Omweenengo oyo, yamukwiira esisa, yaamuleheramo ekobi elyo lyoosi, yaamuleha yawaao.

Nae mani omuhalaabani oyo, niyali akobolayo, yabukanana nende mulala hu bahalaabani basye owaba nende ekobi lyae lya edinaari emia ndala chong'ene; ya mwebbakiraho, yamukwa mu mamiro yaamumika naboola ati, ‘Nduunge ekobi lyaange.’
Mani omuhalaabani waasye, yakwa aasi, ya mwekongooya ati, ‘Ndesimiiriseho, njia ohuhutuunga.’
Nae yahaya ohumutekeeresa, yacha ya musukuna mu mboyero, ohwoola luyahatuunge ekobi elyo.
Nae, abahalaabani basye nibabona batyo, omwooyo kwabachuna muno, bacha baboolera omwenengo waabwe buli siindu syali syeholehe.
Omweenengo oyo yeecha yalaanga omuhalaabani oyo yaamuboolera ati, ‘Ewe omuhalabani mubi! Ese ndahuleheramo ekobi lyakiire awo lyoosi liwaba nalyo olwohuba wandekongooya;
nae ewe, haba siwahakwiriire omuhalabani waasyo esisa, koti lundahukwiira?’
Mani etima lyadiira omwenengo oyo muno, yeecha yaasukuna omuhosi oyo mu mahono kabejiela ohwoola luyahatuunge ekobi lyae lyoosi.
Olwo nilwo lu Lata oli Mukulu lwacha ohuholera buli muundu hweeng'we, nimutaleheramo abasy'eng'we nende omwooyo kweeng'we kwoosi.”
Nae Yesu niyamala ohulomaloma emboosi echo, yatula e Galilaaya yaacha mu situundu sye Buyudaaya, engereha w'omwaalo kwa Yorudaani;
mani esidiyiha sy'abandu syeecha syamulondaho, yamala yabawonisirya ebweene eyo.
Nae Abafalisaayo beecha yali bamuhema nibamuteeba bati, “Mani elako lifukiirira omuundu ohwirusa omuhasi wae hulwa esifune syoosi?”
Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Musisiiri ohusomaho muti ohutula mu huchaaka, Nasae yaloonga omusaacha nende omuhasi,
mani yaboola ati, ‘Hulw'esifune sino, omusaacha achia ohulehaanga simwaana nende ng'ina, yeyambanie nende omuhasi wae, mani bombi behole omubiri mulala’?
Mani bulaanu sibasisiiri babiri, nae omubiri mulala. Sakira esyo si Nasae yawambania alala, omuundu yeesi atasikabuhanianga.”
Nae Abafalisaayo bamuteeba bati, “ Lwasiina Musa yatusa elako ati, omusaacha aberesenge omuhasi ebbarwa y'ohulobana, hwaamale amwirusire elalira?”
Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Musa yabafukiirira ohwirusa abahasi beeng'we, ohweema hu lw'obwaangalafu bw'emyooyo cheeng'we, nae sisyaba sityo ohutula mu huchaaka.
Handi mbaboolera endi, oyo yeesi owirusa omuhasi wae, ataali hu lw'obucheke,” mani yadehya owundi, aba aholere obucheke,
Abeki bae beecha baboola bati, “Ebiindu nibiba bityo akati-kaati w'omusaacha nende omuhasi wae, mani mbawo obutadeehya biba bihira.”
Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Abandu boosi sibanyala bafukiirira enjekesa yino, ohumalaho abo ba Nasae aba yekulirewo.

Olwohuba, biriwo ebiindu bitaali nasilala ebikera omuundu yahaya ohudeehya. Abandu bandi sibanyala hudeehya olwohuba beebulwa batyo; abandi baladwa busa, mani sibanyala hudeehya; nae abandi sibanyala hudeehya olwohuba befwiirisa obulamu bw'ohudeehya, olw'ohuhalaabanira Obwaami bwo Mukulu. Mulehe oyo onyala ohufukiirira, afukiirire.”
Mani beecha baleeta abaana bayere eyiri Yesu abateeho emihono handi abasabire. Nae abeeki bae beecha boolobya abandu;
nae Yesu yababoola ati, “Mulehe abaana beeche yindi, handi mu tabakayira; olwohuba abafwana koti bano, nibo abeene Bwaami bwo Mukulu.”
Yesu yabeesaho amahono, mani yamala yawaawo.
Abweene awo, omusyaani wundi yeecha eyiri Yesu namuteeba ati, “Omweekesa, silayi siina sihoyeere ohuhola, hu fune Obulamu Butaakama?”
Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Lwasiina wundeeba hu biindu bilai? Aliwo omuundu mulala yeng'ene omulai. Nae nooba nodaha ohwingira mu Bulamu, linda Amalako ka Nasae.”
Yateeba Yesu ati, “Malako siina?” Nae Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Otetaanga; Otayiranaanga; Otebaanga; Otabachaanga;
beresaanga latao nende mao oluyaali; handi, dahaanga owaasyo koti omweene luwedaha.”
Omusyaani oyo yaboolera Yesu ati, “Amalako kano koosi, ngalondaanga ohutula mu buyere bwaange; nae siina handi siimba mochoha?”

Yesu yaamuboolera ati, “Nodaha ohuba omuundu mwolerefu, cha okusemo ebiindu byooli nabyo, mani eseende chitulamo ochikabire abamanani, mani oba ochia ohufuna obuyiinda Mukulu; mani omale wiche wunonde.”
Nae omusyaani oyo niyawulira atyo, yatula awo yawaawo niyewunamiire muno, olwohuba yali nende obuyiinda bungi muno.
Mani Yesu yaboolera abeeki bae ati, “Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, sichia ohudinyira muno omuundu muyiinda ohwingira mu Bwaami bwo Mukulu.
Handi mbaboolera endi, syanguyira engamia ohubita mu moni yesindaani, ohuhira omuundu muyiinda ohwingira mu Bwaami bwa Nasae.”
Nae abeeki bae nibawulira sino, bawuka muno baboola bati, “Mani wiina onyala ohuwona?”
Yesu yabatingaala tiiri mu moni, yamala yabakobolamo ati, “Sino sisinyaliha eyiri abandu, nae eyiri Nasae, buli siindu sinyaliha.”
Abweene awo, Peetero yakobolamo naboola ati, “Bone, efwe hwaleha ebiindu byoosi mani hwa huloonda. Ni siina sihwahanyoole?”

Yesu yababoolera ati, “Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi mu syaalo siyaaha, Omwaana w'Omuundu niyahehale hu sisaala syae sy'oluyaali, eng'we abanondaho mwesi mucha ohwihala hu bisaala by'obutuki, ehumi-na-bibiri, muheengere omusango enjia ehumi-na-chibiri cha Yisirayiri.

Mani buli muundu yeesi owaleha enyumba kata bamwaanang'ina, kata bambochong'ene, kata latang'ene, kata ng'ina, kata abaana, kata eloba, hu lw'eliita lyaange, achia ohunyoola amahabi emia ndala eyeebyo, alala nende Obulamu Butaakama.
Nae abangi bataangiramo bacha ohuba abahenerehayo, nae abahenerehayo bacha ohuba abatangiramo.
“Obulamu bwo Mukulu bufwaanana nende omwenengo, owawuuna echuli ohukoonya abandu bamuholera mu ndalo yae y'emisabbiibu.
Niyamala ohuwuliirisania nabo omuheemba kw'edinaari ndala hu ludaalo, yabatuma mu ndalo bache bamuholere.
Handi niyacha erwaanyi esaa chidatu che chuli, yabona abandu bandi nibeemere busa mu siito;
mani yababoolera ati, 'Eng'we mwesi muche mu ndalo yange, njia ohubabeeresa omuheemba okubahoyera.' Mani bosi beemao bacha.
Handi niyali nakeenda erwaanyi esaa chisaasaba, nende esaa chitaanu-na-chine, yahola esiindu nasilala.
Handi aambi w'esawa ehumi-na-ndala, yatula yacha yabukaana abandu bandi bosi nibeemere busa; mani yababoolera ati, ‘Lwasiina, eng'we mweema busa ano oludaalo olulaamba nimutaholaho esiindu syoosi?’
Bamukobolamo bati, ‘Olwohuba awumao omuundu yeesi otubeereseho omulimo.’ Nae yababoolera ati, ‘Mani mwesi muche mu ndalo yange.’

Mani engoloobe niyoola, omweene ndalo y'emisabbiibu yaboolera omuhubbirisa w'abahosi bae ati, ‘Laanga abahosi boosi, obakabe omuheemba kwaabwe; ohuchaakira hu bamaliirihe, omaliriihe nende abatangire.’
Mani abachaaka ohuhola aambi w'esaa ehumi-na-ndala nibeecha, buli muundu yafuna edinaari ndala-ndala.
Nae abatangira ohuhola nibeecha, babaasa bati bacha ohufuna echihiraho awo; mani bosi bafuna edinaari ndala-ndala busa.
Nae nibabukula omuheemba kwaabwe okwo bekanyiisa muno eyiri omwenengo,
nibaboola bati, ‘Boneho, abamaliriihe bano, baholere esaa ndala yong'ene, nae ewe obakabire nasilala nende efwe, abafunihane nende omulimo kw'oludaalo lwoosi mu mubasu kwakiire awo.’
Nae yakobola mu mulala hw'abo ati, ‘ Omwiicha, siindi hubahola esibi daawe; haba sihufukiirisaanie naawe ohuholera edinaari ndala?
Bukula ebyao mani oweeo; ese omweene heengereo ohuberesa omaliriiheyo wuno omuheemba kwaakana nende kuhubereese.
Ese mbula obunyala bw'ohwehunyera ebiindu byaange koti lumba nindaha? Kose oli ohumbalana hulw'obukabi bwaange?’
Mani abahenerehayo bacha ohuba abatangira, nae abatangira bacha ohuba abahenerehayo.”
Mani Yesu niyali naachia e Yerusaalemu, yayira abeeki bae ehumi-na-babiri endulo, mani nibali hu lukeendo, yababoolera ati,
“Mbao hucha e Yerusaalemu; mani Omwaana w'Omuundu achia ohudiiswa mu mahono ka bahuluundu ba Babalaamisi nende Abekesa ba Amalako, mani bamuheengere omusango kw'ohufwa,
handi bamale bamudiise Abateende, bamudulire alala nende ohumuhuya ehoba, mani bamale bamuhomerere hu musalabba, nae hu ludaalo lw'ohudatu achia ohusyuuha.”
Abweene awo, ng'ina baana ba Sebbedaayo yeecha eyiri Yesu naali nende abaana bae babiri, mani yaasigama, mu moni wae ohumusaba esiindu silala syong'ene.
Yesu yamuteeba ati, “Odaha siina?” Yamukobolamo ati, “Wechube oti, abaana bange bano bacha ohwihala, mulala hu muhono kwao muluungi, nae owundi hu muhono omukooda mu Bwaami bwao.”
Nae Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Mbao okoterwe syosaba. Munyala ohung'wa hu sikoombe si njia ohung'wa?” Nae ba mukobolamo bati, “Hunyala.”
Yesu yababoolera ati, “Mucha ohung'wa hu sikoombe syaange, nae eby'ohwihala hu muhono kwaange muluungi oba hu mukooda, mbula obunyala bubeeresa, nae bwabo ba Lata yatekehera.”
Mani abeeki ehumi bala nibawulira esyo, etima lyabadiira muno hulwa abasyaani b'enda ndala abo.
Nae Yesu yabalaanga ohwiicha yali, mani yababoolera ati, “Mumanyire muti abatuki babandu bali mu syaalo muno baheera ohuhalaabanirwa busa, handi abo ababa nende obunyala, batukira busa obwaalaba.
Nae mw'eng'we haba sisihoyeere ohuba sityo; ohumalaho,
buli odaha ohuba omwemeresi, ahoyere abe omuhalaabani w'abaasye;
koti lu Mwaana w'Omuundu ateecha ohuhalaabanirwa nae ohuhalaabanira abandu, nende ohuwaayo obulamu bwae koti omutuulu kw'ohununula abangi.”
Mani nibali nibatula mu Yeriko, esidiyiha sihoongo sy'abandu syeecha syamuloonda.
Nae bone, abawofu babiri bali nibehaale hu ndulo w'engira, nibawulira bati Yesu niye owali niyeecha ohubita, bachaaka ohwekongooya mu kono ly'akulu bati, “Mwaana wa Daudi! Tukwiireho esisa!”
Nae esidiyiha sy'abandu syeecha syabahabuhira, nisiibaboolera ohuwuleera; nae abaofu bano bameeda busa ohwekongooyera akulu muno nibaboola bati, “Mwaana wa Daudi, Tukwiireho esisa!”
Mani Yesu yeecha yeema, mani yabalaanga, nababoolera ati, “Eng'we mudaha mbaholere siina syeene?”
Mani bamukobolamo nibamuboola bati, “Omwaami, efwe hudaha otulimbuse emoni fwesi huboneho!”
Mani Yesu yeecha yabakwiira esisa, mani yabadiira hu moni chaabwe; mani abweene awo, abasaacha abo beecha bachaakiraniramo ohubona, mani baasingira baloonda Yesu.
Nae Yesu nende abeeki bae nibali aambi ohwingira mu siko sye Yerusaalemu, boola e Bbetifaage aambi nende olugulu lwa Olibeti. Mani Yesu yatuma abeeki babiri,
nababoolera ati, “Muche mu siko esibali mu moni, mani mucha ohwakaanayo epunda yibaboyere niyiri nende omwaana kwayo. Muchiboolole, mani muchindeetere.
Nae omuundu wundi nababoolera esiindu syoosi, mumuboolera muti, ‘Omwaami niye ochidaha,’ mani achia ohuchibalehera.”
Sino syeholeha ohwoseresa abweene bi omunabbi yalomaloma naboola ati;
“Muboolere omuhaana wa Siyooni muti, boneho, omutuki wao mbawo yeecha yooli, Muloonga muno, handi yehaale hu punda, Hu mwaana kw'epunda, epunda ndoto.”
Mani, abeeki abo bacha bahola koti lu Yesu yabatuma;
baleeta epunda eyo, nende omwaana kwayo, bachaalaho engubo chaabwe, mani Yesu yehalaho.
Esidiyiha sy'abandu sihoongo nasyo syaala engubo chaabwe hu ngira, nae abandi bawakula amasaga k'emisaala nibakaala hu ngira.
Esidiyiha sy'abandu esyali simwimisiremo, nende esyali simuloondaho, byachaaka ohuhuumula biti, “Hosaana! Omwaana wa Daudi! Wehabi oyo owiicha mu liita ly'Omwaami! Hosaana akulu mu kulu eyo!”
Mani Yesu niyengira mu Yerusaalemu abandu bomu siko omwo boosi basanguluha, edooho lyoosi lyaduma buduma, nibateeba bati, “Wuno ni wiina?”
Esidiyiha nasyo syakobolamo siti, “Wuno niye Yesu Omunabbi ohutula e Nasareti mu Galilaaya.”
Yesu yengira mu nyumba ya Nasae, mani yachaaka ohwiruhaniamo abali bakuliramo nende abali bakusiramo ebiindu, yafumamya emeesa cha abafunjisa eseende nende ebisaala by'abakusa amaburuku.
Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Syandiikwa siti, ‘Enyuumba yange yinalangangwa enyumba ya amalaamo.’ Nae eng'we mu yikaluhanie ohuba eng'ungu ya abanyaka.”
Mani abaofu nende abalema bamala beecha yali mu nyumba omwo, yabawonia.

Nae abahuluundu ba Balaamisi, nende Abekesa ba Malako, nibabona ebyaamayia bi Yesu yali aholere, alala nende abaana bali bahuumulira mu nyumba ya malaamo omwo bati, “Hosaana! Omwaana wa Daudi!” etima lyeecha lyabadiira muno.

Mani beecha bateeba Yesu bati, “Oli ohuwulira bi baana bano baboola?” Nae Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Eee. Nae eng'we musisiiri ohusomaho esyandiiko siboola siti, ‘Ni mu minwa chabayere nende abaana badoto banuuna, nimwo omutula efuma ya Nasae ndayi mubwichufu’?”
Yesu yamala yabaleha awo, yaatula mu siko esyo yacha e Bbetani yi yeyalisa.
Echuli ni buhyere, Yesu yakobola mu siko esyo, yawulira enjala ni yimuluma.

Ni yabona omusaala kw'enduli hundulo w'engira, yaasuda yoola mu sisina, nae yahaya ohunyoolaho esyaamo syoosi, ohumalaho amasaafu kong'ene nikadidya. Mani yaboolera omusaala okwo ati, “Solyaamaho ebyaamo byoosi, ehabi liindi!” Mani omusaala okwo, kwomerao.
Abeki nibabona sino, bawuka muno bateeba bati, “Lwasiina, omusaala kw'enduli kwoomere bwaangu kutyo?”

Nae Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, nimuba nende efukiirira, handi mwahaya ohuba nende ohukana-kana, muba mucha ohunyala ohuhola si ese holere hu musaala kw'enduli, nae kata nimuboolera olugulu luno muti, ‘Siingira ano mani wesukune mu nyaanja,’ nibiba busa koti lumuba muboolere.
Handi nimuba nende efukiirira, muba mucha ohunyoola byoosi-byoosi bimuba nimusabire.”

Yesu yengira mu nyumba y'amalaamo, nae niyaba niyeekesa, abahuluundu ba Balaamisi, alala nende abahuluundu ba Abayudaaya beecha yali bamuteeba bati, “Bunyala siina bwoli nabwo ohuhola ebiindu bino? Nae wiina owahuberesa obunyala obwo?”
Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Syesi njicha ohubatebaho esiindu silala, nae ni musifunyamo, syesi njia ohubaboolera yindatusa obunyala buhola ebiindu bino.

Obunyala bwa Yowaana bwohubatiisa abandu, bwatula yena? Bwatula eyiri Nasae, kose eyiri abandu?” Nae abeene-na-beene bachaaka ohuteebana bati, “Huboole hutye? Nihuboola huti, ‘Bwatula eyiri Nasae,’ aba achia ohututeeba ati, ‘Nae hu siina simwamufukiirira?’
Nae ni huboola huti, ‘Bwatula mu bandu’ hutya bi bandu banyala ohutuhola, olwohuba abandu boosi bomiisa bati, Yowaana yaba omunabbi wadyeeri.”
Mani nibamukobolamo bati, “Hukoterwe.” Nae yesi yababoolera ati, “Syeesi siinjia hubaboolera yindatusa obunyala bwohuhola ebiindu bino.
“Bulaanu nang'we mubaasa mutye? Omuundu wundi yaba nende abaana bae basyani babiri; yacha yaboolera omusyaani muhuluundu ati, ‘Mwaana wange, cha olime mu ndalo yange olwaleero.’
Nae yamukobolamo ati, ‘Siinjia hucha.’ Nae lunyuma, yeecha yebaasa, mani yamala yacha.
Lunyuma, Saabwe yacha eyiri omwaana wundi, yamuboolera yesi ache ahole nasilala atyo. Oyo nae, yamukobolamo ati, ‘Omwaami njia ohuchia,’ nae yamala yahaya ohuchia.

Bulaanu hu babiri abo, wiina owahola si Saabwe yenya?” Bamukobolamo bati, “Omwaana muhuluundu.” Yesu yababoolera ati, mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, Abasolosa b'omusolo nende abahasi bacheke, bacha ohubataangirira ohwingira mu Bwaami bwa Nasae.

Olwohuba, Yowaana yeecha yimuli ohubeekesa engira y'obwadyeeri, nae mwahaya ohumufukiirira; nae abatoosa bomusolo nende abahasi bacheke bamufukiirira. Handi kata ni mwabona mutyo, simwefunaka mwamufukiirira.

Yesu yaboola ati, “Mutekeerese olukaado lundi. Yaliwo omwenengo wundi owataaka endaalo y'emisabbiibu, mani yayisitiraho olukaka ohuyebodoohania, yayabamo esiina syohuhunyiramo efwiini, yamala yombaha omunara. Mani yaapangisa endaalo eyo abalimi bandi, nae omweene amala asamula mu syaalo sy'eyale.
Endaalo chohunoka efwiini nichoola, yatuma abahalabani bae eyiri abalimi abo bamubeerese omukabo kwae.
Nae abalimi nabo, bakwa hu bahalabani bae abo bahuya mulala, beeta owundi, handi balasa owundi amakina.
Nae handi, omweene ndalo oyo yeecha yatuma abahalabani bandi bangi ohuhiraho abatangira, nae abalimi babahola nasilala batyo.
Lunyuma lwa byoosi, yeecha yatuma Omwaana wae mweene naboola ati, ‘Luno leero bacha ohutya Omwaana wange bamube oluyaali.’
Nae nibabona Omwaana wae, bafukiirisania abeene-na-beene bati, ‘Wuno niye omusiha wae; leha mani humwiite, mani huyire omwaandu kwae.’
Mani beecha ba mukwaaho, ba musukuna erwaanyi w'endaalo y'efwiini, bamala ba mwiita.
Bulaanu, omweene ndalo niyahakobole, yahaholere abalimi abo siina?”
Bamuboolera bati, “Syadyeeri, achia ohwiita bubi abalimi babi abo, amale apangise abalimi bandi endaalo yae, abacha ohumuberesa omukabo kwae kw'efwiini, ebiha by'ohufuna nibyoolere.”

Yesu yabateeba ati, “Musisiiri ohusomaho ebyandiiko byolerefu muti; ‘Omusiruunga ku bombahi balekeeresa nikwo okweholere omuhuluundu mu muse; kuno mulimo kw'Omwaami nikwo; handi kutubonehera bulai muno!’
Sakira mbaboolera endi, bacha ohubang'uula obwaami bwa Nasae babubeerese abandu bandi, abaama ebyaamo bilai.”
Abahuluundu ba Balaamisi, nende Abafalisaayo lubawulira engaado Yesu chiyakaada echo, bamanya busa bati nibo bayali alomalomaho.
Nae nibakesaho ohumudiira, beecha batya esidiyiha syali syafukiirira siti, Yesu yali omunabbi wa Nasae.
Yesu handi yalomaloma nabo mu ngaado naboola ati,
“Obwaami bwo Mukulu bufwaanana nende omutuki watekehera omwaana wae musyaani esidyaalo sy'obweeya.
Yatuma abahalabani bae bache baboolere abakeni balaange beeche hu sidyaalo sy'obweeya, nae bahaya ohwiicha.

Handi yeecha yatuma abahalabani bandi naboola ati, ‘Muboolere abakeni balaange abo muti, Mbao malire ohutekeha buli siindu syoosi esidahibwa hu sidyaalo. Njitire elawu change alala nende emoosi nginu, mwiche hu sidyaalo sy'obweeya.’
Nae, abakeni balaange abo sibadeebayo haba, buli otula yechiira busa mu mirimo chae; mulala yacha mu ndalo yae, owundi yacha mu huchurusa,
nae abadong'ereyo nabo bakwa hu bahalabani bae, baabatoocha, bamala baabeeta.
Omutuki oyo yanyoolera muno; mani yatuma abasirikari bae ohuchia ohwiita abatemo abo, alala nende ohusaamba esiko syaabwe.
Mani yaboolera abahalabani bae, ati, ‘Mbao malire ohutekeha esidyaalo sy'obweeya, nae koti abakeni balaangwa hu sidyaalo lubeekese bati sibahoyera ohusibaaho,
mani muche mu masang'angira, mulaange abandu boosi bamubonayo, beeche hu sidyaalo sy'obweeya.’
Mani abahalabani abo bacha hu ngira, babuusa abandu boosi babanyolayo, ababi nende abalayi nasilala; mani esibaanja syamala syechula abakeni ddu.
“Nae omutuki niyengira mu sibaanja ohubona abakeni, yabona omuundu wundi otefwaalire engubo cho hu sidyaalo.
Mani yaamuteeba ati, ‘Wasyaange, wingire otye muno notaali nende engubo cho hu sidyaalo sy'obweeya?’ Nae omuundu oyo yateng'eng'ala, yabulera busa.
Omutuki oyo yemawo yaboolera abahalabani bae ati, ‘Mumuboye amahono nende amakulu, mani mumusukune erwaanyi mu sirima. Eyo niyo yanalirira niyeesia ameeno.’
Yesu yemawo yaamaliirisa ati, 'Abalaangwa bangi, nae abadolwamo badiidi.'”
Olwoola, Abafalisaayo bacha behoba ohuteka Yesu bamudiire munomanoma yae.

Mani batuma abeeki baabwe alala nende abaloondi ba Herode bandi bache eyiri Yesu, nibaboola bati, “Omweekesa, humanyire huti oli omuundu w'obwadyeeri. Wekesaanga engira ya Nasae mu bwadyeeri bweene, notadeeba hu bibaandu babaasa, olwohuba sodebaanga oluyaali lw'abandu daawe.
Bulaanu tuboolere ebibaaso byao? Siba esilai mu malako keefwe, ohutooya omusolo kwa Kaisaali, kose haba?”
Yesu nae yali amanyire hale esichiririrwa syaabwe sibi esyo, mani yababoolera ati, “Abebachirisi eng'we, lwasiina mu ndeka omuteego?
Mani munjekeseho ebbeesa li mutoyeraanga omusolo.” Bamuleetera ebbeesa ly'emwaamwa,
mani yabateeba ati, “Huno, huliho esifwaanani sya naanu, nende eliita lya naanu?”
Bamukobolamo bati, “Bya Kaisaali.” Mani Yesu yababoolera ati, “Mukalusire Kaisaali, ebya Kaisaali, nae Nasae, ebya Nasae.”
Nae nibawulira batyo, bawuka muno, bamuleha mani bawaao.
Ludaalo lweene olwo, Abasadukaayo batafukiirira mu husyuha hw'abafwa, beecha eyiri Yesu,
bamuteeba esiteebo nibaboola bati, “Omweekesa, Musa yaboola ati, ‘Omuundu naafwa, nataalehereho omwaana, mwaanang'ina akerama omuhasi mufwiire oyo, yamala yebulira mwaanang'ina wafwa, abaana.’

Olwoola, yaliwo abasyaani bataanu-na-babiri ab'enyumba ndala. Omuhulundu waabwe, yeecha yadeehya omuhasi wae mani yafwa natebuuleho nae omwaana. Koti luyali nataalehereho omwaana, yalehera mwaanang'ina omuhasi wae oyo.
Sino syosi syeholeha handi hu mwaanang'ina wohubiri, handi hu wohudatu, ohwolera elalira hu wo hutaanu-na-habiri.
Lunyuma, omuhasi oyo yesi yeecha yafwa.
Bulaanu, hu ludaalo lusembayo lu bafwa balisyuhiraho, omuhasi oyo achia ohuba omuhasi naanu? olwohuba boosi bali bamudehyaho?”
Nae Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Awo mudoondobaane muno! Olwohuba mukoterwe kata ebyandiiko byolerefu, alala nende amaani ka Nasae.
Olwohuba mu husyuha hw'abafu, muwumamo ohudeehya kata ohudeeha, nae abandu bacha ohuba koti bamalaika Mukulu.
Nae, ebidiira hu husyuha mu bafu, eng'we musisiiri ohusomaho bi Nasae yababoola naalomaloma ati,
‘Neese Nasae wa Yibbulaimu, handi Nasae wa Yisaka handi Nasae wa Yakobbo’? Amahulundu keene mbwe, siindi Nasae wa abafu, nae ndi Nasae wa abalamu.”
Nae esidiyiha sy'abandu nisyawulira sityo, syawuka muno enjekesa yae.
Nae Abafalisaayo nibawulira bati Yesu amalire ohuteng'eng'asa Abasadukaayo, bebuusa alala,
mani mulala hu Bafalisaayo owali omweekesa w'amalako yachooma Yesu nende esiteebo sy'esiteki ati,
“Omweekesa, lako siina elihira amalako kandi koosi obuhuluundu?”
Nae Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Dahaanga Nasae Omwaami wao nende omwooyo kwao kwoosi, nende obulamu bwao bwoosi, nende amakesi kao koosi.
Lino nilyo elako ly'amberi handi elihira akandi koosi obuhuluundu.
Handi ely'ohubiri elifwaanana nalyo, nilyo, dahaanga owaasyo, koti luwedaha omweene.
Amalako ka Musa koosi, nende enjekesa y'abanabbi yoosi, yeema hu Malako kabiri kano.”
Bulaanu Abafalisaayo nibali be busire alala, Yesu yabateeba esiteebo naboola ati,
“Mubaasa mutye hu Kristo? Mwaana wa naanu?” Bamukobolamo bati, “Mwaana wa Daudi.”
Yesu yabateeba ati, “Lwasiina Daudi niyemereerwe nende Mwooyo Mwolerefu, yamulaanga ati, Omwaami, naboola ati,
‘Omwaami yaboolera Omwaami wange ati, yihala hu muhono kwaange muluungi ohwoola lundahahole abasuku bao babe esiteeni sy'ohulaambisaho amakulu kao’?
Mani Daudi niyamulaanga ati, Omwaami, sinyaliha sitye handi Kristo ohuba omwaana wa Daudi?”
Nae abulao omuundu wundi, kata mulala owanyala ohukobola mu Yesu, handi ohutula ludaalo olwo, abulao omuundu waba nende amaani ak'ohumuteebaho esiteebo siindi.
Olwoola, Yesu yaboolera esidiyiha sy'abandu, alala nende abeeki bae ati,
“Abeekesa b'amalako nende Abafalisaayo, nibo abali mu sifwo sya Musa sy'ohweekesa amalako,
sakira muhoyeere ohuhola alala nende ohuwulira byoosi-byoosi bi bababoolera, nae mutaholaanga koti lu bahola, olwohuba sibahola bibeekesa.
Baboya emikuku misito kitanyaliha bakidwiiha hu mabeka k'abandu bandi, nae abeene sibakesaho kata ohugeeng'a olwala lw'omuhono kwaabwe hu mukuku musito okwo ohubahoonya.

Buli siindu sibahola, bachiiririraanga mbwe abandu bababone. Mani muboneho koti lubabambaliya emisiingiri ch'ebyandiiko byolerefu, bacheboya mu bweeni, nende hu maambala; handi bahola amakemo kamaganduula kaabwe kaba amaleeyi, handi amatakalafu.
Badaha muno obwihalo bw'oluyaali nibali hu sidyaalo, kata mu Sinagoogi;
handi badaha ohubereswa oluyaali luhoongo mu siito, nende abandu ohubafumia bati, Abekesa! Abekesa!
Nae eng'we simuhoyeerwe ohulaangwa muti, ‘Omweekesa,’ olwohuba muli nende omweekesa mulala yeng'ene, niye Kristo, nae eng'we mweesi muli abebulaane.
Handi mu talangaanga omuundu yeesi hu syaalo huno muti, ‘Lata’ olwohuba muli nende Seeng'we mulala yeng'ene, oli Mukulu.
Handi batabalangaanga bati, ‘Abaami’ olwohuba muli nende Omwaami mulala yeng'ene, niye Kristo.
Omuundu ohiramo oluyaali mw'eng'we, ahoyere ohuba omuhalabani w'eng'we.
Omuundu yeesi, oweniinia omweene, achia ohwiiswa aasi, nae omuundu yeesi oweyisa aasi, achia ohuniiniswa.

“Chibakaanire eng'we, Abafalisaayo alala nende Abandiiki b'Amalako, abebachirisi eng'we! Olwohuba mwikalira abandu omulyaango kucha mu Bwaami bwo Mukulu, nae eng'we beene simwingiramo daawe, handi haba simufukiirira abo abadaha ohwingiramo beengira.

Chibanyolere eng'we, Abeekesa b'Amalako nende Abafalisaayo, abebachirisi eng'we! Mung'uula abahasi bafwiire enyumba chaabwe, ni mumala mwekaadirisa nende ohulaama hu leeyi muno! Sakira muchia ohufuna esinyaaso shiramo obuhoongo.

Chibakaanire eng'we, Abekesa b'Amalako nende Abafalisaayo, abebachirisi eng'we! Mukendaana hu syaalo, ni mwambuhana enyaanja, ohwoola lu muchuusa kata omuundu mulala busa, yengira mu diini yeng'we; mani ni mwahamala ohumuchuusa, mukera omuundu oyo yehola omubi w'ohuchia mu muliro kutasima, amahabi kabiri ohuhiraho eng'we beene!

“Chibakaanire eng'we, abemeresi baofu! Mweekesa muti, ‘Omuundu niyechubira enyumba ya Nasae, ohwechuba ohwo sihuhola siindu syoosi, nae niyechubira esaabbu y'omunyuumba ya Nasae, ohwechuba ohwo humudiiraho.’
Abasiru batabona eng'we! Siina esihira esiindi oluyaali, esaabbu, kose enyumba ya Nasae, eyikera esaabbu eyo yaba enjolerefu?
Handi mweekesa muti, ‘Omuundu yeesi niyechubira alutaari, ohwechuba ohwo sihuhola siindu syoosi; nae niyechubira ebiyaanwa biri hu alutaari, ohwechuba ohwo humudiiraho.’
Eng'we nga mwaofulira elalira! Siina esihira esiindi oluyaali, esiyaanwa kose alutaari, eyikera esiyaanwa esyo syaaba esyolerefu?
Sakira omuundu niyechubira alutaari, aaba yechubiire alutaari nende buli siindu syoosi esiyiriho;
handi omuundu niyechubira enyumba ya Nasae, aba yechubiire enyumba ya Nasae, nende Nasae yesi oyirimo;
handi mani omuundu wechubira ekulu, oyo aba yechubiire esisaala sy'obutuki sya Nasae nende Nasae mweene osihalaho.

“Nae chibakaanire eng'we, Abekesa b'Amalako nende Abafalisaayo; eng'we abebachirisi! Olwohuba mubeeresa Nasae silala sy'ehumi esy'ebiindu bidiidi-diidi koti ebitunguru, ebisaari alala nende ebiindu biindi biwunya esiing'aari, nae simudeebayo hu biindu bihoongo bi Malako keekesa koti, ohuba nende obwadyeeri, esisa, nende efukiirira; muhoyeere ohwoseresa ebiindu bino ataali ohulekeresa ebiindi ebyo.
Eng'we abemirisi batabona, mu diinya amaachi muhaye ohung'wa obuduhulu bwoosi, nae eno muli koti abandu bamira obukala ebiindu bihoongo!
“Chibakaanire eng'we, Abekesa b'Amalako nende Abafalisaayo; abebachirisi eng'we! Eng'we aboosa hu Mukulu w'ebikoombe nende ow'esaani, nae mu kati wabyo, mwechula eby'obwiibi nende okuliira.
Abafalisaayo batabona eng'we! Mutaangire mberi mwoose mukati w'esikoombe nende ow'esaani, hu bulaanu erwaanyi yosi yimale yibe endafu.

“Chibakaanire eng'we, Abekesa b'Amalako nende Abafalisaayo; abebachirisi eng'we! Mbao mufwaana nende ebiriindwa ebibahirwe eraangi ya rachaari, ebiboneha bulai bweene hu Mukulu, nae mu kati mwichulemo amakumba ak'abafwa, nende engakaayi chaahwo.
Nasilala, mwesi mucha ohufwaana abolerefu hu Mukulu, nae mu myooyo cheeng'we bweene, mwichulemo obwebachirisi nende obubi.
“Chibakaanire eng'we, Abekesa b'Amalako nende Abafalisaayo; abebachirisi eng'we! Olwohuba neng'we abombaha ebiriindwa bya banabbi, handi mutereesa bilai byeene ebiriindwa by'abolerefu,
nimuboola muti, ‘Huba nihwaliwo mu ndaalo cha bakuuka beefwe, haba sihwahabeere silala nabo muhwiidisa amabaanga k'abanabbi.’
Mbao hane eng'we beene mwetumbulaanga muti muli abechuhulu baabo abeeta abanabbi.
Sakira bulaanu eng'we muchiiririre busa nende ohuhola bi bakuuka beeng'we bi bachaakisa hale.
Eng'we enjuha, handi abaana be ndemo! Munaone mutye ohuheengerwa omusango okw'ohuchia mu muliro kutasima?

Sakira njia ohubatumira abanabbi, nende abandu bakesi muno, nende abekesa b'amalako, abandi hwaabo mucha ohubeeta nimubahomerera hu musalabba, handi abandi mucha ohubanaala ehoba mu Sinagoogi cheeng'we, nimubayiima ohubasaandia ohutula mu siko silala ohwoola mu siindi.

Awo niwo mani, amabaanga k'abolerefu boosi akediswa hu syaalo, kahabeemeho ohutulira elalira hu mabaanga ka Abbeli ohwoola hu mabaanga ka Sakariya omwaana wa Bbarakia, yimweteera akati-kaati w'esifwo syolerefu nende alutaari.
Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, esinyaaso sino syoosi sichia ohwiicha hu luse luno!

“Aaa bae! Eng'we aba Yerusaalemu, abeeta abanabbi, handi abahuya amakina abandu babatumiirwe! Ndahakesaho amahabi maangi muno ohubabuusa alala mbabwiihe koti lu ngoho yibwiha obumwiinyu bwayo mu mbaya chayo, nae mwahaya ohufukiirira.
Boneho enyumba ya Nasae eyo koti luyicha ohwebwaabwa, yidong'e koti ekuunda!
Mani mbaboolera endi, haba simuchia ohumbonaho handi, ohwoola lu mwahaboole muti, ‘Akiniswe oyo owiicha mu liita ly' Omwaami.’ ”
Yesu niyali awao natula mu nyumba y'amalaamo, abeeki bae beecha bamwekesa koti lu nyumba ya Nasae eyo yombahwa bulai.
Nae yabakobolamo ati, “Eng'we mubona ebiindu bino byoosi koti lubiri? Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, libulao ekina licha ohudong'a hu liindi nilitaagumuulwe.”

Yesu niyali niyehaale hu lugulu lwa Olibeti, abeeki bae beecha yali mu bweekisi, bamusaba nibaboola bati, “Tuboolereho ludaalo lweene lu biindu bino byahakwiireo, handi halolero siina ahalyekesa ohwiicha hwao nende enjakamo y'esyaalo?”
Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Mweliinde omuundu yeesi ahaye ohubabachirisa abakose.
Olwohuba, abandu bangi baheeche mu liita lyaange nibaboola bati, ‘Niise Kristo,’ mani bacha ohukosa abandu bangi.
Handi mwahawulire ebiita by'aambi nende eby'eyale, nae mutesinduha daawe, olwohuba bino nibyo ebiindu bihoyeere obubao, nae enjakamo y'esyaalo nayo yisisiiri ohwoola.
Olwohuba, esyaalo silala syahaseete esiindi, handi obutuki bwosi bwahaseete obutuki bundi. Handi wahakweeo enjala nende ohutengereha hw'esyaalo mu bituundu biingi.
Bino byoosi nihwo ohuchaaka busa hw'ohusaanda, koti obuchuuni butaangira omwaana naali aambi ohwibulwa.
“Mani bacha ohubasandia, babeete nende ohubeeta; Handi enjia choosi chicha ohubasyuula hu lw'eliita lyaange.
Mani abandu bangi bacha ohulehuulira efukiirira, mani balye mu basyaabwe olukwe, mani bamale basyulane abeene-na-beene.
Nae abanabbi b'obubacha bangi bacha ohwiicha babache abangi, bamale babakose.
Mani, koti lu huhola ebibi hwemeedere, awo nilwo lu hudahana hwaabandu baangi hucha ohuchalaala.
Nae, omuundu wahagumire ebidinyu ebyo ohwoola hu njakamo, niye owahaone.
Handi Emboosi Ndayi y'Obwaami bwa Nasae buno, yicha ohwekeswa mu syaalo syoosi. Sino sibe esyohuboneraho eyiri abandu boosi, hu njakamo y'esyaalo yimale yoole.
“Mani nimubonaanga amatichasi ka amasira omunabbi Danieri kayalomalomaho hale niketengeehe mu sifwo sy'olerefu, (omuundu osoma emboosi chino, yekute amahulundu kacho),
mani abandu bali mu Buyudaaya beeruhire mu ngulu.
Nae omuundu wahabe hu sirama sy'enyumba, haba siyahehe aasi ohubukula ebiri mu nyumba yae.
Handi omuundu wahabe mundalo, haba siyahakobole engo ohweenda engubo chae.
Chahakaane muno abahasi baliba asito, mu ndaalo echo, alala nende abahasi baliba nende abaana badoto basinuuna!
Nae eng'we mwekongooye busa ebiha by'ohwiruhiramo hw'eng'we, bihaye obubao mu ndaalo ch'emboo y'omunyiti, kata hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato!
Olwohuba ebiha ebyo husaanda hw'amakana hucha obubao ohutabechaangao ohutula esyaalo ni siloongwa ohwoola bulaanu buti, handi sihwahabeeo ehabi liindi daawe.
Handi endaalo echo chiba nichitahendeeswaho, abulao omuundu yeesi owahaonere daawe. Nae hu lw'obulayi bw'abandu badoole ba Nasae, endaalo echo chahendeswaho.
Mani omuundu yeesi nababoolera ati, ‘Mubone Kristo, nguno!’ Kata ati, ‘Ngula’ - mutasifukiriraanga.

Olwohuba wahabeeo abelaanga Kristo bataali badyeri, nende abelanga abanabbi bataali badyeri; bacha ohwoola baholeenge eby'amayia biingi by'ohubachirisa abandu, nga bachiririra nisinyaliha ohukosa kata abadoole ba Nasae.
Mani mweliinde, mbawo malire ohubaboolera bino oludaalo olwo nilutoola.
Sakira, nibababoolera bati, ‘Boneho ngula ali mu sichiimi sira,’ mutachichaangayo; handi ni baboola bati, ‘Boneho ngula ali mu bigoro by'omukati w'enyumba, mutasifukiriraanga.’
Olwohuba koti lu lumesu lw'efula lumesuha ohutula ebukwe ohwoola emumbo, nilwo nasilala lu hwiicha hw'Omwaana w'Omuundu hucha ohuba.
Olwohuba, yi siindu syoosi sifwiira, awo niwo yi eswi chebuusira alala.
“ ‘Ohusaanda hw'endaalo echo nihwahawe huti; elyuuba licha ohwirima, handi omwoosi sikwahaduhe. Ening'ining'i chahabulunguhe ohutula Mukulu, handi amaani ko Mukulu kacha ohudengaana.’

Awo niwo ahalolero h'omwaana w'Omuundu hacha ohubonehera Mukulu, handi enjia choosi echohusyaalo chicha ohulira handi chicha ohubona Omwaana w'Omuundu nakobolera hu maleesi byo Mukulu naali nende amaani alala nende oluyaali luhoongo muno.
Mani achia ohutuma ba malaika bae ohuubba olwiika nende ekono hoongo, mani babuuse alala abadoole bae ohutula mu mbeka ch'esyaalo choosi, ohutula hu mbeka ndala y'ekulu ohwoola hu yindi.
“Bulaanu mweekere hu musaala kw'omusabbibbu. Esaga ly'akwo nilitusa amasaafu madoto liti, eng'we mu manya busa muti, endaalo ch'omubasu chiri aambi.
Sakira eng'we mwesi nimubona ebiindu bino byoosi, mucha ohumanya muti, ali aambi ohwoola, ali hu siruwa bweene.
Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, oluse luno siluchia huwaao ebiindu bino byoosi nibiteholeha.
Ekulu nende esyaalo bicha ohuwaao, nae emboosi change haba sichahaweeo daawe.
“Nae oludaalo lweene olwo, kata ebiha byeene, abulao omuundu omanyire, kata bamalaika bo Mukulu, kata Omwaana ohutusaho Latang'ene yeng'ene niye omanyire.
Koti lubyali mu ndaalo cha Nowa, handi nilwo nasilala lu bicha ohuba hu ludaalo lu mwaana w'Omuundu yahechereho.
Olwohuba, oludaalo lwa maachi k'ofwomboole, nilusiiri ohwoola, abandi bali nibalya, nibang'wa, abasaacha nibadeehya, abahasi nibadeeha, ohwoola hu ludaalo lu Nowa yengirira mu lyaato,
nae haba sibanyala ohumanya ohwoola lu maachi k'ofwomboole keecha kaabamira, nasilala nilwo lusyahabe hu ludaalo lu mwaana w'Omuundu achia ohwichiraho.
Ebiha ebyo, abasaacha babiri bahabe mu ndalo, mulala bahamubukule, nae owaasye bamuleha.
Abahasi babiri bahabe nibasia hu lukina, bahabukuleho mulala nae owundi adoong'e.
Sakira mube abetekefu, olwohuba mukoterwe oludaalo lu Mwaami yahechereho.
Nae sino musimanye muti, omwenengo aba niyamanya ebiha by'esiro bi mwiibi yecheramo, aba yahetekehe, mani yahaya ohukanya omwiibi yafunaka enyumba yae.
Sakira eng'we mwesi mube abetekefu, olwohuba Omwaana w'Omuundu achia ohwiicha mu biha bimutamubaasiramo.
“Nae muundu siina oba omuhalabani mukesi-kesi handi omwesikwa, yi mweneengo wae ataawo ohuliinda edaala lyae? Oyo niye omuundu obeeresa abandu bomungo omwo eby'ohulya mu biha bihoyera.
Omuhalabani oyo, aba ali owehabi, yi mweneengo wae naaba naakobola, amwakaana naahola emirimo chae echo.
Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, omwenengo wae achia ohumuhola aliinde emyaandu chae choosi.
Nae niwichuhira omuhalabani yaba omubi, omweene yachaaka ohuboola mu mwooyo kwae ati, omwenengo wae ahiindire ohukobola,
mani yachaaka ohuhuya abahalabani basye, handi yachaaka ohulya nende ohung'wa alala nende abameesi,
omwenengo wae aba achia ohukaluha hu ludaalo lw'atabasirisiramo nende mu biha by'atamanyire.
Mani omwenengo oyo achia ohumusaandia, amale amube esinyaaso alala nende abebachirisi, eyo niyo yibacha ohulirira alala n'ohwesya ameeno.
“Sakira Obwaami bwo Mukulu bulifwaananisibwa nende abahaana ehumi, abakiinga amataara kaabwe, bacha ohubukaanira omweeya musaacha.
Bataanu, baba abasiru, nae bataanu baba abakesi.
Abahaana bataanu basiru bakiinga amataara kaabwe, nae sibakiinga amafuta daawe.
Nae abahaana bataanu bakesi, bakiinga echupa cha amafuta alala nende amataara kaabwe.
Nae, koti lu mweya yahiinda ohwoola, boosi beecha bakuunuha, endoolo chamala chabayira.
Mani musiro akati, esihu syechiira nibaboola bati, ‘Bone, omweeya nguno yolere! Mutule mumubukanire!’
Abweene awo, abahaana abo boosi basiingira mani bawambia amataara kaabwe.
Nae abahaana basiru beecha baboolera abakesi bati, ‘Eng'we mutubeeho hu mafuta keeng'we, mbano amatara keefwe kadaha ohusiima.’
Nae abahaana bakesi bakobolamo bati, ‘Wichuhira amafuta kahuli nako kahaya ohutumala, efwe naang'we. Silayi muche eyiri abakusa, abeene mwekulire.’
Nae nibali bachiire ohukula amafuta, omweeya musaacha yeecha yoola, mani abali nibamalire ohwetekeha, beengira nae musidyaalo sy'obweeya; bamala bekalawo omulyaango.
Nae lunyuma abahaana bandi bala beecha bakobola mani baboola bati, ‘Omwaami twiikulireo.’
Nae yakobolamo ati, ‘Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, haba simbamanyire.’
Sakira eng'we mwetekehe, olwohuba simumanyire oludaalo kata nende ebiha.
“Obwaami bwo Mukulu buchia ohufwaananisibwa nende omwenengo wundi owali achia olukeendo eyale, mani yalaanga abahalaabani bae, yabalehera obuyiinda bwae babuliinde;
yabeeresa omuundu mulala etalanta chitaanu, owundi etalanta chibiri, nae handi omuundu wundi etalanta ndala ohweema hu maani ka buli muundu. Nae omwenengo oyo naamala achia hulukeendo lwae.
Omuundu yibaba etalanta chitaanu, yacha bwaangu yachurusiramo, mani yeecha yanyoola etalanta chitaanu chiindi.
Omuundu yibaberesa etalanta chibiri, yesi yeecha yafuna etalanta chibiri chiindi,
nae omuundu yibaberesa etalanta ndala yacha yayaba eliina muloba yaasiihamo obuyiinda bw'omwenengo wae.
Mani lunyuma, ebiha bileeyi nibibitireo, omwenengo w'abahosi abo yakobola, yachaaka ohubaliirira emyaandu chae chiyali nabaleheere.
Mani omuundu yibaberesa etalanta chitaanu yeecha yatusayo etalanta chitaanu chiindi naboola ati, ‘Omwaami, wamberesa etalanta chitaanu, mbano ndanyola chitaanu chiindi.’

Omweenengo wae yakobolamo naboola ati, ‘Webale muno, omuhalaabani mulai handi omwesikwa; weekese obwesikwa bwao mu biindu bidiidi, njia ohuhubeeresa ebiindi bihira hoo; yingira mu sangaalo ly'Omwaami wao.’
Nae omuundu yibaberesa etalanta chibiri naboola ati, ‘Omwaami, wamberesa etalanta chibiri, mbano funire chibiri chiindi.’

Omweenengo wae yamukobolamo naboola ati, ‘Webale muno, omuhalaabani mulai handi omwesikwa; weekese obwesikwa mu biindu bidiidi, njia ohuhubeeresa ebiindi bihira hoo; yingira, mu sangaalo ly'Omwaami wao.’
Nae omuundu yibaberesa etalanta ndala yesi naboola ati, ‘Omwaami, manyire endi oli omuundu mwomeranu. Okesa yotataakire esiindu syoosi, handi wabuusa yotabakaale.
Sakira obuti bwandiira ndaacha ndaabiiha etalanta yao muloba. Mani bukula ebyao, mbano hukalusiire.’
Nae omwenengo wae yamukobolamo ati, ‘Ewe omuhalaabani mubi handi omukata, hane wamanya oti ngesa yitataakire, handi mbuusa yitabakaale?
Lwasiina siwabukula eseende change wachibiiha yibabiihanga eseende, mani nimba ningoboole, sindahaduhaane ebiindu byaange nibyemeedereho?
Mani nibiri bityo, mumutuseho etalanta eyo, muberese oyo oli nende etalanta ehumi.
Olwohuba omuundu yeesi oli nabyo, achia ohumedwaho ebiindi, mani abe nende ebihiraho byadaha. Nae omuundu otaali nende esiindu syoosi-syoosi, kata syali nasyo bacha ohumutusaho.'
Mani omuhalaabani owuma obuhoonyi oyo, mumusukune erwaanyi mu sirima siingi; yibacha ohulirira nibeesia ameeno.’
“Mani Omwaana W'omuundu nalikobola mu luyaali lwae, alala nende bamalaika bae boosi, achia ohwihala hu sisaala syae sy'oluyaali sy'obutuki.
Enjia choosi chaheeche chebuusira mu moni wae, mani achia ohukabulamo abandu amahabi kabiri, koti lu omwaayi lwakabula amakoondi nende embusi.
Achia ohuta amakoondi hu muhono kwae muluungi, nae embusi hu muhono mukooda.
Mani omutuki oyo achia ohuboolera abo abali hu muhono kwae muluungi ati, ‘Eng'we ba Lata yabeeresa ehabi, mwiche mubukaane obwaami bubabatekehera ohutula ohuloongwa hw'esyaalo;
olwohuba ndali numwa enjala, mwaamba eby'ohulya; ndali numwa obuluwo, mwaamba esy'ohung'wa; ndali omukeni mweng'we, mwambukanira;
ndali mbula esy'ohwefwaala, mwafwaasa; ndali omulwaae, mweecha mwambona; ndali mu mboye, mweecha mwaangeniya.’
Nae abolerefu abo bamukobolamo bati, ‘Omwaami, liina luhwahubona enjala niyihuluma, hwahuliisa, kose nolumwa obuluwo, hwahubeeresa esyohung'wa?
Handi liina luhwahubona nolwaala, kose nowuma esyohwefwaala hwahufwaasa?
Handi liina luhwahubona nolwaala, kose nooli mu mboye hwahukeniya?’
Nae Omutuki oyo achia ohubakobolamo ati, ‘Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, lumwahola esyo eyiri oyo ohiramo obudiidi hu bandu bange, mwaholera ese.’
Mani achia ohuboolera abo abali hu muhono kwae mukooda ati, ‘Mbweere eyi, eng'we abalaamwa! Mwingire mu muliro kutasima okwatekeherwa Sitaani nende bamalaika bae;
olwohuba enjala yali yinuma, mwahaya ohumberesa esy'ohulya, obuluwo bwali buunuma, mwahaya ohumberesa esy'ohung'wa,
ndali omukeni, mwahaya ohunjakaanira; ndali mbula esy'ohwefwaala, mwahaya ohufwaasa; ndali omulwaae, handi ndali mu mboye, mwahaya ohungeniya.’

Mani abo bosi bacha ohukobolamo bati, ‘Omwaami, liina luhwahubona enjala niyihuluma, kose obuluwo nibuhuluma, kose nooli omukeni, kose nowuma esy'ohwefwaala kose nolwaala kose nooli mu mboye, mani hwahaya ohuhuhoonya?’
Nae achia ohubakobolamo ati, ‘Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, koti lumutahola esyo eyiri mulala ohiramo obudiidi hu bandu bange bano, haba simwasiholera.’
Mani bacha ohutula awo, beengire musinyaaso esitaakama, nae aboolerefu bahache mu Bulamu butaakama.”
Olwoola, Yesu niyamala ohulomaloma ebiindu bino byoosi, yabolera abeeki bae ati,
“Mumanyire muti endaalo chibiri nichiwa, esidyaalo sya Paasaka sichia ohwoola, mani Omwaana W'omuundu achia ohudiiswa mu mahono k'abandu bacha ohumuhomerera hu musalabba.”
Mani Abalaamisi bahuluundu nende abemirisi ba bandu beecha bahung'anira mu lwaanyi lwa Omulaamisi muhuluundu olaangwa Kayaafa,
mani bahola olukwe lwohudiira Yesu bamwiite mu ngiso.
Nae beecha baboola bati, “Hutahola sino hu ludaalo luhuluundu, olwohuba abandu banyala ohukwaamo eesisi”
Yesu niyali e Bbetani mu nyumba ya Simooni, owali yalwaalaho obulwaae bwa makere,
omuhasi wundi yeecha eyiri Yesu naali nende echupa ya mafuta kesing'aari handi ak'ebbeyi y'akulu, mani yakamuchuha hu mutwe. Yesu yali niyehaale naalya.
Nae abeeki bae nibabona batyo, haba sibawulira bulai, baboola bati, “Ohunyaasa amafuta mutyo hwaasi?
Olwohuba amafuta kano bahakakusiremo ebbeyi yaakulu muno, mani eseende chitulamo baachikabira abamanani.”
Nae Yesu koti luyali namanyire bino yababoolera ati, “Omuhasi wuno mumufwambya siina? Olwohuba yaholeere esiindu silayi muno.
Buli siha muli nende abamanani, nae simuchia ohuba naange ebiha byoosi.
Olwohuba omuhasi wuno yanjuhireho amafuta kano natekeha omubiri kwaange ohuchia ohusiihwa.
Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, buli abundu woosi, mu syaalo syoosi, yibaneekesenge Emboosi Endayi yino, esiindu siyaholeere sino, bacha ohusilomalomaangaho ohumwichulisa.”
Olwoola, mulala hu beeki ehumi-na-babiri, olaangwa Yuda Yisikarioti yacha eyiri Abalaamisi bahuluundu,
mani yabateeba ati, “Munamberesa siina ni mbadiisa Yesu?” Nae bamubalira eseende chefeesa ebituundu amahumi kadatu bamubeeresa.
Ohutula ebiha ebyo, Yuda yachaaka ohukiiya engira yaanyala ohuliira mu Yesu olukwe.
Bulaanu, hu ludaalo lutaangira lw'esidyaalo sy'emigaati chobusye obutaali bubbaahe, abeeki ba Yesu beecha yali bamuteeba bati, “Odaha huhutekehere ena owohuliira esidyaalo sya Paasaka?”

Nae yababoolera ati, “Muche mu siko, ow'omuundu wundi mu muboolere muti, ‘Omweekesa aboola ati, ebiha byaange mbawo byoolere; njia ohuliira esidyaalo sya Paasaka alala nende abeeki bange mu nyumba yao.’ ”
Mani abeeki bahola koti lu Yesu yababoolera, bacha batekeha esidyaalo sya Paasaka.
Nibwoola engoloobe, Yesu yehala alala nende abeeki ehumi-na-babiri, bachaaka ohulya.
Mani nibali balya, Yesu yaboola ati, “Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi mulala hw'eng'we achia ohudyaamo olukwe.”
Abeki bawuka muno, bachaaka ohumuteeba syamulala-mulala bati, “Omwaami, oli ohuboola ese, kose?”
Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Oyo otoonga naange mu saani ndala niye ochia ohundyaamo olukwe.
Mani Omwaana w'Omuundu achia ohufwa koti lu byandiiko byolerefu bimuboolaho, nae chakaanire oyo ochia ohulya mu mwaana w'Omuundu olukwe! Byahahirire omuundu oyo obuteebulwa!”
Abweene awo Yuda omuhobi yalomalomera akulu ati, “Omweekesa, oli ohuboola ese, kose?” Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Mbao omweene oboolere.”
Bulaanu nibali basiilya, Yesu yabukula omugaati, yaakusabira ehabi, yaakumekula-mekula mani yaakuberesa abeeki bae naboola ati, “Mubukule mulye, kuno nikwo omubiri kwaange.”
Handi yabukula esikoombe, mani niyamala ohwebasa, yasiberesa abeeki bae naboola ati, “Mubukule, mung'we husino mweesi;
olwohuba kano niko amabaanga kange aka elakano akacha ohwidiha hulwa bandu bangi ohuleherwamo ebibi.
Mbaboolera endi siinjia hung'wa handi hu syaamo sy'efwiini ohwoola hu ludaalo lundahang'weereho efwiini njiaha alala nang'we mu Obwaami bwa Lata.”
Mani nibamala ohweemba olweembo lw'ohufumia Nasae, batula bacha hu lugulu lwa Olibeti.
Abweene awo, Yesu yababoolera ati, “Mweesi mucha ohwiruha mundehe syeng'ene esiro sya leero, olwohuba syandiikwa siti, ‘Njia ohuhubba omwaayi, mani amakoondi k'omusidwooli kasalaane.’
Nae nimalire ohusyuuha, njia ohubataangiriramo ohuchia e Galilaaya.”
Peetero yalomalomera alafu namuboolera ati, “Kata nende abandi boosi bahulehe, ese haba siinjia huhuleha daawe.”
Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Huboolera obwadyeeri endi, esiro sy'olwaleero sino, engoho niyisisiiri ohuholyooha, onaba wundekaanire amahabi kadatu.”
Peetero nae yamuboolera ati, “Kata nihuli ohufwa naawe, haba siinjia ohuhwekaana.” Mani nilwo nasilala lu beeki bandi bosi baboola.
Mani Yesu yamala yacha nende abeeki bae mu sifwo silaangwa siti, Getesemaane, yaboolera abeeki bae ati, “Eng'we mudong'e ano, njieho aala ndekongooye.”
Niyamala atyo, yabukula Peetero nende abaana ba Sebbedaayo babiri yacha nabo. Engisa yeecha yamudiira muno, yaba nende ohwelalihira hungi.
Mani yababoolera ati, “Engisa enyiingi yindi hu mwooyo, kata yinyala ohunjita-bwiita. Eng'we mudong'e ano mani muliinde ni naange.”

Mani niyasudaho budiidi mu moni ati, yenama, yageng'a aasi obweeni yekongooya naboola ati, “Lata, nisinyaliha, esikoombe syohusaandisibwa sino sihaye ohunjolaho; nae sitaba koti lu ese ndaha, ohutusaho sibe koti lu ewe odaha.”
Nae yakaluha eyiri abeeki bae yabanyoola nibakona mani yaboolera Peetero ati, “Simunyala ohumokaho naange kata esaa ndala yong'ene?
Muliinde, mani mwekongooye hu muhaye ohukwa muhuhemwa. Omwooyo kweenya nae omubiri nikwo omukata.”
Handi ehabi lyohubiri yasingira yacha ohwekongooya naboola ati, “Lata, esikoombe sino, nisitachia ohundulaho nitasing'weere, leha syodaha siholebwe.”
Yakobola handi yanyoola nibakona olwohuba emoni chaabwe chali chisidoye, chichuule endoolo.
Mani yeecha yabaleha awo, handi yacha ohwekongooya ehabi lyohudatu naboola emboosi nasilala echo.
Yakobola eyiri abeeki bae mani yaboola ati, “Eng'we musikonere nimwewuluhira busa? Bone! Ebiha mbano byahoola eby'ohuliiramo Omwaana W'omuundu olukwe, bamudiise mu mahono kaababi.
Musiingire huweeo; omuhobi nguno amalire ohwoola.”

Yali asilomalomaanga atyo, Yuda, mulala hu beeki ehumi-na-babiri niyoola. Yaba ali nende esidiyiha sy'abandu nibakiingire engaanga nende endabuhi nibatula eyiri Abalaamisi bahuluundu nende abemirisi b'Abayudaaya.
Bulaanu omuhobi oyo yali amalire ohuwuliirisania nende esidiyiha esyo ohubabeeresa ahalolero mbwe, “Oyo yindaakwe musirifu niye yimwenya, mumukweho mumudire.”
Yuda niyoola yachooma Yesu naboola ati, “Omweekesa, emireembe kibe naawe!” Mani yamukwa musirifu.
Yesu yamukobolamo ati, “Wasyaange, siina esihuleteere?” Mani beecha bakwa hu Yesu bamudiira.
Nae bone, mulala hu abo abali nende Yesu, yachoolayo olugaanga yaatemaho ohutwi hw'omuhalabani w'Omulaamisi muhuluundu.
Nae Yesu yaamuboolera ati, “Kalusa olugaanga lwao musilaalo syalwo, olwohuba abo boosi abehonyera olugaanga, balifwa olugaanga.
Mubaasa muti sinyala ohwekongooya Laata yamberesa obuhoonyi, ni abweene awo atuma eye lya bamalaika emikaanda kihira ehumi-na-kibiri?
Nae nibyahabeere bityo, ebyandiiko byolerefu ebiboola biti, bino bihoyeere ohuholebwa, byaholereere bitye?”

Esiha esyo, Yesu yalomaloma nende esidiyiha esyo naboola ati, “Mwiichire nende engaanga alala nende endabuhi ohundiira, koti abechera omwiibi? Buli ludaalo mbechaanga ninjekesa mu nyumba ya Nasae nae husiina simundiraanga.
Nae bino byoosi biholebwe hu bi banabbi bandiika byolerere abweene.” Mani abeeki boosi beecha beeruha baleha Yesu yeng'ene.
Abo abali badiirire Yesu beecha bamuyira ewa Kayaafa omulaamisi muhuluundu, yi beekesa bamalako nende abemirisi babandu bali bebusiire.
Nae Peetero yamulondaho enyuma ohwoola mulwaanyi lw'omulaamisi muhuluundu oyo. Yengira mulwaanyi yehala aasi nende abaliindi nadaha ohubona koti lu buli siindu sinaabe.
Bulaanu Omulaamisi Muhuluundu nende ab'esiina boosi bakesaho ohukonyeresa obuloli bw'obubacha obudiira hu Yesu obunyala ohukera bamwiita;
nae haba sibanyoolaho esiindu syoosi. Kata katyo mbwe abandu bangi bakesaho ohulomaloma ebyobubacha hu Yesu. Lunyuma abandu babiri bamala beema,
baboola bati, “Omuundu wuno yaboola ati, ‘Nyala ohulikula enyumba ya Nasae yino, handi ndayombahira mu ndaalo chidatu.’ ”
Mani Omuhulundu w'Abalaamisi, yasingira yateeba Yesu ati, “Obulaho nende esyohukobolamo kata silala? Siina syeene si bano bahufwaambya?”
Yesu nae yabuleera-buwuleera. Mani Omuhulundu w'Abalaamisi, yakobolamo naboola ati, “Mu liita lya Nasae Mulamu, ndaha wechube: Tuboolere nooli Kristo Omwaana wa Nasae.”

Yesu nae Yamuboolera ati, “Niiwe oboolere otyo. Nae mbaboolera endi, ohutula olwaleero, mucha ohubona Omwaana w'Omuundu niyehaale hu muhono muluungi kwoyo oli n'obunyala bwoosi, handi niyeechera hu maleesi ko Mukulu.”
Mani Omuhulundu w'Abalaamisi, yataandula engubo chae naboola ati, “Ngandi enomanoma yino y'ohufwoola Nasae. Husiina handi hukoonya obuloli bundi? Mbao abeene mwewuliirire emboosi chae embi echo.
Nae eng'we muheengao mutye?” Bakobolamo bati, “Ahoyera ohufwa.”
Mani abweene awo bachaaka ohumufuuchaho amate mu moni alala nende ohumuhuya; nae abandi bamupaama nibaboola bati,
“Ewe Kristo, tutumbulire, Wiina mweene ohuhuyire?”
Esiha esyo, Peetero yali yehaale erwaanyi mu lwaanyi, nae omuhaana mulala hu bahalaabani b'Omulaamisi Muhuluundu yeecha yali yamuboolera ati, “Ewe wesi obeere nende Yesu Omugalilaaya.”
Nae Peetero yekaana muno mu moni wa bandu boosi ati, “Ese ngoterwe byooli ohuboola ebyo.”
Niyamala yasingira yaachia musiruwa. Omuhaana wundi yamubona awo, yaboolera abali beemere awo ati “Omusaacha wuno yesi abere nende Yesu Omunasareeti.”
Peetero handi yekaana niyechuba ati, “Omuundu oyo, ese haba simumanyire.”
Ebiha bidiidi nibyabitao, abali nibeemere awo, beecha eyiri Peetero bamuboolera bati, “Mubwadyeeri bweene, ewe oli mulala hu bandu bae, olwohuba engeri yolomalomeramo yihubuula.”
Handi Peetero yachaaka ohwekaana niyechuba ati, “Omusaacha oyo ese mukoterwe.” Abweene awo, edaaywa niyiholyooha.
Mani Peetero yechulisa bi Yesu yaboola ati, “Edaaywa niyisisiiri ohuholyooha, onaabe wundekaanire amahabi kadatu.” Mani yaatula erwaanyi yaalira muno.
Nibwahya mumaherebeende, abahuluundu ba Balaamisi boosi, nende Abemeresi babandu beehala bawuliirisania engira y'ohwiita Yesu;
mani bamuboya bacha bamudiisa Pilaato owali Gafana.

Nae Yuda omuhobi, niyabona ati bamalire ohuheengera Yesu omusango kw'ohufwa, yefunaka mani yakobosera abahuluundu b'Abalaamisi nende Abemirisi ba bandu, eseende ch'efeesa, ebituundu amahumi kadatu, naboola ati,
“Holere esibi muhulya olukwe amabaanga kataaliho omusango.” Nabo baboola bati, “Ebyo nibyo siina hw'efwe? Ebyo byao omweene.”
Mani Yuda nasukuna aasi ebituundu by'efeesa mu nyumba ya Nasae, mani yawaawo yacha yemika.
Nae abahuluundu b'Abalaamisi, babukula ebituundu by'efeesa, baboola bati, “Sisihoyerwa ohuta eseende chino musibiihiro olwohuba seende ch'amabaanga nicho.”
Beecha bawuliirisania, mani baachikulamo eloba hu muloongi w'endamu, elyohusihangamo Abateende.
Sakira eloba elyo balilaanga eloba ly'amabaanga nolwaleero.
Mani, bi munabbi Yeremiya yaboola byolerera biti, “Mani babukula ebituundu by'efeesa amahumi kadatu, obukusi bu baana Bayisirayiri bandi bamutaaho,
mani bachehonyera ohukula eloba ly'omuloongi w'endamu koti Nasae luyandagira.”
Abweene awo, Yesu yeema mu moni wa Gafana; nae Gafana yaamuteeba ati, “Niiwe omutuki w'Abayudaaya?” Yesu yamukobolamo ati, “Omweene niiwe owahaboola otyo.”
Nae Abalaamisi bahuluundu nende Abemeresi babandu nibali bamwaayirisa, siyabakobolamo esiindu syoosi.
Mani Pilaato yamuboolera ati, “Ewe haba sowulira koti bahwayirisa mu biindu biingi bino?”
Nae Yesu siyakobolamo emboosi yoosi kata hu musango mulala; sino syawukia Gafana muno.
Hu buli sidyaalo sya Paasaka, yali esaambo ya Gafana ohubalehuliraanga omuboye mulala, yi bandu baba nibasabire.
Mani mu biha ebyo, bali n'omuboye w'esaambo mbi muno olaangwa Bbarabba.
Mani nibaba nibebuusire, Pilaato yabateeba ati, “Mudaha mbalehuulire wiina mweene? Bbarabba, kose Yesu olaangwa Kristo?”
Olwohuba yali amanyire ati embaliha yaabwe niyo eyakera bamudiisa Yesu.

Handi Pilaato niyali yehaale hu sisala sy'ohuheengeraho emisango, omuhasi wae yeecha yaamutumira emboosi ati, “Otaholaho esiindu syoosi hu muundu otaliho obubi oyo, olwohuba mbeere nende obunyaahani bungi nimulootaho musiro sy'olwaleero.”
Nae Abalaamisi bahuluundu nende Abemeresi ba bandu bawooya esidiyiha sy'abandu basabe Pilaato abalehulire Bbarabba, nae Yesu anyaasibwe.
Gafana yababoolera ati, “Wiina mweene hu bano bombi yimudaha mbalehuulire?” Mani bakobolamo bati, “Bbarabba.”
Pilaato yabateeba ati, “Nae Yesu olaangwa Kristo, muhole endye?” Boosi baboola bati, “Leha ahomererwe.”
Nae Pilaato nabateeba ati, “Aholere sibi siina?” Nae bemeeda ohuwaasira akulu ni baboola bati, “Leha ahomererwe.”

Mani Pilaato niyabona ati sibimuhoonya ohuchiiririra nende ebiteebo, olwohuba abandu bali bemeeda busa ohusasakala, yabukula amaachi, yesaaba amahono, abandu boosi ni babona naboola ati, “Mbulaho omusango kwoosi hu Makulu k'omuundu wuno; abeene mubone esy'ohuhola.”
Nae abandu boosi bakobolamo bati, “Leha amabaanga kae kabe hw'efwe nende hu baana beefwe!”
Mani Pilaato yamala yabalehulira Bbarabba. Nae nibamala ohunaala Yesu ehoba, yabadiisa Yesu bache bahomerere.
Mani Abasirikari ba Gafana bayira Yesu mu dooho lya Pilaato elilaangibwa 'Praetorium' mani eye lyoosi lyeecha lyamwebodohania.
Mani bamufwaalula engubo chae, bamufwaasa ekaanju ly'omudoba kwa ranjaayi.

Mani nibasiinga engata y'amawa nibamufwaasa hu mutwe koti esitweetwe, mani nibamudiisa omukwajo mu muhono kwae muluungi. Mani nibasigama mu moni wae, nibamuhoomolera nibaboola bati “Yindira, ewe omutuki w'Abayudaaya!”
Mani bamufuchaho amate, handi baabukula ekada bamuhuya hu mutwe.
Nibamala ohumuhoomolera batyo, beecha bamufwaalulamo ekaanju, bamufwaasa engubo chae cheene, mani bamutusa erwaanyi bache bamuhomerere.
Nibali nibatula erwaanyi, babukaanana nende omusaacha otula e Sireeni olaangwa Simooni. Mani beecha bamuyiika ohwedwiiha omusalabba kwa Yesu.
Nae niboola abundu alaangwa ati, Gologoosa (amahulundu kasyo mbwe, Esifwo sy'ebiyaanga),
baabeeresa Yesu efwiini yibasasiremo ekaha; nae niyayihombaho, yahaya ohuying'wa.
Nae nibamala ohumuhomerera, bakabana engubo chae nibachubbira eha;
mani beecha beehala awo ohumuliinda.
Nae akulu w'omutwe kwae nibataao omusango kumufwambya nikusoma kuti, “Wuno niye Yesu, Omutuki w'Abayudaaya.”
Abweene awo baba bahomererewo abeebi babiri alala nende Yesu, mulala hu muhono muluungi nae owundi hu muhono mukooda.
Mani abandu bali nibabitiraangao bayuuya busa emitwe
nibaboola bati, “Ewe owali onyala ohulikula enyumba ya Nasae handi wayombahira mu ndaalo chidatu, wewonie omweene! Nooli Omwaana wa Nasae, bulaanu yiha otule hu musalabba.”
Mungeri nasilala eyo niyo yi Balaamisi bahuluundu, nende Abekesa bamalako alala nende Abemeresi babandu, bamuhoomolera, nibaboola bati,
“Oyo yawonia abandi, nae omweene haba saanyala hweonia. Oyo niye Omutuki w'Abayisirayiri; leha yeehe hu Musalabba mani huhumufukiiriremo.
Yesika mu Nasae, leha bulaanu Nasae amuwonie naaba namudaha; olwohuba yaboola ati, ‘Nise Omwaana wa Nasae.’ ”
Handi abeebi baba bahomereerwe alala nae bosi bamuhoomolera mu ngeri nasilala eyo.
Bulaanu ohutula esaa chisaasaba, esirima syadiira esyaalo syoosi ohwoola esaa chitaanu-na-chine.
Mani aambi w'esaa chitaanu-na-chine, Yesu yalira nende ekono ly'akulu ati, “Eli, Eli, lema sabach-thani?” Amahulundu keene mbwe, “Nasae wange, Nasae wange, lwasiina wunjwang'ire?”
Nae abandi hu bandu bali beemere awo nibawulira esyo, baboola bati, “Omuundu wuno nga mbawo ali ohulaanga Elija.”
Mulala hu bandu abo, yeruha bwaangu yabukula esyaangu, yaasiiniha mu fwiini yahaliha, yaasita hu kada, mani yaamubeeresa ang'we.
Nae abandi baboola bati, “Muliinde huboneho Elija naneeche yamuwonia.”
Nae Yesu yalira handi mu kono ly'akulu, mani yakwisa omwooyo.
Nae bone, engubo yomu nyumba ya Nasae, yataanduhamo akati, ohutula akulu ohwolera elalira aasi; mani esyaalo syeecha syateengereha, enyaanda chaadihana;
ebiriindwa byosi byekuha, handi emibiri ch'abandu ba Nasae bangi abali bafwa balamuha,
nae nibatula mu ng'ani Yesu naamalire ohusyuuha mu bafu, bacha mu siko syolerefu, mani babonehera abandu bandi.

Nae omusirikaari muhunuufu alala nende abo bayali nabo nibaliindire Yesu, nibabona ohutengereha hw'esyaalo, nende ebyo byoosi ebyeholeha, beecha batya muno baboola bati, “Mubwadyeeri bweene, wuno abere Omwaana wa Nasae!”
Awo wosi waliwo abahasi bangi, nibeemere nibewunjiraanga eyale. Bano nibo abali baloondere hu Yesu ohutula e Galilaaya nibamuhalaabaniraanga;
mwabo mwalimo Maria otula e Magadala, nende Maria ng'ina Yakobbo nende Yosefu, nende ng'ina baana ba Sebbedaayo.
Mani obwire nibweera, omusaacha muyiinda otula Arimaseya olaangwa Yosefu yeecha yoola; wuno yesi yali omweeki wa Yesu.
yacha eyiri Pilaato yaamusaba omubiri kwa Yesu. Mani Pilaato yalagira ati, bamubeerese omubiri kwa Yesu.
Yosefu yabukula omubiri, yaakuboya mu suuka lafu,
yamala yaakuta mu ng'ani yae njiaha, yibali babaachire mu lwaanda; mani yaasindikisa okukina kuhoongo yakwikalira hu ng'ani, yamala yawaawo.
Maria we Magadala, nende Maria wundi, bali baliwo nibehaale aasi nibewunjire esiriindwa.
Nibuhyere, oludaalo luloonda Olw'ohwetekehera, Abalaamisi bahuluundu nende Abafalisaayo bebuusira eyiri Pilaato,
mani baboola bati, “Omwaami, efwe hwichulisa koti omubacha oyo yaboola nasisiiri omulamu ati, ‘Oluunyuma lw'endaalo chidatu, njia ohusyuuha handi.’

Sakira lagira baliinde esiriindwa bulai ohwoola hu ludaalo lwohudatu, ataali awo, abeeki bae banyala ohuchia bamwiibamo, mani bamala baboolera abandu bati, ‘ Asyuhiire mu bafu,’ mani obubacha busemberehayo bucha ohuba obubi muno ohuhiraho obwataangira.”
Pilaato yababoolera ati, “Eng'we muli nende Abasirikaari baliinde; muche mubone muti esiriindwa basiriinda bulai muno koti lu munyala.”
Mani bacha baaomera bulai ekina lyali hu siriindwa, bataao omusirikaari, babona bati buli siindu siri bulai bweene.
Bulaanu, oludaalo lwa Sabbaato niluweere, mumaherebeende kahyesa oludaalo lutaangira mu juma, Maria w'e Magadala nende Maria wundi, bacha ohubona esiriindwa.
Abweene awo, esyaalo syateengereha muno, olwohuba malaika wa Nasae yeha ohutula Mukulu, mani yeecha yaasindikisa ekina, yaalitusa hu mulyaango kw'esiriindwa yaliihalaho.
Efwaani yae yali koti olumesu, handi engubo chae chali endafu koti amakina k'efula.
abaliindi nibamubona, batya muno, bateengereha, mani baba koti abafwiire.
Nae malaika yaboolera abahasi abo ati, “Mutatya daawe; olwohuba manyire endi muli ohukoonya Yesu yibahomerera.
Haba saali ano; amalire ohusyuuha koti luyaboola. Mwiiche mubone yi yali yeyaliise.
Mani muche bwaangu muboolere abeeki bae muti, amalire ohusyuuha mu bafu, ngula abatangiriremo ohuchia e Galilaaya; eyo niyo yimucha ohumubonera. Mbao malire ohubaboolera.”
Mani batula maangu muno hu siriindwa obuti nibubadiirire alala nende esangaalo, beeruha bacha baboolera abeeki bae.
Nae bone, Yesu yeecha yabukanana nabo mani yaboola ati, “Ehabi chibe nang'we!” Mani basuda yali bamudiira hu makulu, bamala bamwiinamira.
Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Mutatya daawe; muche muboolere abaloondi bange bache e Galilaaya, mani eyo niyo yibacha ohumbonera.”
Mani abahasi abo nibali basichichaanga, bone, Abasirikaari bandi hu bali baliindire esiriindwa, bacha mu siko, baboolera Abalaamisi bahuluundu buli siindu syoosi esyali syeholehe.
Nae Abalaamisi bahuluundu abo nibamala ohwebuusa alala nende Abemirisi ba bandu, beecha bafukiirisania ohuberesa Abasirikaari abo eseende nyiingi muno,
mani nibaboolera bati, “Muboolere abandu muti, ‘Abeki bae beechere esiro beeba omubiri kwae efwe nihukona.’
Nae Gafana nawulira bino, efwe hucha ohumwomiisa, mani hubone huti eng'we simukwa mu budinyu bwoosi.”
Abaliindi abo babukula eseende echo, bahola koti lu bababoola; mani ebyo nibyo bi Bayudaaya basiloonderera nolwaleero.
Abeki ehumi-na-mulala bacha e Galilaaya hu lugulu lu Yesu yali atekehe ohubukananirayo nabo.
Mani nibamubona, bakwa aasi bamwiinamira; nae abandi bali basisiiri nende ohukana-kana.
Nae Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Bamalire ohumberesa obunyala bwoosi Mukulu nende hu syaalo.
Sakira muche muhole abandu b'ebyaalo byoosi babe abeeki bange; mubabatiise mu liita lya Seefwe, nende ery'Omwaana, nende ery'Omwooyo Mwolerefu.
Mubeekese ohuloonda amalako koosi kandababeeresa, handi mumanye muti, ndi nang'we endaalo choosi ohwoola hu njakamo y'esyaalo.”
Ohuchaaka hw'Emboosi Ndai cha Yesu Kristo, Omwaana wa Nasae.
Koti lu Yisaaya yandiika ati: “Bone, mbao nduma wamwaanda wange ahutangirire mu moni wao ahutereesere engira.
Ekono lyoyo ohumulira, musiparara niliboola liti: Mutereesere Omwaami engira; Mukolole emihoosi chae”

Awo niwo yi Yowaana Omubatiisi yabonehera musiparara, nayaala ohubatiisibwa hwohwefunaka hu bandu banyale ohuleherwamo ebibi byaabwe. Yowaana yabatisaanga abandu nabekesa ati, “Mwefunake, mubatisibwe Nasae abaleheremo ebibi byeeng'we.”
Mani abandu bangi batula mu syalo syoosi esyo mu Buyudaaya nende mu siko sye Yerusaalemu syoosi, baacha eyiri Yowaana, beyolobya ebibi byaabwe, mani yababatiisa mu mwaalo kwa Yorudaani.
Yowaana yefwalaanga engubo cho bwooya bw'engamia, handi yeboyaanga oluhoba lw'eseero mu sibuno, nae ebyohulya byae byalichingi esike nende obuuhi bw'omusiino.
Yowaana yayalaanga naboola ati, “Enyuma wange yiriyo owunoondaho, oyo niye owuhirira elalira oluyaali, yitahoyera ohwiinama aasi ndaaboolola eesya ch'ebiraato byae.
Ese mbabatiisa nende amaachi; nae oyo achia ohubabatiisa nende Mwooyo Mwolerefu.”
Olwoola, Yesu yatula e Nasareti mu syaalo sy'e Galilaaya, yacha hu mwaalo kwa Yorudaani eyiri Yowaana amubatiise.
Nae Yesu niyatula mu maachi busa ati, yabona Ekulu nilikuuhe, mani Mwooyo yamwihaho nafwaanana koti eguugu;
mani ekono lyatula Mukulu niliboola liti, “Niiwe Omwaana wange muheerwa muno; niiwe ohira ohusangaasa.”
Abweene awo ni Mwooyo amwimirira yamuyira musiparara.
Mani yaaba musiparara eyo ohumala endaalo amahumi kane, Sitaani naali ohumuhema. Yamenyanga nende esolo ndeende; nae bamalaika ba Nasae nibamuhalaabanira.
Bulaanu, nibamalire ohudiira Yowaana, Yesu yeecha mu Galilaaya yachaaka ohuyaala Emboosi Ndai cha Nasae,
naboola ati, “Ebiha byoolere, handi Obwaami bwa Nasae buli aambi; mwefunake, mufukiirire Emboosi Ndai.”
Yesu niyali nakeenda hu lwaasi lw'enyaanja ye Galilaaya, yabona Simooni nende Andereya mwaanag'ina nibali ohusukuna enjero munyaanja; olwohuba bali abanaabi.
Mani Yesu yababoolera ati, “Munoonde, njia ohubahola mube abanaabi b'abandu.”
Mani abweene awo, baleha enjero chaabwe bamuloonda.
Handi niyemeedaho mu moni budiidi, yabona Yakobbo nende Yowaana abana ba Sebbedaayo, nibali mu lyaato lyaabwe nibonga enjero.
Mani abweene awo Yesu yabalaanga; baleha Sebbedaayo saabwe mu lyaato alala nende abahalaabani bapangise, baloonda Yesu.
Yesu alala nende abeeki bae bacha mu Kaperanaumu; nae olwa Sabbaato nilwoola, yacha yengira mu Sinagoogi yachaakaniramo ohweekesa.
Nae abandu, besinduha muno enjekesa yae, olwohuba siyali koti eya abekesa ba Malako; nae yekesa koti omuundu oli nende obunyala.
Nae abweene awo, omusaacha waliho omwooyo mubi yengira mu Sinagoogi mani yayula naboola ati,
“Ewe Yesu we Nasareti, onaatuhole otye? Wichire ohutusihirisa? Huhumanyire, niiwe Omwolerefu mweene wa Nasae.”
Nae Yesu yakuhabuhira naboola ati, “Nyita chi, handi omutulemo bwaangu!”
Nae omwooyo mubi okwo kweecha kwasusucha omusaacha oyo muno, kwayulira mu kono ly'akulu, kwamala kwamutulamo.
Mani abandu boosi bawuka muno, bachaaka ohuteebana abeene-na-beene nibaboola bati, “Sino siina? Yino njekesa njiaha! Wuno ali nende obunyala, alagira busa emyooyo mibi, nikimuwulira.”
Mani abweene awo, efuma ya Yesu niyisasaana mu syalo syoosi esye Galilaaya.
Abweene awo ni Yesu atula mu Sinagoogi naachia nende Yakobbo nende Yowaana beengira mu nyumba ya Simooni nende Andereya.
Bulaanu, masalang'ene Simooni yali akonere mu buliri nalwaala omusuuja, mani Yesu niyengira mu nyumba busa ati, bamuboolera ebidiira hu muhasi oyo.
Yesu yeecha, yamudiira omuhono, yamusingisa. Omusuuja kwamutulaho, mani yatulaniramo ohubahalaabanira koti lusihoyeere.
Engoloobe yene eyo, elyuuba nilyahakwa, bachaaka ohumuleetera abalwae babuli ngeri kata nende abo abaliho emisaambwa.
Mani abandu b'esiko esyo syoosi beecha bebuusira alala mu mulyaango kw'enyumba eyo.
Yesu yaonia abalwae babuli ngeri, handi yerusa emisaambwa emiingi. Siyakanyaanga emisaambwa echo ohulomaloma esiindu syoosi, olwohuba chali chamumanya.
Nae nibwahya, ebukwe niyisisiiri ohuheba, Yesu yasingira yaatula mu nyumba omwo, yacha mu sifwo sitaalimo abandu, mani yaba eyo yeng'ene niyekongooya.
Nae Simooni nende abaasye batula erwaanyi, bachaaka ohumukoonya,
mani nibamwakaana, bamuboolera bati, “Buli muundu yeesi ali ohuhukoonya busa.”
Nae yababoolera ati, “Mulehe huchie mu biko bitusibiraane, nyale ohuyaaliramo mwosi; olwohuba esyo nisyo esyandeeta.”
Mani yacha mu Galilaaya mwoosi, nayaalira mu Sinagoogi chaabwe handi niyerusa mu bandu emisaambwa.
Olwoola, omusaacha wali nalwaala obulwaae bw'amakere yeecha eyiri Yesu ohumwekongooya; yaasigama aasi yamuboolera ati, “Niweenya, onyala ohuumonia.”
Esisa siingi muno syadiira Yesu, mani yaakolola omuhono kwae yadiira hu musaacha oyo, namuboolera ati, “Ese nyenya, wona.”
Mani ebiha byeene ebyo, obulwaae bw'amakere bwamwamuhaho, yawona.
Nae Yesu yamuhuutira muno, yamala yamuseebula yawaawo bwaangu,

handi yamuboolera ati, “Bona oti sobooleraho omuundu yeesi esiindu syoosi; nae cha weyekese eyiri omulaamisi, omale owaane esiyaanwa si Musa yalagira esyeekesa siti owonere obulwaae bw'amakere, sino sibe esilolero eyiri abandu.”

Nae omusaacha oyo yatula yachaaka busa ohusasania efuma eyo buli abundu. Sino syakayira Yesu ohwingira mu siko syoosi alafu, nae yabechaanga erwaanyi mu ngoongo; mani eyo niyo yi bandu bechaanga yali nibatula mu buli situundu.
Oluunyuma lw'endaalo endiidi, Yesu yakobola e Kaperanaumu mani efuma yae yawulirihana yiti akaluhe ewaabwe.
Abandu bangi bebuusa beechula ohwolera elalira hu mulyaango, wabulao esifwo sidoong'ere syoosi. Nae Yesu yali abayaalira Emboosi Ndai ya Nasae.
Awo niwo yi basaacha bane boolera nibakiingire hu butalihe omusaacha wadataala, nibamuleetera.
Nae nibabona bati sibanyala hwoola eyiri Yesu olw'esidiyiha sihoongo, baniina hu sirama sy'enyumba, basiikulamo esidomo, mani baabisiramo omulwaae oyo, yoola ali Yesu.
Nae Yesu niyabona efukiirira yaabwe, yaboolera omulwaae oyo ati, “mwaana wange, ebibi byao bihuleherwemo.”
Nae abekesa ba malako bandi abali nibehaale awo nibawulira batyo, bachaaka ohweteeba abeene-na-beene mu myooyo chaabwe bati,
“Lwasiina omusaacha wuno alomaloma ati? Huno hufwola Nasae! Nasae yeng'ene niye onyala ohuleheramo ebibi!”
Nae abweene awo, Yesu niyamanya mu mwooyo kwae ati abo bali ohweteebana abeene-na-beene, yeecha yababoolera ati, “Lwasiina muli ohweteeba mu myooyo cheeng'we mutyo?
Siina syeene esihira obwangu, ohuboolera omudataafu oti, ‘Ebibi byao bihuleherwemo,’ kose, ohuboola oti, ‘Siingira, obukule obutalihe bwao, okeende’?
Nae ohubeekesa ati, Omwaana w'Omuundu ali nende obunyala hu syalo obwohuleheramo ebibi,” yaboolera omudataafu oyo ati,
“Huboolera endi, siingira, obukule obutalihe bwao, ochie engo!”
Mani yasingira, yabukula bwaangu obutalihe bwae, yalaala yawaawo abandu boosi nibamubona. Mani boosi-boosi bawuka muno, bafumya Nasae nibaboola bati, “Sihubonaangaho esiindu sifwaana siti!”
Yesu yatula awo handi yacha hu lwaasi lw'enyaanja. Niyali eyo, esidiyiha sy'abandu syoosi handi syeecha syamwebuusaho mani yachaaka ohubeekesa.
Handi niyali nakeenda, yeecha yabona omutoosa w'omusolo, olaangwa Leefi, omusyaani wa Alufaayo, niyehaale mu nyumba yisoloserwamo omusolo, mani yamuboolera ati, “Noonde.” Mani yasingira yaamuloonda.

Nae Yesu niyali naalya mu nyumba ya Leefi, abatoosa b'omusolo bangi nende abaholi b'ebibi beecha beehala balya nae alala nende abeeki bae; olwohuba abatoosa b'omusolo alala nende abaholi b'ebibi abali nibamuloondere bali abangi muno.

Nae abekesa ba malako aba, Abafalisaayo, nibabona bati Yesu ali ohulya nende abaholi b'ebibi alala nende abatoosa b'omusolo, beecha baboolera abeeki bae bati, “Lwasiina oyo alya nende abatoosa b'omusolo alala nende abaholi b'ebibi?”
Nae Yesu niyawulira esyo, yababoolera ati, “Abalamu haba sinibo abeenya omulesi, ohutusaho abalwae; Ese haba sindeecha ohulaanga abolerefu, nae ndeecha ohulaanga abaholi b'ebibi.”

Olwoola, abeeki ba Yowaana alala nende Abafalisaayo nibali nibasiiba, abandu bandi beecha eyiri Yesu bamuteeba bati, “Lwasiina abeeki ba Yowaana nende abeeki b'Abafalisaayo basiiba, nae abeeki bao haba sibasiiba?”
Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Mani sinyaliha abakeni bo hubugole ohuhaya ohulya, omweene bugole nasisiiri nabo? Ngandi haba! Omweene bugole nasisiiri nabo, haba sibanyala husiiba.
Nae ebiha byahoole, omugole abatusibweho, awo nilwo lubahasiibe.
Abulao omuundu yeesi onaba esiraka siyaaha hu ngubo ngofu; olwohuba naahola atyo, esiraka siyaaha siba sichia ohwehuuna sitaandule engubo ngofu eyo, mani obutanduhe buhongoye buhireho obwaliwo.

Handi abulao omuundu yeesi ochuha efwiini njiaha musikiingiro sy'eseero sikofu; olwohuba naahola atyo, efwiini yiba yicha ohwaata eseero eryo; mani efwiini yinyasihe alala nende eseero lyeene; nae efwiini njiaha yihoyera eseero yaaha.”
Yesu niyali nakeenda naabitira mu mikuunda ch'emere hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato lundi, abeeki bae bachaaka ohuwakula emitwe ch'emere.
Nae Abafalisaayo beecha bamuboolera bati, “Bonaho, lwasiina abo bali ohuhola esiindu sitafukiirirwa ohuholwa hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato?”
Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Eng'we musisiiri ohusomaho si Daudi yahola, nahayiswe handi enjala niyimuluma, alala nende abo bayali nabo:

koti luyacha yengira mu nyumba ya Nasae, Abbiatari naali omulaamisi muhuluundu, mani yaalya emigaati chali chibereswe Nasae, echitafukiirirwa ohuliibwa nende omuundu yeesi ohutusaho abalaamisi bong'ene, handi yabukula yakabaaho abo bayali nabo?”
Mani yeecha yababoolera ati, “Sabbaato yateebwao hulw'omuundu, nae omuundu haba saaliwo hulwa Sabbaato;
Mani sakira, Omwaana w'Omuundu ali Omwaami wa Sabbaato yosi.”
Yesu handi niyengira mu Sinagoogi, yakaanamo omusaacha wali nende omuhono kwafwa.
Nae abandu bandi bachaaka ohumwehaliirisa babone nanamuwonia hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato nibakiiya ohumudiisa omusango mbwe muholi w'ebiindu bitadahibwa.
Nae Yesu yaboolera omusaacha w'omuhono kwafwa ati, “Yicha ano.”
Mani Yesu yateeba abandu abo ati, “Sihoyera ohuhola esiindu silayi hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato, kose esibi, ohuwonia obulamu, hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato, kose ohwiita?” Nae boosi bawuleera busa.

Nae Yesu yeecha yaanyoolera mani yabatingaala nende etima, olwohuba emyooyo chaabwe chali emyomeranu, mani yeecha yaboolera omusaacha oyo ati, “Kolola omuhono kwao okwo.” Mani omusaacha oyo yemao yaakukolola, kweecha kwawtonerao elalira.
Nae Abafalisaayo nibabona batyo, basiingira batula erwaanyi, mani batulaniramo ohuwuliirisania nende abandu b'omukanda kwa Herode, koti lubanyala ohumusihirisa.
Yesu alala nende abeeki bae beemao bewiira bacha hu lwaasi lw'enyaanja. Mani esidiyiha sy'abandu sihoongo ohutula e Galilaaya syabaloondaho, alala nende abandi ohutula mu Buyudaaya,

e Yerusaalemu, Yidumea nende ohutula eyale ohubita engereha wa Yorudaani, nende ohutula aambi wa Tiro nende Sidoni. Handi esidiyiha siindi sihoongo syeecha ohweema hu fuma y'ebiindu bi Yesu yali naahola.
Mani Yesu yaboolera abeeki bae bamutekehere elyaato esidiyiha siteecha syamufwiinyirira.
olwohuba yali amalire ohuwonia abandu bangi, nae abandu bali nende endwaae chitaali nasilala bali nibasyeyindikania nibadaha bati bamudiireho busa.
Mani buli lu myooyo mibi chamubonaanga, chakwichanga aasi mu makulu kae nichirira chiti, “Niiwe Omwaana wa Nasae.”
Nae Yesu yakihutiraanga muno chitakera yamanyihana bwaangu.
Abweene awo, Yesu yacha hu lugulu, mani yalaanga abo bayali nadaha; mani beecha yali.
Mani yalobolamo ehumi-na-babiri, babecheenge nae, handi banyale ohutumwa nibacha ohuyaala,
handi nende ohuba nende obunyala obw'ohwirusa emisaambwa:
Simooni oyo yiyalanga Peetero;
Yakobbo omusyaani wa Sebbedaayo nende Yowaana mwaanang'ina Yakobbo, oyo yiyalanga Bbowanarigesi, esyeekesa siti, abana b'ohwaduluhana ng'ekulu;
Andereya, Filipo, Batulumaayo, Matayo, Tomasi, Yakobbo omusyaani wa Alufaayo, Tadeo, Simooni Omukanani,
nende Yuda Yisikarioti, owamulyaamo olukwe.
Mani Yesu yeecha yakobola engo. Nae handi esidiyiha sihoongo syeecha syebuusira yaali, mani syabakayira kata ohulya.
Nae abanaluya bae nibawulira batyo, basiingira bacha ohumudiira, olwohuba abandu bandi bali baboola bati, “Abiyire omutwe.”
Nae abekesa ba malako abatula e Yerusaalemu beecha baboola bati, “Nguyo aliho omusaambwa kulaangwa, Bbelesebbuli, handi yerusa emisaambwa nende obunyala bwa Bbelesebbuli omuhulundu w'emisaambwa.”
Mani Yesu yamala yabalaanga beeche yali, mani nachaaka ohubakaadira engaado ati, “Sitaani anyala atye ohwirusa Sitaani waasye?
Mani obutuki nibukabuhanamo bwachaaka ohulwaanakana obweene-no-bweene, obutuki obwo haba sibunyala bwayindira.
Handi enyumba yoosi niyikabuhanamo mani yachaaka ohulwaanakana eyeene-ne-yeene, enyumba eyo haba siyinyala huyiindira.
Nae nikali mbwe Sitaani bulaanu niye ochaakire ohwelwaania omweene, mbawo mani edaala lyae likabuhanemo, mani haba silinyala ohuyiindira, mbawo lyoolere ohusihirira.
Nae abulao omuundu onyala yahalaka yengira mu nyumba y'omuundu w'amaani, yayaaya ebiindu byae, natataangire ohumuboya, hu yaanyala ohuyaaya enyumba yae bulai.
“Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, abandu bacha ohuleherwamo ebibi byaabwe byoosi, alala nende ebyo byoosi bibalomaloma ebifwoola Nasae;
nae oyo yeesi olomaloma ebifwoola Mwooyo Mwolerefu, haba saachia huleherwamo olwohuba aba aholere esibi sitawa”
olwohuba abandu bali baboolere bati, “Yesu aliho omusambwa.”
Mani ng'ina Yesu nende bamwaanang'ina bamala beecha. Nae nibali nibasyeemere erwaanyi, batumira Yesu emboosi, nibamulaanga bati yeeche yibali.
Nae, esidiyiha sy'abandu syali sihaale nisimwebodohanie, syaboolera Yesu siti, “Mao nende ba mwaanamao bali erwaanyi, bahukoonya.”
Nae Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Mama nende bamwaanaama nibo abali yena?”
Mani yatingaala hu bandu bali nibehaale nibamwebodohaanie, naboola ati, “Ba maama nende ba mwaanama mbano bali ano!
Oyo yeesi ohola bi Nasae adaha, niye oba mwaanama, nende mboocho, nende maama.”

Yesu yacha hu lwaasi lw'enyaanja ye Galilaaya handi yachaaka ohweekesa. Mani esidiyiha sy'abandu sihoongo muno syeecha syamwebodohania, handi yengira yehala mu lyaato, nae esidiyiha esyo syadoong'a nisihaale aasi hu lwaasi lw'enyaanja.
Mani Yesu yabeekesa ebiindu biingi muno niyehoonyera engaado. Nae niyaba nabekesa, yababoolera ati,
“Mutekeerese bulai! Omuundu wundi yatula yacha ohuwaanya emwo.
Niyali awaanya, emwo yindi yakwa hu ngira, mani amayoni keecha kayiboocha.
Emwo yindi yakwa hu bikina-kina, ataali eloba liingi, mani bwaangu-bwaangu yamera, olwohuba siyali yisiihirwe aasi muno.
Nae omubasu nikwafwa, emwo eyo yeecha yaakonga, mani yooma olwohuba yali siyayira emisi aasi muno.
Emwo yindi yakwa mu mawa, mani amawa kayifwinyirira, mani yahaya ohwaamaho esiindu syoosi.
Emwo yindi yakwa mu loba layi, mani yaama ebyaamo. Yahula, yakaliya, mani yaama ebyaamo, aandi amahumi kadatu, aandi amahumi kasasaba, handi aandi emia ndala.”
Mani Yesu yaboola ati, “Oyo oli nende amatwi kawulira, leha awulire.”
Nae Yesu niyali atulire eyiri esidiyiha, abandu bali nibadong'ere nae alala nende ehumi-na-babiri, beecha bamuteeba ebidiira hu ngaado.
Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Eng'we neng'we ababeereswa ehabi y'ohumanya esyaama sy'Obwaami bwa Nasae, nae abandu b'erwaanyi, buli siindu siri busa mu ngaado;
mani bacha ohwewunja bulai bweene nae bahaye ohubona; handi bawulire bulai bweene, nae bahaye ohumanya amahulundu keene; olwohuba banyala ohwefunaka mani baleherwamo.”
Mani yemawo yabateeba ati, “Eng'we mwesi simumanyire amahulundu k'olukaado luno? Nae mucha ohumanya mutye amahulundu k'engaado chiindi choosi?
Omuwaanyi niye owaanya emboosi ya Nasae.
Abandu bawulira emboosi ya Nasae, nae bwaangu-bwaangu Sitaani niyeecha abamalamo emboosi yiba niyingiire mu myooyo chaabwe, abo nibo abafwana nende emwo yakwa hu ngira.
Abandu bawulira emboosi ya Nasae, mani bwaangu-bwaangu bayidiira nende esangaalo, nibo abo abafwana nende emwo yakwa hu bikina-kina.
Bano, sibaba bali nende emisi mireei, mani besimiirisaho hu lw'esiha sidiidi, nae ohusaanda oba ohunyaasibwa nihwoola hu lw'emboosi ya Nasae, bwaangu-bwaangu baebwaaba.
Nae abandi nibo abawaanywa mu mawa. Abo nibo abawulira emboosi ya Nasae,

nae ohwelalihirira hw'obulamu bw'omusyaalo muno, nende ohwekoomba hw'obuyiinda bw'omusyaalo, alala nende obwekoombi bw'ebiindu biindi, biingira mu myooyo chaabwe mani byafwinyirira emboosi ya Nasae, mani yahaya ohwaamaho esiindu syoosi.
Nae abandi bafwaana koti emwo yawaanywa hu loba layi, abo nibo abawulira emboosi ya Nasae, bayifukiirira mani baama ebyaamo, aandi amahumi kadatu, aandi amahumi kasaba, handi aandi emia ndala.”
Mani Yesu yemeeda ohuboola ati, “Mani etaara liretwanga mu nyumba ohufuunihwa mu simweero, oba ohuteebwa mu lwalo w'esitaanda, kose hu siteeni syalyo?
Olwohuba abulao esiindu syoosi esyakiswa, esitacha ohukisulwa syamanyihana, handi abulao esiindu syoosi esyabwihwa esitalibwihulwa syabonehana alafu.
Oyo yeesi oli nende amatwi kawulira leha awulire.”
Mani Yesu yababoolera ati, “Mwehaliiriseenge ebyo bimuwulira. Esikero syoberesa owaasyo, nisyo syosi siwahafune, handi nende ohwongerwaho ebihira awo obuungi.
Olwohuba, oyo oli nabyo achia ohwongerwa; nae oyo otaali nabyo, kata ebidiidi byali nabyo bacha ohubimumalaho.”
Handi Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Obwaami bwa Nasae bufwaanana koti omuundu yahawaanya emwo mu ndalo yae.
Mani yakobola engo, esiro nisyoola niyekonera, obwire nibuhya, niyesingirira, nae emwo eyo yimera yahula, omweene natamanyireho engeri yiyimeramo handi yahula.
Eloba lyeene nilyo elikera emwo yaamera handi yahula ohwoola luyiyangala.
Nae ebyaamo nibyaangala, omuundu oyo atulaniramo bwaangu yachaaka ohukesa olwohuba ekesa liba lyoolere.”
Handi Yesu yeecha yaboola ati, “Obwaami bwa Nasae hunabukeraanie hu siindu siina, oba hunabukaadire lukaado siina?
Bufwaana nende olumwo lw'omutuumba, olwohuba ebiha by'ohulutaaka mu loba, nilwo oluhiramo obudiidi hu syalo;
nae nilumalire ohutaakibwa, lumera lwahula, lwehola okusaala kuhiramo emisaala chiindi choosi, mani kwataaho amasaga mahoongo muno, yi mayoni kabburuha kanyala ohwombaha ebiswi, mu siiniha syakwo.”
Yesu, yehonyera engaado nyiingi echifwaana chityo ohubayaalira emboosi ya Nasae. Yabekesaanga atyo hubanyale ohumanya bulai.
Haba siyalomalomaanga nabo esiindu syoosi natehonyere olukaado, nae niyabechaanga yeng'ene nende abeeki bae, yabatumbuliraanga alafu buli siindu syoosi.
Mani hu ludaalo lweene olwo engoloobe, yeecha yababoolera ati, “Mulehe husyaabale enyaanja huchie engereha.”
Mani beemao baleha esidiyiha sy'abandu awo, beengira elyaato li yali yehaalemo, bamala bawaao. Amaato kandi kosi kali awo.
Nibali nibasyaabala nibawao, omuyaka kw'amaani kweene kwasyuuha, mani amafwinda keeyiha kachaaka ohuubba hu lyaato libalimo ohwoola lu lyaato lyali aambi ohwichula.
Nae Yesu yali ali mu numa naakona hu mabasi. Beecha bamusimusa nibaboola bati, “Omweekesa, huli ohusihirira naawe haba sodeeba?”
Mani Yesu yemao yaasingira, yahabuhira omuyaka, handi yaboolera enyaanja ati, “Yenjeera! Okwalaale!” Mani omuyaka kweecha kwaakama, enyaanja yanyita chi!
Yesu yeecha yabateeba ati, “Lwasiina mutya? Haba simuli nende efukiirira?”
Mani bamala beechula obuti, bachaaka ohuteebana abeene-na-beene bati, “Wuno nae muundu siina yi muyaka nende amafwinda byosi biwulira?”
Yesu alala nende abeeki bae beecha boola engereha w'enyaanja ye Galilaaya mu syalo sye Geraasa.
Mani Yesu niyatula busa ati mu lyaato, yaakanana nende omusaacha oliho omwooyo mubi, otula mung'uungu chibasihaangamo abandu.
Omusaacha wuno yamenyaanga mu ng'ani chomung'ungu, handi yabulao omuundu yeesi owanyalaanga ohumuboya kata nende eminyororo;

olwohuba yali naboywaangaho nende epiingo alala nende eminyororo nae eminyororo yachidonya-donyaangamo busa, nae epiingo nacho yachihalaka-halakangamo busa; handi abulao omuundu yeesi owali nende amaani k'ohumuyiingira.
Esiro nende esideete, yali nang'abanaanga busa mu ng'ani chomung'ungu, nende hu ngulu niyehumusa-huumusa, handi niyenyubululira amakina.
Mani niyabonera Yesu eyale, yeruha bwaangu yeecha yali yaamwiinamira;
