handi naalira nende ekono hoongo naboola ati, “Yesu Omwaana wa Nasae ow'Akulu Muno, onaahole otye? Hulirire mu liita lya Nasae endi, otasaandia haba!”
Omusaacha wuno yaboola atyo olwohuba Yesu yali amuboolere ati, “Mwooyo mubi ewe, tula mu musaacha oyo!”
Nae Yesu yamuteeba ati, “Eliita lyao nilyo naanu?” Nae oyo yakobolamu ati, “Eliita lyaange nilyo Legion; olwohuba huli bangi.”
Mani omusaacha oyo yachiiririra ohwekweeda Yesu nende esinani ataberusa ohutula mu syalo esyo.
Bulaanu aambi awo waliwo omukanda muhoongo kw'embiichi nikuli ohwayaanga hu ndulo w'esigulu;
mani emyooyo mibi echo chekweeda Yesu nichiboola chiti, “Tutume huchie ena mbiichi echo, otufukiirire huchiingiremo.”

Yesu yemawo yafukiirira emyooyo mibi echo, chatula mu musaacha oyo, mani chacha cheengira mu mbiichi. Omukaanda kw'embiichi okwo kwoosi, kwali kwoola aambi w'elifu chibiri enaamba, mani choosi chatimuha embiro chehirira hundulo w'esilugulu, chaweera mu nyaanja chasihama choosi.
Abaayi b'embiichi beecha bosi beeruha basalaana, bacha mu siko sihoongo alala nende mu ngoongo chikabuhane basasaania emboosi echo. Mani abandu beeyiha ohuchia ohubona esyali nisiholehaane.
Nae niboola eyiri Yesu, babona omusaacha wali niyechulaho emyooyo mibi niyehaale awo. Yali niyefwaalire engubo bulai handi elalu nilimuweereho, mani abandu abo boosi baatya muno.
Mani abandu bali nibabweene ebikwireo, beecha bachaaka ohukaniayira abandi ebyali bikwiire hu musaacha waliho emyooyo mibi oyo, nende ebyakwa hu mbiichi.
Abweene awo abandu beecha bekweeda Yesu atule mu syalo syaabwe.
Nae Yesu niyali niyengira mu lyaato, omusaacha waliho emyooyo mibi yekweda Yesu ati amufukiirire ache nae.
Nae Yesu yaahaya, yamuboolera ati, “Kaluha engo eyiri abandu bao, obaboolere ebiindu by'amaani bi Nasae ahuholeere, handi koti lw'ahukwiriire esisa.”
Mani omusaacha oyo yeecha yaatula awo yacha yachaaka ohuyaala mu biko ehumi (Muluyonaani bati, Dekapooli) ebiindu byoosi bi Yesu yali amuholeere, mani abandu boosi bawuka muno.
Yesu yemawo handi yasyaabala mu lyaato yacha engereha w'enyaanja. Nae niyoola eyo, handi esidiyiha sihoongo sy'abandu syeecha syamwebodohania.
Abweene awo, mulala hu bemirisi bomu Sinagoogi, olaangwa ati Yayiro yeecha eyiri Yesu. Niyoola yabona Yesu, yamukwa mu makulu,
yamwekweeda nende esibeera, naboola ati, “Omwaana wange muhaana muyere mulwaye muno, ali aambi nende ohufwa. Mani yicha omuteeho amahono kao, anyale ohuwona, abe omulamu.”
Mani Yesu yeecha yacha nende Yayiro. Handi esidiyiha sy'abandu sihoongo syeecha syamulondaho mani syamwebungihaho.
Musidiiyiha omwo mwalimo omuhasi wali nalwaala esihulukuto nisimumalireho emyaaka ehumi-na-chibiri.
Yali asandire muno mu mahono kaabalesi bangi, nanyaasire buli mwaandu kuyali nakwo, nae haba saona daawe, ohutusaho obulwae bwemeeda busa.
Omuhasi wuno yali yawulira efuma ya Yesu, mani yeyindikania mu sidiyiiha yoola enyuma wa Yesu, mani yadiira hu ngubo yae.
Yahola atyo olwohuba omweene yali yeboolere mu mwooyo kwae ati, “Nindiiraho busa kata hu ngubo chae, mba njia ohuwona.”
Mani niyamudiiraho busa ati, ni esihulukuto syakamirao; mani omuhasi yamala yewulira mu mubiri kwae ati bwadyeeri, obulwae bwae obwo bumalire ohuwona.
Nae Yesu niyamanya ati, aliwo amaani akamutuliremo, abweene awo yakaluhaana emukoongo mu sidiyiiha yateeba ati, “Naanu odiirire hu ngubo yange?”
Nae abeeki bae bamuboolera bati, “Oli ohubona koti esidiyiha siri ohuhuyindikania, handi oteeba oti, ‘Wiina owundiirireho?’ ”
Nae Yesu yemeeda ohwewunja abone omuundu omudiirireho.
Nae omuhasi oyo, koti luyali amanyire esyali simweholeheho, yeecha natiire handi nateengereha mani yaakwa aasi mu makulu ka Yesu, mani yamuboolera obwadyeeri bwoosi.
Mani Yesu yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Muhana-ng'ene, efukiirira yao yihuwonisye; mani wao nende ehabi handi obulwaae bwao obwo buwonere elalira.”
Nae Yesu niyali nasilomalomaanga, abandu bandi ohutula ewa Yayiro boola bamuboolera bati, “Omuhaana wao amalire ohufwa. Lwasiina osaandia Omweekesa handi?”
Nae Yesu yahaya ohubideebaho bibali baboolere, Yesu yemao yaboolera omwimirisi wa Sinagoogi ati, “Otatya, fukiirira busa.”
Mani Yesu siyafukiirira omuundu yeesi ohumuloondaho ohutusaho, Peetero nende Yakobbo nende Yowaana mwaanang'ina Yakobbo.
Nae niboola mu daala ly'omwimirisi wa Sinagoogi, Yesu yabona abandu nibadoobanire, handi abalisi niboobba wuwi alala nende ohuchereenjesera akulu muno.
Mani Yesu niyamala ohwingira mu nyumba, yaboolera abandu ati, “Lwasiina mudobaana alala nende ohulira? Omwaana wuno haba saafwiire, nae ali ohukona busa.”
Nae abandu abo bamucheha busa. Nae yeecha yabatusa boosi erwaanyi, mani yabukula simwaana mwaana nende ng'ina alala nende bayali ali nabo, mani beengira bacha yi mwaana yali.
Yesu niyoola, yadiira omuhono kw'omwaana oyo, yamusingisa naboola ati, “Talitha cumi” amahulundu mbwe, “mwaana muhaana ewe, huboolera endi, siingira weeme.”
Nae abweene awo ni omuhaana oyo asingira yeema, achaaka ohukeenda (olwohuba yali yosa emyaaka ehumi-na-chibiri), mani abweene awo, abandu bawuka muno hulw'ebyo byoosi ebyali byeholehe.
Nae Yesu yabahutira muno ati omuundu yeesi atamanyaho sino, mani yababoolera ohuberesaho omuhaana oyo esy'ohulya.
Yesu yemao yaatula awo yacha mu syaalo syewaabwe syeene mani abeeki bae bamuloondaho.

Nae oludaalo lwa Sabbaato nilwoola, yacha mu Sinagoogi yachaaka ohweekesa. Mani abandu bangi bali omwo nibawulira biyeekesa, besinduha muno baboola bati, “Nae omusaacha wuno yatusa ena bino byoosi? Makesi siina kano kabamubeeresa? Anyala atye ohuhola ebiwukisa bino!
Wuno haba siniye omubaachi busa, omwaana wa Maria, handi mwaanang'ina Yakobbo nende Yosefu, nende Yuda nende Simooni, handi bambochong'ene sibamenya busa naafwe?” Mani beemao bamwekaana.
Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Omunabbi yeesi saahaywa ohubeereswa oluyaali ohutusaho mu siko sy'ewaabwe syeene, handi mu bandu bae beene, handi mu b'enyumba yae yene.”
Mani Yesu siyanyala huholerayo ebyaamayia byoosi, ohutusaho yesa amahono hu balwaaye badiidi busa mani yabawonia.
Mani Yesu yeecha yesinduha muno hulw'efukiirira ndiidi yibali nayo. Mani Yesu yabita niyeekesa mu ngoongo.
Mani yalaanga abeeki ehumi-na-babiri beeche yali, mani yaamala yabatuma bache babiri-babiri, mani yababeeresa obunyala bw'ohwirusa emyooyo mibi.
Yabahuutira batakiingaho esiindu syoosi mu lukeendo lwaabwe ohutusaho endabuhi; batakiinga omugaati kwoosi, kata omufuuko, kata eseende yoosi mu sibiro chaabwe;
nae befwaale ebiraato by'akaala, nae batefwaala amakanju kabiri.
Mani Yesu yababoolera ati, “Nimwiingiraanga mu nyumba yoosi, mubecheenge omwo ohwoola lu mwahaweereo.
Nae nimwolaanga abundu yibatababukaanira mani bahaya ohubawulira, nimuba nimutula mu syaalo esyo, muteng'ulaanga olufu luli hu makulu keeng'we lube esilolero sibakabuhania nabo.”
Mani abeeki abo bacha bayaala bati abandu bahoyeere ohwefunaka.
Mani beecha berusa hu bandu emisaambwa miingi muno, mani baabaha abalwaye bangi amafuta, mani baabawonia.

Omutuki Herode, yeecha yasiwulira; olwohuba eliita lya Yesu lyali lifuma muno. Abandu bandi baboola bati, “Wuno niye Yowaana Omubatiisi owasyuhiiswe ohutula mu bafu; mani sakira obunyala buno bwoosi buli ohumuholeramo.”
Nae abandu bandi nabo baboola bati, “Wuno niye Elija.” Handi abandi baboola bati, “Wuno niye omunabbi, oli busa koti mulala hu banabbi bahale.”
Nae Herode niyawulira sino yaboola ati, “Yowaana, yindahengaho omutwe, niye wuno ohusyuhiiswe.”
Olwohuba Herode yali yatuma handi niyadiira Yowaana, mani nibamuboyera mu mboyero olwohuba Herodia, owali omuhasi wa Filipo mwaanang'ina, yi Herode yali yadeehya.
Olwohuba Yowaana yali yaboolera Herode ati, “Haba sisihoyerwa ewe ohuyira omuhasi wa mwaanamaao.”
Mani Herodia yali yadiirira Yowaana ehiinda, nakiiyanga ohumwiita. Nae yali saanyala ohusihola,

olwohuba Herode yali yatya muno Yowaana namanyire bulai bweene ati, Yowaana yali omusaacha omulungifu mweene handi omwolerefu, mani yaamulinda bulai bweene. Mani niyawulira Yowaana nayaala, yateenga muno; kata niyasangaalira bi Yowaana yayalaanga.

Nae ehabi yeecha yadiira Herodia, hu ludaalo lw'esichuliso sy'ohwibulwa hwa Herode. Herode yali aholere esidyalo sihoongo muno, niyehaase abaami bahuluundu nende abahuluundu baabasirikaari, alala nende abandu bahunuufu mu Galilaaya.
Nae omuhaana wa Herodia niyeecha yahina, yasangaasa muno Herode alala nende abakeni bae; mani omutuki oyo yemao yaboolera omuhaana oyo ati, “Saba esiindu syoosi siwekoomba, mani njia ohuhusibeeresa.”
Mani yeecha yechuba naboolera omuhaana oyo ati, “Buli siindu syoosi syochia ohusaba, njia ohuhubeeresa, kata sibe esituundu sy'obwaami bwaange.”
Mani omuhaana oyo yeecha yaatula erwaanyi, yaacha yaboolera ng'ina ati, “Sabe siindu siina?” Nae ng'ina yamuboolera ati, “Saba omutwe kwa Yowaana Omubatiisi.”
Mani abweene awo, omuhaana oyo yeruha bwaangu yakaluha eyiri omutuki oyo mani yamuboolera ati, “Ndaha wumberese bulaanu buno omutwe kwa Yowaana Omubatiisi hu lusaani.”
Mani omutuki oyo yeecha yelalihirira muno; nae niyabaasa hu sichubo syae alala nende hu bakeni bae, siyadaha ohuhalaka biyali aboolere omuhaana oyo.
Mani abweene awo, omutuki oyo yeecha yaatuma mulala hu basirikari baliindi, yamuhuutira ohuleeta omutwe kwa Yowaana. Mani omusirikari oyo yaacha yaatemaho omutwe kwa Yowaana naali mu mboyero,
mani yaleeta omutwe okwo hu lusaani, mani yaakudiisa omuhaana oyo; omuhaana oyo nae yacha yaakudiisa ng'ina.
Mani abeeki ba Yowaana nibawulira sino, beecha baabukula omubiri kwae, mani bakusiiha mu ng'ani.
Olwoola, Abatume beemao bakobola eyiri Yesu, mani bamukaniayira ebiindu byoosi bi bali nibaholere handi nibekeese.

Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Mutuleyo muche yi bandu bataali mube eyo mweng'ene, mani muwuluuheho budiidi.” Olwohuba abandu bangi bali bemeeda ohwiicha handi abandi nibawaao, nibihaire Abatume ohufuna kata obweyaango bw'ohulya.
Mani beecha beengira mu lyaato, baasyabala bacha mu sifwo sibulamo abandu, baba eyo bong'ene.
Bulaanu, abandu bangi beecha bababona, baabamanyirisa, mani beruhaho nibatula mu biko byoosi, mani beecha baabatangira ohwoolayo.

Mani Yesu niyoola busa ati hu sikobero, yabona esidiyiha sihoongo nisimalire ohwebuusa, mani yeecha yabakwira esisa, olwohuba bali bali koti amakoondi kabulaho omwaayi; mani yachaaka ohubeekesa ebiindu biingi muno.
Mani obwire nibweera, abeeki bae beecha yali baboola bati, “Esifwo sino sibulamo abandu, handi mbawo obwire buli ohwiira;
Seebula abandu bano beenyohe, bache mu ngoongo nende mu byaalo by'aambi ano, banyale ohwekulira esy'ohulya.”
Yesu nae yabakobolamo ati, “Eng'we mubaberese esy'ohulya.” Nae abeeki bae nabo bamuboolera bati, “Efwe huchie hukule emigaati ch'edinaari emia chibiri hubabeeresa balye?”
Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Nang'we muliho nende emigaati chiinga? Muche mubaliire.” Mani nibamala ohubaliira, beecha bamuboolera bati, “Chiri emigaati chitaanu nende eng'eni chibiri.”
Mani Yesu yemawo yaboolera abandu boosi ohwihala aasi hu bunyaasi bw'omuboka mu mikaanda.
Mani abandu beecha beehala aasi, mu mikaanda ch'abandu emia ndala-ndala, handi abandi mu mikaanda cha amahumi kataanu-kataanu.

Mani Yesu yabukula emigaati chitaanu echo nende eng'eni chibiri echo, yatingaala akulu Mukulu, yabibeeresa ehabi, yamekula-mekula emigaati echio, yamala yachidiisa abeeki bache bachiberese abandu; handi yamala yaakabira abandu boosi eng'eni chibiri echo.
Mani abandu abo boosi balya beekuta.
Beemao babuusa alala ebimweero ehumi-na-bibiri ebichuule ebidonye-donye byadoong'aho eby'emigaati nende eby'eng'eni.
Mani abalya ebyohulya ebyo bali abasaacha elifu chitaanu enaamba.
Abweene awo Yesu yaboola abeeki bae beengire mu lyaato bamutangirire ohusyaabala bakwe engereha w'enyaanja, mu Bbetisaida, omweene naasisebulaanga esidiyiha sy'abandu esyo.
Mani Yesu niyamala ohubetusaho boosi, yemao yacha yaniina hu lugulu ohwekongooya Nasae.
Nae obwire nibweera, elyaato ly'abeeki bae lyali limalire ohwoloberera ebusiba w'enyaanja, nae omweene nadong'ere yeng'ene engereha hu lukoongo.

Yesu yemawo yabona ati abeeki bae abo bali bali ohunyahana muno ohufuka elyaato ohusuda, olwohuba omuyaka kwali nikuwucha nikutulira yibali nibachoomere. Nae nichali aambi w'esaa chine chesiro, Yesu yabonehana nakeenda hu maachi, niyeecha yibali. Yali adaha abitireho busa aambi nabo,
nae nibabona naali ohukeenda hu maachi babaasa bati syali esihyeeno, mani bobba wuwi;
olwohuba boosi bali bamubweene, mani nibakwiiremo oluteengo. Nae abweene awo, Yesu yalomaloma nabo naboola ati, “Mugume omwooyo, olwohubani neese mweene; mutatya.”
Yesu yemao yengira mu lyaato mubali mani omuyaka kwaakama. Mani abeeki beecha bawuka muno,
olwohuba sibali nibamanyire esy'amaya sy'emigaati chira, olwohuba emyooyo chaabwe chali chahahanyala.
Mani nibali nibamalire ohusyaabala engereha, beecha boola hu lukoongo lwe Genesareeti, mani baboya elyaato lyaabwe awo.
Nae nibatula busa bati mu lyaato, abandu bamanyirisa Yesu bwaangu,
mani beeruha basasaanira mu ngoongo chisibiraane awo choosi, bachaaka ohuletaanga abalwaye hubutalihe bwaabwe, buli abundu woosi yibabechaanga bawuliire bati awo niyo yi Yesu yali.

Mani buli abundu woosi yi Yesu yechaanga, kata mu ngoongo, ebiko bihuluundu, oba esyaalo, handi abandu baalisaanga abalwaye mu bifwo by'ebiito, mani nibamusabaanga bati badiirengeho busa kata hu kemo lye ngubo yae; nasitalomwa buli oyo yeesi owayidiirangaho, yawonerangao.
Nae bulaanu, Abafalisaayo beecha bebuusira ali Yesu, alala nende abekesa ba malako bandi abali nibatulire e Yerusaalemu,
beecha babona bati, abeeki ba Yesu bandi balichaanga nibatesabire amahono, esyeekesa siti, haba sibesabaanga amahono koti lusihoyeere.
(Olwohuba Abafalisaayo, nende Abayudaaya boosi, sibalya nibatesaabire amahono kaabwe nibalondakirira nende omuduunga kwali kwa bakuuka yaabwe;

nae handi nibakaluha ango nibatula mu siito, sibalya ohwoola lu balabya emibiri chaabwe; handi aliwo emiduunga chiindi emiingi muno chibahoyerwanga ohwoseresa koti, okw'ohwoosa ebikoombe nende esyoongo alala nende ebiindu byehonyerwa byoosi ebyaholwa musibya sy'omugasa. )

Handi Abafalisaayo alala nende abandiiki ba malako beemao bateeba Yesu nibaboola bati, “Lwasiina abeeki bao haba sibalondakana nende emiduunga cha bakuuka yeefwe, nae balya busa nende amahono kefutire?”

Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Bwadyeeri omunabbi Yisaaya yadeeka yalomaloma hw'eng'we abebachirisi koti lusyandiikwa siti, ‘Abandu bano banjisamo oluyaali nende emboosi chong'ene, nae emyooyo chaabwe chiri eyale naange;
ohunyinamira hwaabwe hubulamo amahulundu.’ ‘beekesa koti amalako ebiindu bi bandu bataao busa.’
Eng'we muleha Elako lya Nasae, nimwomiirira hu miduunga cha bandu busa.”
Handi Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Eng'we muli nende amakesi muno akohufuna engira ndayi y'ohuta ebuleka Elako lya Nasae, hu mweemeo munyale ohwoseresa emiduunga cheeng'we!
Olwohuba Musa yaboola ati, ‘Yisaanga oluyaali mu latao nende mao’; handi ati, ‘Oyo yeesi olomaloma bubi hu simwaana kata ng'ina, mubwadyeri bweene ahoyera ohufwa’;
nang'we muboola muti omuundu naboolera simwaana kata ng'ina ati, ‘Esyo simbeere njia ohuhubeeresa bulaanu siri Korubbani,’ esyo nisyo esiyaanwa sibereeswe Nasae
awo bulaanu simuba mumukanya ohuholeraho simwaana kata ng'ina, esiindu syoosi,
awo niyo yimunyasira elalira emboosi ya Nasae nimwehoonyera emiduunga cheeng'we echo chimuchiiririra nimweekesa abana beeng'we. Handi muhola ebiindu biingi biindi koti ebyo bityo.”
Yesu handi yalaanga abandu beecha yali, mani yababoolera ati, “Eng'we mweesi mutekeerese bulai bimboola bino, handi mumanye muti:
abulao esiindu syoosi esiingira mu muundu nisitula erwaanyi esinyala syamunyaasa; ohutusaho ebyo ebitula mu muundu nibyo ebimunyaasa.”
Nae abandu nibaba nibamalire ohuwaao, Yesu yeecha yengira mu nyumba, mani abeeki bae bamuteeba amahulundu k'olukaado olwo.
Nae yababoolera ati, “Hane mbao mwesi musisiiri ohumanya. Haba simubona muti buli siindu syoosi esiingira mu muundu ohutula erwaanyi sisinyala humunyaasa,
olwohuba ni siingira, haba sisichia mu mwooyo, nae sichia munda yae mani syabitamo busa?”
Mani yaboola ati, “Esiindu situla mu muundu nisyo esimunyaasa.
Olwohuba, ebiindu bitula mu muundu, biba bitula mu mwooyo kwae, omwo nimwo omutula ebibaaso bibi, obuyirani, obwiibi, obutemo, obucheke,
obwekoombi bubi, obusuku, obubacha, obuseresi bubi, ehiinda, obumoonyi, esuunga, esibboli.
Ebibi bino byoosi, bitula mu muundu, mani nibyo ebimunyaasa.”
Mani niyamala atyo, yasingira yawao naachia mu syalo sya Tiro nende Sidoni. Mani yeecha yengira mu nyumba, natakanya omuundu yeesi asimanye; kata katyo, siyanyala ohwekisa.
Nae abweene awo, ni omuhasi wundi yi mwaana wae muhaana yaliho omusambwa, yeecha yawulira ati Yesu aliwo, mani yeecha yaakwa aasi mu makulu kae.
Nae bulaanu omuhasi oyo yali Omuyonaani, omwibulanwa wa Foenisia ohutula Siiria. Mani yaasaba Yesu yeeruse omusambwa okwo hu mwaana wae oyo.
Mani Yesu yaboolera omuhasi oyo ati, “Leha mberi bataangire ohuliisa abaana, olwohuba sisilai ohubukula ebyohulya by'abaana wabisukunira embwa.”
Nae omuhasi oyo yamukobolamo ati, “Eee, Omuhulundu; kata katyo, embwa chiri aasi w'emeesa chosi chirichaangaho kata hu budonye-donye bw'ebyohulya bi baana balya balehaho.”
Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Ohweema hu nomaloma yino, onyala wewerawo; omusaambwa kumalire ohutula hu mwaana wao oyo.”
Mani omuhasi oyo yawaawo yakobola engo, yanyoola omwaana wae oyo niyeyaliise hu sitaanda, omusambwa nikumalire ohumutulamo.
Yesu niyakobola ohutula mu syalo sya Tiro, yabitira hu ngira ya Sidoni, ey'omusyaalo sy'ebiko ehumi (Dekapooli), naachia hu nyaanja ye Galilaaya.
Mani handi beecha bamuleetera omusaacha wundi owali omudiimbe handi nga haba saanyala hulomaloma; mani basaba Yesu amwiseho omuhono kwae.
Nae Yesu yeecha yaamuyira endulo yi bandu bataali, yaata enjala chae mu matwi k'omusaacha oyo, handi yafuucha amate, yaamala yaamudiira hu lulimi;
niyamala atyo yatingaala Mukulu, yeesa omwooyo mani yamuboolera ati, “Efufata,” esyeekesa mbwe, “Yikuha.”
Mani amatwi kae keemao keekuha, olulimi lwae lwaboololoha, mani yaanyala ohulomaloma bulai bweene.
Yesu yemao yabahutira batabooleraho omuundu yeesi; nae koti luyachiiririra ohubahuutira, nilwo lwosi lu bandu bachiririra ohusilomaloma nende obwomiifu bwoosi.
Mani abandu beecha besinduha ohubitiirira, nibaboola bati, “Wuno mbano aholere ebiindu byoosi bulai bweene; akera kata abadiimbe bosi bawulira handi abakwa esiru bosi balomaloma.”
Mu ndaalo echo, esidiyiha sy'abandu sihoongo muno handi nisyeecha syebuusira eyiri Yesu, mani bahaywa esyohulya syoosi, Yesu yalaanga abeeki bae, yababoolera ati,
“Esidiyiha sy'abandu sino sindiisa esisa muno, olwohuba syahaba ano naange endaalo chidatu enaamba, mani babula esyohulya syoosi;
nae nimbaseebula bakobole engo waabwe nende enjala, bacha ohukwa hu ngira; handi abandi hu bandu bano batula eyale muno.”
Nae abeeki bae bamukobolamo bati, “Wiina onyala ohuliisa abandu bangi bano emigaati mu syalo sy'esiparara sino?”
Nae Yesu yabateeba ati, “Nae eng'we muli nende emigaati chiinga?” Baboola bati, “Chitaanu-na-chibiri.”

Mani Yesu yeecha yaboola esidiyiha esyo ohwihala aasi hu loba; mani yeecha yabukula emigaati chitaanu-na-chibiri echo, mani niyamala ohuchibeeresa ehabi, yachidonya-donya, yachibeeresa abeeki bae bachikabule abandu abo; mani bosi bamala bahola batyo.
Abeki abo bali nende otung'eni tudiidi twosi, mani Yesu niyamala ohutubeeresa ehabi, yaboola ati otung'eeni tuno twosi batukabule abandu.
Mani beecha baalya, beekutira elalira; mani babuusa ebidonye-donye ebyadoong'aho, byechula ebimweero bitaanu-na-bibiri.
Abandu balya bali aambi elifu chine enaamba.
Yesu yemao yaseebula abandu abo bawaao; mani abweene awo, yeecha yengira mu lyaato alala nende abeeki bae, mani bamala bacha mu situundu esilaangwa siti, Dalumanuuta.
Olwoola, Abafalisaayo bandi beecha eyiri Yesu mani bachaaka ohuyingana nae, nibamuhema abaholere esilolero esy'amayia ohutula Mukulu.
Yesu yeecha yesa omwooyo lukali muno, naboola ati, “Lwasiina olwiibulo luno lukonyeresa busa esilolero? Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, abulao esilolero sichia ohubereswa olwiibulo luno.”
Yesu yemao yabatulaho yawaao, yengira mu lyaato yasyaabala yacha engereha.
Bulaanu abeeki bae bali nibebiriire ohwiicha nende emigaati; nae bali badong'ere nende omugaati mulala kwong'ene mu lyaato
Yesu yemawo yabakerakira naboola ati, “Mumanyaanga, mweliinde amamera k'Abafalisaayo nende aka Herode.”
Abeki beecha baboolanira abeene-na-beene bati, “Hubula omugaati kwoosi.”

Nae olwohuba Yesu yali amalire ohusimanya, yemawo yababoolera ati, “Lwasiina muli ohwekaniayaanga muti mubula omugaati kwoosi? Eng'we mutoola ohubona hwosi kata ohumanya hwosi? Emyooyo cheeng'we chomerana?
Mwaba nende emoni, mwahaya ohubona? Handi mwaba nende amatwi, mwahaya ohuwulira? Handi kata simunyala ohwichulisaho?

Oludaalo lu ndadonya-donyeraho emigaati chitaanu ohuliisa abandu babita elifu chitaanu, eng'we mwabuusa ebimweero biinga ebichuule ebidonye-donye byadoong'aho?” Nabo bamukobolamo bati, “Ehumi-na-bibiri.”
“Nae emigaati chitaanu-na-chibiri ohuliisa abandu ababita elifu chine, mwabuusa ebimweero biinga ebichuule ebidonye-donye byadoong'aho?” Nabo bamukobolamo bati, “Bitaanu-na-bibiri.”
Nae Yesu yemawo yababoolera ati, “Kata katyo, ohumanyaho hwosi, musisiiri ohumanya?”
Beemao boola e Bbetisaida. Niboola eyo, abandu bandi beecha baleeta eyiri Yesu omusaacha muwofu, bamwekongooya bati amudiireho busa.
Yesu yeecha yadiira omuhono kw'omusaacha muwofu oyo, yamutusa erwaanyi w'olukoongo olwo; yaamufucha hu moni, handi yamwisaho amahono kae, mani yaamuteeba ati, “Oli ohubonaho esiindu syoosi-syoosi?”
Omusaacha oyo yeecha yatingaala akulu mani yaamala yaboola ati, “Ndi ohubona abandu; nae bafwaana koti emisaala chikeenda.”
Yesu yeecha handi yaata amahono kae hu moni ch'omusaacha oyo; mani omusaacha oyo yeecha yahang'aasa emoni chae, mani chawonera elalira, yaanyala ohubona buli siindu bulai bweene.
Yesu yemao yaseebula omusaacha oyo akobole engo wae, namuboolera ati, “Otachiaho kata wengira mu lukoongo olwo.”
Yesu yemao yaasingira yawaao nende abeeki bae, bacha mu ngoongo echiri mu Kaisarea Filipi; nae nibali hu lukeendo olwo, Yesu yeecha yateeba abeeki bae ati, “Abandu baboola bati nise naanu?”
Nae abeeki bae bamuboolera bati, “Yowaana Omubatiisi; abandi bati, Elija; handi abandi bati, mulala hu banabbi.”
Nae Yesu yabateeba ati, “Nae eng'we muboola muti nise naanu?” Peetero yamukobolamo ati, “Ewe niiwe Kristo.”
Mani Yesu yabahutira ati bataboolera omuundu yeesi ebimudiiraho.

Yesu mani yachaaka ohubeekesa ati Omwaana w'Omuundu ahoyere ohusaanda muno, handi asyulwe nende abahuluundu b'enjia, abalaamisi bahuluundu, nende abekesi b'amalako, handi yeetibwe, handi oluunyuma lw'endaalo chidatu, asyuhe.
Yesu yalomaloma bino mubwahaahu. Nae Peetero yamubukula yamuyira endulo mani yachaaka ohumwalabira.
Nae Yesu niyakaluhaana mani yabona abeeki bae, yaalabira Peetero, naboola ati, “Ewe Sitaani, mbweere eyi! Olwohuba haba sooli huluwaande lwa Nasae, nae oli hu lwaande lw'abandu.”
Yesu yemao yalaanga esidiyiha sy'abandu alala nende abeeki bae beeche yali, mani yababoolera ati, “Omuundu yeesi odaha ohunoonda, leha yesyule omweene, mani akinge omusalabba kwae, yanonde.
Olwohuba oyo yeesi odaha ohuwonia obulamu bwae omweene, achia ohubukosa; nae oyo okosa obulamu bwae hu lwaange nende hulw'Emboosi Ndai, aba achia ohubuwonia.
Olwohuba omuundu afunamo siina, ohunyoola esyaalo syoosi, nae afwiirwe obulamu bwae?
Olwohuba, siindu siina syeene si muundu anyala ohukulasaniamo obulamu bwae?

Olwohuba, oyo yeesi odiirwa esoni hu lwaange nende hu lw'emboosi change, mu luse luholi lw'ebibi handi olutamanyire Nasae luno, oyo niye yi mwaana w'Omuundu yesi achia ohudiirirwa esoni, niyahabe niyeecha mu luyaali luhoongo lwa Simwaana alala nende bamalaika boolerefu.”
Yesu yemawo yababoolera ati, “Mubwadyeeri mbaboolera endi, aliwo abandu bandi hu beemere ano, abacha ohubona obwaami bwa Nasae nibwiichire nende obunyala, nibatoola ohufwa.”
Mani oluunyuma lw'endaalo chisaasaba, Yesu yeecha yabukula Peetero nende Yakobbo nende Yowaana, yaabayira hu lugulu luleeyi bong'ene; mani yakaluhanisibwa mu moni chaabwe,
mani ebyefwalo byae byang'enang'ena, nende obwa dibbo bumilamilana muno, ohuhira esilabya syoosi esiri hu syalo huno syahanyala ohulabya.
Mani abweene awo waboneherao Elija alala nende Musa; nibali ohulomaloma nende Yesu.
Mani Peetero yaboolera Yesu ati, “Omwaami, silayi muno efwe ohuba ano; leha efwe hwombahe ebikaali bidatu, silala esyao, silala esya Musa, handi silala esya Elija.”
Olwohuba Peetero yali awungire, ahayiswe nende esy'ohuboola, olwohuba bali batiire muno.
Mani esireesi syeecha syaabafuuniha, mani ekono lyeecha lyatulira musireesi niliboola liti, “Wuno niye Omwaana wange muheerwa; mumuwulire.”
Mani abweene awo nibachaaka ohwewunja bulai, haba sibabonaho omuundu wundi yeesi naali nabo ohutusaho Yesu yeng'ene.
Mani nibali mbwe hubehirira aasi w'olugulu, Yesu yeecha yabahutira obutabooleraho omuundu yeesi ebyo bibali nibabweene, ohwoola lu mwaana w'Omuundu niliba naamalire ohusyuuha ohutula mu bafu.
Mani beecha babiiha esiindu esyo mu mwooyo chaabwe, nibetebaanga abeene ohumanya emboosi echo mbwe ohusyuuha ohutula mu bafu bicheekesa.
Nae bamuteeba bati, “Lwasiina, abekesa b'amalako baboola bati Elija niye ohoyeere ohutangira ohwiicha?”

Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Elija niye otaangira ohwiicha atekehe ebiindu byoosi bibe koti lubihoyeere ohuba; nae ebyandiikibwa bidiira hu mwaana w'Omuundu byeekesa siina, biti mbwe ahoyere ohusaanda muno handi ayiribwe koti omusyuule?
Nae ese mbaboolera endi Elija yamala ohwiicha, mani bamala ohumuhola syoosi sibadaha, koti busa lubyamulomalomaho mubyandiiko byolerefu.”
Mani nibeecha boola eyiri abeeki, babona esidiyiha sihoongo muno nisibebodohaanie, mani abekesa b'amalako nibali ohuyingana nabo.
Mani abweene awo abeeki nibabona Yesu, besinduha muno, mani beeruha nibacha yali, bamala bamuheesa.
Nae Yesu yabateeba ati, “Siina syeene simuli ohuyinganaanga nabo?”
Nae mulala hu bandu bali mu sidiyiiha yamukobolamo ati, “Omweekesa, ndeetere omwaana wange yooli, olwohuba aliho omusaambwa mubbungafu;
mani buli lukumuninaanga, kumubbanga aasi; mani abira efiro muhanwa niyeesia ameeno mani amala abbangalala. Mani sabire abeeki bao ohukwiirusa nae sibanyalire.”
Nae Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Ee, eng'we oluse lutamanyire Nasae, njia ohuba nang'we ohwoola liina? Njia ohubesimiirisa ohwoola liina? Mumundeetere ano.”
Mani beecha baleeta omusyaani oyo eyiri Yesu; nae omusaambwa okwo nikwabona Yesu, abweene awo kwaniina omusyaani oyo, mani kwamusuchaa-sucha, mani yaakwa aasi, yekalangasa, nabira efiro muhanwa.
Mani Yesu yateeba simwaana mwaana oyo ati, “Yahaba ati ohumala mbaka siina?” Nae yaboola ati, “Ohutula mu budoto bwae.
Mani buli siha kumusukunaanga mu muliro nende mu maachi, kuti kumusihirise; nae nonyala wahola esiindu syoosi, tukwiire esisa mani otuhoonye.”
Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Mbwe nonyala! Ebiindu byoosi binyaliha eyiri oyo ofukiirira.”
Abweene awo, simwaana mwaana oyo yayula naboola ati, “Ese fukiirira; ewe ndehere hu lw'obutaba nende efukiirira hwange ohwo!”

Nae Yesu niyabona ati esidiyiha syali sichaakire ohwiruha nisyebuusa alala, yahabuhira omusaambwa okwo naboola ati, “Ewe omusaambwa mudiimbe handi okwakwa esiru, hulagira endi, tula mu mwaana oyo, handi otamukaluhaangamo ehabi liindi.”
Mani nikwamala ohwayula nende ohumususuucha bubi muno, kwamutulamo, mani omusyaani oyo yaba koti omulaambo kwaafwa hale; mani abandu bahira obuungi baboola bati, “Amalire ohufwa.”
Nae Yesu yeecha yaamusingisa namudiirire omuhono, mani yaasingira yeema.
Mani Yesu niyali naamalire ohwingira mu nyumba, abeeki bae beecha bamuteeba nibali bong'ene bati, “Lwasiina efwe sihunyalire ohwirusa omusambwa okwo?”
Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Omusambwa kufwaana koti kuno, sikunyala ohwiruswa nende esiindu syoosi ohutusaho ohusaba hwong'ene.”
Yesu nende abeeki bae beecha batula awo, bahalakania mu Galilaaya. Yesu siyakanyaho omuundu yeesi amanyeho atyo;

olwohuba yali niyeekesaanga abeeki bae nababoolera ati, “Omwaana w'Omuundu achia ohudiiswa mu mahono k'abandu bandi, bache bamwiite; mani naamalire ohwiitwa, oluunyuma lw'endaalo chidatu, achia ohusyuuha.”
Nae abeeki bae sibanyala ohumanya enomanoma eyo, mani baatya ohumuteeba.
Mani boosi beecha boola e Kaperanaumu; mani Yesu niyali amalire ohwingira mu nyumba, yabateeba ati, “Mubeere nimuteebanaanga siina hu ngira?”
Nae abeeki boosi bawuleera busa chi; olwohuba nibali bali hu ngira bali nibateebanaanga abeene-na-beene oyo owali nabahiramo oluyaali.

Yesu yamala yehala aasi mani yalaanga ehumi-na-babiri abo; mani yababoolera ati, “Omuundu yeesi naaba achia ohuba omwimirisi, ahoyere ohuba owenyuma ohira mu boosi, handi ohuba omuhalaabani wa boosi.”
Mani Yesu yeecha yabukula omwaana muyere, yamwemesa akati waabwe; mani yamwakata mu mahono kae, yababoolera ati,
“Oyo yeesi owakaanira omwaana ofwaana koti wuno mu liita lyaange aba yanjakaanire; nae handi oyo owunjakaanira, aba siyakaanire ese, nae aba yakaanire oyo owanduma.”
Nae Yowaana yaboolera Yesu ati, “Omweekesa, hubweene omuundu wundi niyerusa emisaambwa mu liita lyao, mani hwamukayira olwohuba saali mulala hweefwe.”
Nae Yesu yaboola ati, “Mutamukayira; olwohuba awumao onyala ohuhola omulimo kwamaani mu liita lyaange, handi abweene awo yanomanomaho bubi.
Olwohuba oyo atatuyirimba, aba ali alala naafwe.
Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, buli obabeeresa amaachi k'ohung'wa olwohuba muli abandu ba Kristo, haba saachia hufwiirwa omukabo kwae.
“Oyo okera mulala hu baere bano abafukiriramo yaakwa mu sibi, syahahirire yaboywa okukina kuhoongo mu kosi mani yaasukunwa mu nyaanja.
Nae omuhono kwao nikukera wakwa mu sibi, kutemeho; olwohuba ohwingira mu bulamu butawa nooli omulema, bihira ohuchia mu muliro kutasima nende amahono koombi, mu muliro kutasima.
Nae ohukulu hwao nihukera wakwa mu sibi huteemeho, olwohuba ohwingira mu bulamu butawa nooli omulema bihira ohuchia mu muliro kutasima nooli nende amakulu koombi.
Nae emoni yao niyikera wakwa mu sibi, yichomolemo; olwohuba ohwingira mu bwaami bwa Nasae nooli nende emoni ndala bihira ohuchia mu muliro kutasima nende emoni choombi,
yi nyeende chayo chitafwa, handi yi muliro kwayo kutasima.
Olwohuba buli muundu achia oluungibwa n'omuliro.
Omuunyu mulai nikwo; nae omuunyu nikuwaamo echamu lyaakwo, kunyala kutye ohukaluswamo echamu elyo? Mubecheengemo echamu, handi abeene-na-beene mubecheenge emireembe.”
Yesu yeecha yaatula awo, yacha mu syalo sya Buyudaaya mani yaambuha omwaalo kwa Yorudaani, handi esidiyiha syeecha syamwebodohaniaho; nae koti luyali yanala ohuhola, yachaaka ohubeekesa handi.
Nae Abafalisaayo beecha yali, bamuteeba nibamuhema bati, “Sifukiirirwa omusaacha ohwirusa omuhasi wae?”
Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Musa yabalagira siina syeene?”
Nabo baboola bati, “Musa yafukiirira omusaacha ohwandiika ebbarwa y'ohwirusa omuhasi, mani yamwemaliraho elalira.”
Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Musa yabaandiikira atyo ohweema hu buwangalafu bw'emyooyo cheeng'we.
Nae ohutula hu huloongwa hw'esyaalo, ‘Nasae yahola bombi, omusaacha nende omuhasi.’
‘Mani hulw'esifune sino, omusaacha achia ohulehaanga simwaana nende ng'ina mani amale yaambanisibwe nende omuhasi wae,
mani bombi beehole omubiri mulala. Bulaanu sibaba basisiiri babiri, nae bali omubiri mulala.’
Sakira, esyo si Nasae yamala ohuwambaania alala, omuundu yeesi atasikabuhanianga.”
Nae nibali mu nyumba, abeeki bae handi bamuteeba ebidiira hu siindu sino.
Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Oyo yeesi owirusa omuhasi wae, mani yamala yadeehya owundi, aba aholere obucheke;
handi omuhasi yesi naaloba wamwe, yamala yadeehera omusaacha wundi, aba ahola obucheke.”
Abandu bandi bali nibaletaanga abana eyiri Yesu abadiireho nende amahono kae, nae abeeki bae baabakayira n'obwaalaba.
Nae Yesu niyabona atyo, yanyoolera, mani yababoolera ati, “Mulehe abaana beeche yindi, mutabakayira; olwohuba abali koti bano nibo abeene Bwaami bwa Nasae.
Mbaboolera obwadyeeri bweene endi, oyo yeesi otakaanira Obwaami bwa Nasae koti omwaana muyere, haba saachia hubwingiramo daawe.”
Mani Yesu yeecha yabaakata yamala yababeresa ehabi, nabesaho amahono.

Mani Yesu niyali hwatula ohuchaaka olukeendo lwae ati, omusaacha wundi yeecha yali niyeruha mani yaasigama mu moni wae yaamuteeba ati, “Omweekesa mulai ewe, siina syeene sihoyeere ohuhola hunyemeo nduuhane obulamu butaakama?”
Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Lwasiina wunaanga omulai? Abulao omulai, ohutusaho Nasae yeng'ene.
Ngandi omanyire amalako kano: ‘Otetaanga, Otayiranaanga, Otebaanga, Otabachiraanga owaasyo, Otakaadirisaanga, Yisaanga oluyaali mu lataao nende mao.’ ”
Nae omusaacha oyo yamukobolamo ati, “Omweekesa, ako koosi, ndakooseresa ohutula mu buyere bwaange.”
Mani Yesu niyamwewunja, yamusiima, mani yamuboolera ati, “Obulwaho esiindu silala siti; cha okuse byooli nabyo, omale obikabire abamanani, mani ochia ohunyoola obuyiinda Mukulu; mani wiche, wunonde.”
Nae omusaacha oyo niyawulira atyo, yawaamo amaani, mani yawao niyelalihiriire muno; olwohuba yali ali nende ebyobuyiinda biingi muno.
Mani Yesu yeecha yatingaala abeeki bae, mani yamala yababoolera ati, “Nga bicha ohudinyira muno abali nende obuyiinda bungi ohwingira mu Bwaami bwa Nasae!”
Mani abeeki bae beecha bawuka muno emboosi eyo. Nae Yesu yeecha yababoolera handi ati, “Baana bange, nga sidinyu muno ohwingira mu Bwaami bwa Nasae.”
Syanguyira muno engamia ohubita mu liina ly'esindaani, ohuhira omuundu muyiinda ohwingira mu Bwaami bwa Nasae.
Handi beecha bemeeda ohwesiinduha muno, mani baboolera Yesu bati, “Mani naanu onyala ohuwonesebwa?”
Yesu yabatingaala, mani yaboola ati, “Eyiri abandu sisinyaliha, nae sibiri bityo eyiri Nasae; olwohuba ebiindu byoosi binyaliha eyiri Nasae.”
Nae Peetero yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Eng'we, ngandi efwe hwaleha ebiindu byoosi mani hwahuloonda.”

Yesu yaboola ati, “Mbaboolera obwadyeeri bweene endi, abulao omuundu yeesi owaleha enyumba kata bamwaanang'ina kata bambochong'ene kata ng'ina kata simwaana kata abana kata amaloba, hulwaange nende hulw'Emboosi Ndai,

otachia ohubukaana amayumba nende bamwaanang'ina nende bambochong'ene nende bang'ina nende abana nende amaloba amahabi emia mu bulamu buno, alala nende ohusaandisibwa, nae mu bulamu bwiicha, achia ohunyoola obulamu butaakama.
Nae abangi abatangiramo bulaanu, bacha ohuheneerehayo, nae abahenerehayo bacha ohutangiramo.”

Mani Yesu nende abeeki bae bali nibali hu ngira nibakeenda nibacha e Yerusaalemu, nae Yesu yali naabataangisiiremo; mani beecha besinduha muno, nende abo abali nibabaloondaho beecha batya muno. Handi Yesu yeecha yakabula abeeki bae ehumi-na-babiri yabasudya endulo, mani yachaaka ohubaboolera ebyo ebyali nibicha ohumweholaho ati,

“Boneho, mbawo hucha e Yerusaalemu; mani Omwaana w'Omuundu achia ohudiiswa abalaamisi bahuluundu alala nende abandiiki ba malako, mani bacha ohumuheengera omusango okw'ohufwa, handi bamudiise Abateende;
mani bachaaka ohumuhoomolera, nende ohumufuchaho amate, nende ohunaala ehoba, nende ohumwiita; nae oluunyuma lw'endaalo chidatu, achia ohusyuuha.”
Mani awo, Yakobbo nende Yowaana, abasyaani ba Sebbedaayo, beecha mu moni wa Yesu, mani bamuboolera bati, “Omweekesa, efwe hudaha ofukiirire ohutuholera esyo syoosi sihuchia ohuhusaba.”
Mani Yesu yabateeba ati, “Siina syeene simudaha ese mbaholere?”
Nabo bamuboolera bati, “Tufukiirire hwihale, mulala humuhono kwao muluungi, nae owundi hu mukooda, mu bwaami bwao.”
Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Eng'we haba simumanyire simuli ohusaba. Munyala ohung'wa esikoombe siinjia ohung'wa, oba ohubatiisibwa?”
Nabo bamuboolera bati, “Eee hunyala.” Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Esikoombe siinjia ohung'wa mucha ohusing'wa; handi nende ohubatiisibwa hunja ohubatiisibwa, mwesi mucha ohubatiisibwa nahwo;
nae ohwihala hu muhono kwaange muluungi, kata hu mukooda, haba sibunyala bwaange ohubakaba, nae hwaabo bahwamala ohutekeherwa.”
Nae ehumi badong'ereo nibawulira batyo, banyolerera muno Yakobbo nende Yowaana.

Yesu yemawo yalaanga boosi beecha bebuusira yali, mani yababoolera ati, “Eng'we mumanyire muti abandu bahoyeere ohutuka Abateende baabehaho nende obunyala bungi muno, handi abemeresi baabwe bahunuufu babatukira amaani maangi.
Nae haba sisichia ohuba sityo mweng'we daawe; nae oyo ochia ohuba omuhunuufu mweng'we, ahoyeere ohuba omuhalaabani weng'we,
nae handi oyo ochia ohuba omwemeresi mweng'we ahoyeere ohuba omuhalaabani wa boosi.
Olwohuba Omwaana w'Omuundu yesi haba siyeecha ohuhalaabanirwa, nae yeecha ohuhalaabanira abandu, handi nende ohuwaayo omulamu bwae bube obwohununula abandu abangi.”

Beemao beecha boola mu Yeriko; mani handi koti lu Yesu yali hwatula busa ati mu Yeriko alala nende abeeki bae nende esidiyiha sihoongo sy'abandu, bakaana Bbarutimaayo owali omuwofu musabirisi, omwaana wa Timaayo, niyehaale hundulo w'engira.
Nae niyawulira ati hane Yesu owe Nasareti niye owali niyeecha, yachaaka ohulirira akulu naboola ati, “Yesu, Omwichuhulu wa Daudi, ngwiire esisa!”
Nae abandu bandi beecha bamwaalabira nibamuboolera bati awuleere; nae Bbarutimaayo yemeeda busa ohulirira akulu muno ati, “Ewe Omwichuhulu wa Daudi, ngwiire esisa!”
Yesu yeecha yeema mani yaboola ati, “Mumulaange.” Mani nibalaanga omusaacha muwofu oyo nibamuboolera bati, “Sangaala; siingira, ali ohuhulaanga.”
Mani niyawulira atyo, yaanyula era engubo yae, yaluuluha yeema, yeecha eyiri Yesu.
Nae Yesu yemao yaamuteeba ati, “Siina syeene syodaha huholere?” Nae omusaacha muwofu oyo yaboolera Yesu ati, “Omwaami, leha nyale ohubona.”
Mani Yesu yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Ewe wediirire olukeendo lwao wewerewo; efukiirira yao yihuwonisye.” Mani awo-naawo, omusaacha oyo yachaakirawo ohubona mani yatulaniramo ohuloonda Yesu.
Nae nibali niboola mu Yerusaalemu, aambi nende Bbetifaage nende Bbetani, beecha boola hu Lugulu lwa Olibeti, mani Yesu yaatuma babiri hu beeki bae,
nababoolera ati, “Muche mu lukoongo lubali mu moni, nae nimunalwiingiramo muti, mucha ohunyoola omwaana kw'epunda nikuboyerwe, okutehalwaangaho; mukuboolole mani mukuleete.
Nae omuundu yeesi nababoolera ati, ‘Muli ohuhola siina sino?’ muboole muti, ‘Omwaami niye okudaha, achia ohukukalusa bwaangu.’ ”
Mani beecha bawaao, banyoola omwaana kw'epunda nibakuboyere amulyango w'enyumba hu ndulo w'engira ndakalafu; mani bamala bakuboolola.
Nae abo abali nibeemere aambi awo bababoolera bati, “Eng'we muhola siina esyo? Lwasiina muli ohuboolola omwaana kw'epunda okwo?”
Nae abeeki abo baabakaluhamo koti Yesu yali ababoolere; mani baabaleha bawaao.
Abeki abo beecha baleetera Yesu omwaana kw'epunda okwo, bakwaalaho engubo chaabwe; mani Yesu yamala yaakwihalaho.
Mani abandu bangi beemao baala engubo chaabwe hu ngira, nae abandi baakula amasaga k'emisaala akaliho amasaafu maangi mani bakaala hu ngira.
Mani abo abali nibatangiiremo nende abo abali nibaloondaho bachaaka ohuhuumula nibaboola bati, “Hosaana! Ali nende ehabi oyo owiicha mu liita ly'Omwaami!
Buli nende ehabi obutuki bwa seefwe Daudi obuli ohwiicha! Hosaana akulu muno!”

Yesu yamala yengira mu Yerusaalemu, mani yacha mu nyumba ya Nasae; nae niyamala ohutingaala yaaswania buli siindu; nae koti obwire bwali bwiirire, yatula yacha e Bbetani alala nende abeeki bae ehumi-na-babiri.
Nibwahya, hu ludaalo luloondaho, nibeecha ohutula e Bbetani, Yesu enjala yaamuluma.

Nae niyabona omusaala kw'enduli eyale nikudidiisye amasaafu, yaasuda aambi ohubona nanyala ohunyoolaho esyaamo syoosi. Nae niyakwoolaho, haba siyanyoolaho esiindu syoosi ohutusaho amasaafu busa, olwohuba sisyali siha sy'emituli ohwaama.
Mani Yesu yaakuboolera ati, “Omuundu yeesi ahoya yahaya ohuhulyaaho esyaamo syoosi handi.” Mani abeeki bae nabo bawulira sino.

Mani beecha boola e Yerusaalemu. Nae niyengira mu nyumba ya amalaamo, yachaaka ohwirusamo abo abali nibakusira alala nende abo abali nibakulira mu nyumba ya amalaamo. Mani yafumamya emeesa ch'abafunjisi b'eseende nende ebisaala by'abo abali nibakusa amaburuku;
mani haba siyafukiirira omuundu yeesi ohubisira esiindu syoosi mu nyumba ya Nasae.

Mani Yesu yekesa nababoolera ati, “Haba sisyandiikwa mubyandiiko byolerefu siti, ‘Enyuumba yange yahalaangwe enyumba y'ohwekongooyeramo eyiri abandu boosi?’ Nae engwe muyiholere obwekiso bw'abanyaka.”

Nae abalaamisi bahuluundu alala nende abaandiiki b'amalako nibawulira batyo, bachaaka ohukiiya engira y'ohumunyaasiramo; nae beecha bamutya olwohuba esidiyiha sy'abandu syali siwukaho busa enjekesa yae.
Nae engoloobe niyoola, abo beecha batula mu siko esyo.
Nae nibali nibabitao echuli, babona omutuli okwo nikwomere ohwolera elalira hu misi.
Mani Peetero yeecha yechulisa, naboolera Yesu ati, “Omwaami, bonaho! Omutuli kuwabwabire kumalire ohwooma.”
Nae Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Mufukiirire mu Nasae.

Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, oyo yeesi oboolera olugulu luno ati, ‘Wekiinge wesukune mu nyaanja,’ mani yahaya ohukana-kana mu mwooyo kwae, nae yafukiirira ati esyo syaaba alomaloma sichia ohwehola, siba sichia ohumweholehera sityo.
Sakira mbaboolera endi, buli syoosi syooba nosaba muhwekongooya, fukiirira oti omalire ohusinyoola esyo, handi siba sichia ohuba esyeeng'we.
Nae nimweema ohwekongooya, muleheremo abaasyeng'we babaliho emboosi, olwo nilwo lu Seeng'we oli Mukulu yesi achia ohubaleheramo ebibi byeeng'we.”
Mani handi beecha boola mu Yerusaalemu. Nae niyali akeenda mu nyumba ya amalaamo, abalaamisi bahuluundu alala nende abaandiiki b'amalako, beecha yiyali,
bamuboolera bati, “Otusa ena obunyala bw'ohuhola ebiindu bino, kose wiina owahuba obunyala bw'ohuhola bino?”
Yesu yababoolera ati, “Njia ohubateeba esiteebo silala syong'ene; nimungaluhamo, syesi mba njia ohubaboolera yindusa obunyala bw'ohuhola bino.
Ohubatiisa hwa Yowaana, hwatula Mukulu, kose mu bandu? Mungaluhemo.”
Mani baboolana abeene-na-beene bati, “Nihuboola huti, ‘hwatula Mukulu,’ achia ohutuboolera ati, ‘Lwasiina simwamufukiirira?’
Kose huboole huti, ‘Hwatula mu bandu?’ ” bali batiire abandu, olwohuba abandu boosi, bali bamanyire bati, Yowaana yali omunabbi mweene.
Mani bakaluha mu Yesu bati, “Efwe hukoterwe.” Nae Yesu ababoolera ati, “Syesi haba siinjia ohubaboolera yindusa obunyala bw'ohuhola ebiindu bino.”

Mani Yesu yeecha yachaaka ohulomaloma nabo mu ngaado ati, “Omusaacha wundi yalima endaalo y'emisabbiibu, mani yamala yombaha olukaka yayibodoohania, handi yayaba eliina ly'esihunyiro sy'emisabbiibu, handi yamala yombaha omunara okw'ohuliindiramo endalo eyo, mani yamala yayibeeresa abahalaabani nae omweene amala yasamula musyaalo siindi.
Esiha nisyoola, yeecha yaatuma omuhalaabani wae mulala eyiri abahalaabani abo, ache aduhaneho ebyaamo biindi eby'emisabbiibu.
Nae abahalaabani abo, beecha bamudiira baamala bamuhuya, baamala baamukalusa yatulire mahono mahaya.
Omweene ndalo handi yeecha yatumira abahalaabani abo omuhalaabani wae wundi, nae abahalaabani abo beecha bamunyaala omutwe bamala bamuhola ebyesoni.
Handi yeecha yabatumira omuhalaabani wundi nae yibecha beeta; alala nende abandi abangi batyo, nibabahuya handi abandi nibabeeta.
Handi omweene ndalo oyo yali adoong'isye omuhalaabani wundi mulala; oyo niye owali omwaana muheerwa; niye yiyeecha yaamaliirihayo ohutuma yibali, naboola ati, ‘Bacha ohwisa oluyaali mu mwaana wange.’
Nae abahalaabani abo beecha baboolanira abeene-na-beene bati, ‘Wuno niye omukerami; mwiche, mulehe humwiite, mani endaalo y'emisabbiibu yibe eyeefwe.’
Mani beecha bamubukula bamwiita, mani bamusukuna erwaanyi w'endalo y'emisabbiibu.
Omweene ndalo y'emisabbiibu eyo achia ohuhola siina? Achia ohwiicha amale asihiriise abahalaabani abo, amale abukule endaalo y'emisabbiibu eyo ayiberese abandu bandi.
Haba simwasomaho ebyandiiko byolerefu bino biti, ‘Ekina lyeene lira li bombahi bahaya nilyo elyeholere omutwe okw'esoonda;
yino yali ehola y'Omwaami, handi ndayi muno mu moni cheefwe’?”
Mani beecha baakesaho ohumudiira, nae baatya esidiyiha esyo, olwohuba bali basifumbule bati Yesu yali akaadire olukaado olwo olubadiiraho; mani beecha bamuleha mani bawao.
Handi beecha bamutumira Abafalisaayo bandi nende Abaherode bandi ohumuteka mu nomaloma yae yeene.

Mani beecha yali bamuboolera bati, “Omweekesa, humanyire huti ewe oli ow'obwadyeeri, handi haba siwekweeda omuundu yeesi; olwohuba ewe haba sootya oluyaali lwesifwo sy'abandu, nae mu bwadyeeri bweene weekesaanga engira ya Nasae yene. Mani sihoyera ohutooya emisolo eyiri Kaisaali, kose haba?
Efwe huhoyeere ohukitunga, kose, efwe sihuhoyeere?” Nae Yesu koti luyali namanyire ohwebachirisa hwaabwe, yeecha yababoolera ati, “Lwasiina muhema mutyo? Mundetere etoongolo, mani mulehe nditingaale”
Mani beecha bamuleetera lala. Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Sino sifwaanani nende obwandiike buno bya naanu?” Nabo bamuboolera bati, “Bya Kaisaali.”
Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Mukalusireenge Kaisaali ebiindu biba nibiri ebya Kaisaali, nae mukalusireenge Nasae ebiindu biba nibiri ebya Nasae.” Mani beecha baatya muno Yesu.
Handi Abasadukaayo bosi beecha yali, abo ababoolaanga bati, ohusyuuha hubulao; mani bamuteeba esiteebo nibaboola bati,
“Omweekesa, Musa yali yatwandiikira ati, mwaanang'ina muundu naafwa mani yaaleha omuhasi, nae haba saalehere omwaana, omuundu oyo ahoyera yabukula omuhasi oyo, yebulira mwaanang'ina abaana.
Olwoola, yaliwo abasyaani bebulanwa bataanu-na-babiri; Omuhulundu w'abwe yeecha yadeehya omuhasi, mani niyeecha yafwa, haba siyaleha omwaana kata mulala;
mani owohubiri yeecha yabukula omuhasi oyo, handi yesi yeecha yafwa nataalehereho omwaana kata mulala; handi owohudatu yesi yeecha yafwa atyo;
mani bataanu-na-babiri abo haba siyalehaho omwaana kata mulala. Muhumaliirihira elalira, omuhasi oyo yesi yeecha yafwa.
Mani muhusyuhira, omuhasi oyo achia ohuba muha naanu? Olwohuba abasaacha bataanu-na-babiri abo boosi bali bamuyira koti omuhasi waabwe.”
Yesu nae yababoolera ati, “Sino sinisyo esikeraanga nimudondobana, olwohuba mbwe haba simumanyire ebyandiiko byolerefu kata nende obunyala bwa Nasae?
Olwohuba abo nibahasyuuhe mu bafu, haba sibahabe nibali abohudehya, kata abohudeeha, nae bacha ohuba koti Malaika bo Mukulu.

Nae esya abafu ohusyuuhisibwa, haba simwasomaho mu sitabo sya Musa, mulukano ludiira hu sichaha, koti lu Nasae yamuboolera ati, ‘Ndi Nasae wa Yibbulaimu, handi Nasae wa Yisaka, handi Nasae wa Yakobbo’?
Haba saali Nasae wa abafu, nae ali owa abalamu; mwadondobana muno.”

Mani mulala hu abaandiiki ba malako yeecha yibali yawulira nibali ohuyingana abeene-na-beene, mani niyabona ati Yesu ali ohubakaluhamo bulai bweene, yeecha yaamuteeba ati, “Lako siina elihiramo koosi obuhunuufu?”
Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Elitaangira lyeene liri liti, ‘Wulira Ewe Yisirayiri: Omwaami Nasae weefwe, Omwaami ali mulala yeng'ene;
mani ohoyere ohudaha Omwaami Nasae wao nende omwooyo kwao kwoosi, handi nende obulamu bwao bwoosi, nende amakesi kao koosi, nende amaani kao koosi.’
Elilondaho nilyo lino, ‘Dahaanga owaasyo koti luwedaha omweene.’ Haba siriruwo elako liindi elihira kano koosi.”
Mani omwandiiki wa malako yeecha yaboolera Yesu ati, “ Omweekesa, oli abweene; oboolere obwadyeeri oti ali mulala yeng'ene, handi abulao owundi ohutusaho oyo;

handi nende ohumudaha nende omwooyo kwoosi, handi nende ohumanya hwoosi, handi nende amaani koosi, handi ohudaha owaasyo koti lu wedaha omweene, bihira muno ebisaambe bilaamba byoosi alala nende ebiyaanwa.”

Nae Yesu niyabona ati akaluhemo nende amakesi, yamuboolera ati, “Ewe haba sooli eyale muno ohutula hu bwaami bwa Nasae.” Mani ohula hwolwo, abulao omuundu yeesi owateemaho ohumuteeba esiteebo siindi syoosi.
Mani Yesu niyali niyeekesa mu nyumba ya Nasae, yaboola ati, “Abaandiiki ba malako bahaboola batye bati Kristo ali omwaana wa Daudi?
Nae Daudi mweene naniinirwe nende Mwooyo Mwolerefu, yesaara ati, ‘Omwaami yaboolera Omwaami wange ati, Yihala hu muhono kwaange muluungi, ohwoola lundirita abasuku bao aasi w'amakulu kao.’
Daudi mweene omulaanga ati, Omwaami; mani yahaba atye omwaana wae?” Mani esidiyiha sihoongo syeecha syamuwulira nende esangaalo.
Mani muhwekesa hwae handi yaboola ati, “Mweliinde abaandiiki ba malako, abaheera ohukendaanira mu maganjuula kaabwe maleeyi, nende ohubona bati bahesibwa bulai mu biito
handi nende obubereswa ebisaala bilai mu Sinagoogi alala nende ebifwo byoluyaali hubidyaalo,
handi abo abayaaya amayumba k'abafwire handi muhwebachirisa abaleyia amalaamo kaaba amaleeyi muno. Abo bacha ohunyoola ohuboneresebwa huhiramo obuhoongo.”
Mani yamala yehala natingaalire esibiihiro sy'eseende, niyewunja ebikaanda by'abandu nibita eseende chaabyo musibiihiro esyo. Abandu banyali bangi batechaangamo eseende enyiingi muno.
Mani omuhasi mufwiire mukofu muno yesi yeecha, mani yataamo obuhela bubiri obwomugasa obwaakana nende etoongolo lala.

Yesu yeecha yalaanga abeeki bae beeche yaali, mani yababoolera ati, “Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, omuhasi mufwiire mumanani wuno, ateremo eseende nyiingi echihira echa abo boosi abasoloseere mu sibiihiro sino.
Olwohuba abo boosi basolosenge hw'ebyo ebidoong'ere hu biindu bibali nabyo; nae wuno ohutula hubumanani bwae, asolose syoosi siyali ali ninasyo, mubulamu bwae bwoosi.”
Mani niyali hwatula busa ati mu nyumba ya amalaamo, mulala hu beeki bae yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Omweekesa, bonaho esiroonyo sy'amakina nende esiroonyo sy'ebyombahe!”
Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Ewe mani oli ohubona ebyombahe bihunuufu bino? Sibichia hudoong'a ekina lala nirihaale hu liindi, elitahasukuunwe aasi.”
Nae Yesu niyali niyehaale hu lugulu olulaangwa luti Olibeti niyewunjire enyumba ya amalaamo, Peetero nende Yakobbo alala nende Yowaana nende Andereya beecha bamuteeba mungiso bati,
“Tuboolereho, lu bino bicha ohwehola, handi halolero siina ahacha ohubaao lu bino byoosi bicha ohubeerao?”
Nae Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Mweliinde omuundu yeesi atanyala ohubahyaamya.
Abandu abangi bacha ohwichaanga mu liita lyaange, nibaboola bati, ‘Ese neese oyo mweene!’ mani bacha ohukosa abandu bangi.
Handi nimuwuliraanga efuma ya maye alala nende embaha yidiira hu maye eyitaali eyadyeeri, mutasanguluhaanga; olwohuba bino bihoyeere ohukwaao, nae enjakamo yiba niyisisiiri ohwoola.

Olwohuba ebyaalo bicha ohusiingisa eye hu byaalo biindi, handi obwaami bwosi hu bwaami bundi; ohutungereha hw'esyaalo hucha ohubaao mu bifwo bitaali nasilala, enjala yosi yicha ohukwaao; nae bino byoosi bicha ohuba busa enjaako y'obuchuuni bw'engasi chohwibula.

“Nae mweliinde abeene; olwohuba bacha ohubayira mweeme mu biina; handi bahabahuyire mu mayumba ka amalaamo k'Abayudaaya; handi mwaheeme mu moni wa ba Gafana nende echa abatuki hu lwaange, ohuberesa obuloli mu moni waabwe.
Nae Emboosi Ndai yiri n'ohuyaalwa mu syalo syoosi.

Nae nibabaletaanga ohuyaaswa handi nibabadisaanga mu mahono kaabwe, muteyendehereraanga nimweteeba muti hunaboole siina; nae muboole busa bimuba muli nabyo ebiha ebyo, olwohuba haba sineeng'we abacha ohulomalomaanga, ohutusaho Mwooyo Mwolerefu oli mweng'we niye achia ohulomalomaanga.
Handi mwaanang'ina muundu mweene niye ochia ohumuwaayo bamwiite;
handi abandu boosi bacha ohuhusyuula hu lw'eliita lyaange. Nae oyo owesimiirisa ohwoola hu njakamo niye ochia ohuwonisibwa.
“Nae nobonaanga esiindu sibi muno nisyolere yisitahoyeere ohuba, (leha omusomi amanye amahulundu), mani mulehe abo abali mu Buyudaaya beeruhire mu ngulu;
oyo oli hu sirama sy'enyumba ateeha aasi, kata atengiraho mu nyumba yae, yatusamo esiindu syoosi;
handi oyo oli mu ndalo atakaluhaanga mungo ohubukula ebyefwalo byae.
Nae chibakaanire abo abali asito nende abo abahabe nibanuunia mu ndaalo echo!
Mwekongooye ebyo bitabao mu ndaalo ch'efula.
Olwohuba mu ndaalo echo, mucha ohubaamo ebinyaaso bitabechaangao hooho ohutula muhuchaaka hw'esyaalo si Nasae yaloonga ohwoola buti, handi haba sibyahabeeo handi endaalo choosi.
Nae Nasae aba nataduduyaho endaalo, awumawo omuundu yeesi owahaonere; nae hu lw'abo ba Nasae yadoola, yaduduya endaalo echo.
Nae, omuundu yeesi nahuboolera ati, ‘Bone, nga Kristo nguno ano!’ kose ati, ‘Bone, ngula ali ala!’ Otasifukiiriraanga.
Olwohuba ba Kristo bobubacha nende ba nabbi bobubacha bacha ohwiicha beekese abyohuboneraho nende ebiwukisa, ohukosa abadoole ba Nasae nisiba nisinyaliha.
Nae mweliinde; olwohuba mbaboleere ebiindu bino byoosi nibisisiiri ohwoola.
“Nae mu ndaalo echo, ebinyaaso ebyo nibiweere, eryuuba licha ohwirima, handi omwoosi kwosi haba sikuchia ohwaaduha,
handi eng'ining'ini chicha ohukwa nichitula akulu, handi amaani ko Mukulu kacha ohudengaanisibwa.
Mani bacha ohubona Omwaana w'Omuundu niyeechera mu maleesi nende amaani alala nende oluyaali.
Mani achia ohutuma ba Malaika, mani bache bahung'aanie alala abadoole bae ohutula hu mbeka chine ch'esyaalo, ohutula hu njakamo y'esyaalo, ohwoola hu njakamo y'ekulu.
“Leha mubonere hu mutuli: nimubona nikutusa amasaafu madoto kuti, nimumanya muti, endaalo ch'esiminyu chiri aambi ohwoola.
Mani sakira, nimubona ebiindu bino nibyeholeha, mumanye muti ali aambi, ali busa husiruwa bweene.
Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, oluse luno haba siluchia huwaao, ebiindu bino nibiteholeha.
Ekulu nende esyaalo bicha ohuwaao, nae mboosi change haba sichicha huwaao.
“Nae oludaalo lweene olwo, kata ebiha byeene, awumao omuundu yeesi omanyire, kata ba Malaika bo Mukulu, kata Omwaana, nae ohutusaho Bbaabba yeng'ene.
Mweliinde, mube ameeso; olwohuba haba simumanyire lu biha byahoolere.
Siri koti omuundu ochia hu lukeendo lw'eyale, naaba natula mu ngo, aberesa abahalaabani bae obunyala, buli otula nende omulimo kwae, mani yaboolera omuliindi w'ohusiruwa abe ameeso.
Sakira mweliinde--olwohuba haba simumanyire lu mweneengo achia ohwichira, kose engoloobe, kose mu siro akati-kaati, kose mu mabweeri-bweeri, kose mu chuli-chuli.
Ataali awo, anyala ohwiicha mabbwooga, mani yabakaana nibasiikona.
Mani bimbaboolera eng'we, mbiboolera abandu boosi endi: Mube, ameeso.”

Bulaanu chali chidong'ere endaalo chibiri ohwoola hu Paasaka nende esidyalo sy'emigaati kitaalimo amamera. Mani abalaamisi bahuluundu alala nende abandiiki ba malako bachaaka ohukoonya engira y'ohumudiira mungiso bamale bamwiite;
olwohuba bali baboolere bati, “Sisilai ohumudiirira hu sidyaalo, olwohuba abandu banyala ohukwaamo esisi.”

Nae niyali ali e Bbetani mu nyumba ya Simooni owali yalwaalaho obulwaae bw'amakere, niyehaale naali ohulya, omuhasi wundi yeecha nende echupa ya mafuta k'esiing'aari siingi, ak'obukusi bwa akulu muno, mani yekula echupa ya amafuta eyo, yamala yakachuha hu mutwe kwa Yesu.
Nae baliwo abandu bandi ababoolana abeene-na-beene bati, “Lwasiina anyaasa amafuta ako atyo?
Olwohuba amafuta kano kanyala ohukuswamo edinaari chihira emia chidatu mani eseende echo baachibeeresa abamanani.” Mani beecha baasoolania omuhasi oyo muno.
Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Mulehe omuhasi oyo abe; Siina syeene simumufwaambya? Yaholeere esiindu silayi muno.
Olwohuba buli siha syoosi muli nende abamanani, mani munyala ohubaholera ebilai buli siha simudahiramo; nae simuchia ohuba naange esiha syoosi.
Omuhasi oyo yaholeere syabeere anyala; abahiire elalira omubiri kwaange amafuta ohukutekehera ohusiihwa.
Nae mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, buli abundu woosi yi Mboosi Ndai yahayaalirwe mu syalo syoosi, esiindu siyaholeere sino, bacha ohusilomalomaho nibamwichulisa.”
Mani abweene awo, mulala hu beeki ehumi nende babiri olaangwa ati, Yuda Yiskarioti, yacha eyiri abalaamisi bahuluundu, nakoonya engeri y'ohuliiramo Yesu olukwe.
Nae nibawulira batyo, beecha basangaala muno mani balaka ohumuba eseende. Mani yachaaka ohukoonya engeri y'ohumulyaamo olukwe.

Oludaalo lutaangira olw'esidyalo sy'emigaati kitaalimo amamera, oludaalo lubeteraangaho ekoondi ly'esidyaalo sya Paasaka, abeeki bae beecha bamuboolera bati, “Odaha huchie huhutekehere ena yonaliira esidyaalo sya Paasaka?”
Mani yeecha yaatuma abeeki bae babiri nababoolera ati, “Muche mu siko, mani mucha ohubukaanana nende omusaacha okiingire esyoongo ya maachi; mani mumuloonde,
mani muboolere omweene nyumba yiyengiramo muti, ‘Omweekesa aboola ati, esiseenge siwundekeheere ohuliiramo esidyalo sya Paasaka alala nende abeeki bange, siri yena?’
Mani achia ohubeekesa esiseenge syaakulu sihoongo esitekeheebwe bulai; omwo nimwo mumuba mututekehere.”
Mani abeeki abo batulaniramo bacha mu siko, mani banyoola buli siindu koti lu yali nababoolera; mani bachaaka ohutekeha esidyaalo sya Paasaka.
Mani obwire nibweera, Yesu yeecha nende abeeki bae ehumi nende babiri.
Nae nibali hu meesa nibalya, Yesu yababoola ati, “Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, mulala hw'eng'we, oyo oli ohulya naange, achia ohudyaamo olukwe.”
Mani bachaaka ohwelalihirira, bachaaka ohumuteeba sya mulala-mulala bati, “Niye ese, kose?”
Nae yababoolera ati, “Niye mulala hu ehumi nende babiri, oyo oli ohutoonga naange mu sikae silala.
Olwohuba Omwaana w'Omuundu awao koti lu syandiikwa, nae chakaanire oyo olya mu mwaana w'Omuundu olukwe! Syahahirire omuundu oyo obuteebulwa.”
Nae nibali nibalya, Yesu yabukula omugaati, yakusabira ehabi, mani yaakudonyolamo, mani yababeeresa, naboola ati, “Mubukule; kuno nikwo omubiri kwaange.”
Handi yabukula esikoombe, nae niyamala ohwebasa, yasiberesa abeeki bae, mani boosi baasing'waaho.
Mani yababoolera ati, “Kano niko amabaanga kange ake elakano, akediswa hulw'abandu bangi.
Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, sinja ohung'waaho handi hu syaamo sy'emisabbiibu ohwoola hu ludaalo lundahasing'weereho buyaaha mu Bwaami bwa Nasae.”
Nae nibamala ohweemba olweembo, batula bacha hu lugulu lwa Olibeti.
Mani Yesu yababoolera ati, “Mweesi mucha ohundulaho; olwohuba syandiikwa siti, ‘Ndahahuye omwaayi, mani amakoondi kahasalaane.’
Nae nindahamale ohusyuuha, ndahabataangirire ohuchia e Galilaaya.”
Nae Peetero yamuboolera ati, “Kata boosi bahulehe, ese haba sinja ohuhuleha.”
Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Huboolera obwadyeeri endi, mu siro sy'olwaleero syeene sino, edaaywa niyisisiiri ohuholyoohera habiri, onaba omalire ohundekaana amahabi kadatu.”
Nae Peetero yakobolamo nende esimyeni ati, “Kata nende nihuli ohufwa, ndafwa naawe, haba sinja ohuhwekaana.” Mani boosi baboola nasilala batyo.
Mani beecha bacha abundu alaangwa ati, Getesemaane; Yesu yaboolera abeeki bae ati, “Mwihale ano, ese hole nindekongooya.”
Mani yeecha yabukula Peetero nende Yakobbo, nende Yowaana yacha nabo, mani engisa nyiingi yamudiira yachaaka ohwelalihirira muno.
Yesu yeecha handi yababoolera ati, “Ndi nende esibeera esiingi muno, esinyala kata ohunjita-bwiita; mudong'e ano mani mube ameeso.”
Mani niyamala atyo, yasudaho mu moni budiidi, yakwa aasi yekongooya naboola ati, siba nisinyaliha, esiha sy'ohusaanda sino syahambitireho.
Mani yamala yaboola ati, “Abba, Lata, Ewe niiwe omunyala w'ebiindu byoosi; nduseho esikoombe sino; nae sitaba koti lu ese ndaha, nae hasibe koti lu ewe mweene odaha.”
Mani yeecha handi yabakaana nibakona, mani yaboolera Peetero ati, “Simooni, wesi oli ohukona? Sonyalaho ohuba ameeso kata esaa ndala?
Mube ameeso mani mwekongooye muhaye ohukwa muhuhemwa; omwooyo kweene kudaha, nae omubiri nikwo omukata.”
Handi Yesu yeecha yaatula awo yacha ohwekongooya, naalomaloma emboosi nasilala echo.
Yesu handi yeecha yakobola yabanyoola nibakona, olwohuba emoni chaabwe chali chichuule muno endoolo; mani bakotwa esyohumukobolamo.
Yesu handi yeecha yakobola ehabi lyohudatu, mani yababoolera ati, “Musikona busa nimuwuluha? Esyo simalire; esiha syahoola; Omwaana w'Omuundu alibwemo olukwe, adiiswe mu mahono kaabaholi be bibi.
Musiingire, mani huweo; bone, ochia ohudyaamo olukwe nguno yolere.”

Mani abweene awo, Yesu niyali asilomaloma, mulala hu beeki ehumi nende babiri olaangwa ati Yuda, yeecha nende esidiyiha sy'abandu nibali nende engaanga nende ebiruga, nibatula eyiri abalaamisi bahuluundu nende abandiiki ba malako alala nende abahuluundu ba ebiha.
Nae omuhobi oyo yali amalire ohubabeeresa esilolero, naboola ati, “Oyo yinja ohukwa mu sirifu niye oyo busa; mani mu mudiire, mumwomiise bilai mani mumuyire.”
Mani omuhobi oyo niyeecha, yachooma tiiri eyiri Yesu, yaboola ati, “Omwaami!” Mani yaamukwa mu sirifu yaamuheesa.
Mani beecha bamukwaaho bamudiira.
Nae mulala hu bandu bali beemere aambi awo yasobolayo olugaanga lwae, mani yatemaho ohutwi hu muhalaabani w'omulaamisi muhuluundu.
Nae Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Mwiichire nende engaanga alala nende ebiruga ohundiira koti abechera omunyaka?
Buli ludaalo ndabereenge naang'we ninjekesa mu nyumba ya Nasae, nae mwahaya ohudiira. Nae lehe ebyandiikibwa byolerefu byolerere.”
Mani boosi bamuleha, beeruha.
Mani omusyaani muraaga yaloonda hu Yesu natefwaalire esiindu syoosi hu mubiri ohutusaho niyeboyere efuungo yong'ene; mani beecha bamukwaaho,
nae yeecha yabechimulaho, yabalehera efuungo eyo, yeruha nawawo syekenye.
Mani beecha bayira Yesu eyiri omulaamisi muhuluundu mweene; mani abalaamisi bandi bahuluundu nende abahuluundu b'ebiha alala nende abandiiki ba malako beecha boosi bebuusa.
Nae Peetero owali alondeere eyale hu Yesu, ohwolera elalira mu lwanyi lw'omulaamisi muhuluundu mweene; yali yehaale nende abaliindi, niyoota omuliro.
Bulaanu abalaamisi bahuluundu alala nende ab'esiina boosi bateeberesa esifune syeene sinyala syakera beeta Yesu; nae bahaya kata ohusinyoola.
Olwohuba abandu bangi beecha batusa obufune bwobubacha hu Yesu, nae ebifune byaabwe ebyo byahaya ohufwaanana.
Handi abandu bandi basiingira batusa obufune bw'obubacha nibaboola bati,
“Hwawulira wuno naboola ati, ‘Njia ohugemula enyumba ya Nasae yino eyombahwa nende amahono, nae mu ndaalo chidatu, njia ohwombaha eyiindi, eyitombahwa nende amahono.’ ”
Kata katyo, abulao obufune bwaabwe obwanyala ohufwaanana.
Mani omulaamisi muhuluundu mweene yasingira yeema akati-kaati waabwe, yateeba Yesu ati, “Obulaho esiindu syoosi syonyala wakaluhamo? Sifune siina syeene si bano bali ohuhufunaana?”
Nae Yesu yawuleera busa yahaya ohukaluhamo esiindu syoosi. Handi omulaamisi muhuluundu mweene yeecha yateeba Yesu ati, “Niiwe Kristo, Omwaana wa Nasae w'Ehabi?”
Nae Yesu yaboola ati, “Nise; handi wahabone Omwaana w'Omuundu niyehaale hu muhono muluungi okwa Nasae wobunyala bwoosi, handi niyeechera hu maleesi komu Kulu.”
Nae omulaamisi muhuluundu mweene yeecha yataandula engubo chae, naboola ati, “Lwasiina handi husikoonyeresa obufune bundi?
Mbao mwewuliirire enomanoma yae eyifwoola Nasae eyo. Nang'we muheengao mutye?” Mani boosi beecha bamuheengera omusango bati ahoyeere ohufwa.
Mani abandi bachaaka ohumufuchaho amate, bamuboya mu moni, mani bamupaama, nibaboola bati, “Mani tuumbulaho!” Mani Abasirikaari bamudiira bachaaka ohumuhuya ebifuusi.
Nae Peetero niyali nasisiiri mulwaanyi aasi, mulala hu bahalaabani bahaana b'omulaamisi muhuluundu mweene yeecha;
mani yabona Peetero niyoota omuliro, yamwehaliirisa, mani yamuboolera ati, “Ewe wesi obeere nende Yesu Omunasareeti.”
Nae Peetero yekaana, naboola ati, “Ese siwumao siimanyire kata ngoterwe syoliho.” Mani yasingira yaatula erwaanyi yeema husiruwa.
Handi omuhalaabani muhaana yeecha yamubona mani yaboolera abandu bali nibeemere awo ati, “Omusaacha wuno niye mulala hu bandu abo.”
Peetero handi yekaana. Nae ebiha bidiidi nibyabitao, abandu bali nibeemere awo, handi bosi baboolera Peetero bati, “Mubwadyeeri bweene, ewe oli mulala hu bandu abo busa; olwohuba oli Omugalilaaya.”
Mani Peetero yachaaka ohwebwaaba alala nende ohwechuba ati, “Ese siimanyire omusaacha wuno yimuli ohulomalomaho.”
Abweene awo, ni edaaywa yiholyooha ehabi lyohubiri. Mani Peetero niyechulisa koti Yesu yali amuboolere ati, “Edaaywa niyitaholyoohera habiri, onaba wundekaanire hadatu.” Mani yatunduha yaalira muno.

Mani nibwahya buti, abalaamisi bahuluundu, nende abahuluundu b'ebiha nende abandiiki ba malako, nende ab'esiina boosi beehasa oluhiiho lw'ohweteebanaho; mani beecha baboya Yesu, bamutusa awo bamuyira ohumudiisa Pilaato.
Nae Pilaato yateeba Yesu ati, “Ewe niiwe omutuki w'Abayudaaya?” Nae Yesu yamukobolamo ati, “Mbao niiwe oboolere otyo.”
Mani abalaamisi bahuluundu beecha bamufunaana ebiindu ebiingi muno.
Pilaato handi yeecha yateeba Yesu ati, “Ewe obulaho esiindu syoosi esy'ohukobolamo? Bonaho obuungi bw'emisaango chibahufunaana.”
Nae Yesu haba siyakobolamo esiindu syoosi, sino syakera Pilaato yawuka muno.
Bulaanu hubuli sidyaalo sya Paasaka, Pilaato yali yanala ohulehuuliraanga abandu omuboye yeesi yibaba nibamusabire.
Nae hu bataana abali mu mboye, abali bahola omusango okw'obutemo muhusasakala, mwalimo omusaacha wundi olaangwa, Bbarabba.
Mani esidiyiha syeecha eyiri Pilaato ohumusaba abaholere koti luyali yanala ohubaholeraanga.
Nae Pilaato yeecha yabateeba ati, “Mudaha mbalehuulire Omutuki w'Abayudaaya?”
Olwohuba Pilaato yali amanyire ati, ehali-hali ly'abalaamisi bahuluundu nilyo elyakera bamudiisa Yesu.
Nae abalaamisi bahuluundu, beecha badondobania esidiyiha sy'abandu sisabe Pilaato amale kabalehulira Bbarabba busa.
Nae Pilaato handi yeecha yabateeba ati, “Nae ndaahole endye omusaacha wuno yimulaanga muti Omutuki w'Abayudaaya?”
Nae abandu boosi bahuumulira akulu bati, “Mumuhomerere.”
Nae Pilaato yababoolera ati, “Lwasiina, sibi siina syaholere?” Nae bemeeda busa ohuhuumula nibaboola bati, “Mumuhomerere.”
Nae ohudaha ohubasangaasa, Pilaato yabalehulira Bbarabba; nae nibamala ohutoocha Yesu, Pilaato yeecha yabadiisa Yesu bache bamuhomerere.
Mani abasirikaari beecha bayira Yesu mu lubiri (olulaangwa luti Praetorium); mani beecha balaanga omukanda kw'Abasirikaari kwoosi ohwebuusa alala.
Mani beecha bamufwaasa ekaanju ly'omudoba kwa ranjaayi, basiinga engata ya amawa, bamufwaasa hu mutwe koti esitweetwe.
Mani bachaaka ohumuheesa nibaboola bati, “Yoga, Omutuki w'Abayudaaya!”
Mani bamuhuya hu mutwe nende ekada, bamufuchaho amate, mani basigama nibamwiinamira.
Nae nibamala ohumuhoomolera, bamufwaalulamo ekaanju ly'omudoba kwa ranjaayi, mani bamufwaasa engubo cheene. Mani bamuyira erwaanyi ohumuhomerera.
Mani babukaanana nende omusaacha wali nakeenda busa owali atula mu lukoongo lundi, olaangwa Simooni ow'Esireeni, simwaana Alekisaanda nende Rufusi, mani bamuyiika ohukinga omusalabba kwa Yesu.
Mani bamuleeta bamwoosa abundu yibalaanga bati, Gologoosa (Amahulundu kasyo mbwe, Esifwo sy'ebiyaanga).
Mani beecha bamubeeresa efwiini yibasasiremo ekaha; nae yahaya ohuying'wa.
Mani bamala bamuhomerera, bamala bakabana engubo chae, nibachubbiraho eha, ohumanya sibuli muundu ayira.
Mani nibamuhomerera hu musalabba esaa y'ohudatu.
Nae esyandiiko sy'esifune simufwaambya syasoma siti, “Omutuki wa Abayudaaya.”
Nae abweene awo wosi bahomererawo abeebi babiri alala nende Yesu, mulala hu muhono kwae muluungi, owundi hu muhono kwae mukooda.
Nae abandu bali nibabitao, bawuka busa, bayuuya emitwe nibaboola bati, “Mbao! Ewe owahalikule enyumba ya Nasae handi wayombahira mu ndaalo chidatu,
wewonie omweene, handi yiha aasi ohutula hu musalabba!”
Nilwo nasilala lu Balaamisi bahuluundu alala nende Abandiiki ba malako lu bamuhoomolera nibaboola bati, “Yawonia abandi; nae omweene haba saanyala ohwewonia.
Leha Kristo, Omutuki w'Abayisirayiri, bulaanu yeehe hu musalabba hubone huhufukiirire.” Kata abo abali bahomereerwe nae bosi bamuhoomolera.
Nae esaa y'ohusaasaba niyoola, esirima syadiira hu syalo syoosi ohwoola esaa y'ohutaanu-na-hane.
Nae hu saa y'ohutaanu-na-hane, Yesu yalira nende ekono ly'akulu ati, “Eli, Eli, lama sabach-thani?” amahulundu mbwe, “Nasae wange, Nasae wange, lwasiina wunjwang'ire?”
Nae abandu bandi abali beemere awo, nibawulira batyo, baboola bati, “Bone, mbawo alaanga Elija.”
Mani mulala yeruha yabukula esyaangu yasiiniha mu fwini yahaliha, yaasita hu kada, mani yaamubeeresa ohung'wa naboola ati, “Muliindeho, lehe hubone Elija naneeche yamwanula hu musalabba.”
Nae Yesu yahuumula mu kono ly'akulu naalira mani yakwisa omwooyo.
Nae engubo y'omunyumba ya Nasae yataanduha akati, ohutula akulu ohwoola aasi.
Nae omusirikaari muhunuufu, owali yeemere namutingaalire, niyabona ati akwisire omwooyo atyo, yaboola ati, “Mubwadyeeri, wuno abeere Omwaana wa Nasae! ”
Abahasi bandi bosi bali awo nibabonera eyale, mwabo nimwo omwali, Maria Magadaleena, nende Maria ng'ina Yakobbo muyere nende Yosesi, nende Saalome,
abali abaloondi bae handi abamuhalabaniraanga nasisiiri e Galilaaya; handi nende abahasi bandi bangi bosi abecha nae e Yerusaalemu.
Nae obwire nibweera, koti lwali oludaalo lw'Ohwetekeheramo, luno nilwo oludaalo lutaangirira Sabbaato,
Yosefu owe Arimaseya, yi bandu bali nibaberesa oluyaali mu siina, handi yesi owali naliindiriire Obwaami bwa Nasae, yenyiira mani yacha eyiri Pilaato yaamusaba omubiri kwa Yesu.
Nae Pilaato yesinduha muno ohuwulira ati, Yesu amalire ohufwa, mani yalaanga omuhulundu wa basirikaari yamuteeba nibuli obwadyeeri mbwe Yesu amalire ohufwa.
Nae omuhulundu wa basirikaari niyaboolera Pilaato ati, Yesu amalire ohufwa, yafukiirira Yosefu ohuyira omubiri kwa Yesu.

Mani Yosefu yakula esuuka lafu, yawanula omubiri kwa Yesu, yaakuboya mu suuka lafu elyo, mani yaakuta mu ng'ani yibali babaachire mu lwaanda; mani yaasindikisa okukina kuhoongo, yaakwikalira hu ng'ani.
Maria Magadaleena nende Maria ng'ina Yosesi babona bulai yibasiiha Yesu.
Bulaanu oludaalo lwa Sabbaato nilwawa, Maria Magadaleena, nende Maria ng'ina Yakobbo alala nende Saalome, baleeta amafuta k'esiing'aari, nibadaha ohubaha omubiri kwa Yesu.
Nae hu ludaalo lutaangira mu juma, echuli elyuuba hulitula liti, abahasi bano bawuuna ohuchia hu siriindwa.
Bali nibateebana abeene-na-beene bati, “Wina onatutusireho ekina hu mulyaango kw'esiriindwa?”
Nae niboola hu siriindwa, batingaala akulu babona okukina nikumalire ohusiindikiswa kwatula hu siriindwa--kwali okukina kuhoongo muno.
Nae nibengira ng'ani bati, babona omusyaani muraaga owefwaalire ekaanju lya rachaari niyehaale hu muhono muluungi, mani beecha besinduha muno.
Nae yababoolera ati, “Mutesiinduha haba; manyire endi muli ohukoonya Yesu owe Nasareeti owahomererwa hu musalabba. Asyuhiire, haba saali ano; mubone abundu yibamwalisa.
Mani muche muboolere abeeki bae nende Peetero muti, abatangiriremo ohuchia e Galilaaya; eyo niyo yimucha ohumubonera, koti luyababoolera.”
Mani batula erwaanyi, beeruha nibatula hu ng'ani; olwohuba obuti alala nende ohutengereha byali bibadiirire muno; mani haba sibabooleraho omuundu yeesi esiindu syoosi, olwohuba bali batiire muno.
Nae niyasyuuha, oludaalo lutaangira mu juma, yataangira ohubonehera Maria Magadaleena, yiyali yerusamo emisaambwa chitaanu-na-chibiri.
Mani Maria Magadaleena wuno yacha yaboolera abaloondi bae abali nibalira handi nibesisiha muno.
Nae nibawulira bati, Yesu mulamu, handi omuhasi wuno amalire ohumubonaho, haba sibasifukiirira.
Lunyuma, Yesu yabonehera abeeki bae babiri mu ngeri yindi nibali nibakeenda nibacha mulukoongo lundi.
Mani bano bakaluhayo baboolera abadong'ereyo, nae bahaya ohufukiirira ebyaabwe.

Muhumaliiriha, Yesu yabonehera abeeki bae ehumi-na-mulala nibali humeesa nibalya; yaboolobya muno olwobutafukiirira bwaabwe alala nende ohuba n'emyooyo myomeranu, olwohuba bali bahayire ohufukiirira eby'abo abali nibamubweene naamalire ohusyuuha.
Mani yababoolera ati, “Muche mu syalo syoosi, mani muyaale Emboosi Ndai, eyiri ebiloonge byoosi.
Oyo ofukiirira, handi yabatiisibwa, achia ohuwonisibwa; nae oyo otafukiirira, omusango kucha ohumuhira.
Mani buno nibwo obulolero bucha ohuba nende abo abafukiiririra: muliita lyaange, bacha ohwirusa emisaambwa; bacha ohulomaloma enimi njiaha;
bacha ohudiira enjuha mu mahono kaabwe, handi nibang'wa obutwa bw'amaani, sibuchia ohubahola bubi; bacha ohwisa amahono kaabwe hu balwaaye, mani baone.”
Nae Omwaami Yesu, niyamala ohulomaloma nabo, yayirwa Mukulu, mani yehala hu muhono muluungi kwa Nasae.
Nae abeeki bae, bacha mani bayaala Emboosi Ndai buli abundu, nae Omwaami yaba naaholera alala nabo, nga yomiisa emboosi chaabwe nende obulolero busiira emboosi echo. Amiina.
Koti lu baandu baangi bamalire ohutekeha bulai mu bwandiike ebiindu bituholehemo,
handi koti abo abatangira ohweboneraho abeene, handi bahalabanira emboosi eyo batudiisa,
ese syesi nimalire bulaanu ohwehaliirisa bulai ebiindu bino, sibweene endi silayi ohuhwandiikira ewe ow'oluyaali Tefiro, nitekeehe bilai ebiindu koti byalondehana,
hu weesi onyale ohumanya obwadyeeri bweene bw'ebiindu bi bahweekesa.
Mundaalo chi Herode yali naali omutuki wa Buyudaaya, waliwo omulaamisi olaangwa Sakariya, owali ow'oluyia lw'abalaamisi lwa Abbija; handi omuhasi wae olaangwa Elisabeeti, yali ow'oluyia lwa Arooni.
Mani bombi bali abalungifu mu moni wa Nasae, nibalondakirira amalako koosi nende ebidahibwa by'Omwaami byoosi ataali ohudondobanaho kata.
Nae sibaliho nende omwaana haba, olwohuba Elisabeeti yali omukuumba, handi bombi bali bahulire mu myaka.
Olwoola, Sakariya niyali ali ohuhola omulimo kw'obulaamisi mu moni wa Nasae, olwohuba oluyia lwae nilwo olwali olw'ohuhalaabanira Nasae mu biha ebyo,
ohweema hu ndekeha yaabwe y'obulaamisi, eha yamukwaho ache aniohese obubbaani mu nyumba ya Nasae.
Nae esidiyiha sy'abandu syoosi syali nisyekongooyera erwaanyi mu biha byohuniohesa obubbaani.
Mani awo niwo yi malaika w'Omwaami yeecha yaamubonehera niyeemere hu lwaande lw'omuhono muluungi kw'alutaari y'ohunioheseraho obubbaani.
Nae Sakariya niyamubona, eholo yamubba muno mani obuti bwamudiira.
Nae malaika yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Sakariya, otatya, olwohuba ohwekongooya hwao huwuliirwe, mani omuhasi wao Elisabeeti, achia ohuhwibulira omwaana musyaani, mani wahamulaange eliita oti Yowaana.
Mani ochia ohuba nende esangaalo nende omwehoyo, mani abandu bangi bahehoye olw'ohwibulwa hwae;

olwohuba yahabe omuhunuufu muno mu moni w'Omwaami, mani siyahang'weeho efwiini yoosi kata esy'ohung'wa simeesa syoosi, mani achia ohwichusibwa Mwooyo Mwolerefu, ohutulira busa elalira munda ya ng'ina.
Achia ohuchuusa abaana ba Yisirayiri bangi abakaluse eyiri Nasae Omwaami waabwe,

handi achia ohumutaangirira mu mwooyo nende amaani ka Elija, achuuse emyooyo cha basimwaana bandu chikaluhe hu baana baabwe, nende ba nandawulira bakaluhe hu makesi k'abalungifu; achia ohuhola abandu betekehere Omwaami waabwe.”
Nae Sakariya yaboolera malaika oyo ati, “Sino, ese ndahasimanye endye? Olwohuba bulaanu ese ndi omusaacha mukofu, handi omuhasi wange yesi ahulire mu myaka.”
Nae malaika yamukobolamo ati, “Niise Gabulieri, oweemere mu moni wa Nasae; mani ndumirwe ohulomaloma yooli, handi ohuhuleetera emboosi ndayi chino.
Mani bone, ochia ohuwuleera handi bihuhaye ohulomaloma, ohwolera elalira hu ludaalo lu biindu bino byaholerere, olwohuba sofukiriire emboosi change, echicha ohwolerera mu biha byaacho.”
Nae abandu bali baliindiriire erwaanyi, beecha bawuka olwohuba Sakariya yali ahiindire muno mu nyumba ya Nasae.
Mani niyatula erwaanyi, haba siyanyala ohulomalomaho nabo, mani bamanya busa bati, yali aboneheerwe mu nyumba ya Nasae; mani yeecha yabaholera busa obulolero, mani omweene yadoong'a natalomaloma.
Mani ebiha byae eby'ohuhalaabanira Nasae nibyawa, yakobolayo engo.
Endaalo chino nichawa, omuhasi wae Elisabeeti yeecha yafuna amabaanga, mani olw'embaka ye myoosi chitaanu yekisa abandu, naboola ati,
“Omwaami mweene niye owumbaasireho yaholera sino mu ndaalo chino, yandusaho esoni mu moni ch'abandu.”
Mu mwoosi kw'ohusaasaba, Nasae yatuma malaika Gabulieri ohuchia mu siko sye Galilaaya esilaangwa siti Nasareti,

eyiri omuhaana otaamanyireho eby'abasaacha, owali afukiirisaanie ohudeehisania nende omusaacha olaangwa ati Yosefu, ow'omunyumba ya Daudi. Eliita ly'omuhaana otaamanyireho eby'abasaacha oyo lyali Maria.
Malaika oyo yeecha yaali mani naboola ati, “Yoga, Ewe owabereswa ehabi, Omwaami ali naawe!”
Nae enomanoma eyo yamusindusa muno, yachaaka ohubaasa mu mwooyo kwae amahulundu k'eheesa yino.
Nae malaika yamuboolera ati, “Maria, otatya, olwohuba Nasae ahubeere ehabi.
Mani bona, ochia ohufuna amabaanga, wiibule omwaana musyaani, mani wahamulaange eliita oti Yesu.
Achia ohuba omuhunuufu, handi yahalaangwe Omwaana woyo oli Akulu Muno; handi Omwaami Nasae achia ohumubeeresa esisaala sy'obutuki sya Daudi kukaang'ene,
handi achia ohutuka enyumba ya Yakobbo, emyaaka choosi; mani obutuki bwae sibuchia huwaao.”
Nae Maria yaboolera malaika ati, “Sino sichia ohunyalihana sitye, olwohuba ese siimanyire eby'abasaacha?”

Nae malaika yamuboolera ati, “Mwooyo Mwolerefu achia ohuhwiihaho, handi amaani kooyo oli Akulu Muno kacha ohuhubwiiha; mani sakira omwaana ochia ohwibulwa achia ohulaangwa omwolerefu, Omwaana wa Nasae.

Mani bona, omuhasi woluya lwao Elisabeeti, mu myaka chae chobukofu, yesi yaamalire ohunyoola amabaanga k'omwaana musyaani; mani kuno nikwo omwoosi kwae kw'ohusaasaba naali asito, oyo yibalangaanga omukuumba.
Olwohuba, sibulao esiindu syoosi esitanyaliha eyiri Nasae.”
Mani Maria yeecha yaboola ati, “Ese mbano, ndi omuhalaabani w'Omwaami; leha sindeholeheho koti lw'oboola.” Mani malaika yeecha yaamuleha.
Mu ndaalo echo, Maria yasingira yacha bwaangu mu syaalo sy'engulu, mu siko sya Buyudaaya,
mani yengira mu nyumba ya Sakariya, yaheesa Elisabeeti.
Nae Elisabeeti niyawulira busa ati ohuheesa hwa Maria, omwaana yachaaka ohutumakala munda; mani Elisabeeti yamala yechuswa Mwooyo Mwolerefu
mani yaalomalomera mu kono lyaakulu naboola ati, “Oli nende ehabi mu bahasi boosi, handi esiri munda yao siri nende ehabi!
Sino sinjolereho sitye, ng'ina Mwaami wange ohwiicha yindi?
Olwohuba bonaho, ohuheesa hwao nihuungwiire mu matwi busa huti, ni omwaana adumakala munda yange olwesangaalo.
Handi w'ehabi oyo owafukiirira ati, ebyo ebyamuboolerwa ohutula eyiri Omwaami byaholerere.”
Nae Maria yaboola ati, “Omwooyo kwaange kufumia muno Omwaami,
handi omwooyo kwaange kwehoyera mu Nasae Omuwonia wange,
olwohuba abweene obuloonga bw'omuhalaabani wae. Olwohuba boneho, ohutula buti, enjibulo choosi chicha ohunangaanga ow'ehabi;
olwohuba oyo ow'Obunyala bwoosi, yaholeere eby'amaani, handi eliita lyae lyolerefu.
Handi esisa syae siri hu bamutya ohutula hu lwiibulo lulala ohwoola hu lundi.
Yekeese amaani mu biindu bi mahono kae kahola, asakuulire ebibaaso by'omumyooyo chaabehusa abeene,
yeesere aasi abahunuufu ohutula hu bisaala byaabwe by'obutuki, handi yaniinia akulu abaloonga;
yekuuse abalumwa enjala nende ebiindu bilai, nae abanyali abatusireyo bihaya.
Ahonyere Yisirayiri omuhalaabani wae, niyechuliise esisa syae,
koti luyaboolera bakuuka yeefwe, Yibbulaimu nende abechulu bae endaalo choosi-choosi.”
Mani Maria yamenya nende Elisabeeti ohumala aambi w'emyoosi chidatu, mani yamala yaakobola engo wae.
Bulaanu, ebiha bya Elisabeeti ohwetusaho nibyoola, yebula omwaana musyaani.
Nae abanaluya bae alala nende abo abasibirana nae nibawulira bati Nasae akwiriire Elisabeeti esisa siingi sityo, beecha basangaalira alala nae.
Nae oludaalo lwa chitanu-na-chidatu nilwoola, beecha ohuheba omwaana oyo; mani bali badaha ohumukuliha eliita lya simwaana bati Sakariya,
nae ng'ina yaboola ati, “Haba daawe; achia ohulaangwa Yowaana.”
Nae bamuboolera bati, “Mu luya lwao, muwumamo omuundu yeesi olaangwa ati, Yowaana.”
Mani baholera simwaana obulolero nibadaha ohumanya koti luyahamulaangire.
Nae yabasaba ekina ly'ohwandiikaho, mani yandiika ati, “Eliita lyae nilyo Yowaana.” Mani abandu boosi bawukaho busa.
Mani abweene awo, ni omunwa kwa Sakariya kwikuha, ni olulimi lwae luboololoha, mani nachaaka ohulomaloma, naakinia Nasae.
Mani obuti bweecha bwadiira abandu bamenya aambi nae boosi. Mani abandu beecha balomaloma hu biindu bino byoosi mu syaalo sy'engulu sye Buyudaaya syoosi;
mani abo boosi ababiwulira, babibiiha mu myooyo chaabwe nibaboola bati, “Nae omwaana wuno yahabe siina?” Olwohuba omuhono kwa Nasae kwali nae.
Mani Sakariya simwaana Yowaana yeecha yechula Mwooyo Mwolerefu, mani yatumbula ebidiira hu mwaana oyo naboola ati,
“Nasae Omwaami wa Yisirayiri akinisibwe, olwohuba akeniye abandu bae handi yabanunula,
mani atusingisiire olwiika lw'obuwonia mu nyumba ya Daudi omuhalaabani wae,
koti lu yalomaloma hale mu minwa cha banabbi bae boolerefu,
ati, achia ohutuwonia atutuse mu basuku beefwe, handi atutuse mu mahono k'abandu batusyuula boosi;
atwekese esisa siyalaka ba kuuka yeefwe, handi niyechulisa Embuliirisania yae enjolerefu,
esichubo siyechuba eyiri Yibbulaimu seefwe,
ohutubeeresa ati efwe, nihununuulwe ohutula mu mihono chaabasuku beefwe, hunyale ohumuhalaabanira ataali ohutya hwoosi,
mu bwolerefu nende obuluungifu mu moni wae mu bulamu bwefwe bwoosi.
Nae ewe, mwaana ewe, ochia ohulaangwa omunabbi w'oyo oli Akulu Muno; olwohuba ochia ohutangiriramo Omwaami, ohumutekehera engira chae,
ohuberesa abandu bae amakesi k'obuwonia, muhuleherwamo hw'ebibi byaabwe.
Nae ohubitira mu sisa siingi sya Nasae weefwe, oludaalo nilutwichiire ohutula akulu,
ohuberesa obulafu abandu abo abehala mu siirima nende mu siiniha sy'ohufwa, ohulungiha amakulu keefwe mu ngira y'emireembe.”
Mani omwaana yahula, handi yaaba omwomiifu mu mwooyo, mani yamenya mu siparara ohwoola hu ludaalo lu yeyekesera alafu eyiri abandu ba Yisirayiri.
