Mundaalo echo, Kaisaali Agusito yatusa elako ati abandu boosi mu bwaami bwae bahoyeere ohubalibwa.
Huno nihwo ohwali ohubalibwa hutangira Kwirino naali Gafana wa Siiria.
Mani buli muundu yeesi yacha ohubalibwa, mu siko syae.
Mani Yosefu yesi yatula mu Galilaaya, mu siko sye Nasareti, yacha e Buyudaaya, mu siko sya Daudi, esilaangwa siti Bbeteleheemu, olwohuba yali ow'enyumba handi ow'olwiibulo lwa Daudi,
ohuchia ohubalibwa nende Maria, yiyali afukiirisaanie nae ohudeehisania. Maria oyo yali ali asito.
Nae nibali eyo, ebiha byae by'ohwetusaho byoola.
Mani yebula omwaana wae musyaani omwikula-nda, yamubwiha mu bikubo, mani yamwalisa mu bwaato bu byaayo biriiramo, olwohuba sibanyoola obweyaango mu nyumba chaabakeni.
Nae mu syaalo esyo, mwalimo abaayi nibali mu syaayiro, nibaliindire ebyaayo byaabwe esiro.
Mani malaika wa Nasae yeecha yababonehera, mani oluyaali lwa Nasae lweechula lwaaduha nilubebodohaanie, mani beecha besinduha muno.
Nae malaika yababoolera ati, “Mutaba nohutya; olwohuba bone, mbaleetera emboosi ndayi ch'esangaalo liingi, ericha ohuba hu bandu boosi;
olwohuba olwaleero luno, mu siko sya Daudi, Omuwonia abebuliirwe, niye Kristo Omwaami.
Mani hano niho ahanaba ahalolero heeng'we: mucha ohwakaana omwaana mudoto yibabwihire mu bikubo, handi niyeyaliise mu bwaato bu byaayo biriiramo.”
Nae bwaangu-bwaangu, malaika oyo alala nende bamalaika bandi bangi abo Mukulu baboneha nibafumia Nasae nibaboola bati,
“Oluyaali lube eyiri Nasae akulu Mukulu, nae emireembe kibe hu syaalo mu bandu abahola ebiindu bisangaasa Nasae!”
Nae Bamalayika nibatulao bawao bacha Mukulu, abaayi beecha baboolanira abeene-na-beene bati, “Mulehe huchie e Bbeteleheemu, hubone esiindu sino esiholehaane, si Nasae atwekeese.”
Mani badindikirira ohuchia, bakaana Maria nende Yosefu, alala nende omwaana mudoto oyo, niyeyaliise mu bwaato bu byaayo biriiramo.
Mani nibabona omwaana oyo, batumbula ebyo ebyali bibabooleerwe ebidiira hu mwaana wuno;
Mani abo boosi ababiwulira, bawuka muno ebyo bi baayi bali nibababoolere.
Nae Maria yabiiha ebiindu bino byoosi, nabibasaangaho muno mu mwooyo kwae.
Mani abaayi bakobolayo ewaabwe, nibakinia handi nibaberesa Nasae oluyaali, hulweebyo byoosi bibali nibawuliire handi nibabweene, olwohuba byali busa koti lubyali nibibaboolerwe.
Nae oluunyuma lw'endaalo chitanu-na-chidatu, omwaana niyali amalire ohuhebwa, yabeereswa eliita mbwe Yesu, eliita li malaika yaamubeeresa natayerwa munda.
Nae ebiha nibyoola eby'ohulabisibwamo babe abolerefu, koti elako lya Musa lyali, Yosefu nende Maria baleeta Yesu e Yerusaalemu ohumudiisa Nasae
(koti lu syandiikwa mu lako lya Nasae siti, “Buli mwaana musyaani yeesi, owikula enda ya ng'ina achia ohulangaangwa omwolerefu wa Nasae” )
handi bacha ohutusaanga esiyaanwa esihoyerwa koti lu lako lya Nasae liboola liti, “Amaguugu kabiri, oba amaburuku madoto kabiri.”

Bulaanu, mu Yerusaalemu, mwalimo omusaacha olaangwa mbwe Simioni, owali omulungifu handi owaheera Nasae muno, owali nalindaanga ohulemeswa omwooyo hwa abandu ba Yisirayiri, handi nga Mwooyo Mwolerefu amuliho.
Handi yali yamala ohwekeswa nende Mwooyo Mwolerefu ati, haba saachia hufwa nataabona Kristo wa Nasae.
Mani niyali niyemiriirwe nende Mwooyo, yeecha mu nyumba ya Nasae; mani abebusi ba Yesu nibali hubamwiingisa bati mu nyumba ya Nasae, bamuholere koti lu lako liboola,
Simioni yeecha yaakiinga Yesu mu mahono, mani yebasa Nasae naboola ati,
“Omwaami, bulaanu onyala ohuleha omuhalaabani wao yawaawo mu mireembe, koti lu mboosi yao yiboola;
olwohuba emoni change chimalire ohubonaho obuwonia bwao
bu ewe mweene watekehera mu moni w'abandu boosi,
obulafu bubonera Abateende, handi obw'oluyaali eyiri abandu bao Yisirayiri.”
Mani simwaana nende ng'ina bawuka muno ebiindu byali bimulomalomwaho;
handi Simioni yabasabira omukisa mani yaboolera Maria ng'ina ati, “Bona, omwaana wuno ateerweo hulw'ohukwa nende ohusiingira hw'abandu bangi mu Yisirayiri, handi nende ohuba esilolero siyinganisibwa
(handi olugaanga lucha ohuhufumita lubite mu mwooyo kwao kwosi), hu bibaaso by'emyooyo miingi binyale ohubonehana alafu.”

Handi waliwo nabbi muhasi, Ana, omuhaana wa Fanueli, ow'oluyia lw'Asheri; yali omukofu naali nende emyaaka miingi muno. Ohutula nawamo omubiri ati, yamenya nende wamwe wamutusamo omubiri oyo emyaaka chitanu-na-chibiri,

mani yadoong'a koti omuhasi mufwiirwe olw'embaka y'emyaaka amahumi kataanu-na-kadatu-na-kine. Haba siyalehaho enyumba ya Nasae, nae yabechaanga busa omwo nalaama, handi nasiiba alala nende ohwekongooya Nasae esiro nende esideete.
Nae niyolerao ebiha byeene ebyo, yebasa Nasae, handi yaboolera abo boosi abali baliindiriire ohuwonisibwa hwa Yerusaalemu, ebidiira hu mwaana oyo.
Nae nibamala ohuhola ebyo byoosi, bi lako lya Nasae liboola, bakobolayo mu Galilaaya, mu siko syaabwe syeene sye Nasareti.
Mani omwaana oyo yahula, handi yaba ow'amaani, niyechula amakesi; handi ehabi ya Nasae yamuliho.
Bulaanu abebusi bae bachichaanga e Yerusaalemu buli mwaaka hu sidyaalo sya Paasaka.
Mani Yesu niyoosa emyaaka ehumi nende chibiri ech'obuhuluundu, beecha bacha e Yerusaalemu, koti lubali nibaholaanga;
Nae esidyaalo nisyawa, nibali nibakobolayo engo, omuraaga wuno Yesu yadoong'a enyuma mu Yerusaalemu. Nae sino, abebusi bae haba sibasimanya,
nae koti lubali babaasa bati ali mu basye babakeenda nabo, bakeenda oludaalo olulaamba nibatamubona, mani bachaaka ohumukoonya mu beeho bwaabwe nende mu bandu babamanyire;
nae nibatamuduuhana, bakaluha e Yerusaalemu nibamukoonya.
Endaalo chidatu nichabitao, bamuduhana naali mu nyumba ya Nasae, niyehaale mu beekesa, nabatekeresaanga handi nabateebaanga ebiteebo;
mani abo boosi abawulira by'aboola, bawuka muno amakesi kae nende engaluhamo yae.
Nae abebusi bae nibamubona, bawuka muno; mani ng'ina yamuboolera ati, “mwaana wange, lwasina otuholere otyo? Bone, ese nende lataao koti lu huhukoonyere nihwaabaaba.”
Nae yabakobolamo ati, “Bibeere bitye ohungoonya? Mubeere mukoterwe muti hoyeere ohuba mu nyumba ya Lata?”
Mani byabahaya ohumanya biyeemaho ohubaboolera ebyo.
Mani Yesu yasingira yawaawo nabo bakobola e Nasareti, mani yaba omuwulisi yibali; nae ng'ina yabiiha ebiindu bino byoosi mu mwooyo kwae.
Mani Yesu yemeeda ohuhula, handi amakesi kae kemeeda, handi yemeeda ohuheerwa nende abandu alala nende Nasae.

Mu mwaaka kw'ehumi nende chitaanu kw'obwaami bwa Tibberio Kaisaali, Pootio Pilaato naali Gafana wa Buyudaaya, nae Herode naali omutuki we situundu sya Galilaaya, nae Filipo mwaanang'ina naali omutuki we situundu sye Yiturea nende Turakoniiti; Lisania yali niye omutuki wa Abbilene,
Anasi nende Kayaafa nibali abalaamisi bahuluundu, emboosi ya Nasae yechera Yowaana omwaana wa Sakariya naali musiparara.
Mani Yowaana yacha mu situundu sya Yorudaani syoosi, nayaala ohubatiisa hwohweyolobya hulw'ohuleherwamo ebibi.
Koti lu syandiikwa mu sitabo sya cha Yisaaya omunabbi siti, “Ekono ly'omuundu wundi ohumulira musiparara niliboola liti: Mutereese engira y'Omwaami, mukolole emyaanda chae.
Buli hoondo yicha ohwichuswa, handi buli lugulu nende esigulu bicha ohukwalaaswa, nende ebyo ebyekodakoda bicha ohukololwa, nende engira ch'ebiguruguunya chicha ohunyiriswa;
handi buli muundu yeesi achia ohubona obuwonia bwa Nasae.”
Mani sakira yaboolera abandu bangi abali nibeetusireyo ababatiise ati, “Eng'we abana b'endemo! Ni wiina obalabule ohwiruha ohwewonia egiili yicha?

Mani mwaame ebyaamo bihoyera ohweyolobya, handi mutachaaka ohweboolera abeene-na-beene muti, ‘Efwe huli abana ba Yibbulaimu’; olwohuba mbaboolera endi, Nasae ali nende obunyala bwohubukula amakina kano yakaholamo abana ba Yibbulaimu.
Kata bulaanu buti, embaachi yiteerwe hu musi bweene wa buli musaala; mani buli musaala okutaama ebyaamo bilai kucha ohutemerwa aasi, mani kusukunwe mu muliro.”
Nae ebidiyiha byeecha byamuteeba biti, “Mani hunaahole siina syeene?”
Nae yabakobolamo ati, “Oli nende amakooti kabiri, leha abereseho oyo otaliho nalyo; handi oyo oli nende ebyohulya, leha yesi ahole nasilala atyo.”
Abatoosa b'omusolo bosi beecha ohubatiisibwa, mani bamuboolera bati, “Omweekesa, efwe hunaahole siina syeene?”
Nae yababoolera ati, “Mutatosaanga ebihira bimuhoyeere.”

Abasirikaari bosi bamuteeba bati, “Nae efwe naafwe, hunaahole siina syeene?” Nae yababoolera ati, “Mutayayaanga omuundu yeesi nimwehoonyera amaani oba nimumubachira busa, handi omuheemba kweeng'we kubamaleenge.”
Koti lu bandu bali busa nibaliindirira, handi nga boosi bali ohwetebaanga mu myooyo chaabwe ebidiira hu Yowaana, bati awundi yahaba naali niye Kristo,

nae Yowaana yabakobolamo boosi ati, “Ese mbabatiisa nende amaachi; nae oyo owuhira oluyaali ali ohwiicha, yi ese tahoyera ohuboolola esya ch'ebiraato byae; oyo niye ochia ohubabatiisa nende Mwooyo Mwolerefu handi nende omuliro.
Olubibo lwae lumuli mu muhono, ohubisa eng'aano yoosi eyiri hu lwanyi lwae lw'ohubbakiraho, handi nende ohuteera eng'aano mu syaaki syae, nae omuhuchi, achia ohukusaamba nende omuliro kutasimiswa.”
Awo mani, nachiiririra ohubachooma, nayaalira abandu Emboosi Ndai.
Nae Herode owali omutuki w'esituundu esyo, yiyali yamala ohuchooma hulwa Herodia, owali omuhasi wa mwaanang'ina handi hulw'ebibi biingi biindi biyali naaholaanga,
yameeda sino hw'ebyo byoosi, mani yekalira Yowaana mu mboye.
Bulaanu, abandu boosi nibali nibabatiisibwe, handi nende Yesu yesi niyali naamalire ohubatiisibwa, mani naali ohwekongoyaanga, Ekulu lyekulwa,
mani Mwooyo Mwolerefu yamwihaho mu ngeri y'omubiri nafwaanana koti eguugu, handi ekono lyatula Mukulu niliboola liti, “Niiwe Omwaana wange muheerwa; niiwe yi sangaliire.”
Yesu hwachaaka obuhalaabani bwae, yali aambi ow'emyaaka amahumi kadatu ech'obuhuluundu, yali omwaana (koti lusyayiribwa ohuba) wa Yosefu, omusyaani wa Heeli,
omusyaani wa Masati, omusyaani wa Leefi, omusyaani wa Meleki, omusyaani wa Yanai, omusyaani wa Yosefu,
omusyaani wa Mataasia, omusyaani wa Amosi, omusyaani wa Nahumu, omusyaani wa Esili, omusyaani wa Nagai,
omusyaani wa Maasi, omusyaani wa Mataasia, omusyaani wa Semeini, omusyaani wa Yoseki, omusyaani wa Yoda,
omusyaani wa Yowanani, omusyaani wa Reesa, omusyaani wa Serubbabbeeri, omusyaani wa Salatieli, omusyaani wa Neeri,
omusyaani wa Meleki, omusyaani wa Adi, omusyaani wa Kosamu, omusyaani wa Elimadamu, omusyaani wa Eri,
omusyaani wa Yoswa, omusyaani wa Eliesa, omusyaani wa Yorimi, omusyaani wa Masati, omusyaani wa Leefi,
omusyaani wa Simioni, omusyaani wa Yuda, omusyaani wa Yosefu, omusyaani wa Yonamu, omusyaani wa Eliakimu,
omusyaani wa Meleeya, omusyaani wa Meena, omusyaani wa Mataasa, omusyaani wa Nasani, omusyaani wa Daudi,
omusyaani wa Yese, omusyaani wa Obbedi, omusyaani wa Bbowaasi, omusyaani wa Saala, omusyaani wa Nahasoni,
omusyaani wa Aminadabbu, omusyaani wa Adimini, omusyaani wa Arini, omusyaani wa Hesirooni, omusyaani wa Pereesi, omusyaani wa Yuda,
omusyaani wa Yakobbo, omusyaani wa Yisaka, omusyaani wa Yibbulaimu, omusyaani wa Teera, omusyaani wa Nahori,
omusyaani wa Serugo, omusyaani wa Reewu, omusyaani wa Pelegi, omusyaani wa Ebberi, omusyaani wa Seela,
omusyaani wa Kainaani, omusyaani wa Arifakusadi, omusyaani wa Seemu, omusyaani wa Nowa, omusyaani wa Lameeka,
omusyaani wa Mesusela, omusyaani wa Enoka, omusyaani wa Jareedi, omusyaani wa Mahalaleeli, omusyaani wa Kainaani,
omusyaani wa Enosi, omusyaani wa Seesi, omusyaani wa Adamu, owa Nasae.
Mani Yesu, niyali yechuule Mwooyo Mwolerefu, yakobola natula e Yorudaani, mani yemirirwa nende Mwooyo oyo
hulwa embaka y'endaalo amahumi kane naali mu siparara, nahemwa nende Sitaani. Mu mbaka eyo yoosi, haba siyalyaaho esiindu syoosi; mani embaka eyo niyawa, enjala yachaaka ohumuluma.
Sitaani yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Nooba nooli Omwaana wa Nasae, lagira ekina lino lyehole omugaati.”
Nae Yesu yamukobolamo ati, “Syandiikwa siti, ‘Omuundu saaba mulamu hulw'ebyohulya byong'ene.’ ”
Handi Sitaani yeecha yaamuyira akulu, mani yamweekesa obwaami bwoosi obw'ohusyaalo mu siha silala,
mani yamuboolera ati, “Ese njia ohuhubeeresa obunyala buno bwoosi, alala nende oluyaali lwaabwo; olwohuba bwamala ohumbereswa, mani mbubeeresa oyo yeesi yimba nindaha.
Mani ewe niwunyinamira, buno bwoosi bucha ohuba obwao busa.”
Nae Yesu yamukobolamo ati, “Syandiikwa siti, ‘Ohoyeere ohwiinamiraanga Nasae, Omwaami wao, handi oyo yeng'ene niye yonahalabaniranga.’ ”
Handi Sitaani yeecha yayira Yesu e Yerusaalemu, mani yamudungeeresa hu sifwo sihira obuleeyi hu nyumba ya Nasae, mani yamuboolera ati, “Nooba nooli Omwaana wa Nasae, yakuha otule ano okwe aasi;
olwohuba syandiikwa siti, ‘Achia ohutuma bamalaika bae bahwakaanire mani bahuliinde,’
handi ‘Bacha ohuhukiingira akulu hu mahono kaabwe, ohaye ohuhuya ohukulu hwao hu kina.’ ”
Nae Yesu yamukobolamo ati, “Siboolwaanga siti, ‘Otahemaanga Nasae Omwaami wao.’ ”
Mani Sitaani niyali amalireyo buli sihemo, yamutulaho yaalinda esiha siindi syoole.
Mani Yesu yeecha yakaluha e Galilaaya nasisiiriho amaani ka Mwooyo, mani efuma yae yasasaana yaswaania esyaalo esyo syoosi.
Mani yeecha yekesa mu Sinagoogi chaabwe, mani buli muundu yeesi yaamukinia.
Yesu yeecha yoola e Nasareti, yiyali yahusirwa; mani yeecha yacha mu Sinagoogi, koti lu yali yanala ohuholaanga, hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato. Mani yeecha yaasingira ohusoma;
nae bone beecha bamubeeresa esitabo sya nabbi Yisaaya. Yabwihula esitabo esyo, mani yakaana yisyandiikwa siti,

“Mwooyo w'Omwaami yandiho, olwohuba amalire ohumbahaho amafuta ohuyaalira abamanani, Emboosi Ndai Yanduma ohulaangirira eyiri abadiirwa endi bacha ohulehuulwa, handi abawofu endi bacha ohulimbula babone, nende abehalwaho ohulehwa babe nende emireembe,
ohulaangirira endi omwaaka kwafukiirirwa ohuba okw'Omwaami kwolere.”
Mani Yabwihawo esitabo esyo, yeecha yaasikalusira omuliindi oyo, mani yehala aasi; mani emoni ch'abandu boosi abali mu Sinagoogi, chamuweeraho.
Mani yeecha yachaaka ohubaboolera ati, “Olwaleero, ebyandiiko byolerefu bino, byolereere koti lumuwuliire mutyo.”
Mani boosi bamulomalomaho bulai muno, handi bawuka muno obulayi bw'emboosi chatulaanga mu munwa kwae; mani baboola bati, “Wuno haba siniye omwaana wa Yosefu?”

Nae yababoolera ati, “Mucha ohunduumbulira ataali ohukana-kana olukaado luno mbwe, ‘Ewe omulesi, wewonie omweene; ebyo bihwawulira huti waholera e Kaperanaumu, biholere ano wosi, mu syaalo syao syeene.’ ”
Nae Yesu yaboola ati, “Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, abulao nabbi yeesi ofukiirirwaanga mu syaalo syae syeene.

Nae mubwadyeri mbaboolera endi, mu ndaalo cha Elija, ekulu nilyeekalwa ohumala embaka y'emyaaka chidatu nende emyoosi chisaasaba emilaamba, handi esiminyu sihoongo muno nisyalya esyaalo syoosi, baliwo abahasi bafwiire abangi muno mu Yisirayiri,
nae Elija siyatumwa eyiri abo boosi ohutusaho eyiri omuhasi mufwiire owe Sarefaati, mu syaalo sye Sidoni.
Handi mu biha bya nabbi Erisa, waliwo abageenge abangi mu syaalo sya Yisirayiri syoosi; nae abulao kata mulala hwaabo owawonisibwa, ohutusaho Namani Omusiria yeng'ene.”
Nae nibawulira sino, abo boosi abali mu Sinagoogi, etima liingi muno lyeecha lyabadiira.
Mani baasiingiriramo, bamusiindikirisa bamusukuna erwaanyi w'esiko sihoongo esyo, mani bamuniinia hu sigulu si siko sihoongo syaabwe esyo syombahwaho, nibadaha ohumusiindiha aasi akwiire omutwe.
Nae omweene yeyindikania yabitira mu sidiyiiha esyo yeweerawo.
Mani Yesu yeecha yehirira yaacha e Kaperanaumu, mu siko sye Galilaaya. Handi niyali nabekesa hu lwa Sabbaato;
abandu bawuka muno enjekesa yae eyo, olwohuba emboosi yae yali yiri nende obunyala.
Nae mu Sinagoogi omwo, mwalimo omuundu wundi owali nende omwooyo kw'omusaambwa mubi; mani yeecha yaalirira mu kono ly'akulu ati,
“Eee, Onaatuhole otye, ewe Yesu we Nasareti? Wichire ohutusihirisa? Ese humanyire, niiwe Omwolerefu mweene wa Nasae.”
Nae Yesu yakuhabuhira naboola ati, “Buleera chi, mani omale omutulemo!” Mani omusambwa okwo nikwamala ohumubba aasi akati-kaati wa baandu, kwamutulamo, nikutaamuholereho obubi bwoosi.
Mani abandu boosi bawuka babolanira abene-na-beene bati, “Yino mboosi siina? Olwohuba yehoonyera busa obunyala nende amaani, nalagira-bulagira emisaambwa, mani nichibatulaho-butula.”
Mani efuma yae yeecha yasasaana mu bifwo byoosi-byoosi eby'esyaalo sisibiraane awo.
Mani Yesu yeecha yasingira yaatula mu Sinagoogi, yacha yengira mu nyumba ya Simooni. Bulaanu, masaalang'ene Simooni yali omulwae w'omusuuja, mani basaba Yesu amuhoonye.
Mani Yesu yeecha yeema ayali, yahabuhira omusuuja okwo, kwamuleha; mani abweene awo, yasingira yabahalaabanira.
Bulaanu, elyuuba nilyali nilikwa, abo boosi abali nende abalwaye balwaala obulwaae butaali nasilala beecha baabaleeta yaali; mani Yesu yesa amahono kae hu buli mulwae, mani yabawonia boosi.
Mani emisaambwa chosi chatula mu bandu bangi nichirira chiti, “Niiwe Omwaana wa Nasae!” Nae yakihabuhiraanga, natachikanya ohulomaloma, olwohuba chali chamanya chiti niye Kristo.
Nae nibwahya, Yesu yasingira yacha mu sifwo sitaalimo abandu. Nae abandu beecha bamukoonya ohwoola lubamwolaho, bamuhayiraho nibatadaha abatuleho;
Nae yababoolera ati, “Ese hoyeere ohuchia ohuyaala Emboosi Ndai ch'Obwaami bwa Nasae mu biko biindi byosi; olwohuba sino nisyo esyakera ndatumwa ohwiicha.”
Mani yacha yayaalira mu Sinagoogi chikabuhane mu Buyudaaya.
Olwoola, Yesu niyali yeemere hu lwaasi lw'enyaanja ye Genesareeti, abandu bangi beecha nibasindihana boole yali bawulire emboosi ya Nasae.
Mani Yesu yeecha yabona amaato kabiri nikali hu lwaasi; nae abanaabi bali nibakatuliremo, nibali ohwosaanga enjero chaabwe.
Yesu yengira mu lyaato lala, elya Simooni, yaamusaba asudyeho elyaato budiidi mu maachi ohutula hu lwaasi. Mani yeecha yachaaka ohweekesa abandu niyehaale mu lyaato omwo.
Nae niyali niyakaame ohulomaloma, yaboolera Simooni ati, “Sudya elyaato ebusiba mani wiise enjero chao odiise eng'eni.”
Nae Simooni yamukobolamo ati, “Omwaami, hunyahaane esiro syoosi nae haba sihufunireho esiindu syoosi! Nae olwohuba oboolere, njia ohwiisa enjero.”
Mani nibamala ohuhola sino, badiisya eng'eni enyiingi muno; nae koti enjero chaabwe chali nichichaakire ohuhanuha,
beecha baasakula nibalaanga abasyaabwe bali mu lyaato liindi beeche babahonyereho. Mani beecha beechusa amaato kabiri ako ohwoola lukali aambi ohusihama.
Nae Simooni Peetero niyabona sino, yeecha yaakwa aasi mu makulu ka Yesu, naboola ati, “Eee Omwaami, ndehe, olwohuba ese ndi omuholi we bibi.”
Olwohuba Simooni, alala nende abo boosi abali nae besinduha hulw'obuungi bw'eng'eni chibali badiisisye;

handi nasilala batyo nilwo lu Yakobbo nende Yowaana, abasyaani ba Sebbedaayo abali nende Simooni Peetero bosi besinduha. Mani Yesu yaboolera Simooni ati, “Otatya; olwohuba ohuchaaka buti ochia ohuba owundeetera abandu.”
Mani nibakoba, baleha awo buli siindu syoosi bamuloonda.

Olwoola, Yesu niyali nasisiiri mu siko siindi, omusaacha wundi owali niyechulaho obulwae bw'amakere yamala yeecha yali; mani niyabona Yesu, yakwa yahubba aasi obweeni, mani yamwekweeda naboola ati, “Omwaami, nooba niweenya, onyala waandabya.”
Mani Yesu yeecha yaakolola omuhono kwae, yaamudiiraho naboola ati, “ Nyenya; laba.” Mani abweene-na-bweene awo, ni obulwae bwa makere bumwamuhaho.

Mani Yesu yeecha yamuhuutira obutabooleraho omuundu yeesi; nae yamuboolera ati, “cha weyekese eyiri omulaamisi, mani owaane esiyaanwa esy'ohuhulabya, koti lu Musa yalagira, sibe esilolero eyiri abandu.”

Nae kata katyo, nilwo lu fuma yidiira hu Yesu yemeeda ohuhusasaana muno; mani ebidiyiha bya bandu bihoongo muno byeecha byamwebuusaho ohutekeeresa enjekesa yae alala nende ohuwonisibwa amadehere kaabwe.
Nae Yesu yeecha yewiira yacha mu siparara mani yekongooya Nasae.

Olwoola, hu ludaalo lundi, Yesu niyali nasomesaanga, waliwo Abafalisaayo nende Abeekesa b'Amalako ka Musa bali nibehaale aambi awo, nibatulire mu buli lukoongo lwe Galilaaya nende e Buyudaaya nende e Yerusaalemu; nae Yesu yali yechuuleho amaani ka Nasae kohuwonia obulwaae.
Mani bone, abasaacha bandi bali baleetera hu sitaanda omusaacha wali yadataala, beecha bakoonya engeri y'ohumwiingisa bamwaalise mu moni wa Yesu.

Nae nibatabona engeri yoosi yibanyala bamwiingisiramo, hulw'esidiyiha sya baandu siingi, beecha baniina hu sirama akulu; mani beekula eliina mu mategula bamwiisiramo aasi akati-kaati w'abandu naali hu sitaanda syae, bamuta mu moni wa Yesu.
Mani Yesu niyabona efukiirira yaabwe, yaboola ati, “Wasyaange, ebibi byao bihuleheerwemo.”
Nae Abekesa b'Amalako ka Musa nende Abafalisaayo beecha bachaaka ohweteeba nibaboola bati, “Ni wiina wuno olomaloma nafwoola Nasae? Ni wiina onyala ohuleheramo ebibi ohutusaho Nasae yeng'ene?”
Nae Yesu niyamanya ohweteebanaho hwaabwe, yabakobolamo ati, “Lwasiina muli ohweteeba mu myooyo cheeng'we mutyo?
Siina syeene esihira obwangu, ohuboola endi, ‘Ebibi byao bihuleheerwemo,’ kose ohuboola endi, ‘Siingira okeende’?

Nae njia ohubeekesa mumanye muti Omwaana w'Omuundu ali nende obunyala hu syaalo obw'ohuleheramo ebibi” --mani yaboolera omusaacha wali yadataala oyo ati, “Huboolera endi, siingira, obukule esitaanda syao, mani ochie engo.”
Mani abweene awo, yasingira yeema boosi nibabona, yaakiinga siyali akonereho, mani yacha engo, naafumia Nasae.
Mani abandu boosi bawuka muno, bafumya Nasae nibechuule obuti, nibaboola bati, “Olwaleero hubweene ebiindu bihutabonaangaho.”
Bino nibyawa, Yesu yeecha yaatula erwaanyi, mani yabona omutoosa w'omusolo olaangwa Leefi, niyehaale aambi nende enyumba yitooserwangamo omusolo; mani yamuboolera ati, “Noonde.”
Mani Leefi yaleha buli siindu syoosi, mani yaasingira yaamuloonda.

Mani Leefi yeecha yatekehera Yesu esidyaalo sihoongo muno mu nyumba yae; handi mu bandu bayalaanga, mwalimo omukanda muhoongo muno okw'abatoosa b'emisolo basye, alala nende abandu bandi bosi beehala nende Yesu hu meesa ohulya nae.
Nae Abafalisaayo nende Abandiiki b'Amalako baabwe bekanyiirisira abeeki ba Yesu nibaboola bati, “Lwasiina eng'we mulya handi mwang'wa nende abatoosa b'omusolo nende abaholi be bibi?”
Nae Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Abandu balamu, haba sinibo abadaha omulesi, nae abalwaye nibo amudaha.
Ese sindeecha ohulaanga abalungifu, nae abaholi be bibi banyale ohweyolobya.”
Handi beecha baboolera Yesu bati, “Abeki ba Yowaana basiiba amahabi maangi muno handi bekongooya muno, kata nasilala nende abeeki b'Abafalisaayo, nae abawo nabo balya handi bang'wa busa.”
Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Ewe onyala ohuhola abakeni bo hu sidyaalo sy'obugole baasiiba omugole musaacha nasisiiri nabo?
Endaalo chicha ohwoola, omugole musaacha abatusibweho, mundaalo echo nimwo mubacha ohusiibira.”

Handi Yesu yabakaadira olukaado lundi naboola ati, “Abulao omuundu yeesi otandulaanga esiraka hu ngubo njiaha, mani yacha yaasinaba hu ngubo ngofu; naahola atyo, aba achia ohutandula engubo njiaha, handi esiraka situla hu njiaha, sisiba sichia ohuchiira hu ngubo hale.

Handi abulao omuundu yeesi otechaanga efwiini njiaha mu bikiingiro by'efwiini by'eseero bihale; nae naahola atyo, efwiini njiaha eyo yiba yicha ohwata amaseero ako, mani yidiihe aasi, handi amaseero ako kosi kaba kacha ohunyaasiha.
Nae efwiini njiaha yihoyerwa ohuchuhibwa mu bikiingiro by'efwiini by'amaseero biyaaha.
Ni handi abulao omuundu omalire ohung'wa efwiini hale owekoomba enjaaha; olwohuba aboola ati, ‘Ehale ndayi.’ ”
Hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato, Yesu niyali nakeenda naabitira mu ndalo y'engaano, abeeki bae beecha bachaaka ohwaakula emitwe ch'engaano, nibachiwuulira mu mahono kaabwe, nibalya.
Nae Abafalisaayo bandi baboola bati, “Lwasiina muli ohuhola esitafukiirirwa ohuholwa hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato?”
Nae Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Musisiiri ohusomaho si Daudi yahola enjala niyali ni yimuluma, alala nende abo bayali nabo:

koti lu yengira mu nyumba ya Nasae, yabukula, handi yamala yaalya, omugaati kwawanirwa Nasae, ku muundu yeesi atafukirirwaanga ohulya ohutusaho omulaamisi yeng'ene, handi koti lwosi luyakukabaho abo abali nae.?”
Mani yeecha yababoolera ati, “Omwaana w'Omuundu niye omwaami wa Sabbaato.”
Handi hu Sabbaato yindi, Yesu niyengira mu Sinagoogi mani yekesa, omusaacha yalimo yi muhono kwae muluungi kwali kwaafwa.
Handi Abandiiki b'Amalako ka Musa nende Abafalisaayo, beecha bewunja Yesu babone oba achia ohuwonia hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato, banyale ohunyoola esifune sibanyala ohumutaaho.
Nae Yesu yali namanyire ebibaaso byaabwe mani yeecha yaboolera omusaacha wali nende omuhono kwaafwa ati, “Yicha weeme ano.” Mani omusaacha oyo yasingira yacha yeema.
Mani Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Ese hambateebeho, sifukiirirwa hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato, ohuhola esilai, kose ohuhola esibi, ohuwonia obulamu kose ohubusihirisa?”
Mani Yesu yeecha yabatingaala yabebodohania boosi, mani yaboolera omusaacha oyo ati, “Kolola omuhono kwao.” Mani yesi yahola atyo, mani omuhono kwae kwakaluha abweene.
Mani etima liingi lyeecha lyabadiira bachaaka ohuteebana abeene-na-beene, esiindu sibanyala ohuhola Yesu.
Mu ndaalo chino, Yesu yatula yacha hu lugulu ohwekongooya; mani yekongooya Nasae esiro syoosi.
Nae nibwahya, yeecha yalaanga abeeki bae, mani yalobolamo ehumi-na-babiri, bayalaanga Abatume;
Simooni, yiyeecha yalaanga ati Peetero, nende Andereya mwaanang'ina, nende Yakobbo nende Yowaana, nende Filipo, nende Batulumaayo,
nende Matayo, nende Tomasi, nende Yakobbo omusyaani wa Alufaayo, nende Simooni owalaangwanga Omulwaanirisi w'esyaalo syae,
nende Yuda omusyaani wa Yakobbo, nende Yuda Yiskarioti, owehola omuhobi.

Yesu yeecha yeha nabo natula hu lugulu, yeema musifwo sikwalaafu, alala nende esidiyiha sihoongo sy'abeeki bae Esidiyiha sihoongo muno esy'abandu bandi ohutula mu Buyudaaya nende mu Yerusaalemu alala nende hu lwaasi lw'enyaanja ye Tiro nende Sidoni syosi syaliwo, abali beechere ohumutekeeresa alala nende ohuwonisibwa endwaae chaabwe.
Handi abo bosi abali nibasandisibwa nende emisambwa bosi baonisibwa.
Mani esidiyiha syoosi syeecha syakiyaanga ohumudiiraho, olwohuba amaani kamutulangaho mani nabaonia boosi.
Mani Yesu yasingisa emoni chae yewunja abeeki bae mani yaboola ati: “Muli nende ehabi eng'we abamanani, olwohuba Obwaami bwa Nasae bweeng'we.
“Muli nende ehabi eng'we abalumwa enjala bulaanu, olwohuba mwahekute. “Muli nende ehabi eng'we abali ohulira bulaanu, olwohuba mwahachehe.
“Muli nende ehabi eng'we abandu nibabasyuula, handi nibabebwaaba mani baabanyeka handi baababoola bati muliho emisaambwa, hulw'Omwaana w'Omuundu!
Musangaale hu ludaalo olwo, handi mutuumakale olw'omwehoyo, olwohuba bone, omukabo kweeng'we Mukulu muhoongo; olwohuba kata basaabwe bosi baholaanga batyo abanabbi.
“Nae chibakaanire eng'we abanyali, olwohuba mwamala ohulemesebwa emyooyo.
“Chibakaanire eng'we abekuute bulaanu, olwohuba mucha ohulumwa enjala. “Chibakaanire eng'we abacheha bulaanu, olwohuba mucha ohulira nende ohuchereenjesa.
“Chibakaanire eng'we, abandu nibabalomalomaho bulai, olwohuba nilwo lu basaabwe baholeraanga abanabbi bobubacha.
“Nae ese mbaboolera eng'we abali ohuwulira endi, Mudaheenge abasuku beeng'we, muholereenge ebilai abo ababasyula,
mubereseenge ehabi abo abababwaaba, handi musabireenge abo ababanyeka.
Oyo ohupaama hu tama, mubereseenge etama liindi lyosi; nae oyo ohumalaho ekooti, otamwimaanga kata esaati lyao.
Beresaanga buli muundu yeesi ohusaba esiindu syoosi; nae oyo ohumalaho ebiindu byao, otamusabaanga ahukalusire handi.
Handi koti lu wahadahire abaasyo bahuholere, nilwo wesi lwooba obaholere.
“Nimudaha busa abo ababadaha, muba musuubira hasiimo siina? Olwohuba kata abaholi be bibi bosi badaha busa abo ababadaha.
Handi nimuholera ebilai abo ababaholera ebilai bong'ene, muba musuubira hasiimo siina? Olwohuba kata abaholi be bibi bosi bahola nasilala batyo.
Handi nimweyosa abo bamusuubira ohubafunaho, hasiimo siina hamuba musuubira ohufuna? Kata abaholi be bibi bosi beyosa abaholi be bibi basyaabwe, hu lunyuma banyale bosi ohubafunaho ebyaaka bityo.

Nae mudaheenge abasuku beeng'we, handi mubaholereenge ebilai, handi mubeyoseenge nimutasuubira ohubafunaho esiindu syoosi; mani omukabo kweeng'we kucha ohuba omuhongo, handi mucha ohuba abana boyo Owa Akulu Muno; olwohuba omweene oyo wesisa eyiri abo abatasiima nende abemani.
Mubecheenge abesisa, koti lu Seeng'we ali owesisa.
“Mutahengeraanga abaasyeng'we emisango, hu mwesi muhaye ohuheengerwa; mutaayasaanga abaasyeng'e, hu mwesi muhaye ohuyaaswa; muleheraangamo abaasyeng'e, hu mwesi munyale ohuleherwamo;

mukabenge abasyengwe, hu mwesi munyale ohubeereswa; mu sikero silayi, esisinyiirwe muno, syadengaanisibwa, syediha aasi, sichia ohubabereswa mu mahono. Olwohuba esikero simubereseramo abaasyeng'e, nisyo mwesi simuba mucha ohukalusirwamo.”
Yesu handi yemeeda yabakaadira olukaado lundi ati: “Mani omuundu muwofu anyala ohwimiriramo omuwofu waasye? Mani bombi sibaba bacha ohukwa mu buko?
Omweeki haba saanyala ohuhira omweekesa wae, nae buli muundu yeesi naaba naamalire ohwekeswa bulai bweene, aba achia ohuba koti omweekesa wae.
Lwasiina ewe obona esikoha siri mu moni yo waasyo, nae sonyala humanya esichihi siri mu moni yao yene?

Kose, ewe onyala otye ohuboolera owaasyo oti, ‘Wasyaange, leha hutusemo esikoha siri mu moni yao,’ nae ewe mweene haba sonyala ohubonaho esichihi siri mu moni yao yene? Omwebachirisi ewe, mberi tusa esichihi siri mu moni yao, hwonyale ohubona bulai bweene mani hu wiche otuse esikoha siri mu moni y'owaasyo.
“Olwohuba abulao omusaala mulai okwamaanga ebyaamo bibi, kata handi omusaala mubi okwamaanga ebyaamo bilai;
olwohuba omusaala kwoosi kumanyihaniraanga hu byaamo byaakwo. Olwohuba enduli haba sichinokwaanga hu musaala kw'amawa, kata emisabbiibbu haba sichinokwaanga hu misaala chomubichaha.

Omuundu mulai, niyeemere hu biindu bilai biyabiiha mu mwooyo kwae, ahola ebiindu bilai, nae omuundu mubi, niyeemere hu biindu bibi biyabiiha mu mwooyo kwae, ahola busa ebibi; olwohuba, omunwa kwae kulomaloma ebiindu byechula mu mwooyo.
“Lwasiina mu naanga-naanga muti, ‘Omwaami, Omwaami,’ nae haba simuhola bimbaboolera?
Buli muundu yeesi owiicha yindi, mani yawulira emboosi change, mani yaachiholeraho, njia ohubeekesa koti lwali:

ali koti omuundu owali niyombaha enyumba, owayaba aasi muno, yaata omuse hu lwaanda; mani amaachi k'ofwomboole nikeecha, ehulukusi yahubba hu nyumba eyo, mani yahaya ohuyidengaania, olwohuba yiba yali yombahwa hu lwaanda.

Nae oyo owulira emboosi change mani yahaya ohuchiholeraho, ali koti omuundu wombaha enyumba hu loba busa eyibulaho omuse; yi hulukusi yahubbaho, mani abweene awo enyumba eyo yakwa, mani yanyaasiha bubi muno.”
Yesu niyafundihira enomanoma yae yino abandu nibatekereese, yatula awo yacha yengira mu Kaperanaumu.
Nae bulaanu omuhongo w'abasirikaari emia ndala yali nende omuhalaabani wae mukoosi muno owali omulwae muno, handi naali aambi ohufwa.
Mani omusirikaari oyo niyawulira efuma ya Yesu, yamutumira abahuluundu b'Abayudaaya, nibamusaba ohwiicha ohuwonia omuhalaabani wae oyo.
Mani niboola eyiri Yesu, bamwekweeda nende esinani nibaboola bati, “Ahoyeere ohuholererwa atyo,
olwohuba yaheera muno esyaalo syeefwe sino, handi yatwombahira Sinagoogi yeefwe.”

Mani Yesu yeecha yacha nabo. Nae niyali aambi ohwoola mu daala, omuhongo w'abasirikaari oyo, yamutumira abeecha bae naboolera Yesu ati, “Omwaami, otenyahania daawe, olwohuba ese haba sihoyera ewe ohwingira mu nyumba yange;
sakira ese mweene sindeleetere yooli. Nae lomaloma busa emboosi, mani omuhalaabani wange achia ohuwona.

Olwohuba ese syesi ndi omuundu w'obunyala, handi ndi nende abasirikaari bali aasi wange; mani nimboolera mulala endi, ‘Cha,’ naachia busa; handi owundi endi, ‘Yicha,’ niyeecha busa; handi omuhalaabani wange endi, ‘Hola sino,’ nasihola busa.”
Nae Yesu niyawulira bino, yesinduha muno, mani yakaluhaana yaboolera esidiyiha syali nisimulondaho ati, “Mbaboolera endi, sisiiri ohwakaanaho efukiirira koti yino mu Yisirayiri mwoosi.”
Mani abo abali batumibwe eyiri Yesu, nibakobola mu nyumba, baakana omuhalaabani oyo naali omulamu.
Abweene awo ebyo nibiweere, Yesu yacha mu siko sihuluundu silaangwa siti, Naini, mani abeeki bae alala nende esidiyiha sihoongo bosi bacha nae.

Nae niyali naali aambi ohwoola mu siruwa sy'esiko sihuluundu esyo, bone, omusaacha wali nafwiire yali akingirwe natusibwa erwaanyi w'esiko ohuchia ohusiihwa, owali omwaana mudeerwa wa ng'ina, handi ng'ina oyo, yali omuhasi mufwiire. Mani esidiyiha sihoongo sy'abandu bomu siko esyo bali bakeendera alala nende omuhasi oyo.
Mani Omwaami niyabona omuhasi oyo, yamukwiira esisa mani yaamuboola ati, “Otalira daawe.”
Abweene awo, Yesu yeecha yadiira hu butalihe bw'omufu, mani abakiingi beecha beema. Mani Yesu yaboola ati, “Omuraaga ewe, huboolera endi, siingira.”
Mani omuundu wali afwire oyo yeecha yasingira yehala, mani yachaaka ohulomaloma. Yesu yeecha yaamudiisa ng'ina.
Obuti bweecha bwadiira abandu bali awo boosi; mani bachaaka ohukinia Nasae nibaboola bati, “Omunabbi w'amaani atwichiremo!” Haandi bati, “Nasae akeniye abandu bae!”
Mani efuma yidiira hu Yesu yino yeecha yasasaana mu Buyudaaya mwoosi, alala nende ebyaalo byoosi ebisyebodohaanie.
Abeki ba Yowaana beecha bamuboolera ebiindu bino byoosi.
Mani Yowaana yeecha yalaanga babiri hu beeki bae yabatuma eyiri Omwaami naboola ati, “Ewe niiwe oyo owohwiicha, oba hukoonye owundi?”
Mani abasaacha abo nibamala ohwoola eyiri Yesu, baboola bati, “Yowaana Omubatiisi atutumire yooli naboola ati, ‘Ewe niiwe owohwiicha oba hukoonye owundi?’ ”
Esiha syeene esyo, Yesu yeecha yawonia abalwaye bangi muno nende ab'endwaae chitaali nasilala alala nende ab'emisaambwa, handi yakera abawofu bangi babona bulai.

Mani Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Muche mani muboolere Yowaana ebyo bimubweene nende bimuwuliire: abawofu, babona; abalema, bakeenda; abamakere, baamulwaho; abadiimbe, bawulira; abafu, balamusibwa; abamanani bayaalirwa Emboosi Ndai.
Mani ali nende ehabi oyo otaambonera bubi.”
Mani ba wamwaanda ba Yowaana nibamala ohuwao, Yesu yachaaka ohulomaloma eyiri ebidiyiha ebyo ebidiira hu Yowaana ati: “Siina syeene simwachia musiparara ohubona? Ekada li muyaka kuwucha nilidengaana?
Mani siina syeene simwachia ohubona? Omuundu ofwaalire engubo chifwooha? Bone, abo abafwaala eching'enang'ena handi bamenya mu bulamu bw'ohwedaha baba mu mbiri ch'abatuki.
Mani siina syeene simwachia ohubona? Omunabbi? Eee, mbaboolera endi, nae oyo niye ohiraho omunabbi.
Wuno niye oyo yibaandikaho bati, ‘Bone, mbawo nduma wamwaanda wange mu moni wao, ochia ohuhuteresera engira mu moni wao.’
Mbaboolera endi, mu bandu beebulwa boosi, abulao ohira Yowaana; kata katyo, oyo ohiramo obudiidi mu bwaami bwa Nasae amuhira oluyaali.”
(Mani abandu boosi alala nende abatoosa b'omusolo nibawulira batyo, basiima ehola ndayi ya Nasae, olwohuba bali babatiiswa nende embatiisa ya Yowaana;
nae Abafalisaayo alala nende Abamalako bebwaaba esichiririrwa sya Nasae yibali, koti lubali nibatabatiisibwa nende Yowaana.)
“Siina syeene sindaakeraanieho abandu b'olwiibulo luno, oba bafwaanana nende siina?
Bafwaana koti abaana behaale mu siito, mani nibalanganaanga abeene-na-beene bati, ‘Hwabobbera elere li sangaasa, nae mwahaya ohuhina; handi hwabacherenjesera, nae mwahaya ohulira.’
Olwohuba Yowaana Mubatiisi yeecha natalia omugaati kwoosi, handi natang'wa efwiini yoosi; nae mwaboola muti, ‘Wuno aliho omusaambwa.’
Nae Omwaana w'Omuundu yeecha naalya handi nang'wa; nae mwaboola muti, ‘Bone, ow'okuliira handi omumeesi wuno, omwiicha w'abatoosa b'omusolo nende abaholi be bibi!’
Nae amakesi ka Nasae obwadyeeri bwaako, bubonehera mu bandu bakafukiirira.”
Olwoola, Omufalisaayo wundi yalaanga Yesu ache alye nae, mani Yesu yeecha yacha mu nyumba y'Omufalisaayo oyo, mani yehala hu meesa, ohulya nae.

Mani bone, omuhasi wundi ow'omusiko sihuluundu esyo, owali omuholi w'ebibi, yeecha yawulira ati Yesu ali ohulya mu nyumba y'Omufalisaayo oyo, yeecha yaleeta echupa y'amafuta k'esiing'aari siingi muno,

mani yeema emukoongo wa Yesu enamakulu wae naalira, mani yachaaka ohudoonya amasika kae hu makulu ka Yesu, handi nakasimuula nende efwiiri ly'ohumutwe kwae, mani yahoomba amakulu ka Yesu, mani yamala yaakabaha nende amafuta k'esiing'aari ako.

Nae bulaanu, Omufalisaayo wali nalaangire Yesu niyabona atyo, yaboola mu mwooyo kwae ati, “Nikali mbwe omusaacha wuno munabbi mweene, aba amanyire muhasi w'engeri siina wuno oli ohumudiiraangaho, olwohuba muholi w'ebibi.”
Nae Yesu yamukobolamo naboola ati, “Simooni, ndi nende esiindu siindaha ohuhuboolera.” Nae Simooni yakobolamo ati, “Omweekesa, siindu siina syeene?”
Yesu yamukanira ati, “Olwoola, omuundu wundi yali nende abandu babiri babaanja; mulala yali nende ekobi lya edinaari emia chitaanu, nae owundi edinaari amahumi kataanu.
Nibyoola byabahaya ohutunga, yeecha yabaleheramo bombi. Bulaanu, ni naanu mweene hu bombi abo ochia ohumuheera muno?”
Simooni yakobolamo ati, “Mbaasa endi oyo, yiyaleheramo ebiingi.” Mani Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Ewe hane mbao oheengere omusango bulai.”

Mani Yesu yakaluhaana yatingaala omuhasi oyo, mani yaboolera Simooni ati, “Obona omuhasi wuno? Ese nyiingire mu nyumba yao muno, nae haba siwumbereese amaachi k'ohwoosa amakulu kange, nae wuno adosere amakulu kange nende amasika kae, handi yakasimuula nende efwiiri lyae.
Haba siwungwiireho mu sirifu, nae ohutula nyiingira muno, omuhasi wuno haba saaleheereho ohuhoomba amakulu.
Ewe haba soobahireho omutwe kwaange amafuta koosi, nae omuhasi wuno abahire amakulu kange nende amafuta k'esiing'aari siingi muno.
Mani sakira huhuboolera endi, ebibi byae, biingi muno bityo, bimuleheerwemo, olwohuba yekeese ohudaha hungi muno; nae oyo oleherwamo ebidiidi, niye oweekesa ohudaha hudiidi.”
Mani Yesu yeecha yaboolera omuhasi oyo ati, “Ebibi byao bihuleheerwemo.”
Nae abo boosi abali nibali nae hu meesa, bachaaka ohuboolanira abeene-na-beene bati, “Wuno niye wiina, onyala ohuleheramo kata ebibi?”
Nae Yesu yeecha yaboolera omuhasi oyo ati, “Efukiirira yao yihuwonisye; cha nende emireembe.”
Ebyo nibyawa busa biti, Yesu yakenda naabitira mu biko bihuluundu nende engoongo nayaala handi naleetera abandu Emboosi Ndai ch'Obwaami bwa Nasae. Yali ali nende abeeki bae ehumi-na-babiri,
alala nende abahasi bandi abali baonisibwa emisaambwa nende amadehere kataali nasilala. Abahasi bano nibo: Maria, olaangwa Magadaleena, yi Yesu yali atusiremo emisaambwa chitaanu-na-chibiri,
nende Jowana, omuhasi wa Chuusa, omubiihi muhuluundu wa Herode, nende Susaana, nende abahasi bangi bandi, abahonyaanga Yesu nende abeeki bae nibatusa hu biindu bi beene bahalaabanaanga ohufuna.
Mani esidiyiha sy'abandu sihoongo nisyamala ohwebuusa alala, handi abandu bandi abatula mu biko bikabuhaane bosi nibeecha yali, Yesu yalomaloma nabo mu lukaado ati,
“Olwoola, omulimi yacha ohuwaanya emwo yae. Mani niyali awaanya, emwo yindi yakwa hu ngira, mani yaasenakirwa mu makulu, mani handi amayoni keecha kayiboocha yoosi.
Nae emwo yindi yakwa hu bikina-kina; mani niyachaaka ohuhula yiti, yeecha yooma, olwohuba haba siyali nende omunyiti.
Nae emwo yindi yakwa mu mawa; mani amawa kahulira alala nayo, mani kayifwinyirira.
Nae emwo yindi yakwa mu loba layi mani yaahula, mani yaama ebyaamo amahabi emia ndala.” Niyamala ohuboola busa atyo, yeecha yahuumula naboola ati, “Oyo oli nende amatwi kawulira, leha awulire.”
Mani abeeki bae nibamuteeba amahulundu k'olukaado luno,

Yesu yaboola ati, “Eng'we ning'we ababeresebwa ehabi y'ohumanya ebyaama by'Obwaami bwa Nasae; nae eyiri abandu bandi, bino biri mu ngaado busa, mani batingaale bahaye ohubona, handi batekeerese bahaye ohuwulira.
“Bulaanu, amahulundu k'olukaado lw'omuwaanyi niko kano: Emwo niyo Emboosi ya Nasae.
Emwo yakwa hu ngira, nibo abo abawulira; nae Sitaani yeecha yabatusaho emboosi chali mu myooyo chaabwe, mani bahaye ohufukiirira bataonisibwa.

Nae emwo yiri hu bikina-kina nibo abo, nibawulira emboosi, bayakaanira nende esangaalo; nae koti lubataali nende emisi, bafukiiriraho hulw'esiha sidiidi, nae ebiha by'ohuhemebwa nibyoola, nibabyekaana.

Nae emwo yakwa mu mawa, nibo abo abawulira emboosi, nae ohwelalihirira nende ohubaasa hu buyiinda bw'esyaalo nende esangaalo ly'obulamu bifwinyirira emboosi eyo, mani ebyaamo byaabwe sibihula byaangala.
Nae emwo yakwa mu loba layi, nibo abo abawulira emboosi, bayidiira bulai muno nende obwadyeeri alala nende omwooyo mulai, mani baama ebyaamo muhwesimiirisa hwaabwe.
“Abulao omuundu oba naamalire ohuwaambia etaara, olifuniha mu simweero, oba yaalita mu lwalo w'esitaanda, nae alita hu siteeni syalyo, hulihosere abengira mu nyumba.
Olwohuba abulao esiindu syoosi esyakiswa, esitahakisulwe, handi, abulao esiindu sy'omusyaama esitalimanyihana syatuswa alafu.
Mani mweliinde engeri yimuwuliriramo; olwohuba oyo oli nabyo, niye ochia ohumeedwaho ebiindi, nae oyo otaliho nende esiindu syoosi, kata nende syabaasa ati ali nasyo, bacha ohumumalaho.”
Olwoola, ng'ina Yesu nende ba mwaanang'ina beecha yali, nae haba sibanyala ohumwolaho olwa esidiyiha sihoongo.
Mani beecha baboolera Yesu bati, “Maao nende ba mwaanamaao beemere erwaanyi, badaha ohuhubona.”
Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Maama nende ba mwaanama nibo abo abawulira emboosi ya Nasae mani bayiholeraho.”
Ludaalo lundi, Yesu yeecha yengira mu lyaato nende abeeki bae mani yababoolera ati, “Mulehe husyaabale huchie engereha w'enyaanja.” Mani beecha bachaaka olukeendo,
nae nibali nibasyaabala, Yesu yeecha yaakona endoolo. Mani omuyaka kw'amaani kweecha kwasiingisa amafwinda kehubba hu bwaato, bwechula amaachi bwaaba aambi ohusihama.
Mani abeeki bacha bamusimusa nibaboola bati, “Omwaami, Omwaami, huli ohufwa!” Mani Yesu yeecha yaasimuha, mani yahabuhira omuyaka alala nende amafwinda; mani byeecha byayenjeera byanyita chi.

Mani Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Efukiirira yeng'we yiri yena?” Mani obuti bwabadiira, mani bawuka muno nibaboolanira bati, “Nae wuno niye wiina, onyala ohulagira kata omuyaka nende amaachi, mani byamuwulira?”
Mani beecha boola mu syaalo sye Geraseneesi, esitingalaane nende e Galilaaya.

Nae Yesu niyali atula busa mu lyaato ati, abweene awo omusaacha wundi, otula mu siko sihuluundu esyo oliho emisambwa yamwoolaho; omusaacha oyo yali yamala embaka hoongo muno natefwalaangaho esiindu syoosi, handi siyamenyaanga mu nyumba yoosi ohutusaho, yamenyanga mu biriindwa mwong'ene.

Omusaacha oyo niyabona busa Yesu ati, yobba wuwi mani yeecha yaakwa mu moni wae, mani yahuumula mu kono ly'akulu naboola ati, “Yesu, mwaana wa Nasae oli Akulu Muno, onaahole otye? Hwekweeda endi, otasaandia daawe.”

Olwohuba Yesu yali amalire ohulagira omusaambwa mubi okwo ohumutulamo. (Olwohuba omusaambwa okwo kwali kwanala ohumuniinaanga amahabi maangi; yali yalindwa bulindwa nende abasirikaari, niyaboyebwa nende eminyororo alala nende epiingo, mani nahalakaanga busa eminyororo echo alala nende epiingo cheene, mani omusaambwa okwo kwamwiirusaanga nikumuyira mu siparara.)
Mani Yesu yeecha yaamuteeba ati, “Eliita lyao nilyo naanu?” Nae yaboola ati, “Esidiyiha”; olwohuba emisaambwa miingi muno chali nichimulimo.
Mani emisambwa echo cheecha chekweeda Yesu atachilagira chacha emakoombe ekotero.

Nae bulaanu, eyicho ly'embiichi hongo lyali niriri ohwayaanga aambi awo hu ndulo w'esigulu; mani emisambwa echo cheecha chamwekweda achilehe chiche chiingire mu mbiichi echo. Mani Yesu yeecha yachileha chacha.

Mani emisaambwa echo cheecha chatula mu musaacha oyo, chacha cheengira mu mbiichi echo, mani eyicho ly'embiichi echo lyoosi lyeecha lyabbabuluha embiro lyehirira egenya, lyaweera mu nyaanja mani embiichi choosi chasihama chafwa.
Nae abaayi b'embiichi nibabona ebyo, beeruha, bacha baasalaania emboosi echo mu siko sihuluundu syoosi alala nende mu ngoongo.

Mani abandu beecha basiingira bacha ohubona esyali nisiholehane, mani beecha boola hu Yesu, mani babukaana omusaacha yi misaambwa chali chituliremo oyo, niyehaale mu makulu ka Yesu, niyefwaalire engubo, naali mwaaywe; mani beecha batya muno.
Nae abo abali basibweene, beecha baabakaniaya engeri yi musaacha waliho emisaambwa oyo, yawonisirwamo.
Mani abandu boosi abali mu syaalo syebodohaanie Geraseneesi beecha bamusaba abatuleho; olwohuba bali batiire muno; mani Yesu yeecha yengira mu lyaato mani yaakobolerayo.
Nae omusaacha yi misaambwa chatulamo oyo, yeecha yekweda Yesu ati, amufukiirire adoong'e nae; nae Yesu yamuseebula naboola ati,
“Kaluha engo, mani obaboolere alafu, obulayi bu Nasae ahuholeere yibwaaka.” Mani yeecha yawaawo, nayaala mu siko sihuluundu esyo syoosi ebilai bi Yesu amuholeere koti lu byaaka.
Mani bulaanu, Yesu niyakobola, esidiyiha sy'abandu syamwakaanira, olwohuba boosi bali nibamuliindiriire busa.
Abweene awo, omusaacha olaangwa ati Yayiro yesi yeecha yoola. Yayiro yali omuhulundu wa Sinagoogi; mani niyoola eyiri Yesu, yamukwa mu makulu yamwekweeda yeeche mu nyumba yae,

olwohuba yali ali nende omuhaana wae mulala yeng'ene, owali aambi w'emyaaka ehumi nende chibiri ech'ohubuluundu, naali aambi ohufwa. Nae Yesu niyali hwakeenda naachia, abandu bali bamweyindikanieho muno.
Nae, omuhasi wali naamalire emyaaka ehumi nende chibiri nalwaala obulwaae bw'ohudaachirira handi omuundu yeesi natanyalaangaho ohumuwonia,
yatulira enyuma, yoola hu Yesu, mani yamala yadiira hu kemo ly'engubo yae; mani abweene awo, ni ohudaachirira hwae ohwo nihwaakama.
Nae Yesu yaboola ati, “Naanu oyo owundiirireho?” Nae abandu boosi nibekaana, Peetero yaboola ati, “Omwaami, mbawo esidiyiha sy'abandu sihwebodohaanie handi siri ohuhudiiya!”
Nae Yesu yaboola ati, “Aliwo omuundu wundirireho; olwohuba mbulira aliwo amaani kahandulaho.”

Mani omuhasi oyo niyeecha yabona ati amanyihane, yeecha natengereha, mani yaakwa mu moni wa Yesu naboola mu moni w'abandu boosi esikerere namudiiraho, handi koti lwaonere abwene-na-bweme naamalire ohumudiiraho.
Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Muhana-ng'ene, efukiirira yao yihuwoniisye; cha nende emireembe.”
Yesu niyali nasilomalomaanga, omusaacha wundi ohutula mu daala ly'omutuki wula ni yoola amuboolera ati, “Omuhaana wao amalire ohufwa; mani handi otanyaahania Omweekesa.”
Nae Yesu niyawulira sino, yamukobolamo ati, “Otatya; fukiirira busa, mani omuhaana wao achia ohuba omulamu abweene.”
Mani Yesu niyeecha yoola mu daala, siyafukiirira omuundu yeesi ohwingira nae mu nyumba, ohutusaho Peetero nende Yowaana nende Yakobbo, nende simwaana nende ng'ina mwaana oyo.
Nae abandu boosi bandoong'a nibalira handi nibacherenjesa hulw'omuhaana oyo; nae Yesu yaboola ati, “Mutalira; olwohuba haba saafwiire, nae ali ohukona.”
Nae abandu bamucheha busa, olwohuba bali bamanyire bulai bweene bati, omuhaana oyo afwiire.
Mani Yesu yamudiira omuhono, yaamulaanga naboola ati, “Mwaana ewe, siingira.”
Mani naakalusa omwooyo, mani nasiingiraniramo; mani Yesu yeecha yabakerakira ati bamubeereseho esiindu sy'ohulya.
Mani abebusi bae beecha besinduha muno; nae Yesu yabahuutira batabooleraho omuundu yeesi esyali nisiholehaane.
Yesu yalaanga ehumi-na-babiri abo bebuusa alala, mani yababeeresa amaani nende obunyala ohwirusa emisaambwa choosi nende ohuwonia endwaae,
mani yabatuma bache bayaale ebidiira hu Bwaami bwa Nasae alala nende ohuwonia abalwaye.
Mani yeecha yababoolera ati, “mutakiingaho esiindu syoosi hu lukeendo lweng'we kata, endabuhi, kata omufuuko, kata omugaati, kata eseende; handi mutakiinga kata engubo chibiri.
Mani, enyumba yoosi yimwingiramo, mubecheenge omwo, ohwoola lu mwahatulemo nimuwaao.
Nae eyo yoosi yibatababukaanira, nimuba nimutula mu siko esyo, muteng'uleenge olufu luli hu makulu keeng'we, sibe esilolero esibakabuhania nabo.”
Mani basiingira bawaao, bacha babita mu ngoongo, nibayaala Emboosi Ndai nende ohuwonia abandu buli abundu woosi yibacha.
Nae bulaanu, Herode omutuki we Galilaaya, niyawulira ebyo byoosi ebyali biholehaane, yeecha yawunga, olwohuba abandu bandi bali baboola bati, Yowaana niye osyuhire mu bafu,
nae abandi bati, Elija niye owali abonehane, nae abandi bati, mulala hu banabbi bahale niye asyuhire.
Nae Herode yeecha yaboola ati, “Nise owatema hu Yowaana omutwe; nae wuno niye naanu yimbulira nibalomalomaho ebiindu bino?” Mani yaakesaho muno ati amuboneho.
Mani Abatume nibakobola, bacha baboolera Yesu bibali nibaholere. Nae Yesu yababukula, yabayira endulo bong'ene mu siko sihuluundu silaangwa siti, Bbetisaida.

Nae esidiyiha sy'abandu nisyamanya sityo, syeecha syamulondaho; mani Yesu yeecha, yabakaanira, mani yeecha yababoolera abidiira hu Bwaami bwa Nasae, handi yeecha yawonia abo boosi abali nibadaha ohuwonisibwa.

Nae obwiire nibwali nibuchaaka ohwiira; ehumi-na-babiri beecha eyiri Yesu bamuboolera bati, “Seebula esidiyiha sy'abandu sino siweeo, sichie mu ngoongo, nende mu syaalo sya aambi, bache bakoonye owohukona, nende ewohunyoola ebiindu by'ohwehoonyera biindi; olwohuba huli mu syaalo sibulamo abandu.”

Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Eng'we beene mubaberese esiindu sy'ohulya.” Nabo baboola bati, “Huli nende emigaati chitabita mu chitaanu, nende eng'eeni chibiri, ohutusaho nihucha hwakulira abandu bano boosi ebyohulya.”
Olwohuba bali aambi abasaacha elifu chitaanu. Nae Yesu yeecha yaboolera abeeki bae ati, “Mubehase aasi mubakabule mu buli mukaanda mubeemo abandu aambi wa amahumi kataanu-kataanu.”
Mani beecha bahola batyo, beehasa abandu boosi aasi.

Mani Yesu yeecha yabukula emigaati chitaanu echo, nende eng'eeni chibiri, mani yaatingaala akulu Mukulu, yamala yabibeeresa ehabi, mani yabidonyadonya, yamala yabibeeresa abeeki abo babikabule esidiyiha sy'abandu esyo.
Mani boosi balya, mani beekuta. Mani beecha babuusa ebidonye-donye bidong'ereho, boosa ebimweero ehumi-na-bibiri.
Olwoola, Yesu niyali yekongooya Nasae yeng'ene naali nende abeeki bae; yeecha yabateeba ati, “Abandu baboola bati, ese nise wiina?”
Nabo bakobolamo bati, “Yowaana Omubatiisi; nae abandi baboola bati, Elija; handi abandi nabo bati mulala hu banabbi bahale niye osyuhire.”
Nae yababoolera ati, “Nae eng'we muboola muti ese nise wiina?” Nae Peetero yakobolamo ati, “Niiwe Kristo wa Nasae.”
Mani Yesu yeecha yabahuutira handi yabalagira batabooleraho omuundu yeesi,

naboola ati, “Omwaana w'Omuundu ahoyeere ohusaanda mu biindu biingi muno, handi abahuluundu b'enjia nende abalaamisi bahuluundu, nende abandiiki b'amalako boole ohumwebwaaba, handi bamwiite, mani hu ludaalo lw'ohudatu asyuhiswe.”
Mani Yesu yeecha yaboolera abandu boosi ati, “Omuundu yeesi nadaha ohunoonda, leha mberi yefwirise omweene, mani akinge omusalabba kwae buli ludaalo, mani yanoonde.
Olwohuba omuundu yeesi odaha ohuwonia obulamu bwae omweene, achia ohubufwiirwa; nae oyo yeesi ofwiirwa obulamu bwae hulwaange, achia ohubuwonia.
Olwohuba ngaanga siina yi muundu anyoola, naalya esyaalo syoosi, nae afwiirwa oba yekosya omweene?

Olwohuba oyo yeesi owumaambirwa esoni alala nende emboosi change, oyo yesi niye yi Mwaana w'Omuundu achia ohuwambirwa esoni niyeecha mu luyaali lwae nende mu luyaali lwa Simwaana nende olwa bamalaika boolerefu.
Nae mbaboolera obwadyeeri bweene endi, aliwo abandi abemere ano bulaanu abatacha ohubonaho ohufwa nibatabona Obwaami bwa Nasae.”
Nae bulaanu, lunyuma lw'endaalo chitanu-na-chidatu, Yesu naamalire ohulomaloma ebiindu bino, yeecha yabukula Peetero, nende Yowaana nende Yakobbo, mani yaniina nabo hu lugulu ohwekongooya.
Mani niyali niyekongooya, efwaani yae yakaluhanisibwa, mani ebyefwalo byae byalafuya byamilamilana.
Nae boneho, abasaacha babiri, Musa nende Elija, beecha balomaloma nae.
Bano babonehera mu luyaali handi balomaloma hu huwaao hwae, huyali achia ohumaliirisira e Yerusaalemu.
Bulaanu Peetero nende abaasye bayali abali nabo, endoolo nyiingi chali chibayirire, mani nibasimuha, beecha babona oluyaali lwae alala nende abasaacha babiri abo nibeemere nae.

Mani abasaacha abo nibali hu balehana nae bati, Peetero yaboolera Yesu ati, “Omwaami, silayi muno efwe ohuba ano; leha hwombahe ebikaali bidatu, silala esyao, esiindi esya Musa, nae esiindi esy'Elija” (Yali saamanyire biyali alomaloma.)
Nae niyali hwasilomalomaanga atyo, esireesi syeecha, syababwiiha; mani nibali nibengira mu sireesi, beecha baatya muno.
Nae ekono lyatula mu sireesi niliboola liti, “Wuno niye mwaana wange, Omulobole wange; mu muwulireenge!”
Nae ekono elyo nilyamala ohulomaloma, Yesu yaboneha nadong'ere yeng'ene. Mani abeeki badoong'a nibawuleerere, mani bahaya ohubooleraho omuundu yeesi mu ndaalo echo, esiindu syoosi sibali nibabweene.
Nae nibwahya, hu ludaalo luloondaho, nibamalire ohwiha ohutula hu lugulu, esidiyiha sy'abandu sihoongo syeecha syabukaanana nae.
Mani boneho, omusaacha wundi ohutula mu sidiyiiha yachaaka ohulira naboola ati, “Omweekesa, hwekweeda bonaho omusyaani wange wuno, olwohuba niye omwaana wange yeng'ene;
mani boneho, omusaambwa kumukwichaangaho, mani yesinduha naalira lukali; kumukikaanga ohwoola lwabira efiro muhanwa, mani kumukuchumbula muno, mani kuhaya ohumutulaho bwaangu.
Nae ndekweedere abeeki bao ohukwiirusa, nae sibanyalire.”
Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Poo, oluse lubi luwuma efukiirira, ndahabe nang'we ohwoola liina, handi ndahabesimiriise ohwoola liina? Leeta ano omusyaani wao.”
Nae niyali ali ohwiicha, omusaambwa okwo kwamususucha, mani kwamumika. Nae Yesu yeecha yahabuhira omusambwa mubi okwo, mani yawonia omusyaani oyo, mani yamukalusira simwaana.
Mani abandu boosi bawuka muno amaani ka Nasae. Nae abandu boosi nibali basiwukaangaho ebyo byoosi bi Yesu yali naaholere, yeecha yaboolera abeeki bae ati,
“Mulehe emboosi chino chiingire elalira mu matwi keeng'we; olwohuba Omwaana w'Omuundu achia ohudiiswa mu mahono k'abandu.”
Nae nabo haba sibamanya amahulundu k'enomanoma yino, handi yali yibakisiibweho, bahaye ohuyimanya; handi bali batiire ohumuteeba ebidiira hu nomaloma yino.
Mani abeene-na-beene bachaaka ohuyingana nibateebana bati, ni wiina ohiramo oluyaali?
Nae Yesu niyeecha yaamanya embaasa yiri mu myooyo chaabwe, yabukula omwaana muyere yaamusudya mu lubafu lwae,

mani yababoolera ati, “Oyo yeesi owakaanira omwaana wuno mu liita lyaange aba yanjakaanira, handi oyo yeesi owunjakaanira aba yakaaniire oyo owanduma; olwohuba oyo ohiramo ohuba aasi mweng'we, niye ohiramo oluyaali.”
Nae Yowaana yakobolamo ati, “Omwaami, hubweene omusaacha niyerusaanga emisambwa mu liita lyao mani hwamukayira, olwohuba haba saali mulala hweefwe.”
Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Mutamukayira; olwohuba oyo yeesi otabayingania aba ali alala nang'we.”
Nae endaalo chae ch'ohukobolayo Mukulu nichasuda aambi, Yesu yahengawo ohuchia e Yerusaalemu.
Mani yaatuma ba wamwaanda bae bache mu moni wae, mani bacha beengira mu lukoongo lw'Abasamaria, ohumutekehera;
nae abandu bamwo bahaya ohumwakaanira, olwohuba yali ahengerwo ohuchia e Yerusaalemu.
Nae abeeki bae, Yakobbo nende Yowaana nibabona sino, baboola bati, “Omwaami, odaha hulaange omuliro kwiihe ohutula Mukulu, kubasihirise?”
Nae Yesu yakaluhaana mani yabahabuhira.
Mani beecha bemeeda, bacha mu lukoongo lundi.
Nae nibali nibakeenda hu ngira, omuundu wundi yeecha yaboolera Yesu ati, “Ese njia ohuhulondaanga buli y'ochiira.”
Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Amabbwe kali nende ameena, handi amayoni kabburuha nako kali nende ebiswi; nae Omwaana w'Omuundu abulaho kata abundu yaanyala ohugeeng'a omutwe kwae.”
Nae Yesu yaboolera omuundu owundi ati, “Noonde.” Nae omuundu oyo yaboola ati, “Omwaami, leha mberi njie siihe lata yange.”
Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Leha abafu basiihe abafu baabwe; nae ewe, cha mani oyaale Obwaami bwa Nasae.”
Nae owundi yaboola ati, “Omwaami, ese njia ohuhuloonda; nae leha mberi njie seebule ab'omudaala lyaange.”
Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Abulao omuundu yeesi, odiira embako y'eng'ombe ohulima, mani yobba amahemo, ohoyera Obwaami bwa Nasae.”
Oluunyuma lwa bino, Yesu yeecha yadoola abeeki amahumi kataanu-na-kabiri na babiri bandi, mani yabatuma bamutangiriremo ohuchia, babiri-babiri, mu buli siko nende esifwo, yiyali owohucha omweene.
Mani yababoolera ati, “Ekesa nalyo liingi muno, nae abahalaabani nibo abadiidi; mani mwekongooye Omwaami we kesa atume abahalaabani mu kesa lyae.
Bulaanu, mani muche; nae bone, mbawo mbatuma, koti abana b'amakoondi mu manani.
Mutakiinga esawo ch'eseende, kata omufuuko kw'ohusumiramo, kata ebiraato; handi, mutaheesa omuundu yeesi hungira.
Nabuli nyumba yoosi yimwingiramo, mutaangireenge ohuboola muti, ‘Emireembe kibe hu nyumba yino!’
Mani, omuundu yeesi ow'emireembe naaba mu nyumba eyo, emireembe cheeng'we chicha ohumubaaho; nae nibitaali bityo, emireembe kichia ohubakaluhira.

Mani mudong'enge mu nyumba yene eyo, nimulya haandi nimung'wa buli siindu syoosi sibabakabula, olwohuba buli muhalaabani ahoyera omuheemba kwae; nae mutalukalukanaanga nimutula mu nyumba eyo nimuchia mu yindi.
Nimwiingiraanga mu siko syoosi, mani baababukaanira, mulicheenge esyo syoosi sibaba babakabule;
muwonie abalwaye baba nibalimo, mani mubaboolere muti, ‘Obwaami bwa Nasae bwiichire aambi nang'we.’
Nae buli lumwingira mu siko syoosi, mani bahaya ohubabukaanira, muchicheenge mu makira kaamwo, mani muboola muti,
‘Kata olufu lw'esiko syeng'we, olwediirire hu makulu keefwe, huli ohubateng'ulira lubaloonde; nae kata katyo, mumanye sino, muti Obwaami bwa Nasae bwiichire aambi.’
Mbaboolera endi, hu ludaalo olwo, Sodomu syahakwiirwe esisa ohuhiraho esiko esyo.

“Chihwakaanire ewe, Korasiini! chihwakaanire ewe, Bbeetasaida! olwohuba ebyaamayia byaholwa mweng'we biba byaholwa mu Tiro nende Sidoni, abandu bamwo baba beefunaka hale, nibefwaala ebigunia, handi nibehala mu kohe.
Nae hu ludaalo lwohuheengeraho omusango Tiro nende Sidoni byahakwiirwe esisa, ohuhiraho eng'we.
Nae ewe Kaperanaumu, odaha ohweniinia ohwoola Mukulu? Mani bacha ohuhwiisa aasi busa ohwoola emakoombe.
“Oyo obawulira, aba awulire ese, handi oyo obahaya, aba ahayire ese, handi oyo owuhaya aba ahayire oyo owanduma.”
Amahumi kataanu-na-kabiri nababiri abo bakobola nibasangaalire muno, nibaboola bati, “Omwaami, kata emisambwa chosi chituwulireenge, nihwehoonyera eliita lyao!”
Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Mbweene Sitaani niyaakuha natula Mukulu naakwa aasi koti olumesu.
Nae bone, mbabeerese obunyala bw'ohuseenakira endemo nende eby'obusiba byoosi, handi nende obunyala bumalawo amaani k'omusuku koosi; mani abulao esiindu sichia ohubawumisa.
Nae kata katyo, mutasangaala olwohuba emisaambwa chibawulira; nae musangaale olwohuba ameeta keeng'we kandiikwa Mukulu.”

Mani esiha syeene esyo, Yesu yeecha yehoyera mu Mwooyo Mwolerefu mani yaboola ati, “Hwebasa muno Bbaabba, Omwaami w'Ekulu nende esyaalo, olwohuba wakisa ebiindu bino abakesi nende abasoma muno, nae wabibwihulira abana badoto; Eee, Bbaabba, olwohuba huno hwali ohudaha wao hw'esisa.
Bbaabba yamala ohumberesa ebiindu byoosi; mani abulao omuundu yeesi omanyire Omwaana ohutusaho Simwaana, handi omanyire Simwaana, ohutusaho Omwaana nende oyo yeesi yi Mwaana ahengawo ohubwihulira.”
Nae Yesu yakaluhanira abeeki bae nibali bong'ene mani yababoolera ati, “Chiri nende ehabi emoni chaabo echibona bimuli ohubona!
Olwohuba mbaboolera endi, banabbi bangi nende abatuki bangi bekoomba ohubona simubona, nae bahaya ohusibona, handi nende ohuwulira simuwulira, nae bahaya ohusiwulira.”
Nae bone, omweekesa wa malako wundi, yaasingira yeema nadaha ohuhema Yesu naboola ati, “Omweekesa, siina syeene siimba hole, hu nyale ohunyoola obulamu butaakama?”
Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Ni siina syeene esyandiikwa mu malako? Okasoma otye?”
Nae yakobolamo ati, “Dahaanga Nasae Omwaami wao nende omwooyo kwao kwoosi, nende obulamu bwao bwoosi, nende amaani kao koosi, nende amakesi kao koosi; handi dahaanga owaasyo, koti lu wedaha omweene.”
Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Okoboolemo bulai; mani hola otyo, mani ochia ohubaao omulamu.”
Nae omweekesa wa malako oyo, koti luyali akiiya ohweekesa ati mulai, yeecha yaboolera Yesu ati, “Nae owasyaange niye naanu?”

Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Olwoola, omusaacha wundi yali nakeenda niyehirira ohutula Yerusaalemu, naachia Yeriko, mani yaakwa mu banyaka, bamumalaho engubo, mani bamuhuya bubi muno, mani bawaao, bamuleha nadong'isye ahateetera hong'ene.
Nae bulaanu olw'ehabi, waliwo omulaamisi wundi yali nabitira hu ngira yene eyo; nae niyamubona, yahededya yabitira endulo yeweerawo.
Handi nasilala, Omuleefi wundi yesi niyeecha yoola mu sifwo esyo yamubona, mani yahededya yabitira endulo.
Nae Omusamaria wundi, niyali naali hu lukeendo, yeecha yoola musifwo si musaacha oyo yalimo; nae niyamubona, yamukwiira esisa,
mani yacha yali, yamuboya ebinyubu, yabichuhaho, amafuta nende efiini; mani yaamubukula yamuta hu esuhiri yae yene, mani yaamuyira mu nyumba y'abakeni, yamala yaamulinda bulai bweene.

Handi nibwahya muchuli, yeecha yabukula edinaari chibiri mani yachibeeresa omuliindi w'enyumba y'abakeni eyo, naboola ati, ‘Liinda omuundu wuno bulai; handi nisibaao esiindu syoosi syomeedaho ohumuhoonya, ningaluha njia ohuhutuunga.’
Naanu mweene hu bandu badatu bano, y'obaasa oti, yekesa eyiri omusaacha wakwa mu banyaka ati niye owaasye?”
Nae yaboola ati, “Oyo owamukwiira esisa.” Mani Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Cha mani wesi ohole otyo.”
Nae Yesu nende abeeki bae, nibali bachiririra nende olukeendo lwaabwe olwo, Yesu yoola mu lukoongo lundi; mani omuhasi wundi olaangwa Marita yeecha yamwakaanira, yengira mu nyumba yae.
Nae yali nende mwaanang'ina olaangwa Maria, oweecha yehala mu makulu k'Omwaami, mani yaatekeeresa enjekesa yae.

Nae Marita owali asidoyeerwe muno nende emirimo ch'ohukabula; yeecha yacha eyiri Yesu mani yaboola ati, “Omwaami, sodeebaho oti, mwaanaama yandehere ohukabula syeng'ene? Mani muboolere yeeche yahoonyeho.”
Nae Omwaami yamukobolamo ati, “Marita, ewe Marita, welalihira handi wachuunirwa ebiindu biingi muno;
nae esiindu silala syong'ene nisyo esihoyerwa. Maria adoolere omukabo mulai, okutacha ohumutusibwaho.”
Ludaalo lundi, Yesu yali abundu wandi niyekongooya, mani niyamala ohwekongooya, mulala hu beeki bae yamuboolera ati, “Omwaami, tweekese ohwekongooya, koti lu Yowaana yekesa abeeki bae.”
Mani Yesu yababoolera ati, “Nimuba nimwekongooya, muboleenge muti: “Seefwe, eliita lyao likinisibwe. Obwaami bwao bwiiche.
Tuberese buli ludaalo, eby'ohulya byeefwe bya buli buhya;
mani otuleheremo ebibi byeefwe, olwohuba efwe beene huleheraangamo oyo yeesi otuholera bubi; mani otatuyira mu huhemebwa.”
Mani yababoolera ati, “Ni naanu hw'eng'we, oli nende omwiicha, onyala ohuchia yali musiro akati, mani yamuboolera ati, ‘Mwiicha wange, ndeeyoleho emigaati chidatu;
olwohuba aliwo omwiicha wange owahoola natula hu lukeendo, nae mbulaho esiindu syoosi esyohumukabula’;
mani nae yakobolamo naali mukati ati, ‘Leha ohunyaasa; olwiiki lumalire ohwikalwao, handi ese nende abaana bange huli mu buliri; Haba sinyala ohusiingira ndahuba esiindu syoosi’?
Mbaboolera endi, kata nende natahasingiire yamuba esiindu syoosi, olwohuba mwiicha wae, nae hulw'enduyirisi eyo, aba achia ohusiingira amubeerese buli syaba nadaha syoosi.
Handi mbaboolera endi, Saba, mani sichia ohuhubeereswa; koonya, mani ochia ohunyoola; hong'oonda, mani ochia ohwikulirwao.
Olwohuba osaba yeesi afuna, handi buli okoonya yeesi anyoola, handi buli ohong'oonda yeesi yahekulirwewo.
Simwaana muundu siina mweng'we, yi mwaana wae asaba amube eng'eeni, onyala ohumuba endemo musifwo sy'eng'eeni;
oba namusaba ebuyu, onyala ohumuba engoberanyaanja?
Nikali mbwe, eng'we abandu babi, mumanyire ohuberesa abana beeng'we ebiindu bilai, nae Seeng'we oli Mukulu siyahahirireho awo ohuberesa Mwooyo Mwolerefu abo ababa nibamusabire!”
Olwoola, Yesu niyali yerusa omusambwa kwali kutalomaloma; nae omusaambwa okwo nikwali kumalire ohuwaao, omusaacha wali natalomalomaanga yeecha yachaaka ohulomaloma, mani abandu bawuka muno.
Nae abandu bandi bachaaka ohuboola bati, “Wuno yerusa emisaambwa nende obunyala bwa Bbelisebbuli, omuhongo wemisaambwa”;
nae abandi, nibeenya ohuhema Yesu, bamusaba ahalolero ohutula Mukulu.
Nae Yesu, koti luyali namanyire ebibaaso byaabwe, yababoolera ati, “Obwaami bwoosi obwekabulanamo obweene-no-bweene buba bucha ohukwa, handi edaala lyoosi erikabuhanamo likwa bukwa.

Mani bulaanu Sitaani yesi nikali mbwe yekabuhanie yakabuhanamo omweene-no-mweene, obwaami bwae buba bucha ohuyiindira butye? Olwohuba muli ohuboola muti, njirusa emisambwa nende obunyala bwa Bbelisebbuli.
Mani nikali mbwe njirusa emisaambwa nende obunyala bwa Bbelisebbuli, nae abana beeng'we baachiirusa nende obunyala bwa nanu? Sakira abeene abo nibo abacha ohubaheengera omusango.
Nae nindehoonyera omuhono kwa Nasae ohwirusa emisaambwa, mbawo mani Obwaami bwa Nasae bumalire ohuboolaho.
Nae omusaacha wamaani, oli nende ebilwaaniro bimala, mani yaalinda edooho lyae, ebiindu byae byoosi biba byeliindire bulai;
nae omuundu wundi omuhiraho amaani, namuseeta mani yamuyingira, amumalaho ebilwaaniro byae biyali niyesikire, akabaniamo abandu bandi ebiindu biyaba amuyayireho.
Oyo yeesi otaali hu luwaande lwaange, aba ali ohunyiingania, handi oyo otaali ohuhoonya ohubuusa alala, aba ali ohusakuula busa.

“Omusambwa mubi nikutula mu muundu, kukeenda nikwaambuhana esa enyiingi, nikukoonya abundu w'ohuwuluuhira; nae nikutabukaana obuwuluuhiro bwoosi, kwiicha kweboolera okweene kuti, ‘Njicha ohukaluha mu nyumba yange yindatulamo eyo.’
Mani nikukobola, kuyakaana niyeeyerwe handi niyitekeheebwe bulai.

Mani kucha kwaleeta emisaambwa chaasye chiindi chitaanu-na-chibiri echikuhiraho obubi, mani cheengira chamenya mu nyumba omwo; mani obulamu bw'omusaacha oyo bwiicha bwabiiya muno bwahiraho koti lubwali hale.”
Yesu niyaboola sino, omuhasi wundi musidiiyiha esyo, yahuumula mani yaboolera Yesu ati, “Yiri nende ehabi, enda yahukiinga, alala nende embeere chiwanuuna!”
Nae Yesu yaboola ati, “Bali nende ehabi abo bosi abawulira emboosi ya Nasae mani bayiholeraho!”

Nae ebidiiyiha by'abandu nibyali nibisyemeeda ohwiicha, Yesu yeecha yaboola ati, “Oluse luno, luse luholi lw'ebibi; lukonyeresa ahalolero, nae abulao ahalolero hacha ohubabeereswa ohutusaho ahalolero ha Yona.
Olwohuba koti lu Yona yeecha yaba ahalolero eyiri abandu bo mu Ninefe, nilwo busa koti lu Mwaana w'Omuundu achia ohuba eyiri oluse luno.

Omutuki muhasi ohutula Emwaalo we syaalo achia ohusiingira hu ludaalo lwohuheengeraho omusango, yeme nende abandu b'oluse luno mani abahengere omusango ohubahira; olwohuba yatula Emwaalo yi syaalo syaakama, yacha ohuwulira amakesi ka Solomooni, nae bone, ano aliwo esiindu esihirira elalira Solomooni.

Abasacha ba Ninefe bacha ohusiingira hu ludaalo lw'ohuheengeraho omusango, mani beeme nende abandu b'oluse luno mani babahengere omusango ohubahira; olwohuba, beyolobya nibawulira ohuyaala hwa Yona, nae bone, ano aliwo esiindu sihirira elalira Yona.
“Abulao omuundu yeesi owaambia etaara, mani yeecha yaalita mu liina, oba yaalifunihaho esimweero, nae alita hu siteeni syalyo, hubula abandu baba nibengira mu nyumba, banyale ohubona obulafu bwalyo.
Emoni yao niyo etaara ly'omubiri kwao; nae emoni yao eyo niyiri enamu, omubiri kwao kwoosi kuba kwichuule obulafu; nae emoni yao niyitaali enamu, omubiri kwao kwoosi kuba kwichuule esiirima.
Mani sakira mweliinde, obulafu bubalimo, buteehola esiirima.
Mani omubiri kwao kwoosi nikuba nikwichuule obulafu, nikutaaliho esituundu siri mu siirima, kwoosi kuba kucha ohuba omulafu, koti etaara lihuhosera nende obulafu bwalyo.”
Yesu niyali nasilomalomaanga atyo, Omufalisaayo wundi yeecha yaamusaba ache alye nae; mani Yesu yeecha yacha nae, yehala alye.
Nae Omufalisaayo oyo yesinduha muno ohubona ati Yesu haba siyesaaba mberi hu yeme alye.
Nae Omwaami yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Bulaanu, eng'we Abafalisaayo mwoosa busa humu Kulu w'esikoombe nende w'olusaani, nae mu myooyo cheeng'we bweene mwechula omuluulu nende ebibaaso bibi.
Abasiru eng'we! Mukaala muti, owahola humukulu oyo, siniye owahola mukati mwosi?
Nae muyaanire abaati ebiindu biri mukati w'esikoombe nende w'olusaani, mani abweene awo buli siindu sy'eng'we sichia ohuba esilafu syeene.

“Nae chibanyoolere eng'we Abafalisaayo! Olwohuba muyaana silala sy'ehumi sy'ebiindu koti ebisaari nende tangawusi, nende ebihwi biwunya esiing'aari, nae mweecha obwadyeeri nende ohudaha Nasae; ebiindu koti bino nibyo bimuba muhola nimutalekeresaho kata silala syosi.
Chibakaanire eng'we Abafalisaayo! olwohuba mudaha muno obwihalo buhiramo obulayi mu Sinagoogi cheeng'we nende ohuheeswa nende oluyaali lungi mu biito.
Chibakaanire eng'we! olwohuba muli koti ebiriindwa byakwalaala bitabonehana, mani abandu beecha baabiseenaho babibitaho nibataamanyire.”
Nae mulala hu beekesa ba malako yeecha yateeba Yesu ati, “Omweekesa, mu nolomaloma otyo, mbawo fwesi oba otunyeka.”

Nae Yesu yeecha yaboola ati, “Chibakaanire eng'we mwesi abekesa ba malako! olwohuba mudwiha abandu emikuku misito chitekiinga, nae eng'we abeene simunyala kata ohudiira hu mikuku echo n'olwala lw'eng'we lulala.
Chibakaanire eng'we! olwohuba muloonga ebiriindwa by'abanabbi ba seeng'we babeeta.
Mbao muli abajulisi, handi mufukiirisania nende ebiindu bi seeng'we abo bahola; olwohuba nibo ababeta, nae eng'we ning'we abaloonga ebiriindwa byaabwe.
Mani sakira Amakesi ka Nasae kosi kaboola kati, ‘Njia ohubatumira banabbi nende abatume, abandi hw'abo bacha ohwiitwa handi abandi bacha ohusaandisibwa,’
hu bulaanu amabaanga k'abanabbi boosi, akediswa ohutulira elalira hu huloongwa hw'esyaalo, kabaanjwe oluse luno,

ohutulira elalira hu mabaanga ka Abbeli ohwoola hu mabaanga ka Sakariya, oyo owasihira akati-kaati w'alutaari nende esifwo syolerefu muno esy'omunyumba ya Nasae. Eee, mbaboolera endi, amabaanga ako kacha ohubaanjwa oluse luno.
Chibakaanire eng'we abekesa ba malako! olwohuba mwabukula olufunguyo lw'olwiiki lw'amakesi; nae eng'we beene haba simwengira, handi mwekalira abo boosi abali nibengira.”
Nae Yesu niyali nasiingira nawawo, abandiiki ba malako nende Abafalisaayo beecha bachaaka ohumwikalirisania muno nende ebiteebo, nibamuhema yemeede ohulomaloma hu biindu biingi,
awo nibamwelindiriire, nisinyalihana bamudiirire hu siindu syanaboole syoosi.

Mu biha byeene ebyo, ebidiyiha by'abandu bangi muno byali bimalire ohwebuusa alala, abandu nibachaakire ohwesenanaho, Yesu yeecha yataangira ohuboolera abeeki bae ati, “Mweliinde amamera k'Abafalisaayo ak'obwebachirisi.
Abulao esiindu syoosi esyabwihwaho esitacha hubwihulwa, oba esyakiswa esitacha humanyihana.
Mani sakira esyo syoosi simwalomaloma mu siirima, sichia ohuwuliirihanira mu bulafu, handi esyo syoosi simwemoonyera mu nyumba, sichia ohulangirirwa hu birama by'enyumba.
“Mbaboolera obwadyeeri eng'we abeecha bange endi, mutatichaanga abo abeeta omubiri, nae nibamala batyo, sibulao esiindu syoosi sibanyala ohuhola.
Nae njia ohubalabula oyo yimuhoyeera ohutya: muticheenge oyo, omala ohwiita, oli nende obunyala bwohusukuna mu muliro kutasima; eee, mbaboolera endi, mutye oyo!
Obubbiichu butaanu, haba sibukulwaanga obuhela bubiri bwong'ene? Nae abulao kata hala hw'otwo ahebirirwanga mu moni wa Nasae.
Lwasiina, kata efwiiri ly'ohumutwe kwao lyoosi, lyamala ohubalwa. Mutatya daawe; eng'we mulimo obuhala obuungi muno ohuhira obubbiichu bungi.
“Handi mbaboolera endi, buli muundu yeesi owufukiirira mu moni w'abandu, Omwaana w'Omuundu yesi aba achia ohumufukiirira mu moni wa bamalaika ba Nasae;
nae oyo owundekaana mu moni w'abandu, achia ohwekaanibwa mu moni wa bamalaika ba Nasae.
Handi muundu yeesi, olomaloma emboosi bubi hu Mwaana w'Omuundu achia ohuleherwamo; nae oyo yeesi ofwoola Mwooyo Mwolerefu, haba saachia huleherwamo daawe.

Nae nibabaletaanga mu moni wa buli Sinagoogi nende mu nomi w'abeemirisi, kata nende mu moni wa b'obunyala bakabuhaane, mutelalihiriraanga eby'ohukobolamo nende engeri y'ohukobolamo, oba ebyohulomaloma;
olwohuba Mwooyo Mwolerefu aba achia ohubeekesa esiha syeene esyo eby'ohulomaloma.”
Olwoola, mulala hu bandu bali musidiiyiha yeecha yaboolera Yesu ati, “Omweekesa, boolera mwaanama akabane naange ebiindu bi hwalaamirwa.”
Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Wasyaange, wiina owataao ohuba omukayi weng'we oba omukabi w'ebiindu byeeng'we?”
Mani Yesu yababoolera ati, “Mweliinde, handi mwekae obwekoombi bwoosi; olwohuba obulamu bw'omuundu sibweema hu bungi bw'obuyiinda bwae.”
Mani Yesu yabakaadira olukaado naboola ati, “Olwoola, endaalo y'omusaacha wundi munyali, yeecha yaama bulai muno;
mani omusaacha oyo yeecha yabaasa mu mwooyo kwae ati, ‘Ndaahole endye, olwohuba mbula abundu w'ohuteera ebirime byaange?’

Mani yaboola ati, ‘Bulaanu sino nisyo siinjia ohuhola: Njia ohukwiisa ebyaaki byaange byoosi, mani male nyombahe ebihoongo bihira hoo; mani omwo nimwo munja ohuteera emere yange alala nende obuyiinda bwaange bwoosi.
Mani niimala endyo njia ohuboolera omwooyo kwaange endi, Bulamu ewe, mbawo oli nende ebiindu biyera ebihubihiirwe ohumala emyaaka emiingi muno; mani otelalihira, lya, ng'wa, mani osangaale.’
Nae Nasae yeecha yamuboolera ati, ‘Omusiru wuno! Esiro syeene sino obulamu bwao, bucha ohuhutusibwaho; mani ebiindu biwabiiha bino byoosi, bicha ohuba ebya wiina?’
Mani nilwo lwali oyo yeesi, owebuungira omweene obunyali bwae, nae saali omunyali mu moni wa Nasae.”
Bulaanu, Yesu yeecha yaboolera abeeki bae ati, “Sakira mbaboolera endi, mutelalihiriraanga eby'obulamu bw'eng'we, bimunaalye, oba ebidiira hu mibiri cheeng'we, nende eby'ohwefwaala.
Olwohuba obulamu buhira ebyohulya, nae omubiri kwosi kuhira eby'ohwefwaala.
Mubonereho hu mahoofwa: haba sikawaanya kata sikakesa, sikali nende ewohubiihamo ebiindu, kata ebyaaki, nae bone Nasae akaliisa. Nae obuhala bw'eng'we sibuhira muno amayoni ako!
Nae wiina hweeng'we hulw'ohwelalihira hwae, onyala ohumeeda hu bulamu bwae bwaaba obuleeyi hooho?
Nikali mbwe eng'we simunyala ohuhola esiindu sidiidi sityo, lwasiina mwelalihira hulw'ebiindi bidong'ereyo?

Mubonereho hu bimuli by'omusiino, koti lubihula; haba sibihola mirimo oba engubo ch'ohwefwaala; nae mbahoolera endi, kata Solomooni, mu luyaali lwae lwoosi, haba siyanyala ohwefwaala yetiha ohwaakana nende silala hu bimuli bino.
Nae nikali mbwe Nasae anyala ohufwaasa busa obunyaasi bwo mu siino obubao olwaleero, nae muchuli busukunwa mu muliro ohusambwa, nae aba yahaake ena ohubafwaasa, Aaa eng'we ab'efukiirira ndiidi!
Mani sakira mutekonyereseraanga eby'ohulya nende eby'ohung'wa kata ohubechaanga nende ebibaaso byohwelalihira.
Olwohuba ebyaalo byohusyaalo huno byoosi, bikonyeresa busa ebiindu bino; nae Seeng'we amanyire ati mwesi mubidaha.
Mani musifwo sy'ebyo, eng'we mukoonyerese Obwaami bwae, mani ebiindu bino byosi biba bicha ohuba ebyeng'we.
“Mutatya daawe, eng'we baana bange, olwohuba Seeng'we musangaafu ohubabeeresa Obwaami.
Mukuse obunyali bweeng'we, mukabire abamanani; mwefunire emifuuko chitakofula, nende obunyali buli Mukulu obutanyaasiha, yi mwiibi yeesi atanyala ohwoola, handi bu mbungi chitanyala ohunyaasa.
Olwohuba yi mwaandu kwao kuba, awo niwo yi mwooyo kwao kwosi kuba.
“Mwefwaalire elalira, handi mulehe amataara keeng'we nikaaduha,
mani mube koti abahalaabani beetekefu baliindire omwaami waabwe ohukobola ango natula hu sidyaalo sy'obweeya, banyale ohumwikulirao olwiiki bwaangu niyoola busa ati yahong'oonda.

Bali nende ehabi abahalaabani abo ba mwaami waabwe yeecha yakaana nibali abetekefu; mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, aba achia ohweboya bulai, mani ababoole behale hu meesa ohulya, mani omweene yeeche abakabule.
Nikali mbwe yeecha mu saa y'ohubiri, oba mu y'ohudatu, mani yabakaana nibali batyo, abahalaabani abo baba bali nende ehabi!
Nae muhoyeere ohumanya sino muti, omweene nyumba aba niyamanya ebiha byeene bi mwiibi yecheramo, aba yahaya ohuleha enyumba yae yahalakwa yengirwamo.
Mani eng'we mwesi, muhoyeere ohuba abetekefu; olwohuba Omwaana w'omuundu achia ohwiicha mu siha syatabasirisirwamo.”
Peetero yeecha yaboola ati, “Omwaami, olukaado luno, oli ohulukaadira efwe, kose abandu boosi?”
Nae Omwaami yaboola ati, “Muliindi siina omwesikwa handi omukesi, yi mwaami wae yahadiisa edaala lyae, nende ohukabulira abandu bamwo omukabo kwaabwe mu biha bihoyeere?
Ali nende ehabi omuhalaabani oyo, yi mwaami wae yeecha yamwakaana naahola esyo syahoyeere ohuhola.
Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, aba achia ohumudiisa ebiindu byae boosi.

Nae omuhalaabani oyo niyeecha yeboolera omweene ati, ‘Mbao ngandi omwaami wange achia ohuhiinda ohwiicha,’ mani yachaaka ohuhuya abahalaabani basye basaacha nende abahasi, mani yachaaka ohulya nende ohung'wa mani yaameera,
omwaami w'omuhalaabani oyo achia ohwiicha hu ludaalo lu muhalaabani oyo atamubasirisiramo handi hu siha syatamanyire, mani aba achia ohumusaandia, mani amale amute alala nende abataali abesikwa.
Nae omuhalaabani oyo owamanya si mwaami wae adaha, nae yahaya ohwetekeha, kata ohuhola koti lu mwaami wae adaha, achia ohutoochwa muno.

Nae omuhalaabani oyo owali nataamanyire si mwaami wae adaha, mani yahola esyo esyahakera yahuywa, aba achia ohuhuywa budiidi. Buli muundu yeesi, obereswa ebiindu biingi, achia ohudahibwaho ebiingi; nae oyo yibabihisa ebiindu biingi, bacha ohumubaanja ebiingi.
“Ese ndeecha ohuwaambya omuliro hu syaalo; handi kuba kwamala ohuwaamba!
Ndi nende embatiisa yihoyeere ohubatisibwamo; handi sinjuuna muno ohwoola lu syaholereere!
Mubaasa muti ese ndeecha ohuleeta emireembe hu syaalo? Haba bbe, mbaboolera endi, ndeecha ohuleeta ohukabuhana;
mani ohutula bulaanu nende ohwemdeeda mu moni, mu nyumba ndala y'abandu bataanu, mucha ohubaamo ohukabuhana, badatu bacha ohukabuha hu babiri, handi babiri bakabuhe hu badatu;

abandu bacha ohukabuhanamo, simwaana akabuhane nende omusyaani wae, omusyaani akabuhane nende simwaana, ng'ina akabuhane nende omuhaana wae, handi omuhaana akabuhaane nende ng'ina, masaala akabuhaane nende muhomusyani wae, muhomusyani akabuhaane nende masaalang'ene.”
Yesu handi yeecha yaboolera esidiiyiha sy'abandu esyo ati, “Eng'we nimubona esireesi nisisingiriire emumbo, mubolaanga bwaangu-bwaangu muti, ‘Efula mbawo yicha’; mani nibiba bityo.
Nae nimubona omuyaka kutulira emwaalo nikuwucha, mubolaanga muti, ‘Omubasu kw'amaani kucha ohufwa’; mani nibiba bityo busa.
Abebachirisi eng'we! Mumanyire bulai muno ohutotola emboneha y'esyaalo, nende ey'ekulu; nae lwasiina haba simumanyire ohutotola ebiha bya bulaanu bino?
“Nae lwasiina abeene simunyala ohweheengerao esiba nisihoyera ohuholwa?

Nooba nooli ohuchia nende ohuyingania eyiri omukayi, teemaho koti lwonyala, owuliirisaanie nae nimusiiri hu ngira, ataali awo, achia ohuhuhwehweesa ahwose eyiri omukayi, mani omukayi oyo amale ahudiise omusirikaari muhoongo, nae omusikaari oyo amale ahusukune mu mboye.
Mbaboolera endi, haba sochia ohutulamo nosisiiri ohutungira elalira ehela yihenerehayo.”
Esiha syeene esyo, waliwo abandu bandi ababoolera Yesu ebidiira hu Bagalilaaya ba Pilaato yasasaania amabaanga kaabwe nende ebiyaanwa byaabwe bibali bayirira Nasae.
Nae Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Mubaasa muti Abagalilaaya bano bali abaholi be bibi ohuhiraho Abagalilaaya bandi hu beemeo basaandisibwe batyo?
Mbaboolera endi, haba daawe; nae ohutusaho nimuteyolobya mwesi mucha ohusihirira mutyo.
Oba, abandu ehumi-na-bataanu-na-badatu ba omunara kwe Siloamu kwakwaho mani kweta, mubaasa muti bali abaholi be bibi muno ohuhiraho abandu bandi boosi abali bamenya mu Yerusaalemu?
Mbaboolera endi, Haba daawe; nae nimuteeyolobya, mwesi mucha ohusihirira mutyo.”

Mani Yesu yeecha yabakaadira olukaado luno ati, “Waliwo omusaacha wundi owataaka omusaala kw'enduli mu ndalo yae; olwoola omusaacha oyo yeecha nakoonyaho ebyaamo, nae yahaya ohwakaanaho esyaamo syoosi.

Mani omusaacha oyo yeecha yalaanga omulimi w'endaalo eyo, yamuboolera ati, ‘Aaa, ndaheecha ano emyaaka chidatu chino choosi ningonyaanga hu mutuli kuno esyaamo, nae haba sinyolaangaho esiindu syoosi. Mani bulaanu kuteme kukwe aasi; olwohuba simbona esikera nikuchiiririra ohunyaasa eloba lino?’
Nae omulimi oyo yeecha yamukobolamo namuboolera ati, ‘Omuhulundu, kulehe kubeo omwaaka kuno kwosi, ngwaakeho mu sisina kwebodoohanie, male kuteeho embolera.
Mani nikwichuhana kwaamaho omwaaka kwiicha, siba sinaba esilai; nae nikuhaya ohwaamaho, bulaanu onyala ohukutema kukwa aasi.’ ”
Olwoola, Yesu yali niyeekesa mu Sinagoogi yindi hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato.

Mani mubweene omwo, mwalimo omuhasi wundi wali aliho omusaambwa kwamulemya hulwa embaka ye myaka ehumi-na-chitaanu-na-chidatu emilaamba; yali niyefuumbamo omukoongo, natanyala kata ohweema nakololoohe.
Mani Yesu niyamubona ati, yamulaanga mani yamuboolera ati, “Muhasi-ng'ene, omalire ohuwonisibwa obulema bwao.”
Mani Yesu yeecha yamwiisaho amahono kae, mani abweene-na-bweene awo, ni omuhasi oyo akololoha, mani yachaaka ohufumia Nasae.

Nae omwimirisi wa Sinagoogi eyo, yeecha yechula etima liingi olwohuba Yesu yali awonisye hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato, mani yeecha yaboolera abandu ati, “Aliwo endaalo chisaasaba echihoyeere ohuholerwaho emirimo; mani mwiicheenge hu ndaalo echo muwonisibwa, nae mutechaanga hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato.”
Nae Omwaami yeecha yamukobolamo ati, “Abebachirisi eng'we! Mweng'we mweesi, naanu otaboololaanga eng'oombe yae kata esuhiri yae hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato ayitusa mu sidwooli, mani ayiyira ohung'wa?
Nae omuhasi wuno, omuhaana wa Yibbulaimu, yi Sitaani yaboya hu lwa embaka ye myaka ehumi-na-chitaanu-na-chidatu emilaamba, haba sahoyera ohuboololwa obuboye buno, hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato?”
