Mani Yesu niyalomaloma sino, abasuku bae boosi esoni chabadiira muno; nae abandu baliwo boosi bachaaka ohwehoya hu lw'ebiindu by'oluyaali byoosi bi Yesu yali naaholere.
Mani Yesu yeecha yaboola ati, “Obwaami bwa Nasae bufwaanana nende siina? Handi ndaabukeraanisye hu siina syeene?

Bufwaanana nende olumwo lw'omutuumba lu muundu wundi yabukula yacha yataaka mu ndalo yae; mani lweechula lwahula, lwehola omusaala muhoongo, mani amayoni kabburuha keecha koombaha ebiswi mu masaga kakwo.”
Yesu yeecha handi yahuboola ati, “Siina syeene sindaakeraanieho Obwaami bwa Nasae?
Bufwaanana nende amamera ka omuhasi wundi yabukula mani yaacha yasaasa mu bikero by'obusye bidatu, ohwoola lu bwoosi bweecha bwebbaaha bwafwiimba bulai.”
Yesu yeecha yakenda naabitira mu biko nende mu ngoongo, niyeekesaanga, handi naali hulukendo naachia e Yerusaalemu.
Mani omuundu wundi yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Omwaami, abandu bacha ohuwonisibwa bahabe busa abayeranu?” Mani Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati,
“Muteemeho muno ohwingirira mu mulyaango mudiiyu; olwohuba mbaboolera endi, abandu bangi bacha oteemaho ohwingira nae haba sibachia hunyala.

Mani omwenengo niyahasiingire, mani yekalawo olwiiki, mucha ohweema erwaanyi muchaake ohuhong'oonda hu lwiiki nimuboola muti, ‘Omwaami, twiikulireo.’ Nae achia ohubakobolamo ati, ‘Ese haba siimanyire yimutula daawe.’
Nae mwahachaake ohuboola muti, ‘Efwe hwalichaanga handi hwang'wechaanga mu moni wao, handi weekesaanga mu makira keefwe.’
Nae achia ohuboola ati, ‘Mbaboolera endi, ese haba siimanyire yimutula daawe; mumbweere-eyi, eng'we mweesi abaholi be bibi!’
Eyo niyo yimucha ohulirira nimweesia ameeno, nimubona Yibbulaimu nende Yisaka nende Yakobbo nende banabbi boosi mu Bwaami bwa Nasae nae eng'we abeene nimusukuunwe erwaanyi.
Mani bandu bahatule ebukwe nende emumbo, handi nende emu Kulu nende emwaalo, mani beehala hu meesa mu Bwaami bwa Nasae.
Mani bone, aliwo abandu baheneerehayo bulaanu abacha ohutangiramo, handi aliwo abatangiramo bulaanu, abacha ohuba ohuheneerehayo.”
Esiha syeene esyo, Abafalisaayo bandi beecha, mani baboolera Yesu bati, “Tula ano oweeo, olwohuba Herode adaha ohuhwiita.”
Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Muchie muboolere ebbwe eryo muti, ‘Bona, ese njirusa emisaambwa handi monia abandu olwaleero nende muchuli, nae oludaalo lw'ohudatu maliiririsa omulimo kwaange.
Nae kata katyo ndi nende ohuchiiririra nende biindi ohuhola, olwaleero nende muchuli, nende oludaalo luloondaho; olwohuba sisinyalihana ohuba mbwe, omunabbi afwiira erwaanyi w'esiko sye Yerusaalemu.’

Eee eng'we abe Yerusaalemu, ohwiitaanga banabbi nende ohuhuyaanga amakina abo ababa nibabatumiirwe! Ndahaake ena ohubuusa alala abana beeng'we koti lu ngoho yibuusanga obumwiinyu bwayo mu mbaya chayo, nae haba simunyaliha daawe!
Bone, enyumba yeng'we yebwabirwe. Handi mbaboolera endi simuchia ohumbonaho, ohwoola lu mwahaboolere muti, ‘Ali nende ehabi oyo owiicha mu liita ly'Omwaami!’ ”
Olwoola, hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato lundi, Yesu yeecha yacha mu nyumba ya mulala hu bemirisi Bafalisaayo, nae niyali naalya, abandu bandi beecha bachaaka ohumwewunja.
Mani bone, omusaacha wundi owali niyafwiimba amakulu nende amahono yeecha yi Yesu ali.
Mani Yesu yeecha yaalomaloma nende abekesa ba malako nende Abafalisaayo naboola ati, “Mani sifukiirirwa ohuwonia hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato, kose haba?”
Nabo bawuleera busa. Mani Yesu yeecha yabukula omusaacha oyo, mani yamuwonia, mani yaamuleha yawaawo.
Mani Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Wiina mweene hweeng'we, oli nende omwaana wae, oba esurusi yae, eyiba niyikwiire mu buko, otatulaniramo yacha yamuhwesa yamutusamo hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato?”
Nabo sibanyala ohumukobolamo mu sino.
Bulaanu, Yesu niyabona engeri yi bakeni balaange bali bedooleremo obwihalo bw'oluyaali luhoongo, yeecha yabakaadira olukaado nababoolera ati,
“Nooba nolaangirwe hu sidyaalo sy'obweeya, otachichaanga wihala mu sifwo sy'oluyaali luhoongo muno, olwohuba oyo ohulaangire anyala ohuba nalaangire omuundu wundi ohuhirira elalira oluyaali;
mani oyo obalaangire mwembi anyala ohwiicha yahuboolera ati, ‘Ewe yikulira wuno esifwo esyo,’ mani bulaanu ochia ohudiirwa esoni nosiingira nochia ohwihala mu sifwo sy'oluyaali lwa aasi muno.

Nae nooba nolangirwe, chichaanga wihala mu sifwo sy'oluyaali lwa aasi muno, hu bulaanu obalaangire niyeecha, anyale ohuhuboolera ati, ‘Mwiicha wange, siingira ochie wihale akulu’; mani oba ochia ohufuna oluyaali mu moni w'abandu boosi ababa nibehaale naawe hu meesa.
Olwohuba buli muundu weniinia omweene achia ohuloongoyaswa, nae oyo oweloongoyasa omweene, achia ohuniinisibwa.”

Yesu yeecha yaboolera omuundu wali amulaangire yesi ati, “Nooba nokabula abandu ohulya oba hu sidyaalo, otalangaanga abeecha bao, kose bamwaanaamao, kose abanaluya bao, kose abasibirana naawe banyali, olwohuba bano bosi banyala ohuhulaanga oludaalo lundi, mani bahutunga.
Nae nooba nokabula esidyaalo, langaanga abamanani, nende abadiimbe, nende abalema, nende abawofu,
mani awo niwo yocha ohufunira ehabi, olwohuba abo haba sibanyala huhutunga. Ochia ohutungwa hu ludaalo lu boolerefu bacha ohusyuuhiraho.”
Nae bulaanu mulala hu bandu bali nibehaale nende Yesu hu meesa, niyawulira sino yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Ali nende ehabi oyo owahalye omugaati mu Bwaami bwa Nasae!”
Nae Yesu yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Olwoola, omusaacha wundi yeecha yakabula esidyaalo sihoongo muno, mani yalaanga abandu bangi muno ohwiicha.
Mani esiha sy'esidyaalo nisyoola, yeecha yaatuma omuhalaabani wae ache aboolere abandu bali balaangirwe ati, ‘Mwiiche; olwohuba buli siindu sidahibwa simalire ohutekehwa.’
Nae boosi beecha bachaaka buli mulala ohwelira-bwelira. Owataangira yamuboolera ati, ‘Ese bulaanu hu ngulire omukunda, mani hoyeere njie kuboneho; hwekongooyere muno wundeheremo obuteecha.’
Handi owundi yeecha yaboola ati, ‘Ese bulaanu hundaakulire busa eng'ombe chirima emikoondo chitaanu, mani hoyeere njie mbone koti lu chirima; mani hwekongooyere muno wundeheremo obuteecha.’
Handi owundi yeecha yaboola ati, ‘Ese bulaanu hundadehiisye omuhasi, mani haba sinyala ohwiicha.’

Mani omuhalaabani oyo yeecha yaakobola mani yaboolera omwaami wae atyo. Mani etima lyeecha lyadiira omwenengo oyo mani yaboolera omuhalaabani wae oyo ati, ‘Cha bwaangu hu makira nende hu myanda chiri mu siko sihoongo, mani oleete abamanani, nende abadiimbe, nende abaofu, nende abalema.’
Mani omuhalaabani oyo yeecha yaboola ati, ‘Omuhulundu, ebyo byoosi biwumboleere ohuhola, mbyosereese endyo, nae handi obweyaango bundi busidong'ereo.’
Nae omwaami oyo yeecha yaboolera omuhalaabani oyo ati, ‘Tula mani ochie hu ngira hoongo choosi, nende otukira tudiidi twoosi, mani oleete abandu beengire bechule enyumba yange.
Olwohuba ewe huboolera endi, abulao omuundu yeesi hu bandu bali balaangirwe ochia ohuhoombaho hu sidyaalo syaange.’ ”
Bulaanu, ebidiyiha bihoongo biindi byeecha byachaana nende Yesu; mani yeecha yakaluhaana yababoolera ati,

“Omuundu yeesi owiicha yindi, saanyala ohuba omweeki wange ohutusaho nga atangire mberi ohusyuula simwaana mweene nende ng'ina nende omuhasi wae, nende abaana bae, nende ba mwaanang'ina, nende ba mboochong'ene, eee, nende kata obulamu bwae bweene.
Oyo yeesi otanyala ohukinga omusalabba kwae kweene, mani yanoonda, haba saanyala ohuba omweeki wange.

Olwohuba, wiina mweene hweeng'we, oba nadaha ohwombaha omunara, otataangira mberi yehala aasi, mani yabaliirira obuungi bw'ebiindu bidahibwa, yabona oba ali nende ebiindu bimala ohwombaha omunara kwawa?
Ataali awo, naamala ohwombaha omuse, mani byeecha byamuhaya ohumaliirisa, abo boosi abakubona, baba bacha ohumucheha,
nibaboola bati, ‘Omuundu wuno yachaaka ohwombaha nae siyanyala ohumaliirisa.’

Oba mutuki siina, oba naachia ohulwaana nende omutuki wundi, atatangira mberi yehala aasi, yabaliira bulai naali nende abalwaani emitwaalo ehumi nanyala ohuyingira oyo omuseeta nende abalwaani emitwaalo amahumi kabiri?
Mani naabona ati sibinyaliha, atuma bawamwaanda basabe ohuwuliirisania babe nende emireembe, omutuki waasye oyo nasisiiri eyale muno.
Mani sakira, oyo yeesi mweng'we otebwaaba byoosi byali nabyo, saanyala ohuba omweeki wange.
“Omuunyu mulai nikwo; nae omuunyu nikuwaamo echamu lyaakwo, kunyala ohukaluswamo kutye echamu elyo?
Kubula obuhoonyi bwoosi hu loba, oba hu mbolera yosi; kusukunwa busa eyale. Oyo oli nende amatwi kawulira, leha awulire.”
Olwoola, abatoosa b'emisolo nende abaholi be bibi boosi bachaaka ohwiicha eyiri Yesu ohuwulira bi yekesa.
Nae Abafalisaayo nende abandiiki bamalako beecha bachaaka ohweng'ulung'uunya nibaboola bati, “Omusaacha wuno yakaanira abaholi be bibi handi yaalya nabo.”
Mani Yesu yeecha yabakaadira olukaado luno ati,

“Muundu siina hw'eng'we, oba nende amakoondi kae emia ndala, mani lala hwaako lyeecha lyakota, otahalehao amahumi kataanu-na-kane nende kataanu-na-kane kala mu saa, mani yacha yakoonya lala lira eliba nilikotere, ohwoola lwalyakaana?
Mani naamala ohulyakaana, alikinga yaalita hu mabeka kae, niyehoya.
Nae niyoola engo, alaanga abeecha bae alala nende abaasye, nababoolera ati, ‘Mwiiche hwehoyere alala, olwohuba malire ohwakaana ekoondi lyaange libeere likotere.’

Mbaboolera endi, mu ngeri nasilala yityo, nilwo lu mwehoyo mungi kucha ohuba Mukulu hu lw'omuholi we bibi mulala oweyolobya ohuhira abandu balungifu amahumi kataanu-na-kane nende bataanu-na-bane abatadaha ohweyolobya.
“Oba muhasi siina, oba nende eseende mwaamwa ch'efeesa ehumi, mani yaakosa emwaamwa ndala, otawaambya etaara, yeya bulai bweene enyumba yoosi nakoonya, ohwoola lwayakaana?
Mani naamala ohuyakaana, alaanga abecha bae alala nende abaasye, naboola ati, ‘Mwiiche hwehoyere alala, olwohuba njakaanire eseende y'emwaamwa yange eyali niyikotere.’
Mbaboolera endi, mu ngeri nasilala yityo, niyo lu bamalaika ba Nasae lubehoyera omuholi we bibi mulala oweyolobya.”
Yesu handi yaboola ati, “Olwoola, waliwo omusaacha wundi owali nende abasyaani bae babiri;
mani omusyaani muyere yeecha yaboolera simwaana ati, ‘Bbaabba, mberese esiha sino omukabo kwaange kw'obuyiinda kuwahambereese nofwiire.’ Mani saabwe yeecha yabakabaniamo obuyiinda bwae.

Nae endaalo endiidi muno nichabitao, omusyaani muyere oyo yabuusa alala ebiindu biyali nabyo byoosi, mani yadiira olukeendo yacha mu syaalo sy'eyale muno, mani yachakia-chakira eyo obuyiinda bwae bwoosi mu bulamu bw'ohuchakala.
Mani niyamala ohuhosesa buli siindu siyali nasyo, enjala nyiingi muno yeecha yaakwawo mu syaalo esyo, ohwoola luyadoong'a naabulaho esiindu syoosi.
Mani yeecha yacha yaamenya nende mulala hu bandu bo musyaalo esyo, owamutuma ache mu mikuunda chae amulisire embiichi.
Yoola ohwekoomba ohulya ebyoola bi mbiichi chalichaanga; nae abulao omuundu yeesi owamuberesa esiindu syoosi.
Nae niyekaluhaho, yabaasa omweene naboola ati, ‘Nae baanga hu bahalaabani ba Bbaabba yapangisa abali nende emigaati chibalya handi chadoong'aho, nae ese ndi ohufwiira ano enjala!
Ese njia ohusiingira mani njie eyiri Bbaabba, mani njia ohumuboolera endi, Bbaabba, ndakosa mu moni w'Ekulu nende mu moni wao;
Sisihoyera ohulaangwa, omwaana wao; nae mbukule busa koti mulala hu bahalaabani bao bapangise.’ ”
Mani yasingira mani yeecha eyiri simwaana. Nae niyali nasisiiri eyale, simwaana yamubona mani yaamukwiira esisa, mani yeruha yacha yamubukaanira yaamukwa mu sirifu.
Nae omusyaani oyo yamuboolera ati, “Bbaabba, ndakosa mu moni w'Ekulu nende mu moni wao; Sisihoyera ohulaangwa omwaana wao.”
Nae simwaana yaboolera abahalaabani bae ati, “Muleete bwaangu engubo yihiramo obulayi, mani mumufwase; handi mumuteeho engila hu muhono, handi mumufwase ebiraato mu makulu;
mani muche muleete eng'ombe nginu muyiite, mani lehe hulye hwesangaase;
olwohuba omwaana wange wuno yali yafwa, nae bulaanu mulamu; yali yakota, nae bulaanu abonehane.” Mani bachaaka ohwesangaasa.
“Nae bulaanu, omusyaani wae muhuluundu yali naali mumukuunda; mani niyali naakobola, yoola aambi nende edaala, yeecha yawulira abandu nibeemba handi nibahina.
Mani yeecha yalaanga mulala hu bahalaabani yamuteeba ati, ‘Siina syeene esikwiireo?’
Nae yamuboolera ati, ‘mwaanamaao yeechere, mani lataao amwitiire eng'ombe nginu, olwohuba amwakaanire naali omulamu abweene.’
Nae yeecha yaanyoolera muno, mani yahaya ohwingira mudaala. Nae simwaana yeecha yaatula erwaanyi yacha yamwekweeda yengire,

nae yakobola mu simwaana ati, ‘Bonaho, huhalaabaniire busa emyaaka chino choosi, handi kata sindatenguyiraho amalako kao; nae osisiiri kata ohumbaaho busa ahameeme hong'ene, nyale ohwesangaasaho nende abeecha bange.
Nae omusyaani wao wuno, owanyaasa omwaandu kwao nende abacheke niyeechere, ewe omwiitire eng'ombe nginu!’
Nae yamuboolera ati, ‘mwaana wange, buli siha oli naange ano, mani ebiindu byaange byoosi byao nibyo.
Mani sibeere esilai muno hwesangaase handi hwehoye, olwohuba mwaanamaao wuno yali yafwa, nae bulaanu mulamu; yali yakota, nae bulaanu abonehane.’ ”

Yesu handi yaboolera abeeki bae ati, “Olwoola, waliwo omusaacha munyali wundi owali nende omuliindi wae, mani abandu bandi beecha bamwekanyiisira muno ebidiira hu musaacha wuno, nibaboola bati, yali anyaasa-nyaasa emyaandu chae.

Mani omusaacha munyali yeecha yalaanga omuliindi oyo, mani yamuboolera ati, ‘Siina syeene sino siindi ohuhuwuliraho? Mberese embaliirira y'obuliindi bwao, olwohuba sochia huba handi omuliindi w'ebiindu byaange.’

Mani omuliindi oyo yeecha yaboola omweene mu mwooyo kwae ati, ‘Ndaahole siina syeene, olwohuba omwaami wange mbano achia ohumalaho omulimo kw'obuliindi? Ese mbula amaani k'ohulima, handi ohwesabirisa hunyaambya esoni.
Heengereo esy'ohuhola, hu bandu bandi banyale ohumbukaanira mu madaala kaabwe, nibanjiruuse hu mulimo kw'obuliindi kuno.’
Mani yeecha yalangaanga buli muundu yeesi owali nende ekobi ly'omwaami wae syamulala-mulala, mani yeecha yaboolera owataangira ati, ‘Omwaami wange ahubaanja siina?’
Nae naboola ati, ‘Ebikero emia ndala eby'amafuta.’ Nae omuliindi oyo yeecha yamuboolera ati, ‘Mani bukula obwandiike bw'efukiirisania yao, mani wihale aasi bwaangu, wandiike ebikero amahumi kataanu.’

Handi yeecha yamuboolera owundi ati, ‘Nae ewe obaanjwa siina?’ Nae yamuboolera ati, ‘Ebikero emia ndala by'eng'aano.’ Omuliindi oyo yeecha yamuboolera ati, ‘Mani bukula obwandiike bw'efukiirisania yao, omale wandiike amahumi kataanu-na-kadatu.’

Omwaami oyo yeecha yaasiima muno omuliindi otaali nende obwesikwa wuno hulw'obukesi-kesi bwae obwo; olwohuba abana b'esyaalo sino bakesi-kesi muno mu ngeri yibadiiraniramo nende oluse lwaabwe ohuhira abana b'obulafu.
Mani sakira mbaboolera endi, mwehoonyere mammona chitaali enungifu, ohwewaambira abeecha mani ebiha nibyoola chabawaaho, banyala baabakaanira mwaba mu bumenyo butaakama.
“Oyo yeesi oba omwesikwa mu biindu bidiidi muno aba anaba omwesikwa mu biingi byosi; nae oyo otaali omwesikwa mu biindu bidiidi muno, haba saaba achia ohuba omwesikwa mu biindu biingi byosi.
Mani nikali mbwe haba soobeere omwesikwa mu mammona chitaali enungifu, wiina mweene ochia ohuhubiihisa obunyali bwadyeeri?
Handi nikali mbwe soobeere omwesikwa mu biindu by'owundi, wiina ochia ohuhubeeresa ebiindu byao byeene?

Abulao omuhalaabani onyala ohuhalaabanira abaami babiri; olwohuba achia ohusyuula mulala nae aheere owundi, oba aba achia ohwiisa oluyaali mu mulala nae alekerese owundi. Mani sonyala ohuhalaabanira Nasae nende mammona.”
Abafalisaayo abali baheera muno eseende, nibawulira bino byoosi, beecha bechusuula muno Yesu.

Nae Yesu yeecha ababoolera ati, “Eng'we ning'we abelyooya abeene mu moni w'abandu, nae Nasae amanyire emyooyo cheeng'we koti luchiri; olwohuba esyo si bandu bakinia, siwumamo obuhoonyi mu moni wa Nasae.

“Amalako ka Musa nende obwandiike bw'abanabbi byali nibyo ebiri nende obunyala ohwoola hu Yowaana; nae ohutula awo, Emboosi Ndai y'Obwaami bwa Nasae yiri ohuyaalwa, mani buli muundu ali ohubwiingiraangamo nende esirifu.
Nae syaangu muno Ekulu nende esyaalo ohuwao, ohuhira kata ahatonyese halala hong'ene ah'amalako ka Musa ohunyaasibwa.
“Omuundu yeesi owirusa omuhasi wae, mani yadeehya owundi, aba aholere obucheke, handi oyo yeesi odeehya omuhasi waloba omusaacha, yesi aba ahola obucheke.
“Olwoola, waliwo omusaacha munyali wundi, owali yefwalaanga engubo ch'oluyaali muno nende ech'elaasi ndayi muno, handi owalichaanga bulai buli ludaalo.
Nae omusaacha mumanani, olaangwa Lasaaro, owali yechula amakoonjo hu mubiri, yeyalisanga hu siruwa sy'omusaacha munyali oyo.
Lasaaro wuno, yekombanga ohulyaaho ebyohulya byali nibilakahaanga aasi ohutula hu meesa y'omusaacha munyali oyo; handi embwa chechaanga mani nichihomberera amakoonjo kae ako.
Omusaacha mumanani oyo yeecha yafwa, mani yaakiingwa nende bamalaika bamuyira yehala mu makulu ka Yibbulaimu. Omusaacha munyali oyo yesi yeecha yafwa, mani yaasiihwa;
mani niyali nasaandisibwa muno emakoombe, yeecha yaasingisa emoni chae, mani yabona Yibbulaimu naali eyale muno, handi Lasaaro niyehaale mu makulu kae.

Mani yeecha yahuumula nalaanga ati, ‘Lata Yibbulaimu, ngwiire esisa, mani otume Lasaaro, yeenihe mu maachi olwala lwae mani yeeche anyiseho olulimi lwaange; olwohuba ndi mubuchuuni bungi muno mu muliro kuno.’

Nae Yibbulaimu yaboola ati, ‘Musyaani ng'ene, yichulisa oti, mu bulamu bwao hu syaalo, wanyoola ebiindu bilai byao; Lasaaro nae yanyoola ebiindu bibi; nae bulaanu ali mu bulamu buyenjeefu ano, naawe oli mu buchuuni bungi muno.

Nae notusireho bino byoosi, akati-kaati w'efwe naawe, bataawo ehoondo ndakalafu muno, ohukayira abo boosi abahabitire ohutula eno nibeecha yimuli, handi abulewo oyo yeesi onyala ohuhalakania ohutula eyo ohwiicha yihuli.’
Nae yeecha yaboola ati, ‘Mani Lata hwekweeda, otume Lasaaro ache engo weefwe,
olwohuba ndi nende ba mwaanama bataanu, ache abalabule, bosi bateecha mu sifwo sy'ohusaandisibwa sino.’
Nae Yibbulaimu yamuboolera ati, ‘Abo bali nende Musa alala nende abanabbi; leha babawulire.’
Nae yaboola ati, ‘Haba daawe, Lata Yibbulaimu; olwohuba niwichuhira omuundu yacha yibali natula mu bafu, bacha ohweyolobya.’
Nae Yibbulaimu yamuboolera ati, ‘Nibatawulira Musa nende abanabbi, mani haba sibachia ohuwulira omuundu yeesi kata asyuhe ohutula mu bafu.’ ”
Handi Yesu yeecha yaboolera abeeki bae ati, “Ebihemo bikera omuundu yahola ebibi bicha ohubaao; nae chimwakaanire oyo obileeta!
Syahamubereere esilai ohuboyebwa mu kosi wae ekina hoongo libasyeraangaho, mani yamala yaasukunwa mu nyaanja, ohuhira lwakera mulala hu baana bayere bano, ohuhola esibi.
Mani mweliinde abeene; mwaanamao naahola esibi, mwekese esibi syaba naaholere, nae niyeyolobya, muleheremo;
nae nahuholera ebibi amahabi kataanu-na-kabiri mu ludaalo lulala, handi yakobola yooli amahabi kataanu-na-kabiri, naboola ati, ‘Ndeyolobya,’ ohoyeere ohumuleheramo.”
Abatume beecha baboolera Omwaami bati, “Twongesemo efukiirira!”
Nae Omwaami yaboola ati, “Muba muli nende efukiirira yaakana nende olumwo lw'omutuumba, mwahaboolere omusaala muhuyu kuno muti, ‘Weyiye, mani ochie wetaake mu nyaanja,’ mani kwahabawuliire.
“Ali hoo hweeng'we, oli nende omuhalaabani olima oba owaaya amakoondi, onyala yamuboolera niyahenuha ati, ‘Yicha bwaangu wihale hu meesa olye’?
Oba natamuboolere ati, ‘Taangira mberi wundekehere esy'engoloobe, omale weterese bulai mani wiche wuninde, male ohulya nende ohung'wa; hu lunyuma wesi hwoche olye handi hwong'we’?
Mani omwenengo oyo, anyala yebasa omuhalaabani oyo olwohuba aholere syaatumirwe ohuhola?
Mani mwesi, nimuba nimuholere ebyo byoosi bimutumirwe ohuhola, muboleenge muti, ‘Efwe huli busa abahalaabani abatahoyeera; huholere busa ebiindu bihuhoyeere ohuhola.’ ”
Yesu niyali hu lukeendo ohuchia e Yerusaalemu, yabitira hu lwaaho lukabuhania esyaalo sya Samaria nende esya Galilaaya.
Mani niyali hu huyaheengira mu lukoongo lundi, yabukanana nende abasaacha bagenge ehumi, abemaho eyale nae
mani behuuma nibaboola bati, “Omwaami Yesu, tukwiire esisa.”
Nae Yesu niyababona, yeecha yababoolera ati, “Eng'we muche mweyekese eyiri abalaamisi.” Mani nibali hu bacha, beecha baonisibwa.
Nae mulala hw'abo, niyabona ati amalire ohuwona, yakaluhaana yacha eyiri Yesu naakinia Nasae mu kono ly'akulu;
mani yaakwa, yafumama aasi mu makulu ka Yesu, namwebasa muno. Bulaanu, omusaacha wuno yali Omusamaria.
Mani Yesu yeecha yaboola ati, “Abandu baonisibwe, haba sibabeere ehumi? Nae bataanu-na-bane bali yena?
Abulao wahakoboole ohukinia Nasae ohutusaho omuteende wuno?”
Mani Yesu yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Siingira mani ochie yocha; efukiirira yao yihuwonisye.”
Abafalisaayo nibateeba Yesu lu Bwaami bwa Nasae bucha ohwiichira, Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Obwaami bwa Nasae haba sibuchia ohwiicha nende obulolero buboneha;
oba, sibahaboole bati, ‘Eee, mbano buli ano!’ oba bati, ‘Mbula buli era!’ olwohuba bone, Obwaami bwa Nasae buli akati-kaati w'eng'we.”
Mani Yesu yeecha yaboolera abeeki bae ati, “Endaalo mbawo chiicha, lu mwahekombere ohubonaho hu ludaalo lulala lw'Omwaana w'Omuundu, nae simuchia hulubona.
Mani bahababoolere bati, ‘Eee, mbawo buli era!’ oba, ‘Eee, mbano buli ano!’ Nae mutacha, mutabaloondaho.
Olwohuba, koti lu lumesu lumyesuhaanga mani luhosa ekulu ohutula hu luwaande lulala ohwoola hu luwaande lundi, nilwo lu Mwaana w'Omuundu achia ohuba hu ludaalo lwae.
Nae ahoyeere ohusaandisibwa mberi mu biindu biingi muno, handi yebwabwe nende olwiibulo luno.
Koti lu byali mu ndaalo cha Nowa, nilwo lu bicha ohuba mu ndaalo ch'Omwaana w'Omuundu
Abandu bali nibalichaanga, nibang'wechaanga, nibadehyaanga, handi nibadehaanga, ohwolera elalira hu ludaalo lu Nowa yengirira mu lyaato, mani amaachi k'ofwomboole keecha kabasihirisa boosi.
Handi nasilala koti lubyali mu ndaalo cha Luti, -- abandu balichaanga, bang'wechaanga, bakulanga, bakusaanga, bataakaanga, bombahaanga,
nae hu ludaalo lu Luti yatulira mu Sodomu, omuliro nende enjeserye byakwa ohutula Mukulu mani byabasihirisa boosi.
Handi nilwo lusicha ohuba hu ludaalo lu Mwaana w'Omuundu yahabonehere.
Hu ludaalo olwo, leha oyo oli hu sirama sy'enyumba, yi biindu byae biri mu nyumba, ahaye ohwiiha aasi ohubibukula; handi nasilala, leha oyo oli mu ndalo ahaye ohukobola engo.
Mwichulise omuhasi wa Luti.
Oyo yeesi okoonya ohuliinda obulamu bwae, achia ohubufwiirwa, nae oyo ofwiirwa obulamu bwae, achia obuliinda.
Mbaboolera endi, mu siro esyo, abaliba babiri hu sitaanda silala; mulala yahayirwe, nae owundi alehwe.
Abahasi babiri abaliba alala nibali ohusya; mulala aliyirwa nae owundi alehwe.”
Nae abeeki bae beecha bamuboolera Yesu bati, “Omwaami, yena bweene?” Nae yababoolera ati, “Yi mubiri kuba, niyo yi eswi chahebuusire alala.”
Handi Yesu yeecha yabakaadira olukaado lundi, olweekesa luti bahoyeere ohwekongoyaanga Nasae buli siha, batawaamo omwooyo.
Yaboola ati, “Mu siko sihuluundu siindi, yaliwo omukayi w'emisango wundi, otaali niyatya Nasae handi otabaasaho hu muundu wundi yeesi;
nae yosi yaliyo omuhasi mu fwiire wundi mu siko sihuluundu esyo, owali yedinya ohumwichaangaho naboola ati, ‘Ngwiire mani wuheengere omusango hire abasuku baange.’
Nae yeecha yahayaho hulw'esiha sidiidi; nae lunyuma yeecha yeboolera omweene ati, ‘Ndahaba mbwe ese sitya Nasae kata nende ohufwa hu muundu,
nae olwohuba omuhasi mu fwiire wuno ali ohunyaasa-nyaasa, njia ohumukwiira, ataali awo aba achia ohunjoong'ya nende ohunonderesa hwae.’ ”
Mani Omwaami yeecha yaboola ati, “Wulireho bi mukai w'emisaango otaali omulungifu byaboola.
Nae Nasae salikwiira abadoole bae, abamulirira esiro nende esideete? Mani aba achia ohuhiinda muno ohubahoonya?
Mbaboolera endi achia ohubakwiira bwaangu muno. Kata katyo, Omwaana w'Omuundu niyaheeche, mani achia ohwakaana efukiirira hu syaalo?”
Yesu handi yeecha yakaadira olukaado luno abandu bandi abali nibemanyire abeene bati bali abolerefu mani nibalekeresaanga abasyaabwe, ati:
“Olwoola, abasaacha babiri bacha mu nyumba ya Nasae ohwekongooya. Mulala yali Omufalisaayo nae owundi yali omutoosa w'emisolo.
Omufalisaayo yema mani yesabira omweene naboola ati, ‘Nasae, hwebasa muno olwohuba siindi koti abandu bandi, abang'uusi, ababacha, abacheke, kata siindi koti omutoosa w'emisolo wuno.
Siiba habiri hu juma, ngaba silala sy'ehumi syabuli siindu sifuna.’
Nae omutoosa w'emisolo yeecha eyale muno, natanyala kata ohusiingisa emoni chae yaatingaala Mukulu, mani yachaaka ohwehubba esirifu naboola ati, ‘Nasae, ngwiire esisa, ese omuholi w'ebibi!’

Mbaboolera endi, omusaacha wuno yakobola engo wae naali omwolerefu mu moni wa Nasae ohuhira Omufalisaayo wula; olwohuba buli muundu yeesi oweniinia achia ohwiiswa aasi, nae oyo yeesi oweyisa aasi, achia ohuniiniswa.”
Bulaanu, abandu bachaaka ohuleeta abana bayere eyiri Yesu abadiireho nende amahono kae; nae abeeki bae nibabona sino, beecha baabakayira.
Nae Yesu yabalaanga beeche yali naboola ati, “Mulehe abana beeche yindi, handi mutabakayira; olwohuba, abali bati, nibo abeene Bwaami bwa Nasae.
Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, oyo yeesi otakaanira Obwaami bwa Nasae koti omwaana muyere haba saachia hubwingiramo.”
Mani omutuki wundi yeecha yateeba Yesu ati, “Ewe Omweekesa mulai, siina syeene sihoyera ohuhola hu nyoole obulamu butaakama?”
Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Lwasiina wunaanga oti omulai? Abulao omuundu mulai ohutusaho Nasae yeng'ene.
Omanyire amalako kano: ‘Otaholaanga obucheke, Otetaanga, Otebaanga, Otatusaanga obuloli bw'obubacha, Yisaanga mu latao nende mao oluyaali.’ ”
Nae yeecha yaboola ati, “Bino byoosi, ndabiloonda ohutula mu buyere bwaange.”
Mani Yesu niyawulira atyo, yamuboolera ati, “Osiibulwaho esiindu silala. Kusa ebiindu byao byoosi, mani okabire abamanani, mani ochia ohunyoola obuyiinda Mukulu; mani wiiche, wunonde.”
Nae oyo niyawulira atyo, yeecha yaanyoolera muno, olwohuba yali omuyiinda muno.
Nae Yesu yamutingaala mani yaboola ati, “Nga sidinyu muno abayiinda ohwingira mu Bwaami bwa Nasae!
Syaangu muno engamia ohubita mu moni y'esindaani, ohuhira omuyiinda ohwingira mu Bwaami bwa Nasae.”
Nae abawulira sino beecha baboola bati, “Mani wiina mweene onyala ohuwonisibwa?”
Nae Yesu yaboola ati, “Esitanyalihana eyiri abandu, sinyalihana eyiri Nasae.”
Nae Peetero yeecha yaboola ati, “Eee, efwe hwaleha amadaala keefwe mani hwahuloonda.”
Nae Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, abulao omuundu yeesi, owaleha enyumba, oba omuhasi, oba bamwaanang'ina, oba abebusi, oba abana, hulw'Obwaami bwa Nasae,
otachia hunyoola amahabi maangi ak'ebyeene ebyo, mu biha bino, handi nende obulamu butaakama mu ndaalo chiicha.”

Yesu yeecha yabukula ehumi-na-babiri abo yabayira endulo, mani yababoolera ati, “Bone, mbano huli ohuchia e Yerusaalemu, mani buli siindu syoosi si banabbi bandiika hu Mwaana w'Omuundu sichia ohwosereswa.
Olwohuba achia ohudiiswa Abateende, mani bamudyabuhire, handi bamuyire bubi, handi bamufucheho;
bacha ohumunaala ehoba, mani bamwiite, nae hu ludaalo lw'ohudatu, achia ohusyuuha.”
Nae abeeki bae haba sibanyala ohumanya biyali naalomalomaho; olwohuba enomanoma yino yali yabakiswaho, mani bahaya ohudiira ebyali nibilomaloomwe.
Yesu niyoola aambi nende Yeriko, omusaacha muwofu wundi yali yehaale hu ndulo w'engira nasabirisaanga.
Nae niyawulira esidiyiha sy'abandu nisibita, yeecha yateeba esyali nisikwiireo.
Bamuboolera bati, “Yesu we Nasareti niye oli ohubita.”
Mani yachaaka ohulira naboola ati, “Yesu, omwichukulu wa Daudi, ngwiire esisa!”
Nae abo abali nibali mu moni wae bachaaka ohumuhabuhira nibamuboolera bati awuleere; nae yemeeda ohulirira mu kono ly'akulu naboola ati, “omwichuhulu wa Daudi, ngwiire esisa!”
Mani Yesu yeecha yeema, yaalagira ati bamuleete yali; mani niyoola aambi, Yesu yamuteeba ati,
“Siina syodaha huholere?” Nae yaboola ati, “Omwaami, leha handi nyale ohubona.”
Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Chaaka handi ohubona; efukiirira yao yihuwonisye.”
Mani abweene-na-bweene awo nachaaka ohubona, mani yaloonda Yesu naberesa Nasae oluyaali; mani abandu abo boosi nibabona sino, beecha bakinia Nasae.
Yesu yacha yengira mu Yeriko mani yali nasibitamo.
Nae waliwo omusaacha wundi olaangwa Sakayo; owali omutoosa w'omusolo, handi omuyiinda muno.
Mani yali nadaha muno ohubona Yesu koti lwafwaana, nae haba siyanyala ohumubona ohweema hu bungi bw'abandu, handi yali omuundu mwimbikiti muno.
Mani yeecha yeruha yacha mu moni w'esidiyiha, mani yaniina hu musaala muhuyu hw'anyale ohubona Yesu, owali achia ohubitira ebweene eyo.
Nae Yesu niyoola mu sifwo esyo, yatingaala akulu mani yamuboolera ati, “Sakayo, yanguyaho bwaangu wiihe aasi; olwohuba lwaleero luno hoyeere ohuba mu nyumba yao.”
Mani Sakayo yanguyaho, mani yeeha aasi bwaangu, yakaanira Yesu nende esangaalo liingi muno.
Nae abandu nibabona batyo, boosi-boosi bachaaka ohweng'ulung'uunya nibaboola bati, “Bone, yahacha ohukeniya omusaacha muholi w'ebibi.”

Nae Sakayo yasingira yeema, mani yaboolera Omwaami ati, “Omwaami bona, njia ohubeeresa abamanani esituundu sy'ebiindu byaange byoosi; handi nimba nindeebaho omuundu yeesi esiindu syoosi, njia ohumukoboserayo ebiindu ebyo, amahabi kane amalaamba.”
Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Olwaleero, obuwonia bwiichire mu nyumba yino, olwohuba wuno yesi mwichuhulu wa Yibbulaimu.
Olwohuba Omwaana w'Omuundu yeecha ohukoonya nende ohuwonia abakota.”

Abandu nibawulira ebiindu bino, Yesu yeecha yemeeda ohubakaadira olukaado, olwohuba yali aambi ohwoola e Yerusaalemu, handi olwohuba abandu bali babaasirisa bati, Obwaami bwa Nasae bucha ohwoola ebiha byeene ebyo.
Mani sakira Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Olwoola, omusaacha w'oluyaali wundi, yatula yaacha mu syaalo sy'eyale muno bamubeerese obwaami, mani amale akobole.
Yecha yalaanga abahalaabani bae ehumi, mani yamala yababeeresa epawundi ehumi, mani yababoolera ati, ‘Muchurusire eseende chino ohwoola lundirikobola.’
Nae abandu bomu bwaami bwae bali bamusyula, mani beecha batuma bawamwaanda ohumulondaho nibaboola bati, ‘Sihudaha omusaacha wuno atutuke.’
Mani niyakobola, naamalire ohunyoola obwaami, yeecha yaalagira bamulaangire abahalaabani bayali yabeeresa eseende, anyale ohumanya obuhala bubanyoola mu buchurusi bwaabwe obwo.
Owataangira mweene, yeecha mu moni wae, naboola ati, ‘Omwaami, epawundi yao, yebula epawundi chiindi ehumi.’
Mani yeecha yamuboolera ati, ‘Oholere bulai muno, oli omuhalaabani mulai mweene! Olwohuba obeere omwesikwa mu siindu sidiidi, mani ochia ohutuka ebiko bihuluundu ehumi.’
Handi owohubiri yeecha naboola ati, ‘Omwaami, epawundi yao, yebula epawundi chiindi chitaanu.’
Nae yamuboolera ati, ‘Mani ewe ochia ohutuka ebiko bihuluundu bitaanu.’
Handi owundi yeecha naboola ati, ‘Omwaami, epawundi yao ngino, ndayibiiha bulai adiiyu mu sitambaara;
ndahutya muno, olwohuba oli omusaacha omudinyu mweene; obukula byotabiiha, handi wakesa byotataaka.’

Yamuboolera ati, ‘Ewe omuhalaabani mubi muno, njia ohuhuheengera omusango ohweema hu byolomaloome omweene nende omunwa kwao! Ewe hane wamanya oti ndi omusaacha mudinyu, obukula bitabiiha, handi okesa bitataaka?
Mani lwasiina siwachia waata eseende change mu biihiro ly'eseende, mani nindahakoboole, sindahachitusireyo nichiriho obuhala?’
Mani Yesu yeecha yaboolera abo abali nibeemere aambi awo ati, ‘Mumubukuleho epawundi eyo, mani muyibeerese oyo oli nende epawundi ehumi.’
Nae beecha bamuboolera bati, ‘Omwaami, oyo ali nende epawundi ehumi!’
‘Mbaboolera endi, buli muundu yeesi oli nabyo, achia ohumeedwa ebiindi; nae oyo yeesi otaliho nende esiindu, kata nende ebyo biyaba ali nabyo bicha ohumutusibwaho.
Nae abasuku bange bano, abatadaha ese mbatuke, mubaleete ano mani mubeetere mu moni wange.’ ”
Mani Yesu niyamala ohuboola atyo, yeecha yemeeda mu moni ohuchia e Yerusaalemu.
Mani niyali aambi ohwoola e Bbetifaage nende e Bbetani, hu sigulu silaangwa siti Olibeti, yeecha yaatuma abeeki bae babiri
naboola ati, “Muche mu lukoongo lubali mu moni olwo, mani nimunaba humwingiramo muti, mucha ohunyoola omwaana kw'esuhiri nikuboyerwe, ku muundu yeesi atehalaho hooho; mukuboolole mani mukuleete ano.
Nae omuundu yeesi nabateeba ati, ‘Lwasiina muli ohukuboolola?’ mumuboolera sino muti, ‘Omwaami niye okudaha.’ ”
Mani abatumwa abo, nibatula bacha bakaana busa koti lu Yesu yali ababooleere.
Mani nibali hubaboololanga omwaana kw'epunda okwo, abeenekwo beecha bababoolera bati, “Lwasiina muli ohuboolola omwaana kw'esuhiri okwo?”
Nabo baboola bati, “Omwaami niye okudaha.”
Mani beecha bakuleetera Yesu, mani nibamala ohusukuna engubo chaabwe hu mwaana kw'esuhiri okwo, beecha behasaho Yesu.
Mani omwaana kw'esuhiri nikwali kukiingire Yesu naacha, abandu beecha bachaaka ohwaala engubo chaabwe hu ngira.

Nae bulaanu niyali aambi ohwoola e Yerusaalemu, naali husiihiriro sy'Olugulu lwa Olibeti, esidiyiha sihoongo sy'abeeki, syachaaka ohwehoya handi nisifumia Nasae mu kono hoongo muno, hulw'emirimo mikali chibali nibabweene,
nibaboola bati, “Ali nende ehabi Omutuki oyo owiicha mu liita ly'Omwaami! Emireembe chibe Mukulu, handi oluyaali lube akulu Mukulu!”
Nae Abafalisaayo bandi abali mu sidiyiiha beecha bamuboolera bati, “Omweekesa, kaania abeeki bao.”
Nae Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Mbaboolera endi, kata bano boosi nibawuleera, amakina keene kacha ohuyokera.”
Yesu niyasuda aambi mani yabona esiko sihuluundu esyo, yasirira muno,
naboola ati, “Biba mbwe olwaleero luno wamanya ebiindu bileeta emireembe! Nae bulaanu ebyo byahwekisaho.
Olwohuba endaalo chicha ohwoola, abasuku bao bacha ohuyaba olukoba, mani bahwebodoohane, mani bahwikalire embeka choosi,
mani bamale bahubbe aasi, ewe alala nende abaana bamenya mu lukoba lwao, mani sibachia huhulehamo ekina hu liindi; olwohuba siwamanya esiha sy'obuwonia bwao nisyoolere.”
Mani Yesu yeecha yengira mu nyumba ya Nasae mani yachaaka ohwirusamo abo abali nibachurusiramo,
naboola ati, “Syandiikwa siti, ‘Enyuumba yange yicha ohuba enyumba y'ohwekongooyeramo’; nae eng'we mwayihola obweyikamo bw'abanyaka.”

Mani Yesu yachaaka ohwekesaanga buli ludaalo mu nyumba ya Nasae. Abalaamisi bahuluundu nende abandiiki b'amalako alala nende abandu b'oluyaali luhoongo beecha bachaaka ohukiiya engira y'ohumusihirisa;
nae sibanyoola esiindu syoosi sibanyala ohuhola, olwohuba abandu boosi bali bahayiire hu mboosi chae.
Ludaalo lundi, Yesu niyali ali ohwekeseraanga abandu mu nyumba ya Nasae handi naali ohuyalaanga Emboosi Ndai, abahuluundu babalaamisi nende abaandiiki b'amalako alala nende abahuluundu beenjia beecha
mani bamuboolera bati, “Tuboolereho bunyala siina bwoholera ebiindu bino, oba wiina mweene owahuba obunyala buno.”
Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Ese syesi njia ohubateebaho esiteebo silala; bulaanu mu mboolereho,
Ohubatiisa hwa Yowaana hwali hutula Mukulu kose mu bandu?”
Mani beecha basiteesaho abeene-na-beene nibaboola bati, “Nihuboola huti, ‘Hwatula Mukulu,’ aba achia ohuboola ati, ‘Lwasiina simwamufukiirira?’
Nae nihuboola huti, ‘Hwatula mu bandu,’ abandu bano boosi baba bacha ohutuhubba amakina; olwohuba bamanyire bati Yowaana yali omunabbi.”
Mani beecha bakobolamo bati haba sibamanyire yiyatula.
Mani Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Syesi siinjia hubaboolera bunyala buholera ebiindu bino.”
Mani Yesu yachaaka ohukaadira abandu olukaado luno ati: “Olwoola, omusaacha wundi yalima endaalo y'emisabbiibu, mani yamala yayirehera abahosi, mani yamala yacha mu syaalo siindi embaka ndeeyi.
Nae ebiha byohunoka ebyaamo nibyoola, yeecha yaatuma omuhalaabani mulala eyiri abahosi abo, bamubeereseho hu byaamo by'omuundalo eyo; nae abahosi abo beecha bamuhuya, mani bamwiirusa mahono mereere.
Handi yeecha yaatuma omuhalaabani wundi; oyo yesi beecha bamuhuya bamala bamuswaasa muno, mani bamwiirusa mahono mereere.
Handi yeecha yaatuma owohudatu; nae wuno beecha banyaala, bamala bamusukuna erwaanyi.
Abweene awo, omweene ndalo oyo yeecha yaboola ati, ‘Ndaahole siina? Njia ohutuma omwaana wange muheerwa muno; awundi banyala ohumwisamo oluyaali.’
Nae abahosi abo nibamubona, beecha baboolanira abeene-na-beene bati, ‘Wuno niye omusiha mweene; lehe humwiite, obusiha bube obweefwe.’
Mani beecha bamusukuna erwaanyi w'endaalo y'emisabbiibu, mani bamwiita. Omweene ndalo y'emisabbiibu aba achia ohuholera siina abandu abo?
Achia ohwiicha mani asihiriise abahosi abo, mani aberese abandu bandi endaalo y'emisabbiibu eyo.” Mani nibawulira sino, baboola bati, “Sitabaaho sityo kata nabudiidi!”
Nae Yesu yabatingaala mani yaboola ati, “Mani esyandiikwa sino syekesa siina siti: ‘Ekina lyeene li bombahi balekeeresa, nilyo elyeholere ely'amaani mu soonda’?
Buli muundu yeesi owegumula hu kina elyo, achia ohusasakuha; nae nilikwa hu muundu yeesi, licha ohumunyonyobola.”
Abandiiki ba malako ka Musa nende abalaamisi bahuluundu bakesaho ohumukwaaho esiha syeene esyo, nae baatya abandu; olwohuba basiyira bati nibo bakaadire mu lukaado luno.

Mani beecha bamwewunja bilai, mani bamala batuma abahemeresi, abebachirisa bafwaane koti abandu b'obwadyeeri, banyale ohumudiira mu mboosi chae, hu banyale ohumudiisa abobunyala nende obutuki bwa Gafana we Roomu.
Beecha bateeba Yesu bati, “Omweekesa, humanyire huti byolomaloma nende biweekesa byadyeeri, handi haba siwehubbira, nae mu bwadyeeri bweene weekesa bi Nasae adaha abandu bahole.
Mani sifukiirirwa efwe ohuberesa Kaisaali omusolo, kose haba?”
Nae Yesu yeecha yafumbula obukodyo bwaabwe, mani yababoolera ati,
“Munjekeseho ebbeesa. Esifwaanani nende obwandiike biriho bya naanu?” Baboola bati, “Bya Kaisaali.”
Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Mani mubeerese Kaisaali ebya Kaisaali, nae beerese Nasae ebya Nasae.”
Mani haba sibanyala ohudiisa Yesu omusango kwoosi mu lwichuule lw'abandu ohweema hubiyalomaloma; nae bawuka muno engaluhamo yae, mani banyita chi.
Abweene awo Abasadukaayo bandi, ababoola bati abulao ohusyuuha hw'abafwa, beecha eyiri Yesu,

mani bamuteeba esiteebo nibaboola bati, “Omweekesa, Musa yatwandiikira ati, mwaanang'ina muundu naafwa yaleha omuhasi natebuuleho nae omwaana, omusaacha oyo ahoyere ohubukula omuhasi oyo, mani yebulira mwaanang'ina wafwa abana.
Bulaanu, waliwo abasyaani b'enda ndala bataanu-na-babiri; omuhulundu waabwe yeecha yadeehya omuhasi, mani yafwa nataalehereho abana;
handi owohubiri yesi yaamudeehya yaba atyo
handi owohudatu yeecha yaamubukula mani byaaba bityo. Mani nasilala batyo boosi bataanu-na-babiri baafwa nibatelehereho abana.
Lunyuma, omuhasi oyo yesi yeecha yafwa.
Mani sakira mu husyuuha hw'abafu, omuhasi oyo achia ohuba owa wiina mweene? Olwohuba yadeheraho abasyaani bataanu-na-babiri abo boosi.”
Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Abandu bo husyaalo huno nibo abadeehya handi badeeha;
nae abo abahoyera ohuba mu bulamu bwiicha, nende mu husyuuha hw'abafwa, haba sibadeehya, handi kata sibadeeha,
olwohuba sibanyala hufwa handi, olwohuba bali koti bamalaika, handi baana ba Nasae, olwohuba bali abana b'ohusyuuha mu bafwa.

Nae ohweekesa mbwe abafu basyuuha, kata Musa yesi yekesa atyo, mu situundu sy'ebyandiiko byolerefu esidiira hu sichaha, syalangiramo Omwaami ati, Nasae wa Yibbulaimu, handi Nasae wa Yisaka, handi Nasae wa Yakobbo.
Bulaanu haba saali Nasae wa bafu, nae ali Nasae wa balamu; olwohuba abandu boosi balamu yali.”
Mani Abaandiiki ba malako bandi beecha bakobolamo bati, “Omweekesa, olomaloome bulai bweene.”
Olwohuba ohutula hwolwo, abulao omuundu yeesi owateemaho ohuteebaho Yesu esiindu syoosi.
Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Bahaboola batye bati, Kristo mwichuhulu wa Daudi?
Olwohuba Daudi mweene aboola mu sitabo sy'Esabbuli ati, ‘Omwaami yaboolera Omwaami wange ati, Yihala hu muhono kwaange muluungi,
ohwoola lu ndahahole abasuku bao babe esiteeni syowuluusiraho amakulu kao.’
Mbao, Daudi amulaanga ati Omwaami; mani handi yahaba atye omwichuhulu wae?”
Mani Yesu yeecha yaboolera abeeki bae abandu boosi nibawulira ati,

“Mweliinde abaandiiki ba malako, abaheera ohung'alaala nibefwaalire emiganjuula chereera, handi abadaha muno ohuheeswa nende oluyaali mu biito, handi abadaha muno ohwihalira mu bifwo by'oluyaali mu Sinagoogi nende mu bidyaalo,
abayaaya amadaala k'abahasi bafwiire, handi abekongooya esaala ndeeyi nibekaadya. Abo bacha ohunyoola ohusaandisibwa huhiramo obubi.”
Yesu yeecha yaasingisa emoni akulu, mani yabona abanyali nibali ohuta ebiyaanwa byaabwe mu sibiihiro;
mani yeecha yabona omuhasi mufwiire mumanani nataamo obuhela bubiri.
Mani yaboola ati, “Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, omuhasi mufwiire mumanani wuno ateeremo ohuhira abo boosi;
olwohuba abo batusireho busa hu biingi bibali nabyo, nae wuno ohutula mu bumanani bwae ateeremo byoosi byaabeere nabyo mu bulamu bwae.”
Mani abandu bandi nibali nibalomaloma hu nyumba ya Nasae, koti luyali niyimila-milana hulw'amakina k'obuhala bungi, nende ebiyaanwa byaamwo, Yesu yeecha yaboola ati,
“Ebiindu bimubona bino byoosi, endaalo chahoole, abulewo ano ekina lyahaleheebwe hu liindi, nikahasukunwe koosi kaweere aasi.”
Mani beecha bamuteeba bati, “Omweekesa, sino syahabeeo liina, handi silolero siina esyahabeo esyeekesa siti sino siri aambi ohukwao?”
Nae Yesu yaboola ati, “Mweliinde muhaye ohukoswa; olwohuba abandu bangi bacha ohwiicha mu liita lyaange, nibaboola bati, ‘Nise oyo!’ handi bati, ‘Ebiha mbino!’ Mutabaloondakiriraanga.
Nae nimuwuliraanga amaye nende embuungu, mutatengatengaanga; olwohuba sino sihoyeere ohubao mberi, nae enjakamo nayo siyichia hukwao busa ehabi lala.”
Bulaanu Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “esyaalo sichia ohusiingira siseete esiindi, handi obwaami bwosi buseete obuundi;
esyaalo syahateengerehe muno, handi enjala nende amalwaaye maangi mabi kahakwe mu byaalo bitaali nasilala; handi ebiindu bitiisa muno nende obulolero bw'amaani ohutula akulu bicha ohubaao.

Nae bino byoosi nibisisiiri ohukwao, abandu bacha ohubadiira mani babasaandye muno, nibabayira mu Sinagoogi chitaali nasilala nende mu mboyero, handi mucha ohuleetwa eyiri abatuki nende Bagafana hulw'eliita lyaange.
Awo niwo yi eng'we mwahatusire obujulisi.
Mani sakira mumanyire elalira mu myooyo ch'eng'we, mutachaaka ohukana-kana hale nibitoola koti lumuba mucha ohukobolamo ebiteebo;
olwohuba, njia ohubaba eby'ohulomaloma nende amakesi kadahibwa, ka kata mulala hu basuku beeng'we aba cha ohunyala ohuhira kata ohudondobania.
Mucha ohusiindihwayo kata nende abebusi beeng'we, kata abanaluya beeng'we, kata abeecha beeng'we handi abandi hw'eng'we mucha ohwiitwa bwiitwa;
abandu boosi bacha ohubasyuula hulw'eliita lyaange.
Nae haba kata olwooya lw'efwiiri lulala olwohumitwe cheeng'we siluchia husihirira daawe.
Nae ni mu hwesimiirisa hw'eng'we mumucha ohufunira obulamu.
“Nae nimubonaanga Yerusaalemu nisyebodoohanisiibwe nende amaye, mani mumanyeenge busa muti, olubwa lwasyo luba lumalire ohwoola.

Mani muleheenge abo ababa nibali mu Buyudaaya beruheenge bacha hu ngulu, handi leheenge abo ababa nibali mu siko sihuluundu bweene bawuya, handi mutalehanga abo ababa nibali erwaanyi mu ngoongo beecha baasiingiramo;
olwohuba chino nicho endaalo ch'ohwetungiramo, ohwoseresa byoosi ebyandiikwa.
Chakaanire abo abaliba nende abana nende abo abaliba nibanuunia abana mu biha ebyo! Olwohuba amasira amaangi kacha ohuba hu syaalo nende egiili ohuweera hu bandu bano;
bancha ohwiitwa nende obusoonjo bw'engaanga handi bayirwe mu mboye mu byaalo biindi byoosi; mani Yerusaalemu sichia ohuseenakirwa mu makulu nende Abateende, ohwoola lu ndaalo ch'Abateende chiriweera.

“Handi yicha ohubao obulolero hu lyuuba nende hu mwoosi nende hu ning'ining'i chosi, nae hu syaalo, ebyaalo bicha ohuba nende engisa nyiingi muno nibitiire ohuwoola hw'enyaanja huluundu nende ohukingana hw'amafwinda kaahwo,
abandu boosi bacha ohufwichaanga obuti nibelalihiriire ebicha ohukwaao hu syaalo; olwohuba obunyala bw'omu Kulu bwosi bucha ohudengaanisibwa.
Mani awo niwo yibacha ohubonera Omwana w'Omuundu niyeechera mu sireesi naali nende amaani mani nende oluyaali lubitiirifu.
Nae bulaanu, ebiindu bino byoosi nibiba nibichaaka ohuholehana, eng'we musingisaanga emitwe cheeng'we, mani mutingaala akulu, olwohuba obuwonia bw'eng'we buba busuda aambi bweene.”
Handi Yesu yeecha yabakaadira olukaado lundi ati, “Mubonere hu mutuli, nende kata hu misaala chiindi choosi;
huchahasebuhira busa chiti amasaafu, mweboneraanga busa abeene mani mumanya muti esiminyu simalire ohwoola.
Mani nasilala nilwo lubiri, nimubonaanga ebiindu bino nibikwao, manyeenge busa muti, Obwaami bwa Nasae buli aambi.
Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, oluse luno haba silwahaweeo bino byoosi nibitaakwao.
Ekulu nende esyaalo bicha ohuwao, nae emboosi change haba sichicha ohuwao.
“Nae mweliinde abeene, emyooyo cheeng'we chitakatayaswa nende emilyo nende obumeesi nende ohwelalihirira hw'ebihoyera obulamu buno, bikere oludaalo olwo lwabakwaaho busa nimutetekeehe koti omuteego;
olwohuba oludaalo olwo lucha ohwichira abandu bali hu syaalo huno boosi.
Nae eng'we mube ameeso esiha syoosi, nimwekongooya Nasae muti muduhane amaani, ak'ohweyonia ebiindu bino byoosi ebicha ohukwaao, nende ohweema mu moni w'Omwaana w'Omuundu.”
Mani Yesu yemeeda ohwekesanga buli ludaalo mu nyumba ya Nasae, nae nibweraanga yatulanga erwaanyi achia akona hu sigulu silaangwa Olibeti.
Nae nibwahyechaanga echuli, abandu bawunaanga ohwiicha yali mu nyumba ya Nasae ohumutekeeresa.
Ebiha bino, esidyaalo sy'Omugaati kw'obusye Butabbahirwe esilaangwa siti Paasaka, syali siri aambi ohwoola.
Mani abalaamisi bahuluundu nende abaandiiki b'amalako bali nibakonyeresa engeri yibanyala ohumwitiramo; olwohuba bali nibatya abandu bandi ohubabona.
Bulaanu Sitaani yeecha yaniina Yuda olaangwa Yisikarioti, owali mulala hu beeki ehumi-na-babiri;
yeecha yaatula ao yaachia ohuchwichwiisania nende abalaamisi bahuluundu alala nende abahuluundu bandi engeri yaanyala yaamutumbuliramo yibali.
Mani beecha basangaala muno, mani bomiisa ohumubaaho eseende.
Mani sakira yesi yeecha yafukiirira, mani yakonyeresa ehabi yinyala yaamukwiira yaanyala ohumutuumbuliramo yibali abundu ataali omuhunu kw'abandu.
Oludaalo lw'ohuliiramo esidyaalo sy'Omugaati kw'obusye butaali obubbaahe, lubeteraangaho ekoondi yeere lwemao lwoola.
Mani sakira Yesu yatuma Peetero nende Yowaana naboola ati, “Muche mututekehere Paasaka, fwesi huyirye.”
Nabo bamuboolera bati, “Ni yena bweene yonadahe huchie huyitekehere?”

Nae yababoolera ati, “Boneho, nimunaba nimumalire ohwingira mu siko sihuluundu, omusaacha onaba nakiingire esyoongo y'amaachi achia ohubakaanira; mani mumulondaanga mwingira nae mu nyumba yaba achia ohwingiramo,
mani muboolere omuliindi w'enyumba eyo muti, ‘Omweekesa ali ohuhuboolera ati, Enyuumba y'abakeni yiri ena, yinja ohuliiramo Paasaka alala nende abeeki bange?’
Mani aba achia ohubeekesa esiseenge sitaabafu esiri akulu esimalire ohuteebwamo ebiindu bidahibwa; ni eyo niyo nimuba mucha ohutekeha.”
Mani beemao bacha basibukaana koti busa luyali ababoolere; mani bamala batekeha Paasaka.
Mani esaa niyoola, Yesu yeecha yehala hu meesa, alala nende abatume abo.
Mani yeecha baboolera ati, “Ndekoombere elalira ohulya Paasaka yino nang'we nitoola ohusaandisibwa;
olwohuba mbaboolera endi haba siinjia huyirya ohwoola luyilyosereswa abweene mu bwaami bwa Nasae.”
Mani yeecha yabukula esikoombe, mani niyamala ohwebasa yeecha yaboola ati, “Mubukule sino, mani musikabanemo abeene-na-beene;
olwohuba mbaboolera endi, ohutula bulaanu buti, ohuchia mu moni, siinjia hung'waaho hu syaamo sy'omusabbibbu ohwoola lu bwaami bwa Nasae bulichiira.”

Handi yeecha yabukula omugaati, mani yamala ohwebasa yeecha yaakudonya-donyamo mani yamala yakubabeeresa naboola ati, “Kuno nikwo omubiri kwaange okwakabulwa hu lw'eng'we. Muholeenge muti nimunjichulisa.”
Handi nasilala yahola atyo esikoombe lunyuma lw'ohumala ohulya esy'engoloobe naboola ati, “Esikoombe sino busa sibeeresebwa hu lw'eng'we, nisyo elakano yaaha eya abamabanga kange.
Nae muboneho, omuhono kw'oyo owundyaamo olukwe kuli ohulya naange.
Olwohuba Omwaana w'Omuundu wuno achia ohuwaao busa koti lusyahengwawo; nae chakaanire omuundu oyo ochia ohuhoseswa mu humulyaamo olukwe!”
Mani beecha bachaaka ohuteebana abene-na-beene ni wiina hu beene abo oli oyo ananyale ohuhola sino.
Amayingani kosi keecha kabatuumbuhamo, akaboola mbwe ni wiina mweene hu beene abo ochia ohuyiribwa koti omuhunuufu obahiramo boosi.
Nae Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Abatuki baabandu Abateende babekeserangaho obwaami; handi abo ababa nibaliho akulu mu bunyala nibo abalaangwa bati, ‘abaliindi b'abandu’.
Nae haba sibiri bityo mwesi yimuli; nae mukanye oyo omuhunuufu oli mweng'we yehole abe koti omuyere mweene, handi omwimirisi nae abe koti oyo ohalaabanira abaasye.
Olwohuba ni wiina mweene omuhunuufu ohiramo, oyo owihaale ohulya, kose oyo omuhalaabanira? Sisiri mbwe niye oyo owihaale hu meesa ohulya? Nae ese ndi mw'eng'we koti oyo oli ohubahalaabanira.
“Eng'we ning'we abachiririire ohuba naange niindi mu mateemo kange;
mani ndi ohubaba omulimo ohuhola koti Bbaabba yamberesa Obwaami,
endi mucha ohuliira nende ohung'wera hu meesa yange mu Bwaami bwaange, handi mucha ohwihala hu bisaala by'obutuki nimukayaanga enjia ehumi-na-chibiri echa Yisirayiri.
“Simooni, ewe Simooni! Bonaho, Sitaani yekombere ohubabukula hu yemewo anyale ohubatondoola koti engaano,
nae ese malire ohubekongooyera endi efukiirira yeng'we yitahaywa; mani nimuba nimumalire ohwomiira handi, muhoyeere ohugumia abaasyeng'we.”
Nae Simooni yeecha yaboolera Yesu ati, “Omwaami, ese ndi omwetekefu ohuchia naawe mu jiela kata nende mu hufwa.”
Yesu nae Yaboola ati, “Ese huboolera ewe Peetero endi, edaaywa haba siyichia ohuholyooha olwaleero, ohwoola lw'ewe ochia ohuba nomalire ohwekaana oti haba siwumanyireho.”
Handi Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Mani ludaalo lundabatumira muche nimutaaliho nende omufuuko, kata esanduku, kata ebiraato, mwacha mwahaya ohubaaho nende esiindu syoosi?” Baboola bati, “Poo!”
Yecha yababoolera ati, “Nae bulaanu buti, leha oyo oli nende omufuuko akubukule, handi katyo busa nende esanduku lyosi. Handi leha oyo otaali nende olugaanga akuse engubo yae alukule.
Olwohuba ndi ohubaboolera endi, esyandiiko syolerefu sino sichia ohunjosereswaho, siti ‘Yabalirwa mu badondobanu’; olwohuba esyo syoosi esyanyandiikwaho siri nende ohwosereswa hwaasyo.”
Handi beecha baboola bati, “Omwaami, lolaho, ngandi engaanga chibiri njino chiri ano.” Handi Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Ebyo bimala.”
Bulaanu Yesu yeecha yaatula erwaanyi, mani koti luyali esaambo yae, yeecha yacha hu lugulu lwa Olibeti; handi abeeki beecha bamuloondaho ebweene eyo.
Nae niyeecha yoola mu sifwo esyo, yeecha yababoolera ati, “Mwekongooye muhaye ohukwa mu huhemwa.”
Handi yeecha yabatulaho yaasudaho eyale yiwahasukuna ekina lyoola, mani yaasigama aasi mani yekongooya ati,
“Bbaabba, nikali mbwe ni ohweenya hwao, nduseho esikoombe sino; kata katyo, bitaba mbwe ni muhudaha hwange busa, nae ohwao nihwo ohuba huholerweho.”
Mani niyasiingira yaatula mu hwekongooya, yeecha eyiri abeeki mani yabanyoola nibali ohukona hulw'obwelalihirifu,
mani yababoolera ati, “Lwasiina mukona? Musiingire mwekongooye munyala ohukwa mu huhemwa.”

Yesu niyali nasilomalomaanga, esidiyiha sy'abandu syeecha syoola, mani omusaacha olaangwa Yuda, owali mulala hu ehumi-na-babiri, niye owali abemiriire. Yecha yaasuda muno eyiri Yesu ati amukwe mu sirifu;
nae Yesu yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Ewe Yuda, onyala otye ohuchia ohulya olukwe mu Mwaana w'Omuundu mu humukwa mu sirifu?”
Mani abo boosi abali nibali aambi nende Yesu nibabona esyali sichia ohulondaho, beecha baboola bati, “Omwaami, hwehonyere olugaanga kose?”
Mani mulala hu beene abo yeecha yatemaho omuhalabani w'omulaamisi muhuluundu mani yaamumalaho ohutwi hw'omuhono muluungi.
Nae Yesu yeecha yaboola ati, “Bino biweere awo!” Mani yeecha yadiira ohutwi ohwo, mani yamuwonia.

Bulaanu Yesu yeecha yaboolera abalaamisi bahuluundu nende abandu bahunuufu b'enyumba ya Nasae nende abahuluundu, abali nibamwichiire ati, “Mwiichire koti abechera omunyaka, nimuli nende engaanga nende ebiruga?
Nindabereenge busa nang'we buli ludaalo mu nyumba ya Nasae, nimutanyalaanga ohungwaho busa. Nae olwohuba yino niyo esaa yeng'we, nende obunyala bw'esiirima.”
Mani beecha bamukwaaho, mani bamala bamutusa awo, nibamuleeta mu nyumba y'omulaamisi muhuluundu mweene. Peetero nae yalondangaho busa naali eyale hooho;
mani nibali nibahaadusa omuliro akati-kaati w'olwaanyi nibahehala alala, Peetero yesi yeecha yabehalamo.
Mani nae omuhaana muhalabani niyamubona niyehaale mu bulafu yamuhang'aasa emoni mani yaboola ati, “Omusaacha wuno yesi abeere nende omuundu oyo.”
Nae yeecha yaasikaana muno naboola ati, “Muhasiiwe, ese haba simumanyire daawe.”
Handi ebiha bidiidi nibyabitao, omuundu wundi yeecha yamubona mani yaboola ati, “Ewe wesi oli mulala hu beene abo.” Nae Peetero yaboola ati, “Omuhongo, ese siindiho nabo daawe.”
Mani handi oluunyuma lw'esiha syoola esaa ndala, handi omuundu wundi yeecha yomiisa naboola ati, “Ataali ohukana-kana, omusaacha wuno yesi abeere nae; olwohuba yesi Mugalilaaya niye.”
Nae Peetero yaboola ati, “Omuhongo, ese haba siimanyire ebyo byooli ohulomalomaanga.” Ni abweene awo, niyali mbwe hwasilomalomaanga, edaaywa yeecha yaholyooha.
Mani ni Omwaami akaluhana atingaala Peetero. Mani Peetero yeecha yechulisa emboosi y'Omwaami yira, koti luyali namuboolere ati, “Edaaywa niyitaholyooha olwaleero, onandekaana amahabi kadatu.”
Mani Peetero yeecha yaatula erwaanyi mani yaalira muno.
Nae bulaanu abasaacha bali nibadiirire Yesu beecha bachaaka ohumuhoomolera alala nende ohumuhuya;
handi beecha bachaaka ohumufuunihaanga emoni, ni bamuteeba bati, “Tuumbulaho! Ni wiina mweene ohuhuyire?”
Handi ni bachiririra ohulomalomaho emboosi nyiingi cheene nibamunyeka.

Nibwahya, oluhung'aano lw'abandu bahuluundu b'abandu beecha bebuusa alala, nende abalaamisi bahuluundu alala nende abandiiki b'amalako boosi; mani beecha bamutusa awo bamuyira ena luhiiho lwaabwe, bamala baboola bati,
“Nikali mbwe niiwe Kristo, tuboolere busa.” Nae yeecha yababoolera ati, “Ese nimbaboolera busa, haba simuchia ohufukiirira;
handi naange nimbateeba, haba simuchia hunyala ohungobolamo.
Nae kali mbwe ohutula esiha sino nende ohwemeeda mu moni, Omwaana w'Omuundu wuno achia ohuba niyehaale hu muhono muluungi okw'obunyala bwa Nasae.”
Mani boosi beecha baboola bati, “Mani niiwe Omwaana wa Nasae?” Nae yababoolera ati, “Muli ohuboola muti nise oyo.”
Mani nabo beecha baboola bati, “Mani aliwo obuloli bundi buhusiidaha? Humalire ohwewuliirira abeene ohutula mu munwa kwae kweene.”
Mani ni omukanda okwo kwoosi kweemao kusiingira, kumuleeta mu moni wa Pilaato.

Mani ni bachaaka ohumuwabira nibaboola bati, “Hubukaanire omusaacha wuno naali ohudondobanianga esyaalo syeefwe, handi naali ohutukaana ohutusiraanga obuhoonyi bwefwe Kaisaali, handi naboola ati omweene niye Kristo handi niye Omutuki.”
Nae Pilaato yeecha yamuteeba ati, “Niiwe omutuki w'Abayudaaya?” Nae yamukobolamo ati, “Niiwe oboolere otyo.”
Mani Pilaato yeecha yaboolera abalaamisi bahuluundu alala nende emikaanda ch'abandu ati, “Ese haba simbonaho omusango kwoosi hu musaacha wuno.”
Nabo baangalala busa nibaboola bati, “Asangulusa busa abandu, naabitira niyeekesa mu Buyudaaya mwoosi, ohutulira e Galilaaya ohwolera elalira kato ano wosi.”
Nae Pilaato niyawulira atyo, yeecha yateeba ohubona omusaacha wuno yali Omugalilaaya.
Mani Pilaato niyeecha yaamanya ati, hane atula mu butuki bwa Herode, yeecha yayira Yesu eyiri Herode, owali yesi naali mu Yerusaalemu esiha syeene esyo.
Nae Herode niyabona Yesu, yasangaala muno, olwohuba yali yekomba luleeyi ohumubona, olwohuba yali namuwuliraangaho busa, mani yali nasuubiraanga ohubonaho obulolero bwahola.
Mani yeecha yaamuteeba ebiindu biingi muno, nae Yesu yahaya ohumukobolamo kata silala.
Abalaamisi bahuluundu alala nende Abandiiki b'amalako nabo bandonga busa nibeemere awo nibedinyiisie ohuwabira butoli-toli.
Nae Herode alala nende abalwaani bae beecha bachaaka ohumusaandia nibamuhoomolera; mani nibeecha nibamufwaasa engubo chobuyaayi nibamala nibamukalusa eyiri Pilaato.
Mani ohuchaakira abweene awo, ni Herode nende Pilaato bachaakirawo ohuba abeecha handi, olwohuba enyuma eyo bali nibasyuulana busa.
Bulaanu, Pilaato yeecha yabuusa alala abalaamisi bahuluundu nende abatuki nende abandu bandi,

mani yababoolera ati, “Mundeteere omusaacha wuno koti oyo owali nadondobania abandu. Nae nimalire ohumuwosesa mu moni w'eng'we, boneho, ese haba siinyalire ohumunyoolaho omusango kwoosi hw'ebyo byoosi bimubeere mu muwabiire.
Kata nende Herode yesi atyo, sakira amutukalusiire handi. Boneho, abulao esiindu syoosi esihoyera ohufwa syaholereho daawe;
Mani ese njia ohumunaalaho ehoba budiidi, mani male mulehuule yeweerewo.”
Nae boosi beecha bahuumira alala nibaboola bati, “Musihirise omuundu wuno, mani mutuboololere Bbarabba” --
omusaacha yali yasukunibwa mu mboye hulw'ahasasakamalo hali hakwiireo mu siko sihuluundu handi nende hulw'obwiiti,
Pilaato handi yeecha yabalomalomera ehabi liindi, nadaha abolole Yesu;
nae handi beecha bahuumira mu kono ly'akulu nibaboola bati, “Mumuhomerere busa, mumuhomerere!”

Handi ehabi ly'ohudatu, Pilaato yeecha yababoolera ati, “Hu lwasiina, sibi siina syeene syaholere? Haba simubweeneho omusango kwoosi okuhoyera ohufwa; Mani sakira, njia busa ohumunaalaho ehoba busa mani nyemeo mulehuule.”
Nae bali nende amayiingi maangi muno nibamusaba nibehuuma bati ahoyeere ohuhomererwa. Mani amakono kaabwe keecha kayingira.
Mani Pilaato yeecha yahenga omusango ati ohudaha hw'abandu nihwo ohuba huholerweho.

Pilaato yeecha yalehuula omusaacha oyo owali yasukunwa mu mboye hulw'ohusasakamala hwali hukwiireo mu siko sihuluundu nende hulw'obwiiti, yibali nibasabire; nae yeecha yahola Yesu koti lubali badahire.
Mani koti nibali hu bamutusa awo, beecha baakwa hu Simooni wundi Omusireeni, owali naakobola busa mu siko natula mu ngoongo mani beecha bamudwiiha omusalabba yakukiinga naloonda hu Yesu.
Mani enyuma wae esidiyiha sihoongo esy'abandu syeecha syamulondaho nende omuhunu kw'abahasi abali nibacherenjesa nibamulira.
Nae Yesu niyakaluhaana yabatingaala, yaboola ati, “Bahaana ba Yerusaalemu, mutandirira haba, nae mwelirire abeene, handi mulirire abana beeng'we.
Olwohuba bone, endaalo mbawo chiicha, chibahabooleremo bati, ‘Bali nende ehabi abakumba, nende enda chitebulaho omwaana yeesi, handi nende embeere chitanuuniaho haba!’
Mani bahachaake ohuboolera engulu bati, ‘Mutukweeho’; handi ohuboolera ebigulu bati, ‘Mutufuniihe.’
Olwohuba nibahola bati omusaala nikusisiiri omubisi, byahabe bitye nikwahabe kwoomere?”
Beecha bayira abasaacha babiri bandi bali beebi babeetere alala nende Yesu.
Nae niboola musifwo silaangwa siti, Esiyaanga, awo niwo yibahomerera Yesu hu musalabba alala nende abeebi babiri abo, mulala hu muhono muluungi, nae owundi humuhono kwae mukaada.
Mani Yesu yeecha yaboola ati, “Bbaabba, baleheremo; olwohuba bakoterwe bibahola.” Mani beecha bahubba eha ohukabania engubo chae.
Mani abandu bali nibeemere awo nibabatingaalire; nae abatuki bamucheha nibamudyabuhira nibaboola bati, “Yawonia abandi; mani leha yewonie omweene, naaba naali Kristo wa Nasae, Omudoole wae Mweene!”
Abamaye bosi beecha bamuhomolera, nibeecha yaali nibamuba efiini yihaliihe,
mani nibaboola bati, “Nooba nooli Omutuki w'Abayudaaya, wewonie omweene!”
Beecha baata obwandiike bwosi akulu wae buti, “Wuno niye Omutuki w'Abayudaaya.”
Mulala hu beebi bali bosi bahomereerwe yahabuhira Yesu naboola ati, “Ewe haba siniiwe Kristo? Wewonie omweene nende efwe fwesi!”
Nae owundi yeecha yaanyeka owaasye oyo naboola ati, “Ewe haba sotyaaho Nasae, nga wesi oheengerwe omusango nasilala nae?
Nae efwe fwembi huhoyera busa; olwohuba efwe huli busa ohunyoola omukabo kuhoyera ebiholwa byeefwe; nae omusaacha wuno nae haba saholereho esiindu syoosi esitahoyera.”
Mani yeecha yaboola ati, “Yesu, wunjichulisanga niwingira mukati wa Bwaami bwao.”
Nae Yesu yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Mu bwadyeeri bweene, ndi ohuhuboolera endi, olwaleero luno ochia ohuba naange mu Paradaisi.”
Ebiha bino byali nibiri aambi w'esaa chisaasaba mani esiirima syeecha syadiira syaalo syoosi ohwoola esaa chitaanu-na-chine,
omubasu nikuhaire ohufwa; mani engubo yadembaanga mu nyumba ya Nasae yeecha yeecha yaatandulwamo habiri.
Mani bulaanu Yesu yeecha yaalira mu kono hoongo mani yaboola ati, “Bbaabba, ngeeng'a omwooyo kwaange mu mahono kao!” Mani Yesu niyamala ohuboola atyo, yayeera omuuya kwae kuheneerehayo.
Nae bulaanu, omumaye muhuluundu niyamala ohubona ebyo byoosi ebyaholehana, yeecha yafumya Nasae, mani yamala yaboola ati, “Ataali ohukana-kana, omusaacha wuno abeere omulaboota mweene!”
Mani abweene awo, ebidiiyiha byoosi ebyali nibyebuusire awo ohubonaho ebyo, nibabona ebyaholehana ebyo byoosi, bakobola mu madaala kaabwe nibehuya mu birifu.
Mani abandu bali bamumanyiirira boosi, alala nende abahasi bali bamuloondereho ohutula e Galilaaya beecha beema eyale mani babona bulai muno ebiindu bino.
Bulaanu waliwo omusaacha olaangwa ati, Yosefu otula mu siko sy'Abayudaaya silaangwa siti Arimaseya. Yali mulala hu b'oluhiiho, handi yali omusaacha mulai handi omulungifu muno,
yali natafukiirisaanie nende ebichiiririrwa nende ebiholwa bibi by'abaasye, handi yali naliindiriire Obwaami bwa Nasae bwiiche.
Omusaacha wuno yacha eyiri Pilaato, mani yaamusaba omubiri kwa Yesu.
Mani yeecha yaakwanula mani yaakuboya mu suuka ly'elaasi lya rachaari, mani yamwalisa mu ng'ani yabaachwa mu lwaanda yibali basisiiri ohusiiha hoomo omuundu yeesi.
Oludaalo olwo lwali oludaalo lw'Ohwetekeheramo, handi Sabbaato yali aambi ohuchaaka.
Abahasi bali beechere nae ohutula e Galilaaya, baloondaho, mani babona eng'ani, nende engeri yibali basihiremo omubiri kwae.
Mani bakobolayo, batekeha ebiindu biwunya esiing'aari nende amafuta k'ohumubaha. Hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato, bawuluuha ohweema koti amalako lu kaboola.
Nae hu ludaalo lutaangira mu juma, mu mabweeri-bweeri, abahasi abo beecha baabukula ebiindu biwunya esiing'aari bibali nibatekeehe, bacha hu siriindwa.
Mani beecha babukaana ekina nirisiingiiswe niritusirwe hu mulyaango kw'esiriindwa,
nae nibengiramo, haba sibanyoola omubiri.
Nibali basyeemere awo, nibawuka esyali siholehane, bone, abasaacha babiri abefwalire engubo chimesa-mesana be beema aambi nabo;
nae koti lubali batiire, handi beenamye obweeni bwaabwe hu loba, abasaacha abo beecha bababoolera bati, “Lwasiina mukoonya omulamu mu bafu?
Mwichulise koti lu yababoolera, nasisiiri mu Galilaaya,
ati, Omwaana w'Omuundu ahoyeere ohuteebwa mu mahono k'abaholi be bibi, handi ahomererwe hu musalabba, nae hu ludaalo lw'ohudatu asyuhe.”
Mani beecha beechulisa emboosi chae echo,
mani beecha batula hu ng'ani bacha baboolera ehumi nende mulala alala nende abadong'ereyo boosi ebiindu bino byoosi.
Bulaanu abahasi bano bali, Maria Magadaleena, nende Jowana nende Maria ng'ina Yakobbo alala nende abahasi bandi babali nabo ababoolera Abatume ebiindu bino.
Nae Abatume bayira emboosi chino koti olukano busa, mani bahaya ohufukiirira eby'abahasi ebyo.
Nae Peetero yasingira mani yeruha naachia hu siriindwa; nae nyenama mani yatingaalamo, yabona engubo ch'elaasi nichiri chong'ene; mani yaakobola engo nawuka busa esyali nisyeholeehe.
Hu ludaalo lweene olwo, babiri hu beeki ba Yesu, bali bacha mu lukoongo lulaangwa luti Emausi, aambi we mairo kataanu-na-kabiri ohutula e Yerusaalemu,
bali nibalomalomaanga abeene-na-beene hu biindu byoosi ebyali nibiholehaane.
Nibaba nibasilomalomaanga handi nibeteebanaho abeene-na-beene, Yesu mweene yaasuda aambi mani yakenda nabo.
Bamubona nae bahaya ohumumanyirisa.
Mani Yesu yababoolera ati, “Mbaha siina yino yimuli ohukaniayaanga abeene-na-beene nimukeenda?” Mani beecha beema nibelalihiriire muno.
Mani mulala hw'abo, olaangwa ati Kulyopa, yamukobolamo ati, “Niiwe omukeni weng'ene mu Yerusaalemu otaamanyireho ebiindu byeholeheyo mu ndaalo chino?”
Nae Yesu yababoola ati, “Bindu siina?” Nae bamuboola bati, “Ebidiira hu Yesu we Nasareti, owali omunabbi w'amaani muno mu biholwa nende mu mboosi mu moni wa Nasae nende mu moni w'abandu boosi,
handi koti, abalaamisi bahuluundu beefwe nende abatuki bamuyira ahengerwe omusango kw'ohufwa mani bamuhomerera hu musalabba.
Nae hwali hubaasa huti niye ochia ohuwonia Yisirayiri. Eee, handi ohumeeda hu bino byoosi, bulaanu chibitirewo endaalo chidatu, ohutula bino biholehana.
Handi, abahasi bandi ohutula mu mukaanda kweefwe batusinduuse muno. Bachiire hu siriindwa echuli muno,
mani bahaya ohubukaanayo omubiri kwae; mani bakobola nibaboola bati, baboneheerwe bamalaika, abababoolere bati, mulamu.
Abasyeefwe bandi bosi bachiire hu siriindwa, mani babukaana nisiri busa koti lu bahasi babeere nibaboolere; nae omweene haba sibamubweneho.”
Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “bae eng'we, nga muli abasiru, handi emyooyo ch'eng'we nga chihiinda ohufukiirira ebyo byoosi bi banabbi baboola!
Mubaasa muti sisyali nisihoyerwa Kristo ohusaanda atyo mberi hu yemewo yengire mu luyaali lwae?”
Mani Yesu yachaaka ohutotolera ebiindu byoosi ebimudiiraho ebiri mu byandiiko byolerefu, ohutulira elalira hu Musa alala nende banabbi boosi.
Mani bali aambi ohwoola mu lukoongo lubali bachamo. Yesu yaboneha koti oli ohuchiiririra mu moni,
mani bamwekweeda nibaboola bati, “Sikala naafwe, olwohuba mbano bwiira handi oludaalo mbano luweere.” Mani yeecha yadoong'a nabo.
Nae niyali hu meesa nabo, yabukula omugaati, mani yakubeeresa ehabi, mani yaakumekula, mani yakubabeeresa.
Mani emoni chaabwe chaamuha, mani bamumanyiirisa; mani abweene awo yabahamyuhaho.
Mani nibaboolanira abeene-na-beene bati, “Mani emyooyo cheefwe sichityemuheenge mw'efwe busa naalomaloma naafwe hu ngira, koti lwatutotoleere ebyandiiko byolerefu?”
Mani baasiingiraniramo ebiha byeene ebyo, mani bakobola e Yerusaalemu; mani banyoola ehumi-na-mulala nibebuusire alala nende abo babali nabo,
ababoola bati, “Bwadyeeri, Omwaami asyuhire, handi aboneheere Simooni!”
Mani bosi bababoolera ebyaholehana hu ngira, handi koti lu bamumanyira mu hu mekula omugaati.
Nae nibali basilomalomaanga bino, Yesu mweene yeecha yeema akati-kaati waabwe.
Nabo beecha besinduha mani batya muno nibabaasa bati babweene esihyeeno.
Mani Yesu yababoolera ati, “Lwasiina mwesinduha handi nimukana-kana mu myooyo cheeng'we?
Bone amahono kange nende amakulu kange, mumanye muti nise omweene; mundiireho mani mubone; olwohuba esihyeeno haba sisiri nende enyama nende amakumba koti lumubona niindi nabyo.”
Nae nibali nibasisiiri ohufukiirira hulw'esangaalo, nende ohuwuka-wukana, yababoolera ati, “Muliho nende esiindu syoosi-syoosi esyohulya?”
Bamubeeresa omunyonyo kw'eng'eni ndeehe,
mani yaakubukula yaakulya nibabona.

Mani yababoolera ati, “Chino nicho emboosi chindababooleraanga nindali nisisiiri nang'we, endi buli siindu syoosi syanyandiikwaho mu malako ka Musa nende mubyandiiko by'abanabbi, alala nende mu Sabbuli ebyali ebyohwolerera abweene.”
Mani Yesu yekula ebibaaso byaabwe, bamanye ebyandiiko byolerefu,
mani yababoolera ati, “Sino nisyo esyandiikwa siti, Kristo ahoyeere ohusaanda mani hu ludaalo lw'ohudatu, asyuhe mu bafu,
handi siti, ohweyolobya nende ohuleherwamo hw'ebibi, huhoyeerwe ohuyaalwaanga mu liita lyae mu byaalo byoosi, ohuchaakira mu Yerusaalemu.
Niing'we abajulisi be biindu bino.
Handi bone, njia ohubatumira si Bbaabba yalaka; nae mudong'e mu siko ohwoola lu maani katula akulu kalibehaho.”
Mani Yesu yeecha yabatusa erwaanyi w'esiko mani yabemirira ohwoola e Bbetani, mani yaasingisa akulu amahono kae mani yababeeresa ehabi.
Nae niyali nababeeresa ehabi, yabatulaho, mani yaakiingwa yayirwa Mukulu.
Mani bakobola e Yerusaalemu nende esangaalo liingi muno,
mani bachiririra ohuba mu nyumba ya Nasae nibafumia Nasae.
Mu huchaaka hweene, Emboosi yaliwo, handi Emboosi eyo yali nende Nasae, handi Emboosi eyo yali Nasae.
Yali mu huchaaka naali alala nende Nasae;
ebiindu byoosi byaholebwa nibimubitiramo, handi ataali ohubaao hwae, abulao esiindu syoosi esyaholebwa esiba syaholwa daawe.
Mu mweene oyo nimwo omwali obulamu, handi obulamu bweene obwo, nibwo obwali obulafu bw'abandu.
Obulafu obwo bwaaduhira mu siirima, nae handi esiirima esyo sisisiiri ohubuyiingira bwabumalawo.
Yaliwo omusaacha owatumwa ohutula eyiri Nasae, omweene liita lilaangwa liti Yowaana.
Yecha hulw'obuloli, ohweekesa obuloli bw'obulafu, hu bandu boosi banyale ohufuna efukiirira ohubitira mu mweene oyo.
Nae omweene oyo haba siyali obulafu obwo daawe, nae yeecha ohweekesa obuloli budiira hu bulafu obwo.
Obulafu bw'obwadyeeri bweene obuhosera buli muundu nibwo obwali nibwiicha mu syaalo.
Yali ali mu syaalo, handi esyaalo syali syaholebwa ohubitira mu mweene oyo, nae kata katyo, esyaalo haba sisyali syamumanya daawe.
Yecha mu daala lyae lyeene, nae abandu bae beene haba sibamwakaanira daawe.
Nae abo boosi abamwakaanira, abo abafukiiririra mu liita lyae, yababeeresa obunyala obwohwehola abaana ba Nasae;
abo abateebulwa nende amabaanga, kata busa nende obunyala bw'omubiri, kata nende ohudaha hw'omuundu busa, nae hu lw'obunyala bwa Nasae yeng'ene.

Mani Emboosi eyo yeecha yehola omuundu, mani yaamenya mw'efwe, niyechula esisa alala nende obwadyeeri; efwe hwamala ohubonaho oluyaali lwae luhoongo muno, koti olwahaba olw'Omwaana mudeerwa wa Simwaana.

(Yowaana yatusa obuloli bu mudiiraho, mani yaalira naboola ati, “Wuno niye oyo yindalomalomaho nimboola endi, ‘Oyo ochia ohwiicha enyuma wange, yaahira oluyaali muno, olwohuba oyo yaliwo ese nitabao.’ ”)
Handi ohutula mu bwiichufu bwae obwo nibwo fwesi bu hwabeeresebwaho ehabi nende ehabi mbitiirifu.
Olwohuba amalako kaberesebwa ohubitira mu Musa; nae esisa alala nende obwadyeeri byabeeresebwa ohubitira mu Yesu Kristo.
Abulao omuundu yeesi owabonaho Nasae; ohutusaho Omwaana mudeerwa, oyo oli mu bwihaliro bwa Simwaana, niye owakera yamanyihana.
Mani buno nibwo obuloli bu Yowaana yatusa, Abayudaaya nibamutumira abalaamisi nende Abaleefi ohutula e Yerusaalemu ohumuteeba bati, “Ewe niiwe naanu?”
Omweene yeyama, haba siyekaana, nae yeyama naboola ati, “Haba si nise Kristo.”
Nae bamuteeba bati, “Niiwe naanu mani? Niiwe Elija?” Nae yaboola ati, “Haba siindi oyo.” “Nae oli omunabbi?” Nae yakobolamo ati, “Haba.”
Mani nabo beecha bamuteeba bati, “Niiwe wiina? Tuboolere sihuchia ohukobola mu bandu batutumire. Ni siina syeene si welomalomaho?”
Yaboola ati, “Ese ndi ekono ely'oyo oli ohuhuumulira mu siparara liti, ‘Kololose engira y'Omwaami,’ koti lu nabbi Yisaaya yaboola.”
Bulaanu, abandu abo bali batumwa nende Abafalisaayo.
Beecha bamuteeba bati, “Mani lwasiina oli ohubatiisaanga, notaali kata Kristo, oba Elija, oba omunabbi?”
Yowaana yabakobolamo ati, “Ese ndi ohubatiisanga nende amaachi; nae aliwo oli mweng'we oyo yimutamanyire,
handi oyo oli ohunondaho enyuma wange, yi lusibiro lw'ebiraato byae ese haba sihoyera ohuboolola.”
Sino syaholehanira mu Bbetani, engereha wa Yorudaani, yi Yowaana yali nabatiisiraanga.
Hu ludaalo luloondaho, Yowaana yeecha yabona Yesu niyeecha nachoomere yali, mani yaboola ati, “Mbao, Ekoondi yere lya Nasae, oyo omalao esibi sy'esyaalo!
Wuno niye oyo yindaboolere endi, ‘Enyuma wange yiriyo omuundu oli ohwiicha owuuhira oluyaali, olwohuba oyo yaliwo ese nitabao.’
Ese mweene sindali nindamumanya; hu lwa sino sakira ese ndeecha nimbatisaanga nende amaachi, hu yoole ohubonehera eyiri Yisirayiri.”
Mani Yowaana yeecha yatusa obujulisi naboola ati, “Ese ndabona Mwooyo niyeeha koti eguugu ohutula Mukulu, mani lyamudong'aho.
Ese mweene haba sindamumanya; nae oyo owanduma ohubatisaanga nende amaachi yamboolera ati, ‘Oyo yolibona Mwooyo namwihaho mani namudoong'aho, wuno niye obatiisa nende Mwooyo Mwolerefu.’
Mani mbweene, mani ndafuna obujulisi endi wuno niye Omwaana wa Nasae.”
Handi hu ludaalo lu londaho, Yowaana niyali niyeemere alala nende abeeki bae babiri;
yeecha yabona Yesu naali ohukeenda, mani yaboola ati, “Mbao, Ekoondi yere lya Nasae!”
Abeki bae abo bawulira bi yali naboola atyo mani baloonda Yesu.

Yesu yeecha yakaluhaana, mani yababona nibali ohumuloonda, mani yababoolera ati, “Siina syeene simuli ohukonyaanga?” Nabo bamukobolamo bati, “Rabbi” (amahulundu kaasyo mbwe, Omweekesa) “ni yena bweene yiwamenya?”
Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Mwiiche mani mubone.” Beecha beecha mani babona yiyali niyamenya; mani baaba nae oludaalo olwo lwoosi, olwohuba chali nichiri esaa ehumi.
Mulala hu beene abo owaulira Yowaana niyali naalomaloma, mani yaamuloonda, yali Andereya, mwaanang'ina Simooni Peetero.
Yecha yataangira ohubona Simooni, mani yamuboolera ati, “Efwe humalire ohubona Mesaaya” (amahulundu kaasyo mbwe Kristo).
Yecha yaamuleeta eyiri Yesu. Nae Yesu niyamutingaala mani yaboola ati, “Hane niiwe Simooni omusyaani wa Yowaana? Mani ochia ohulaangibwa Keefa.”
Nibwahya mu chuli, Yesu yahengawo ohuchia e Galilaaya. Mani yeecha yanyoola Filipo mani yamuboolera ati, “Noonde.”
Nae bulaanu, Filipo yali niyamenya mu Bbeetasaida, esiko sihuluundu sya Andereya nende Peetero.
Filipo yeecha yabukanana nende Nasanayiri, mani yamuboolera ati, “Hwakaanire oyo yi Musa yandiikaho mu Malako handi nende yi banabbi bandiikaho, Yesu Omunasareeti, omusyaani wa Yosefu.”
Nae Nasanayiri yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Mani aliwo esiindu silayi syoosi esinyala ohutula mu Nasareti?” Nae Filipo yamuboolera ati, “Ewe yicha obone.”
Yesu yeecha yabona Nasanayiri niyeecha yali, mani yamuboolera ati, “Bonaho, Omuyisirayiri mweene nguno, otaliho esidinyu syoosi!”
Nae Nasanayiri yeecha yaboolera Yesu ati, “Ewe wumanyire otye?” Nae Yesu yamukobolamo ati, “Ese hubweene kata Filipo nasisiiri ohuhulaanga nobeere nooli mu siiniha sy'omusaala mutuli.”
Nasanayiri yamukobolamo ati, “Omweekesa, hane oli Omwaana wa Nasae! Niiwe Omutuki wa Yisirayiri ayakiriire!”
Nae Yesu yamukobolamo ati, “Mbwe olwohuba nihuboolere endi, hubweene nooli mu siiniha sy'omusaala kw'enduli, sakira ofukiirira? Ochia ohubona ebiindu bihira bino obulayi.”
Handi Yesu yeecha yemeeda ohumuboolera ati, “Huboolera obwadyeeri bweene endi, ochia ohubona Ekulu nilikuulwe, mani ba malaika ba Nasae nibaniina handi nibeeha hu Mwaana w'Omuundu.”
Hu ludaalo lw'ohudatu, waliwo obweeya bwali e Kaana mu Galilaaya, yi ng'ina Yesu yali.
Yesu alala nende abeeki bae bosi bali balaangirwe mu bweeya obwo.
Mani efwiini niyahawa, ng'ina Yesu yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Efwiini yibawereho.”
Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Maama, onaahole otye? Esiha syaange sitoola.”
Ng'ina Yesu yeecha yaboolera abahalaabani abo ati, “Muhole buli syababoolera syoosi.”

Nae bulaanu, yaliwo esyoongo ch'amaachi chibabaacha mu makina chisaasaba nichemere awo hulwohweyosa hw'Abayudaaya ohwomusiro, buli yitula nga yinyala ohukiinga amaachi koola egalani amahumi kabiri oba amahumi kadatu.
Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Yichuse esyoongo chino nende amaachi.” Mani beecha baachichuusa baachidumbeesera elalira.
Yecha yababoolera ati, “Bulaanu dayeho akandi, mani mukayirire omuhulundu w'esidyaalo.” Mani beecha bakayira yali.

Nae omuhulundu w'esidyaalo niyaonjaho amaachi ako akali bulaanu kakaluhaane kali efwiini, yeecha yahayaho ohumanya yiyitusiirwe (ohutusaho abahalaabani bali bachiire amaachi ako bali bamanyire), omuhulundu w'esidyaalo yeecha yalaanga omugole musaacha

mani yamuboolera ati, “Buli muundu atangiraanga ohukabula efwiini ndayi; mani abandu nibaba nibamalire ohung'wa yibuli muundu adaha omweene, hu bulaanu baleeta efwiini enjalaafu; nae ewe obiihireenge busa efwiini ndayi ohwoola bulaanu buti.”
Sino nisyo esyali esilolero syae sichaaka siyaholera e Kaana mu Galilaaya, mani syolesa oluyaali lwae luhoongo; mani abeeki bae beecha bamufukiiriramo muno.
Lunyuma lwa bino ohuwa, Yesu yeecha yehirira yaacha e Kaperanaumu, alala nende ng'ina, nende ba mwaanang'ina nende abeeki bae; mani beehala eyo bamala hooyo endaalo enjeraanu.
Esidyaalo sya Paasaka ya Abayudaaya syali siri aambi ohwoola, mani Yesu yeecha yaniina yacha e Yerusaalemu.
Niyengira mu nyumba ya Nasae, yanyoolamo abandu bali nibakusa eng'oombe ndawu, nende amakoondi, nende amaburuku, nende abafunjisi b'eseende nibali hu mulimo kwaabwe okwo.

Mani niyamala ohuluha olubbariki lw'endereechi, yaberusa boosi, alala nende amakoondi nende eng'oombe ndawu chosi, batula mu nyumba ya Nasae; handi yeecha yabbwomoola erwaanyi eseende ch'amatongolo ech'abafunjisi b'eseende, handi yamala yafumamya nende emeesa chaabwe.
Mani yeecha yaboolera abakusaanga amaburuku ati, “Mutuse muno ebiindu bino; mutahola enyumba ya Bbaabba ohuba enyumba y'obuhala.”
Abeki bae beecha beechulisa bati syali syandiikwa mu byandiiko byolerefu siti, “Ohudaha muno enyumba yao hwahanjitise.”
Abayudaaya bulaanu beecha bamuboolera bati, “Oli nende ahalolero siina honyala ohutwekesa ahakera wahola bino.?”
Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Mukwiise enyumba ya Nasae yino, mani mu ndaalo chidatu njia ohuyisiingisa yeeme.”
Abayudaaya beecha baboola bati, “Byayira emyaaka amahumi kane nende chisaasaba ohwombaha enyumba ya Nasae yino, nae ewe mani onanyala ohusiingisa mu ndaalo chidatu?”
Nae Yesu yali alomaloma hu nyumba ya Nasae eyali niyo omubiri kwae.

Mani koti lu yeecha yaasyuhiswa ohutula mu bafu, abeeki bae beecha beechulisa bati yali yamala ohusilomalomaho; mani beecha bafukiirira muno mu byandiikibwa byolerefu nende mu mboosi yi Yesu yali yalomaloma.
Nae bulaanu niyali naali mu Yerusaalemu hulw'esidyaalo sya Paasaka, abandu bangi muno beecha bamufukiirira muno mu liita lyae, nibamala ohubona obulolero buyali naahola;
nae Yesu haba siyabeesika muno,
olwohuba yali namanyire muno buli muundu koti lwafwaana mani siyadaha omuundu wundi ohukerakira akadiira hu muundu yeesi; olwohuba omweene yali yamanya bulai bweene esiri mukati w'omuundu.
Bulaanu waliwo omusaacha Mufalisaayo olaangwa Nikodema, owali omwimirisi w'Abayudaaya.

Omusaacha wuno yeecha yeecha eyiri Yesu mu siro, mani yamuboolera ati, “Rabbi, humanyire huti ewe oli omweekesa otula eyiri Nasae; olwohuba abulao oyo yeesi onyala ohuhola obulolero buno bwohola, ohutusaho Nasae naali nae.”
Nae Yesu yamukobolamo ati, “Mubwadyeeri bweene, huboolera endi, ohutusaho oyo yeesi niyeebulwa buyaaha, oyo saanyala hubona Obwaami bwa Nasae.”
Nae Nikodema yaboolera Yesu ati, “Omuundu anyala atye ohwibulwa naali omuhulundu? Anyala handi yengira ehabi ly'ohubiri munda yang'ina handi hu yebulwe?”
Nae Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Huboolera obwadyeeri bweene endi, omuundu yeesi nateebulwa nende amaachi handi nende Mwooyo, haba saanyala ohwingira mu Bwaami bwa Nasae.
Esiindu syoosi esiibulwa nende omubiri siba omubiri, nae esyo esiibulwa nende Mwooyo siba mwooyo.
Otesiinduha muno oti huboolere endi, ‘Ohoyeere ohwibulwa buyaaha.’
Omuyaka kuwucha nikuchiira yikudaha, handi owulira busa ohuwuuma hwaakwo, nae haba somanyire yi kutulira, oba yikuchiira; mani nilwo lu biri nende oyo owibulwa nende Mwooyo.”
Nae Nikodema yeecha yaboolera Yesu ati, “Sino sinyala sitye ohubaao?”
Nae Yesu yamukobolamo ati, “Ewe oli omweekesa wa Yisirayiri, nae haba somanyire sino?
Huboolera obwadyeeri endi, efwe hulomaloma bihumanyire, handi hutusa obujulisi obudiira hw'ebyo bihwamala ohubona; nae eng'we haba simufukiirira obujulisi bw'efwe.
Mani nikali mbwe ese huboolere ebiindu by'ohusyaalo huno, nae haba sofukiirira, oba onanyala otye ohufukiirira nihuboolera ebiindu by'omu Kulu?
Abulao oyo yeesi owamala ohuniina yoola Mukulu, ohutusaho oyo oweeha natula Mukulu, Omwaana w'Omuundu.
Handi koti lu Musa yasingisa yeemesa endemo mu siparara, nilwo lu Omwaana w'Omuundu achia ohusiingiswa yemesebwe,
hu mbwe oyo yeesi omufukiiriramo anyale ohufuna obulamu butaakama.”
Olwohuba Nasae yadaha esyaalo muno mani yawaayo Omwaana wae mudeerwa, hu bulaanu oyo yeesi omufukiiriramo ahaye ohukotao, nae afune obulamu butaakama.
Olwohuba Nasae yatuma Omwaana mu syaalo, nataheengera esyaalo omusango, nae mbwe esyaalo sinyale ohuwonisibwa ohumubitiramo.
Oyo yeesi omufukiiriramo haba saheengerwa omusango ohumuhira; nae oyo otamufukiirira yamala ohuheengerwa omusango ohumuhira hale, olwohuba oyo haba siyafukiirira mu Mwaana mudeerwa wa Nasae.
Mani yino niyo eheenga y'omusango, yiti mbwe obulafu bwamala ohwiicha mu syaalo, nae abandu beecha baadaha esiirima ohuhira obulafu, olwohuba ebiholwa byaabwe byali ebibi.
Olwohuba buli muholi we bibi, asyula obulafu, mani saadaha hwiicha eyiri obulafu, olwohuba naahola atyo, ebibi byae biba bicha ohweyerula bibonehane.
Nae oyo omuholi w'ebihoyera yeecha eyiri obulafu, hubulaanu sichie sibonehane bulai bweene biti ebiholwa byae ebyo biholeerwe mu Nasae.
Lunyuma lwa sino, Yesu nende abeeki bae beecha bacha mu syaalo sye Buyudaaya; yibecha bamenya nabatisaanga.
Yowaana yesi yali nabatisaanga naali abundu alaangwa ati, Ayenoni esyali aambi nende Salimu, olwohuba amaachi kaliyo amaangi muno; mani bandu bechaanga nibabatiiswa.
Olwohuba Yowaana yali atateebwa mu mboye.
Nae bulaanu, ohuyingana hwecha hwabaao akati w'abeeki ba Yowaana nende Omuyudaaya wundi nihudiira hu musiro kw'ohweyosa.

Mani beemao beecha eyiri Yowaana mani bamuboolera bati, “Rabbi, oyo owali naawe nooli engereha wa Yorudaani, yiwatusiraho obujulisi, nguno ali ano, ali ohubatisaanga, mani abandu boosi bali ohuchia yali.”
Nae Yowaana yakobolamo ati, “Abulao omuundu yeesi onyala ohunyoola esiindu syoosi ohutusaho nasibereeswe ohutula Mukulu.
