Mani bulaanu esirabo sy'obuluungifu siniindire, si Mwaami, omuheengi w'emisaango w'obwadyeeri, achia ohundiisa hu Ludaalo olwo. Andi haba si ese syeng'ene, nae achia ohudiisa abo boosi abamulindiriire nende ohudaha ohwiicha hwae.
Kesaho koti lwonyala ohwiicha yindi bwaangu.
Olwohuba Deema, amalire ohuwambana obwiicha nende esyaalo, kata amalire ohundeha achiire Tesaloniika. Kureseni achiire Galatia. Nae Tiito yacha Dalamatiya.
Luka yeng'ene niye odoong'ere naange. Bukula Mariko mani wiiche nae; olwohuba anyala ohuhoonya ohuhalaabana.
Ndatuma Tikiku ohuchia mu Efeeso.
Niwiicha, ndeetere ekooti lyaange lindalehera Karupo mu Turaosi; leeta nende ebitabo byosi, ohuhirira elalira eby'amaseero.
Alekisaanda omwitaanyi w'emigasa, yaahola obubi muno; Omwaami mweene niye ochia ohumukaba omukabo kuchaana nende ebiholwa biyaahola.
Wesi mweliinde, olwohuba ayingania muno emboosi yeefwe.
Abulao omuundu yeesi owahoonya lundataangira ohwewosaho. Boosi-boosi banjiruha bandeha. Ndekongooya Nasae ahaye ohubabaliraho esibi esyo!
Nae Omwaami yaba naange, mani yambeeresa amaani sakira ndanyala ohutuumbula emboosi choosi Abateende baawulira. Handi yamonia yandusa mu meeno k'edalang'i.
Mani Omwaami achia ohuhoonya mu bidinyu byoosi, mani yaamonie hu nyoole Obwaami bwo Mukulu. Oluyaali lube nae emireembe nende emireembe. Amiina.
Heesa Purisiila nende Akwiila, nende edaala lya Onesiforo.
Erasito yadoong'a Koliiti. Nae Ndaleha Turofiimu Mileeto olwohuba yali nalwaala.
Kesaho koti lwonyala ohwiicha endaalo ch'emboo nichisiiri ohwoola. Yubbulu, Pudeni, Lino nende Kilaudiya babaheesa, handi abafukiiriri boosi-bosi babaheesa.
Omwaami abe nende omwooyo kwao. Esisa sya Nasae sibe nang'we mweesi.

Ebbarwa yitula eyiri Paulo, omuhalaabani wa Nasae handi omutume wa Yesu Kristo. Ndadoolebwa handi ndatumibwa ohuhoonya efukiirira y'abandu ba Nasae yadoola, handi nende ohumeerera banyale ohumanya obwadyeeri bweekesebwa mu diini yeefwe,
eyeemere hu suubi ly'obulamu butaakama. Nasae otabacha yatusuubisa hale esyaalo nisitaaloongwa obulamu butaakama buno.
Nae endaalo chihoyera nichoola, yatwekesa emboosi yino. Yandiisa emboosi yino, handi njaala koti lu Nasae Omuwonia weefwe yaatuma.
Nyandiikira Tiito omwaana wange wumbulira mu fukiirira yituwambaaniya. Lehe Nasae Seefwe, nende Omuwonia weefwe Yesu Kristo ahube ehabi nende emireembe.
Ndahuleha mu Kureete endi onyale ohukolola ebiindu byali nibisiidaha ohukololwa, handi oteeo abemeresi b'abafukiiriri mu buli siko.

Yichulisa oti, omwemeresi yodoola, ahoyeere ohuba otaaliho esiindu syoosi sibamwekanyiisaho, handi ahoyeere ohuba naali omusaacha w'omuhasi mulala. Handi abana bae bosi hahoyeere ohuba abafukiiriri, handi sibahoyeere ohuba abaalaba, oba abatawulira amalako.

Koti lwali omuhalaabani wa Nasae, omwemeresi w'abafukiiriri ahoyeere ohuba nataaliho esiindu simwekanyiisaho. Haba sahoyeere ohuba omuundu w'esuunga, oba onyoolera bwaangu, oba omumeesi, omwaalaba, oba ow'omutoolyo.
Ahoyeere ohuba owakaanira abakeni bulai, handi odaha ohuhola ebiindu bilai. Ahoyeere ohuba omuundu wefuka omweene, omulungifu, omwolerefu, handi ow'esaambo ndayi.
Ahoyeere ohuba omuundu womiirira hu mboosi yadyeeri koti luyeekeswa, hwaanyale ohweekesa abandu bandi enjekesa y'adyeeri alala nende ohwakamiya abo abakesaho ohuyingania enjekesa eyo.
Olwohuba aliwo abayingani bangi, ohuhirira elalira Abayudaaya beehola abafukiiriri mu Kristo, abajeemu handi ababachirirsa abandu nende emboosi chibulamo obuhoonyi.
Enjekesa yaabwe yihoyeerwe ohwakamisibwa, olwohuba babita mu madaala k'abandu nibeekesa ebitahoyera ohwekesebwa nibachiiririra ohwegagayasa abeene.
Mulala hu Bakureete beene, omunabbi waabwe yaboola ati, “Abaandu Bakureete babacha muno, manani mabi, b'omululu handi bakata beene.”
Mani omuundu wuno yaboola obw'adyeeri bweene. Mani sakira mubaakamisire elalira n'amaani, hu banyale ohuba nende efukiirira y'adyeeri.
Mani handi bahaye ohuhayira hu ngano hale ch'Abayudaaya, nende amalako k'abandu balekeeresebwa.

Eyiri abandu balungifu, buli siindu syoosi siluungifu, nae eyiri abandu b'omufuto, handi abataali nende efukiirira, abulao esiindu siluungifu; ebibaaso byaabwe nende ohumanya hwaabwe byamala ohunyaasiha.
Beyira koti abamanyire Nasae, nae mu biholwa byaabwe, byeekesa biti haba sibamudaha. Basyulana, handi sibadaha ohuwulira amalako.
Nae ewe, ohoyeere ohweekesa ebifukiirisania nende enjekesa yadyeeri.
Yekesa abasaacha bahuluundu bahaye ohuba abameesi, babe ab'amakesi, babe ab'efukiirira ndayi, abohudaha hulai, handi abesimiirisa.
Mu ngeri nasilala eyo, yekesa abahasi bahuluundu bebise koti abahasi bali nende obulamu bwolerefu bahoyera. Bahae ohuba abamoonyi oba abameesi. Bahoyeere ohwekesanga ebiholwa bilai,
hu banyale ohweekesa abahasi baraaga ohudahaanga abasaacha baabwe nende abaana baabwe,
ohuba abeliinda, abataaliho esibi, handi ohuba abahasi b'omudaala abalai bawulira abasaacha baabwe, hwabuleo omuundu yeesi ochia ohulomaloma bubi hu Mboosi yitula eyiri Nasae.
Mu ngeri nasilala hubbirisa abasaacha baraaga beefuke abeene.
Nae mu byoosi ewe omweene ohoyeere ohuba esyohuboneraho esy'esaambo ndayi. Bechaanga owadyeeri handi omumaliirifu mu njekesa yao.
Wehoonyere emboosi ndayi echatayinganisibwa, hu basuku bao banyale ohudiiribwa esoni nibahaywa ohuba nende esiindu sibi syoosi sibatulomalomaho.
Abaambe bahoyeere ohuwulira abaami baabwe, handi ohubasangaasa mu buli siindu. Sibahoyeerwe ohukalusania nende abaami baabwe,
oba ohubeeba. Nae bahoyeere ohwekesaanga bati balai handi beesikwa mu buli siindu, mani mu buli siindu sibahola, abandu banyale ohusiima enjekesa yidiira hu Nasae Omuwonia weefwe.
Olwohuba Nasae yamala ohweekesa abandu boosi esisa syae esy'ohubaonia.
Esisa esyo sitwekesa ohwebwaaba obulamu butatya Nasae, nende obwekoombi bw'obulamu bw'omusyaalo, mani hu hunyale ohwefuka abeene, ohuba abalungifu, handi abatya Nasae mu syaalo muno,
nihulindiriire Oludaalo lwolerefu lu husuubira, lu luyaali luhoongo lwa Nasae weefwe nende Omuwonia Yesu Kristo lwahabonehere.
Kristo yewaayo hu lweefwe mani yatununula mu bibi byoosi, handi nende ohutulabia hube abandu bae beene aboolerefu, handi abadaha huhola ebiindu bilai.
Beekese ebiindu bino byoosi, handi wehoonyere obunyala bwao bwoosi nobagumia emyooyo. Nenya abo handi nonenya abahutekeeresa. Leha omuundu yeesi atahulekeresa.
Yichulisa abandu bao oti bahoyeere ohubeeresa abemirisi nende ab'obunyala oluyaali, babe abawulisi, abetekefu ohuhola bulai omulimo kwoosi nende obwesikwa.
Bakerakire batalomaloma bubi hu muundu yeesi, bahaye ohusoolana, nae babe abaloonga, handi beyekese eyiri abandu boosi bati b'esaambo ndayi.

Olwohuba efwe fwesi abeene hale hwali abasiru, abajeemu, abakota. Hwali nihwahayira mu bulamu bw'obwekoombi bwefwe bubi, nende ohwesangaasa hwa buli ngeri. Hwali abetima handi abehiinda. Abandu bali nibatuhaya, handi fwesi nihwahayana abeene-na-beene.
Nae obulayi nende esisa sy'ohudaha hwa Nasae Omuwonia weefwe nibyabonehana,

yeecha yaatuwonia. Haba siyatuwonia olwohuba hwali nihuholere esiindu silayi mu bulungifu bweefwe, nae yatuwonia ohweema hu sisa syae syeene. Yatuwonia yatwooka mani hwebulwa ehabi ly'ohubiri, mani hwehola abayaaha mu Mwooyo Mwolerefu.
Nasae yatuchuhaho Mwooyo Mwolerefu wae mu bungi ohubitira mu Yesu Kristo Omuwonia weefwe.
Sino syaholehana hu hunyale ohulabisibwa hulw'esisa syae, hu hunyale ohuba abasiha b'obulamu butaakama buhusuubiramo.
Emboosi chino chadyeeri. Ndaha womiise ebiindu bino, hu abo abafukiirira mu Nasae banyale ohumaliirira ohuhola ebiholwa bilai. Ebiholwa bino bilai muno handi bihoonya buli muundu.

Nae leha ohweyingisa mu mayiingani k'obusiru, ohuhwesana hu bungi bw'enjibulo nyiingi, ohukabuhanamo, nende obusoolo budiira hu huhalaka amalako. Olwohuba ebiindu bino byoosi bibulamo obuhoonyi handi byabuhaya busa.
Kesaho ohukerakira omuundu oleetera abandu ohukabuhanamo ehabi lala oba amahabi kabiri, nomala otyo, lehana nae elalira.
Manya oti omuundu oyo yamala ohulema handi ebiholwa byae bibi byeekesa biti yamala ohweheengera omusango ohumuhira.
Nihutumira Ariteema oba Tikiku, wanguyaangaho ohwiicha yindi mu Nikopooli, olwohuba heengereo ohuba eyo mu ndaalo ch'emboo.
Kesaho koti lwonyala ohuhoonya Seena omunamalako nende Apolo betekehe ohuchaaka olukeendo lwaabwe. Handi bona oti bali nende buli siindu sihoyera hu lukeendo.

Handi hubbirisa abandu beefwe oti bahoyeere ohweeka ohuholaanga ebiindu bilai, hu banyale ohuba abetekefu ohuhoonyaanga mu bidinyu bikwao bwaangu, bahayeenge ohubechaanga awo busa abula obuhoonyi bwoosi.
Abandu bandi nabo boosi bahuheesere. Wesi heesa abandu batudaha, abo ab'efukiirira ndala naafwe. Nasae abakwiire esisa mweesi.
Ese Paulo owaboywa hulwa Kristo Yesu handi nende Timoteo omwaana weefwe. Hwandiikira ewe Filemooni omuhalaabani wasyeefwe muheerwa
nende Afiiya mboocho yeefwe, nende Arikipo omusikaari waasyeefwe, alala nende abafukiiriri ba Kristo abebusiranga mu nyumba yao.
Nasae Seefwe, nende Omwaami weefwe Yesu Kristo babakwiire esisa handi bababeerese emireembe.
Wasyaange Filemooni, buli ludaalo niihwichulisa mu hwekongooya hwange, ndeebasa Nasae wange,
olwohuba mbulira ebidiira hu hudaha hwao eyiri abandu ba Nasae boosi nende efukiirira yooli nayo mu Mwaami Yesu.
Ndekongooya Nasae endi ohuholera alala hwao nende abafukiiriri bandi, huhuhoonye ohwemeeda ohumanya ebilai byoosi bihunyoola mu bulala nende Kristo.
Mwaanaama w'omwooyo, ohudaha hwao hundeetera esangaalo liingi muno, handi hungumia muno omwooyo! Olwohuba wasangaasa emyooyo ch'abandu ba Nasae boosi.
Hulw'esifune sino, hoyeere ohuba omumaliirifu koti mwaanamaao mu Kristo, ohuhulagira ohole esiindu syohoyeere ohuhola.
Nae olwohuba hudaha, hwekongooya bwe kongooya. Ese Paulo, wamwaanda wa Kristo Yesu, nae bulaanu oli omuboye wae
hwekweeda hulw'omwaana wange Onesimu, yindeehola laatang'ene mu Kristo niindi mu mboye.
(Hale haba siyaba nende obuhoonyi yooli, nae bulaanu, wobuhoonyi bw'amaani yooli nende yiindi.)
Bulaanu ndi ohumutuma akobole yooli, handi yeecha nende omwooyo kwaange.
Ndahadahire adoong'e naange ano, anyale ohuhoonya mu sifwo syao, niindi mu buboye hulw'Emboosi Ndai.
Nae haba sindahire ohuhola endyo ewe notafukiriire; ohutusaho ndahire ewe omweene ohole otyo ohutula mu hudaha hwao omweene, ataali ohuyiikwa.
Awundi sino nisyo esyakera Onesimu yaahukabuhanaho hulw'esiha sidiidi, hwaanyale ohuhukoboserwa elalira.

Olwohuba haba saali ohukobola koti omuwaambe busa, nae ohirira eyale omuwaambe; ali mwaanamaao w'omwooyo mu Kristo. Ali nende obuhoonyi bungi muno yiindi! Handi achia ohuba nende obuhoonyi bungi ohuhirao koti bulaanu ali omuwaambe handi mwaanamaao mu Mwaami.
Sakira niwumbaasaho oti ndi omuhalaabani waasyo, mubukaanire koti lu wahanjakaaniire.
Nabaao esiindu syoosi siyahukosera, oba nomubaanjaho esiindu syoosi, sibalire hu ese.
Ese Paulo, nyandiika ebiindu bino nende omuhono kwaange kweene. Ese Paulo njia ohuhutuunga. Kata ndahaba nimanyire endi obulamu bwao bwosi buliwo hulwaange.
Sakira wasyaange, hulw'Omwaami ngwiire esisa. Koti mwaanama mu Kristo sangaaseho!
Ndi omumaliirifu endi ochia ohuhola bi husaba, handi ochia ohuhola ebihiraho bihusaba.
Ohumeeda hwebyo, tekehereho owohweyalisa, olwohuba suubira endi, Nasae achia ohukobolamo ohwekongooya hweeng'we eng'we mweesi mani yangaluse yi muli.
Epafura omuboye wasyaange mu Kristo Yesu, ahuheesa.
Handi Mariko nende Aristaako, nende Deema, alala nende Luka abahalaabani basyaange, bosi bahuheesa.
Lehe ehabi ch'Omwaami weefwe Yesu Kristo chibe nang'we.
Hale, Nasae yalomalomanga nende ba kuuka yeefwe amahabi maangi handi mu ngeri chikabuhaane nabitira mu banabbi.

Nae mu ndaalo chimaliirihayo chino, Nasae alomaloome naafwe nabitira mu Mwaana wae. Omwaana wae oyo niye yi Nasae yadoola ohuba omusiha w'ebiindu byoosi, handi Nasae yabitira mu Mwaana wae oyo ohuloonga ebiindu byoosi.

Omwaana oyo, niye obulafu bweekesa oluyaali lwa Nasae, handi niye efwaani ya Nasae yeene, handi niye oliinda ebiloonge byoosi nende emboosi yae y'amaani. Naamalire ohunyalira ebibi by'abandu boosi ohuleherwamo, yeehala Mukulu hu muhono muluungi kwa Nasae, Omweene bunyala bwoosi.
Omwaana wa Nasae yabeereswa oluyaali luhira olwa bamalaika, koti busa eliita li Nasae yamubeeresa lihira akaabwe oluyaali.
Olwohuba, abulao malaika yeesi yi Nasae yabooleraho ati, “Niiwe Omwaana wange, olwaleero hwibuule” Oba handi ati, “Njia ohuba Laatang'ene, handi yesi abe Omwaana wange”
Nae ohumeeda hw'ebyo, Nasae niyali aambi ohutuma Omwaana wae mwikulaanda mu syaalo, yaboola ati, “Lehe bamalaika ba Nasae boosi bamwiinamire.”
Nae bino nibyo bi Nasae yaboola ebidiira hu bamalaika ati, “Nasae yahola bamalaika bae baaba emboo, handi yaahola abahalaabani bae enjeserye ch'omuliro.”
Nae ebidiira hu Mwaana, Nasae yaboola ati, “Obwaami bwao, Ewe Nasae, bw'endaalo choosi, otuka abandu nende obwadyeeri.
Waheera obuluungifu nae wasyuula obuhyamu. Mani sakira Nasae, Nasae wao ahwawulewo handi ahubeere esangaalo ly'oluyaali lungi muno ohuhira luyabeeresa abaasyo.”
Nasae handi yaboola ati, “Ewe, Omwaami, mu huchaaka niiwe owaloonga esyaalo, handi wahola ekulu nende amahono kao keene.
Ebiindu ebyo byoosi bicha ohusihirira, nae ewe ochia ohudoong'ao; byoosi bicha ohukofula koti engubo.
ochia ohubifuumba koti omukeeka, handi bichuuhe koti engubo. Nae ewe ochia ohudoong'a busa koti lwooli, handi emyaaka chao haba sichicha hwaakama.”
Nae malaika siina yi Nasae yabooleraho ati, “Yihala hu muhono kwaange muluungi ohwoola lundihola abasuku bao babe esiteeni sy'ohutaaho amakulu kao.”
Bamalaika abo, haba sinibo emyooyo chihalaabanira Nasae, chi Nasae yatuma ohuhoonya abo abacha ohunyoola obuwonia?
Mani sakira huhoyeere ohwomiirira muno mu bwadyeeri buhwamala ohuwulira, hu abulewo esiindu syoosi esinyala ohutukosa.
Nikali mbwe emboosi yi bakuuka yeefwe banyoola ohutula hu bamalaika yali ey'adyeeri, handi abo abatayilonda oba bayifukiirira, banyoola ohusaandisibwa hu bahoyera.
Bulaanu huba hucha ohwewonia hutye, nihulekeresa obuwonia buhuluundu buno? Omwaami mweene niye owataangira ohulaangirira obuwonia buno, handi abo abamuwulira batwomiisira bati bwadyeeri nibwo.
Handi Nasae yesi yeecha yameeda ohwomiisa emboosi eyo naahola obulolero nende ebiwukisa alala nende eby'amaya bitaali nasilala, handi naakaba ebiyaanwa koti lwadaha ebiyaanwa bya Mwooyo Mwolerefu.
Nasae haba siyataao bamalaika ohuba abatuki b'esyaalo sichia ohwiichaesyaalo sihuli ohulomalomaho.
Ohutusaho koti lu syaboolwa abundu wandi mu byandiiko byolerefu siti, “Omuundu niye siina esikera ewe Nasae wamubaasaho muno? Omuundu-buundu busa niye naanu yodeebaho muno?
Wamuhola ohuba aasi wa bamalaika ebiha ebidiidi muno; wamufwaasa ekofya y'oluyaali nende efuma,
handi wamuhola atuke ebiindu byoosi.” Siboola siti, Nasae yamuhola “ohutuka ebiindu byoosi”; sino syekesera elalira siti yamubeeresa ebiindu byoosi.

Nae hubona Yesu, owaholwa yabaaho aasi wa bamalaika hulw'esiha sidiidi, hwaanyale ohufwiira buli muundu hulw'esisa sya Nasae. Bulaanu humubona nafwaasirwe ekofya y'oluyaali nende efuma hulw'ohufwa hwae.
Syali sihoyera Nasae, owaloonga handi oliinda buli siindu, ohubeeresa Yesu obunyala bw'ohuyira abandu mu buwonia ohubitira mu husaanda hwae, hwaanyale ohukera abaana bangi bakabaneho hu luyaali lwae.
Alabya abandu ohutula mu bibi byaabwe, mani oyo olabya nende abo abalabisibwa, boosi bali nende Laata yaabwe mulala. Sakira Yesu saali nende esoni ohubalaanga abebulana bae.
Aboolera Nasae ati, “Njia ohuboolera abandu bange ebiindu biwahola; njia ohuhufumia yi bebusiire alala.”
Handi aboola ati, “Njia ohuta esuubi lyaange mu Nasae.” Handi aboola ehabi liindi ati, “Mbano ndi ano nende abaana ba Nasae yambeeresa.”

Koti abo ba Yesu alaanga abaana, bali bandu ab'omubiri nende ab'amabaanga, Yesu yesi yeehola yafwaana nabo mani yaakabana hu bw'omuundu bwaabwe. Yahola atyo hwaanyale ohusihirisa Sitaani, oli nende obunyala hu hufwa.
Yahola atyo, hwaanyale ohuboolola abo abali ababoye mu bulamu bwaabwe bwoosi olwohuba bali batya ohufwa.
Sibonehera elalira siti, haba sahoonya ba malaika. Ohutusaho ahoonya abechuhulu ba Yibbulaimu.

Mani sakira yahoyera ohwehola afwaanane nende abandu bae mu ngeri choosi, hwaanyale afwaane nende ba mwaanang'ina mu buli ngeri, hwaanyale ohuba Omulaamisi Muhuluundu waabwe mwesikwa, handi ow'esisa mu huhalaabana hwae eyiri Nasae, hu bibi by'abandu binyale ohuleherwamo.
Mani bulaanu anyala ohuhoonya abo abahemebwa, olwohuba yesi omweene yahemebwa handi yasaanda.
Bakristo basyaange, mweesi mwalaangwa nende Nasae! Mubaaseho hu Yesu, yi Nasae yatuma ohuba Omulaamisi Muhuluundu w'efukiirira yi hutuumbula.
Yali omwesikwa eyiri Nasae, owamudoola ohuhola omulimo kuno, koti lu Musa yesi yali omwesikwa mu mulimo kwae mu nyumba ya Nasae.
Koti omwombahi w'enyumba anyoola oluyaali ohuhira enyumba yeene, mu ngeri nasilala, Yesu ali nende oluyaali lungi muno ohuhira Musa.
Buli nyumba yoombahwa nende omuundunae Nasae niye omwombahi wa buli siindu.
Nae Musa yali omwesikwa mu nyumba ya Nasae yoosi koti omuhalaabani, mani yalomaloma hu biindu bi Nasae yali achia ohuhola mu moni.
Nae Kristo mwesikwa koti Omwaana wa Nasae oliinda enyumba ya Nasae. Huli enyumba yae nihudoong'a buli ludaalo nihuli abagumu, handi nihuli abomiifu mu siindu si husuubiramo.
Mani sakira, koti lu Mwooyo Mwolerefu aboola ati, “Olwaleero, nimuwulira ekono lya Nasae,
mutoomia emyooyo cheeng'we koti lu bakuuka yeeng'we bahola, koti lubajeemera Nasae, koti lu bali hu ludaalo olwo mu siparara, koti lu bamuhema.
Eyo niyo yi bakuuka yeeng'we yi bahemera, kata nibaba nibamalire ohubona ebiindu bindahola mu mbaka y'emyaaka amahumi kane.
Mani sakira ndeecha ndanyoolera nabo mani ndaboola endi, 'Buli siha bahyamu mu myooyo chaabwe handi bahaya ohuwulira amalako kange.'
Sakira etima lyandiira mani ndechuba nimboola endi: ‘Haba sibachia hwiingira mu buwuluhiro bwaange.’ ”
Mani basyaange mweliinde abulewo omuundu yeesi mw'eng'we oba nende omwooyo mubi okutafukiirira, ahaye ohutula hu Nasae mulamu.

Ohutusaho, muhoyeere ohugumia abaasyeng'we emyooyo buli ludaalo, hasita emboosi “Olwaleero” mu byandiiko byolerefu yitudiiraho, hwabuleo omuundu yeesi hw'eng'we onyala ohubachiriswa nende esibi, mani yooma omutwe.
Olwohuba fweesi hukabanira alala nende Kristo nihwomiisa obwesikwa bweefwe buhwachaaka nabo hwoola hu njakamo.
Sino nisyo si byandiiko byolerefu biboola biti, “Olwaleero, nimuwulira ekono lya Nasae, mutoomia emyooyo cheeng'we koti lu bakuuka yeeng'we bahola, koti lu bajeemera Nasae.”
Nae bandu siina abawulira ekono lya Nasae mani baamala baamujeemera? Abo nibo abandu boosi ba Musa yeemerera nabatusa mu Misiri.
Nae bandu siina ba Nasae yanyoolerera hulw'embaka y'emyaaka amahumi kane? Nibo abandu bahola ebibi, mani baakwa baamala bafwiira mu siparara.
Nae Nasae niyechuba naboola ati, “Haba sibahengire mu buwuluhiro bwaange,” yali alomaloma hu bandu siina beene? Yali alomaloma hu abo abali nibamujeemera.
Bulaanu hubona huti, haba sibanyala ohwingira mu buwuluhiro bwae, olwohuba haba sibali nende efukiirira.
Bulaanu, Nasae yatubeeresa esisuubise hu hunyale ohunyoola obuwuluuhiro buyalomalomaho. Mani lehe hweliinde abulewo omuundu yeesi mw'eng'we otahoyera ohunyoola obuwuluuhiro bu yatusuubisa obwo.
Olwohuba fwesi hwawulira Emboosi Ndai koti lu bosi bawulira. Bawulira emboosi, nae haba siyabahoonya, olwohuba nibayiwulira haba sibayaakanira nende efukiirira.

Sakira efwe abafukiirira, lehe hunyoole obuwuluuhiro bu Nasae yasuubisa. Siri busa koti lu yaboola ati, “Etima lyandiira mani ndechuba nimboola endi: ‘Haba sibachia hwiingira kata nabudiidi mu buwuluhiro bwaange!’ ”
Olwohuba abundu wandi mu byandiiko byolerefu, sino nisyo si biboola ebidiira hu ludaalo lwa hataanu-na-habiri: “Nasae yawuluuha hu mirimo chae hu ludaalo lwa hataanu-na-habiri.”
Esiindu syeene sino handi silomalomwaho siti: “Haba sibahengireho kata nabudiidi mu buwuluhiro bwaange.”
Abo abatangira ohunyoola Emboosi Ndai haba sibanyala ohunyoola obuwuluuhiro obwo, olwohuba haba sibafukiirira. Mani aliwo abandu bandi endaalo chino abacha ohufukiirirwa ohubunyoola.
Handi Nasae yataawo oludaalo lundi lulaangwa luti, “Lwaleero.” Daudi hale yalomalomaho mu byandiiko byolerefu naboola ati, “Olwaleero, nimuwulira ekono lya Nasae, mutoomia emyooyo cheeng'we.”
Yoswa aaba niyabeeresa abandu obuwuluuhiro, Nasae haba siyahaboleere handi ebidiira hu ludaalo lundi.
Nae koti lu siri, abandu ba Nasae basidoong'ereyo nende obuwuluuhiro obuli koti ohuwuluuha hwa Nasae hu ludaalo lwa chitaanu-na-chibiri.
Olwohuba buli muundu yi Nasae aberesa ohuwuluuha, awuluuha emirimo chae, koti lu Nasae yawuluuha echae.

Mani sakira, lehe hukeseho koti lu hunyala ohunyoola obuwuluuhiro obwo. Sisihoyera omuundu yeesi hweefwe ohulekeresa ekono lya Nasae, koti lu ba kuuka yeefwe bahola, mani hwaahaya ohunyoola obuwuluuhiro obwo.

Olwohuba Emboosi ya Nasae, namu handi yihola, handi njoki ohuhira olugaanga lwooki emaande chaalwo choombi. Yiheenga ohwoolera elalira yi mwooyo nende endasi bibukaanira yi nyiingo nende obuchunjuuni bibukaananira.Yimanyire obwekoombi nende ebibaaso by'abandu bya mu mwooyo.
Abulao esiindu syoosi esinyala ohukiswa Nasae; ebiindu biloonge byoosi biri alafu, handi biikule mu moni wae. Handi efwe fweesi hucha ohwewosaho mu moni wae.
Lehe bulaanu hwomiirire hu fukiirira yihutumbula. Olwohuba huli nende Omulaamisi Muhuluundu owamala ohwingira ohwoola mu moni wa Nasae bweene, oyo niye Yesu, Omwaana wa Nasae.

Omulaamisi Muhuluundu yihuli nae, siniye oyo otatuchuunirwa hulw'obukata bweefwe. Ohutusaho, huli nende Omulaamisi Muhuluundu owahemebwa mu ngeri choosi koti chihuhemebwamo, nae haba siyaholaho esibi syoosi.
Mani lehe hube abagumu husude aambi nende obwihalo bwa Nasae bw'oluyaali, eyiri esisa. Eyo niyo yihucha ohuchia ohukwiirwa esisa, handi hunyoole ehabi y'ohutuhoonya, buli lu huba nihudaha obuhoonyi.
Buli mulaamisi muhuluundu adoolebwa ohutula mu bandu baasye, mani atumibwa ohuhalaabanira Nasae hulwaabwe, ohukabula ebiyaanwa alala nende ebiweebwayo by'ebibi.
Koti lu mweene oyo aaba naali omukata mu ngira nyiingi, anyala ohuba omuloonga eyiri abo ababa nibataamanyire esy'ohuhola mani abahola ebisobyo ebiingi.
Handi koti lu mweene ali omukata, omweene yesi ahoyeere ohuwaayo ebiyaanwa, ataali hulw'ebibi by'abandu byong'ene, nae nende hulw'ebibi byae byeene.
Abulao omuundu wedoolera omweene oluyaali lw'ohuba omulaamisi muhuluundu. Nae hulaanga hwa Nasae nihwo ohukera omuundu naaholebwa ohuba omulaamisi muhuluundukoti lu Arooni yali.
Mu ngeri nasilala eyo, Kristo mweene haba siyetaaho oluyaali lw'ohuba omulaamisi muhuluundu. Ohutusaho, Nasae yamuboolera ati, “Oli Omwaana wange; olwaleero hwibuule.”
Omweene oyo handi abundu wandi yaboola ati, “Ochia ohuba omulaamisi endaalo choosi, mu ngeri y'obulaamisi bwa Melikisedeki.”

Yesu mu bulamu bwae naali hu syaalo, yekongooyanga Nasae, handi niyekweeda niyehuuma mu kono hoongo, handi naalira amasika maangi, Nasae wali naacha ohumuwonia ohufwa. Olwohuba yali omuloonga handi omufukiiriri muhuluundu, Nasae yamuwuliraanga.
Kata nende niyali Omwaana wa Nasae, yeekera mu husaanda hwae ohuba omuwulisi.
Mani niyaholwa ohuba omulungifu, yeecha yaaba otulaho obuwonia butaakama eyiri abo boosi abamufukiiriramo.
Handi Nasae yamulangirira ohuba niye omulaamisi muhuluundu, mu ngeri y'obulaamisi bwa Melikisedeki.
Huli nende ebiindu biingi bihuhoyeere ohulomaloma ebidiira hu siindu sino, nae bidinyu muno ohubibanyonyola koti lumuli abakata mu hutegeera.

Ebiha bibeereo ebimala ohukera mwaaba nimwamala hale ohwehola abeekesa-nae kata katyo, eng'we musiidaha abeewo omuundu wundi obeekesa amasomo kataangira keene ak'emboosi ya Nasae. Ataali ohuba nimulya eby'ohulya byoomeranu, eng'we musisiiri busa nimuhoyera ohung'wa amabeere.
Buli muundu yeesi oba nasiihoyera ohung'wa busa amabeere kong'ene aaba asisiiri omudoto, otaaliho nende obumanyirifu bwoosi mu siindu sidiira hu humanya esiindu sihoyera, oba esiindu sitahoyera.
Eby'ohulya byomeranu, hu luwaande lundi, bihoyera abandu bahuluundu, ohubitira mu hweholeraanga abeene, boola baanyala ohumanya ohukabuhania akati-kaati w'esiindu silayi, nende esiindu sibi.

Lehe hwemeede nende enjekesa nyaangafu, hulehane nende enjekesa yatangira yidiira hu Kristo. Haba sihuhoyeere ohuchaaka ohwombaha omusiingi kundi, okw'ohukaluhana ohutula hu mirimo chibulamu obuhoonyi, nende ohufukiirira mu Nasae.
Omusiingi kundi okw'ohweekesa ebidiira hu mbatiisa chikabuhaane, nende ohwisaho amahono, ebidiira hu husyuuha hw'abafu nende ohuheengerwa omusango hutaakama.
Lehe huchie mu moni! Mani sino nisyo sihuchia ohuhola, Nasae naakanya.

Olwohuba binyaliha bitye, abandu baba nibalehana nende efukiirira, ohukobosebwa enyuma baanyala ohweyolobya? Olwohuba hale bali nibali mu bulafu bwa Nasae; bahombaho hu siyaanwa syo Mukulu, handi banyoola omukabo kwaabwe okwa Mwooyo Mwolerefu.
Bali nibamanya bati emboosi ya Nasae ndayi niyo, handi bamala ohumanya amaani k'endaalo chiicha.

Mani beecha baalehana nende efukiirira yaabwe! Haba sisinyaliha ohubakobosa enyuma baanyala ohweyolobya ehabi liindi, olwohuba baba bali ohuhomerera Omwaana wa Nasae ehabi liindi, handi ohumuyemula mu moni w'abandu bangi.
Nasae aberesa ehabi eloba ling'wa amaachi k'efula yilikwaaho buli siha, handi elibaaho ebimera biri nende obuhoonyi eyiri abandu baliba nilyalimirwa.
Nae niliba nilimeraho busa amawa nende esiino, liba libula obuhoonyi; liba liri mu masira ka Nasae ohuliholimira, mani lyasihirisibwa nende omuliro.
Nae basyaange, kata nihuba nihulomaloma huti, haba sihubeekanakanamo. Humanyire huti, mwanyoola emikisa chihiramo obulayi, ech'obuwonia bweeng'we.
Nasae haba siyehubbira. Haba saacha hwibirira omulimo kumwahola, oba ohudahana hu mwamala ohweekesa mu buhoonyi bumwatusa nimuhoonya abandu bae, handi bu musyemeeda ohuhoonya Abakurisito baasyeng'we.
Ohudaha hweefwe huhiramo huli huti, buli mulala hweeng'we ahoya yaliinda amawofu k'ohuhola esiindu silayi kae ohwolera elalira hu njakamo, hu biindu bimuli ohusuubira binyale byoolerere abweene.
Haba sihudaha eng'we mwehole abakata, nae mube koti abandu bafukiirira handi abomiifu mu myooyo, hu munyale ohunyoola esiindu si Nasae yasuubisa.
Nasae niyahola esisuubiso nende Yibbulaimu, yehoonyera eliita lyae omweene, olwohuba abulao omuundu omuhira oluyaali.
Yasuubisa naboola ati, “Njia ohuhubeeresa omukisa, handi hubeerese abeechuhulu bangi muno.”
Yibbulaimu yali omwesimiirifu, mani sakira yanyala ohunyoola esiindu si Nasae yali yamusuubisa.
Olwohuba omuundu niyechuba, yeehonyera eliita ly'omuundu omuhiraho oluyaali, handi esichubo esyo simalao ohuyingana hubaao hwoosi.
Bulaanu Nasae yadaha ohweekesa abo abacha ohunyoola siyasuubisa, esilai sihirao ati haba saacha hukaluuhania esichiiririrwa syae; mani sakira yameeda ohwomiisa esisuubise esyo niyechuba.

Mani aliwo ebiindu bino bibiri, ebitanyala ohukaluuhana, handi bi Nasae atahanyala hubachaho. Mani sakira efwe abamala ohunyoola obwiiruhiro yaali, hugumisibwa muno ohwomiirira namaani hu sisuubise siri mu moni.

Esuubi lino nilyo eliri koti enaanga y'obulamu bweefwe. Haba siyikanwa-kanwa, handi nyomiifu, handi yicha niyibita mu lubugo luhiinga lw'omunyumba ya Nasae, yengirira elalira mu sabo ly'omukati bweene.
Yesu yamala ohututaangirira ohutuchiira mu kati bweene omwo, mani yaamala yeehola omulaamisi muhuluundu w'endaalo choosi, koti Melikisedeki.

Melikisedeki wuno, yali omutuki wa Salemu, handi omulaamisi wa Nasae Ohiramo Obuhulundu. Koti lu Yibbulaimu yali natula mu biita bi yeeteramo abatuki bane, Melikisedeki yabukaanana nae mani yamuberesa ehabi.

Mani Yibbulaimu yeecha yaamubeeresa esituundu silala hu buli bituundu ehumi ebyabuli siindu siyali ayaayire mu hulwaana eye elyo. (Amahulundu kataangira ak'eliita Melikisedeki niko, “Omutuki w'Obuluungifu”; handi koti luyali omutuki wa Salemu, amahulundu k'eliita lyae handi niko, “Omutuki w'Emireembe.”)

Ebimulomalomwaho, haba sibituumbula ebidiira hu laatang'ene oba ng'ina, oba hu bakuukaang'ene yeesi; oba ebidiira hu hwibulwa hwae oba hu hufwa hwae. Melikisedeki afwana koti Omwaana wa Nasae; mani adoong'a naali omulaamisi endaalo choosi.
Boneho koti lu yanyoola oluyaali! Yibbulaimu kuuka yeefwe mumanyirifu, yesi yamubeeresa esituundu silala hu bituundu ehumi syabuli siindi siyali nayaayire mu biita.

Olwohuba amalako kafukiirira abechuhulu ba Leefi abali abalaamisi ohusolosa esituundu silala hu bituundu ehumi esya buli siindu ohutula eyiri abandu ba Yisirayiri. Sino syekesa siti, esituundu esyo sisoloswa ohutula hu bandu baabwe beene, kata nende bahaba nibali abechuhulu ba Yibbulaimu.

Melikisedeki wuno haba siyali ow'olwiibulo lw'oluyia lwa Leefi, nae yasolosa esituundu silala sy'ebituundu ehumi ohutula hu Yibbulaimu, handi yaamubeeresa ehabi koti omuundu naali nende esisuubise sya Nasae.
Ataali ohukana-kana hwoosi, omuundu obeeresa ehabi w'oluyaali ohuhira omuundu yaaberesa ehabi chae.

Nae ebidiira hu balaamisi, esituundu silala hu bituundu ehumi sisoloswaanga nende abandu bafwa; nae ebidiira hu Melikisedeki, esituundu silala hu bituundu ehumi, syasoloswa nende omuundu mulamu, koti lu byandiiko byolerefu biboola.

Handi hunyala ohuboola huti Yibbulaimu yatuunga esituundu silala hu bituundu ehumi, ohweekesa ati Leefi (yi beechuhulu baasolosa esituundu silala hu bituundu ehumi) yesi yasituunga ohubitira mu mahono ka Yibbulaimu.
Olwohuba Leefi yali nasisiiri ohwiibulwa, nae yali nasisiiri mu Yibbulaimu kuukaang'ene lu Melikisedeki yabukaanana nende Yibbulaimu.

Ohweema hu mulimo kwa Abaleefi kw'obulaamisi, nimwo omwatula amalako akaberesebwa abandu ba Yisirayiri. Bulaanu, emirimo ch'Abaleefi chiba nichali emilai, lwasiina handi abalaamisi bandi abafwana koti Melikisedeki badahibwa, ataali bafwaana koti Arooni?
Olwohuba nabaawo ohukaluuhana mu malako k'ohudoola abalaamisi, awo wosi aaba aliwo engaluuhana mu malako ka Musa mwosi.
Handi Omwaami weefwe, yi biindu bino bilomalomaho, yali ow'oluyia lundi, handi abula omuundu wundi yeesi ow'oluyia lwae owali ahalaabaneho koti omulaamisi.
Olwohuba simanyihaane bulai bweene siti, Omwaami weefwe yali ow'olwiibulo lwa Yuda, handi Musa haba siyatuumbulaho hu luya luno naalomaloma hu balaamisi.
Emboosi yino yemeeda ohubonehera elalira alafu; olwohuba omulaamisi wundi yabonehana oli koti Melikisedeki.
Haba siyaholebwa omulaamisi ohweema hu malako k'abandu; nae yeehola omulaamisi, ohweema hu maani k'omuundu oli nende obulamu butaakama.
Olwohuba ebyandiiko byolerefu biboola biti, “Ochia ohuba omulaamisi endaalo choosi, oli koti Melikisedeki.”
Sakira elako hale lisudisibwa endulo, olwohuba lyali ekata handi elibulamo obuhoonyi.
Olwohuba amalako ka Musa kali nikatanyala ohuhola esiindu syoosi ohuba esyolerefu. Nae bulaanu, esuubi lihira obulayi lileeterweo li hubitiramo hwoola aambi nende Nasae.
Nae sino haba sisyaholehana ataali esichubo sya Nasae. Abandi boosi baholwa ohuba abalaamisi ataali esichubo syoosi.
Nae Yesu yeehola omulaamisi ohubitira mu sichubo koti lu Nasae yamuboolera ati, “Omwaami yechubire esichubo mani haba saachia hukaluuhania ebibaaso byae: ‘Oli omulaamisi endaalo choosi.’ ”
Mani sakira ohwechuba ohwo hwahola Yesu yaaba esyomiiso syomiisa elakano layi lihira ehale.
Handi aliwo engabuhana yiindi: abalaamisi bandi abo bali abaangi, olwohuba bali nibafwa, mani sibanyala ohwemeeda nende omulimo kw'abwe okwo.
Nae koti Yesu ali omulamu endaalo choosi, omulimo kwae koti omulaamisi, sikunyala hudiisibwa omuundu wundi koti omusiha.
Sakira Yesu anyala ohuwonisira elalira bandu bacha eyiri Nasae nibamubitiramo, olwohuba aliwo omulamu endaalo choosi ohubekongooyera eyiri Nasae endaalo choosi.

Yesu niye Omulaamisi Muhuluundu onyala ohutuhoonya mu buli siindu sihudaha. Olwohuba mwolerefu niye, handi abulaho esisobyo syoosi, oba esibi syoosi; mwolerefu handi yaawulibwa ohutula hu baholi b'ebibi, mani yakiingwa yaaninisibwa akulu ohubita ekulu.

Haba saali koti abalaamisi bahuluundu bandi; haba saadahibwa ohuwaana ebiyaanwa buli ludaalo hulw'ebibi byae omweene, nende ohuwaana ebiyaanwa hulw'ebibi by'abandu bandi bosi. Yawaana elalira esiyaanwa silala syong'ene, koti lu mweene yeweerayo koti esiyaanwa.

Amalako ka Musa kahola omuundu otaali omwolerefu ohuba omulaamisi muhuluundu; nae esisuubise si Nasae yahola niyechuba, esyeecha lunyuma lw'elako, sihola Omwaana wa Nasae mweene, owaholwa ohuba omwolerefu w'elalira endaalo choosi.
Sino nisyo esiindu sihuluundu mu biindu bihulomaloma; huli nende omulaamisi muhuluundu, owihaale Mukulu hu muhono muluungi kw'esisaala sy'obutuki sya Nasae w'Oluyaali Lwa akulu.
Ahalaabana koti omulaamisi muhuluundu, mu bwihalo bwolerefu muno, mu yeema ly'adyeeri li Mwaami yoombaha ataali li muundu yoombaha.
Buli mulaamisi muhuluundu, adoolebwa ohuwaanira Nasae esiyaanwa sy'esolo nende ebiyaanwa biindi, sakira omulaamisi muhuluundu wuno yesi, ahoyera ohuba nende esiyaanwa syohuyaana.
Aaba naali ow'ohusyaalo huno, haba siyahabeere omulaamisi olwohuba aliwo abandu bandi, abawaana esiyaanwa ohuchaanakana nende amalako k'Esiyudaaya.

Abalaamisi bahuluundu bano, omulimo ku bahola, kufwaanaho busa handi siiniha busa esy'ebiindu biholebwa Mukulu. Siri busa koti lu byali hu Musa. Niyali naali aambi ohwombaha Eyeema Lyolerefu lya Nasae, Nasae yamuboolera ati, “Bona oti ohola buli siindu ohweema hu ngeri yibahukereramo nooli hu lugulu.”

Nae koti lu biri, Yesu yamala ohubeeresebwa omulimo kw'omulaamisi muhuluundu muno, ohuhira okw'abalaamisi abo, koti elakano li yatekeha akati-kaati wa Nasae nende abandu lyosi lihira ehale, olwohuba lyeema hu bisuubise by'ebiindi bihiramo.
Elakano litaangira liba nilitaalimo esibi syoosi, elakano ly'ohubiri haba siryahadahiibwe.

Nae Nasae yanyoola esibi hu embuliirisania yitaangira, sakira yaboola ati, “Omwaami aboola ati endaalo chiri ohwiicha, chinja ohuholeramo elakano yaaha nende Abayisirayiri alala nende abandu b'oluyia lwa Yuda.

Elakano elyo haba sirichia ohuba koti lindahola nende kuuka yaabwe. hu ludaalo lundabadiirira hu muhono nimbeemerera ohubatusa mu syaalo sy'Emisiri. Olwohuba haba sibali nende obwesikwa hu embuliirisania lindahola nabo, sakira haba sindabadeebaho.

Mani lino nilyo elakano linja ohuhola nende Abandu Bayisirayiri Omwaami aboola ati, mu ndaalo chiicha: njia ohuta amalako kange mu bibaaso byaabwe, handi njia ohukandiika mu myooyo chaabwe, mani njia ohuba Nasae waabwe, handi nabo ohuba abandu bange.

Handi abulao omuundu yeesi ochia ohweekesa owaasye oba ochia ohuboolera owaasye ati, ‘Manya Omwaami,’ olwohuba boosi bacha ohuumanya, ohutulira elalira hu muundu ohiramo obudiidi, ohwolera elalira hu muundu ohiramo obuhoongo.
Njia ohuleheramo ebibi byaabwe handi siinjia hwichulisa ebibi byaabwe lundi.”
Nasae ohulomaloma hu embuliirisania njaaha, yakofusa elakano lyataangira; nae buli siindu sikofula mani sya waamo obuhoonyi siba siri aambi ohusihirira.
Elakano litaangira lyali nende amalako k'ohwiinamiramo Nasae nende esifwo syombahwa nende abandu esy'ohwiinamiramo.
Bombaha eyeema lifwaana liti: Esiseenge sy'erwaanyi, esilaangibwa Esifwo Syolerefu, mwalimo esiteeni sy'ohutaaho etaara, nende emeesa yiriho omugaati kuwaanirwa Nasae.
Enyuma w'olubugo lw'ohubiri, yaliyo eyeema libalaanga bati, Esifwo Sihiramo Obwolerefu.

Mu yeema omwo mwalimo alutaari y'esaabbu, yibanioheseraho obubbaani, nende Esanduku ly'Embuliirisania elyabwiihwa nende esaabbu enyaande choosi. Mu Sanduku omwo mwalimo ebbuka ly'esaabbu, omwalimo emaanu, endabuhi ya Arooni yali yasebuhaho amasaafu, nende amakina kabiri akandiikwaho amalako ka Nasae.
Akulu w'Esanduku, hwaliho abakerubbi beekesa oluyaali lwa Nasae, nibabambuule embaya chaabwe, hu sifwo si bibi bireherwamo. Nae bulaanu, sino si nisyo esiha sy'ohunyonyola buli siindu mu bwiichufu.
Yino niyo engeri yi biindu bino byatekehebwamo. Abalaamisi bengiraanga mu yeema ly'erwaanyi buli ludaalo ohuhola omulimo kwaabwe.

Nae omulaamisi muhuluundu yeng'ene niye owengiraanga mu yeema ly'omukati, handi yaholaanga atyo ehabi lala hu buli mwaaka. Omulaamisi muhuluundu wuno haba siyengirangamo natakiingire amabaanga kaacha ohuwaanira Nasae hulw'ebibi byae omweene nende ebibi bi bandu bahola nibakoterwe bati bali nibahola ebibi.
Mu biindu bino byoosi, Mwooyo Mwolerefu yeekesa ati, engira yoola mu Sifwo Sihiramo Obwolerefu, yali niyisisiiri ohumanyihana, eyeema litaangira nirisyemereo.

Sino syali esifwaanani busa, esyeekesa ebiindu biholehana bulaanu. Ohweema hu tekeha yino, ebiyaanwa nende ebisolo biyaanirwa Nasae, haba sibinyala huhola omwooyo kw'omuundu wiinamira Nasae kwaaba omwolerefu elalira.

Ebyo byalichingi busa ebiindu koti eby'ohulya, eby'ohung'wa, nende emiduunga miingi chikabuhaane ech'ohwelabya. Bino byoosi byali busa amalako k'ohumukulu, akahola ohwoola hu biha bi Nasae achia ohuteerao ehola njiaha.

Nae Kristo yeecha koti Omulaamisi Muhuluundu w'ebiindu bilai biriwo bulaanu. Sakira eyeema lyahalaabaniramo, ly'oluyaali lungi muno handi lyolerefu ohuhirao. Eyeema lino haba silyaholwa nende amahono k'abandu, esyeekesa siti, haba siriri ely'ohusyaalo huno.

Kristo niyabita mu yeema, mani yengira ehabi lala lyong'ene mu Sifwo Sihiramo Obwolerefu. Kristo haba siyengira mu Sifwo Sihiramo Obwolerefu nende amabaanga k'embusi nende ak'endaawu ohuwaanira Nasae. Nae yabukula amabaanga kae keene, mani yeengira nako mani yatunyoolera obuwonia butaakama.
Olwohuba amabaanga k'embusi nende ak'endaawu nende ekohe ly'emoosi saambe ebiyaanywa hu bandu bataali abalabiswa, mani bino bibalabya humukulu hwong'ene.
Sino nisiri esyadyeeri, mani amabaanga ka Kristo otaaliho esibi syoosi kacha ohulabya ebibaaso by'emyooyo nikabitusa mu biholwa bifu bihale, hu banyale ohuhalaabanira Nasae mulamu.

Hulwesifune sino, Yesu niye oleeta etekeha y'Elakano yaaha, mani abo ba Nasae yalaanga banyale ohunyoola ehabi yi Nasae yasuubisa. Sino sinyalihana olwohuba yamala ohubaao ohufwa hununula abandu ohutula hu bibi bibahola, nibasisiiri mu Embuliirisania yitaangira.
Yi silaamo syandiike yi siri, ahoyeere ohubaao esiindu syomiisa siti omuundu wasyandiika yamala ohufwa.
Olwohuba esilaamo syandiike esyo sibulamo obuhoonyi, omuundu wasihola nasisiiri omulamu; handi haba sibasiholeraho, omuundu oyo nasisiiri ohufwa.
Esyo nisyo esikera Elakano litaangira lyosi kata silyanyala ohwomiiswa amabaanga nikasisiiri ohwidiha.

Nae Musa niyamala ohuboolera abandu ebilagiro byoosi koti lu biri mu malako, yabukula amabaanga k'elaawu nende ak'embusi, mani yakasasaania nende amaachi, mani yamala yakawaanya hu bandu boosi niyehoonyera olusaala lu laangwa luti 'yisopu' oluboyerweho obwooya bw'amakoondi bwa ranjaayi, mani yabwinihamo, mani yaamala yakawaanya hu sitabo sy'amalako, nende hu bandu boosi.
Mani Musa naboola ati, “Kano niko amabaanga akomiisa elakano li Nasae yabalagira ohwoseresa.”
Handi mu ngeri nasilala eyo, Musa yawaanya amabaanga hu yeema nende hu biindu byoosi ebyehoonyerwa mu hwiinamira Nasae.
Olwohuba mu malako ka Musa, aambi buli siindu silabisibwa nende amabaanga, handi sisireherwamo amabaanga nikasisiiri ohwidiswa.
Ebiindu bino ebiri koti efwaani y'ebiindu byo Mukulu, byali bihoyerwa ohulabya abandu mu ngeri eyo. Nae ebiindu byo Mukulu bidaha esiyaanwa silayi sihiraho ebya muno.

Olwohuba Kristo haba siyengira mu Sifwo Sihiramo Obwolerefu si bandu bahola busa, esyali koti esifwaanani sy'obwihalo bwadyeeri bweene. Kristo yengira Mukulu bweene, yaali bulaanu mu moni wa Nasae hulweefwe.
Omulaamisi muhuluundu w'Esiyudaaya yengiraanga buli mwaaka mu Sifwo Sihiramo Obwolerefu nende amabaanga k'ebisolo. Nae Kristo haba siyengira Mukulu ohwewaayo omweene amahabi maangi.

Olwohuba Kristo yahabeere nahoyera ohusaanda amahabi maangi ohutulira elalira mu huloongwa hw'esyaalo. Nae bulaanu, yabonehana ehabi lala lyong'ene mu ndaalo chaakamayo chino, ohumalao ebibi ohweema hu siyaanwa silala sy'obulamu bwae syeene.
Koti lu siri, buli muundu yeesi w'ohufwa ehabi lala, handi naamalire ohufwa, Nasae amuhengere omusango.

Mu ngeri nasilala eyo, Kristo yesi yawaanwayo ehabi lala ly'ong'ene koti esiyaanwa simalao ebibi by'abandu bangi. Handi achia ohubonehana ehabi ly'ohubiri. Haba siyaheeche ohulwaanisa esibi handi, nae yaheeche ohuwonia busa abo abamulindiriire.

Amalako k'Esiyudaaya kali busa koti esiiniha sy'efwaanani sy'ebiindu bilai bicha ohwiicha, nae haba sikali efwaani yadyeeri yeene y'ebiindu by'elalira bino. Sakira ebiyaanwa bibeeresebwa buli siha, haba sibinyala ohulabisira elalira abandu basuda eyiri Nasae.

Ebiyaanwa ebyo biba nibinyala ohulabisira elalira abandu beenamira Nasae, ebiyaanwa ebyo haba sibyahayaanirweyo buli siha, olwohuba ababiyaanayo bahabeere nibalabiswa elalira ehabi lala nibataaliho nende esibi mu myooyo chaabwe.
Nae koti lu siri, ebiyaanwa ebyo bibeechulisa busa ebibi byaabwe buli mwaaka.
Olwohuba amabaanga k'elaawu nende amabaanga k'embusi haba sikanyala ohumalao ebibi.
Mani ohweema hu sifune esyo, Kristo niyali aambi ohwiicha mu syaalo, yaboolera Nasae ati, “Ewe haba siweenya ebiyaanwa nende ebiindu bituswa, naye watekehera omubiri.
Ebiyaanwa by'esolo chisaambwa hu alutaari, oba ebiyaanwa bimalao ebibi haba siwabisangaalira.
Sakira ndaboola endi, 'Nasae, mbano ndi ano, ohuhola sy'odaha, koti busa lu syanyandiikwaho mu sitabo sy'Amalako.'”

Yatangira ohuboola ati, “Haba siwadaha handi haba siwasangaalira ebiyaanwa nende ebiindu bituswa, oba nende ebisolo bisaambwa hu alutaari, nende ebiyaanwa bimalao ebibi.” Yaboola sino kata nende syahaba siti ebiyaanwa bino byatuswa ohulondakana nende bi malako ka Musa kadaha.
Mani yeecha yaboola ati, “Nasae, mbano ndi ano ohuhola syodaha.” Sakira Nasae yamalawo ebiyaanwa bihale byoosi, mani yataawo esiyaanwa sya Kristo mu sifwo syaabyo.

Olwohuba Yesu Kristo yamala ohuhola esiindu si Nasae yadaha ahole, sakira efwe fweesi bulaanu hwamala ohulabiswa ohutula mu bibi, hulw'esiyaanwa siyawaayo esy'omubiri kwae syeene, ehabi lala lyong'ene.
Buli mulaamisi w'Esiyudaaya yeesi, buli ludaalo yeema nawaayo ebiyaanwa nasilala amahabi amaangi; nae ebiyaanwa bino haba sibinyala ohumalao ebibi daawe.
Nae Kristo yawaayo esiyaanwa silala sy'ong'ene, hulw'ebibi ehabi lala lyong'ene, mani yeehala hu muhono muluungi kwa Nasae.
Ohutula olwo, bulaanu yalindirira ohwoola lu Nasae yahahole abasuku bae ohuba koti esiteeni syawuluusiraho amakulu kae.
Olwohuwaayo esiyaanwa sia alala esyo, yamala ohulabisira elalira abo bayoosaho ebibi.
Handi Mwooyo Mwolerefu yesi atubeeresa obujulisi bwae. Ohutangira aboola ati,
“Lino nilyo elakano linja ohuhola nabo Omwaami aboola: mu ndaalo chiichayo, njia ohuta amalako kange mu myooyo chaabwe mani kandiike mu bibaaso byaabwe.”
Handi ameeda naboola ati, “Haba siinjia hwichulisira elalira ebibi byaabwe, nende ebiholwa byaabwe bibi.”
Mani ebibi bino nibimalire ohuleherwamo, esiyaanwa sy'ohumalao ebibi haba sisiba nisidahibwa.
Sakira basyaange, ohubitira mu hufwa hwa Yesu, bulaanu hunyala ohwingira mu Sifwo Sihiramo Obwolerefu ataali ohutya.
Yatwikulirawo engira njiaha, engira enamu, eyibita mu lubugo esyeekesa siti, ohubitira mu mubiri kwae kweene.
Bulaanu huli nende Omulaamisi Muhuluundu oliinda enyumba ya Nasae.
Mani lehe husude aambi nende Nasae nende omyoyo kutaalimo esibi, okwichuule efukiirira, nihuli nende emyooyo chilabiiswe ohutulamo ebibaaso bibi, nende emibiri chooseebwe nende amaachi malafu.
Lehe hwomiirire hu suubi lihuli nalyo, olwohuba Nasae otusuubisa mwesikwa niye.
handi lehe hubaaseho hu basyeefwe, huhoonyane abeene-na-beene nihweekesa ohudahana handi nihuhola ebiindu bilai.
Hutaleha esaambo y'ohwebuusa alala, koti lu bandu bandi bahola. Ohutusaho, lehe hwemeede ohugumisania emyooyo, koti lu hubona huti, Oludaalo lw'Omwaami lusudire aambi.
Nihumalire ohumanya obwadyeeri, nae abeene hwaheengao ohwemeeda ohuhola ebibi, mani humanye huti, abulao esiyaanwa siindi esicha ohumalao ebibi.
Ohutusaho esidong'ere nihwo ohuliindirira nihutiire ohuheengerwa omusango handi nihutiire omuliro mwaalaba kucha ohusihirisa abo abayingania Nasae.

Olwohuba buli muundu otawulira amalako ka Musa yeetwa ataali ohusaasirwa naamalire ohuheengerwa omusango ohumuhira ohweema hu bujulisi bw'abandu babiri oba obw'abandu bahira babiri, abomiisa bati yahola esibi.

Bulaanu mubaasa muti omuundu olekeresa Omwaana wa Nasae, mani yaayira amabaanga k'embuliirisania lya Nasae akamwoosaho esibi koti esiindu sibulamo obuhoonyi, handi onyoolesa Mwooyo w'esisa, haba saacha hunyoola husaandisibwa hungi muno hwahoyerwa?
Olwohuba humanyire omuundu waboola ati, “Ohwetuunga hwange nihwo, mani njia ohwetuunga”; handi owaboola ati, “Omwaami achia ohuheengera omusango abandu bae.”
Siindu syohutya muno omuundu ohudiisibwa mu maani ka Nasae mulamu.
Mwichulise koti lu byali mu ndaalo chabita. Mu ndaalo echo, obulafu bwa Nasae nibumalire ohubahosaho, mwasaanda ebiindu biingi muno, nae haba simwayingirwa mu hulwaana hweeng'we.
Endaalo chiindi mwanyekwaanga mu moni w'abandu, handi baabasaandya. Handi endaalo chiindi mwali abetekefu ohweyambaania hu bandu basaandisibwa batyo.

Mwakwiira abandu bali mu mboye esisa, handi nibabang'uula ebiindu byeeng'we mwesimiirisira ebidinyu ebyo nende esangaalo, olwohuba mwali mwamanya muti, mwali nimusisiiri nende esiindu silayi sihirao, esiyindira emyaaka choosi.
Sakira mutalehana nende obugumu bweeng'we, olwohuba bucha ohubaleetera omuheemba muhoongo muno.
Muhoyeere ohwesimiirisira ebidinyu, hu munyale ohuhola si Nasae adaha, mani munyoole si Nasae yasuubisa.
Olwohuba koti lu byandiiko byolerefu biboola biti, “Hulw'esiha sidiidi muno, mani oyo oli ohwiicha achia ohwiicha, haba saacha huhiinda daawe;
nae omulungifu wange niye ochia ohubaao omulamu hulw'efukiirira, nae naatya mani yakobola enyuma, omwooyo kwaange haba sikuba kuchia ohumusangaalira daawe.”
Nae efwe haba sihuli abandu batya mani hwakobola enyuma mani husihirisibwe daawe, nae huli hw'abo abali nende efukiirira handi abaliinda bulai obulamu bwaabwe.
Bulaanu, ohuba nende efukiirira nihwo ohwekesera elalira huti, hucha ohunyoola ebiindu bi husuubira, ohwomiisira elalira huti hucha ohunyoola ebiindu bi hutabona.
Ohufukiirira hwa bandu ba hale nihwo okwakera Nasae yabasiima.
Efukiirira niyo eyikera hwamanya huti Nasae niye owaloonga ekulu nende esyaalo niyehoonyera emboosi yae, sakira ebiindu biboneha byaloongwa ohutula mu biindu bitaboneha.

Efukiirira niyo eyakera Abbeli ya yaanira Nasae esiyaanwa silayi muno ohuhira esya Kaini. Efukiirira ya Abbeli niyo eyakera Nasae yamusiima koti omuundu mulungifu, olwohuba Nasae mweene yasiima ebiyaanwa byae. Handi efukiirira niyo eyikera Abbeli yaaba nasilomaloma, kata nende ayahaba niyamala ohufwa.

Efukiirira niyo eyakera Enoka yaahaya ohufwa. Ohutusaho yayiribwa Mukulu eyiri Nasae, handi abulao omuundu yeesi owanyala ohumunyoola olwohuba Nasae yali amalire ohumuyira. Ebyandiiko byolerefu biboola biti, Enoka nasisiiri ohuyirwa Mukulu, yali amalire ohusangaasa Nasae.

Abulao omuundu yeesi onyala ohusangaasa Nasae ataali efukiirira. Olwohuba omuundu wiicha eyiri Nasae ahoyeere ohuba nafukiirira ati Nasae aliwo, handi achia ohubeeresa buli muundu omukoonya omuheemba.

Efukiirira niyo eyakera Nowa yaawulira ohulabula hwa Nasae ohudiira hu biindu byali nibicha ohukwaao. Efukiirira yakera Nowa yaawulira Nasae mani yoombaha elyaato li yawoneramo alala nende abandu bo mudaala lyae. Esyatulamo, esyaalo syaheengerwa omusango, nae Nowa yanyoola obuluungifu ohutula eyiri Nasae obutula mu fukiirira.

Efukiirira niyo eyakera Yibbulaimu yaawulira Nasae niyali namulaanga ohutula mu syaalo syae, ohuchia mu syaalo siyali nasubiise ohumuberesa. Yibbulaimu yaleha esyaalo syae syeene natamanyireho yi yali naacha.

Efukiirira yae niyo eyakera yaamenya koti omuteende mu syaalo si Nasae yali yamusuubisa. Yamenyanga mu yeema koti Yisaka nende Yakobbo baholaanga, bosi abanyoola esisuubise nasilala ohutula eyiri Nasae.
Olwohuba Yibbulaimu yali naliindiriire esiko si Nasae yatekeha, handi yoombaha; esiko syoombahwa hu misiingi chiyiindira.
Efukiirira niyo eyakera Yibbulaimu yehola laatang'ene bandu kata nende niyali nabitiriire mu myaka, handi Saara yesi yali nabitire emyaaka ch'ohwibula.
Kata nende Yibbulaimu yali naali koti omuundu wamala ohufwa, nae ohutula mu muundu mulala wuno, abaana abangi beebulwa abali koti ening'ining'i cho muukulu, oba koti omusenye kwo hu nyaanja.

Abandu bano boosi bafwiira mu fukiirira. Haba sibanyoola ebiindu bi Nasae yali yasuubisa, nae bali nibabibonera eyale muno mani babyakaanira, mani bomiisira elalira bati, bali Abateende busa handi abeyikami busa hu syaalo.
Abandu balomaloma ebiindu bino, beekesera elalira koti abali ohukoonya esyaalo syeene.
Haba sibabasaanga hu syaalo sibali nibaleha; baba nibahola batyo, bahanyoolere obweyaango bw'ohukobolayo.
Ohutusaho, bali nibekoomba esyaalo silai sihirao; esyo nisyo esyaalo syo Mukulu.

Efukiirira niyo eyakera Yibbulaimu, Nasae niyali naamuhema, yawaayo Yisaka omwaana wae, koti esiyaanwa. Yibbulaimu niye yi Nasae yahola nae esisuubise, nae yafukiirira kata ohuwaayo omwaana wae koti esiyaanwa.
Nasae yali kata namuboolere ati, “Ochia ohunyoola abeechuhulu ba ndahulaka ohubitira mu Yisaka.”
Yibbulaimu yamanya ati, Nasae anyala ohusyuuhisa abandu ohutula mu hufwa, sakira ohulomaloma hw'engeri yino huli koti, Yibbulaimu yakaanira Yisaka ohutula mu bafu.
Efukiirira niyo eyakera Yisaka yasuubisa Yakobbo nende Esau emikisa mu bulamu bwaabwe bw'omuumoni.
Efukiirira niyo eyakera Yakobbo yaaberesa abaana ba Yosefu emikisa nasisiiri ohufwa. Yaguunama hu mudiiro kwae mani yenamira Nasae.
Efukiirira niyo eyakera Yosefu naali aambi ohufwa yaalomaloma hu hutula hw'Abayisirayiri mu syaalo sy'Emisiri, mani yaaleha amakerako kadiira hu biindu bibahoyeere ohuhola hu mubiri kwae nafwiire.

Efukiirira niyo eyakera abebusi ba Musa, baamukisa embaka y'emyoosi chidatu naamalire ohwibulwa, olwohuba abeebusi bae bali babweene bati omwaana wuno yali aboneha bulai, mani haba sibatya ohuhaya ohuwulira amalako k'omutuki.
Efukiirira niyo eyakera Musa niyali naahulire, yakaana ohulaangibwa omwaana w'omuhaana wa Faraao.
Musa yasiima ohusaandira alala nende abandu ba Nasae, ohuhira ohwesangaasira mu sibi hulw'embaka ndiidi.
Musa yamanya ati, ohusaanda naanyekwa hulwa Masiiya hwali huhirira elalira eyale obuyiinda bw'Emisiri, olwohuba yali namanyire omuheemba kwaacha ohunyoola mu moni.
Efukiirira niyo eyakera yaatula mu Misiri, natatiireho etima lya Faraao. Yesimiirisa koti oli ohubona Nasae otabonehana, mani yaahaya ohukobola enyuma.
Efukiirira niyo eyakera Musa yataawo esidyaalo sya Paasaka, handi yaalagira ati, amabaanga kabahibwe hu njiki, hu malaika w'ohufwa ahaye ohwiita abaana b'Abayisirayiri baamberi.
Efukiirira niyo eyakera Abayisirayiri baambuha Enyaanja Njahanyu koti abali ohukeenda hu loba lyomu. Nae Abamiisiri nibateemaho ohuhola batyo, basihama baafwa.
Efukiirira niyo eyakera ebida bya Yeriko byaakwa aasi Abayisirayiri nibamala ohukeenda nibabyebodoohania ohumala endaalo chitaanu-na-chibiri.
Efukiirira niyo eyakera Rahabbu omucheke wekusa omweene, yaahaya ohwiitibwa nende abo abali nibahaya ohuwulira Nasae, olwohuba yakaanira bulai Abayisirayiri bahemeresi.
Bulaanu ndemeede handi ohuboola siina? Obweyaango haba sibuunganya ohulomaloma hu Gidioni, Bbaraki, Samusooni, Yefuta, Daudi, Samueli nende hu banabbi.
Olwo hufukiirira bano balwaana baayingira obutuki butaali nasilala. Bahola esiindu sihoyera mani banyoola si Nasae yabasuubisa. Kata beekala eminwa ch'edalang'i.
Basimya omuliro kwaaduha nende amaani, baona ohwiitibwa nende engaanga. Bali abikata, nae beehola ab'amaani. Beehola ab'amaani mu biita mani baayingira amaye k'Abateende.

Efukiirira niyo eyakera abahasi baabeereswa abeeho baabwe nibasyuuhire ohutula mu hufwa. Abandu bandi basaandisibwa nae baahaya kata ohutula mu mireembe, nae baafwa obuchuuni, hu banyala ohusyuuhira mu bulamu bulai buhirao.
Abandi bandi banyekwa, baahuyibwa, handi abandi baaboyebwa nende eminyororo baasukunibwa mu mboye.

Bahubbwa nende amakina, baatibwamo akati-kaati ebituundu bibiri nende emisumeeno, beetwa nende engaanga. Bakeendaanga nibefwaalire amaseero k'amakoondi nende embusi, nibataaliho nende esiindu syoosi, nibasandisibwa, nibayirwa bubi.
Esyaalo haba sisyali nisibahoyera elalira! Bayikanaanga mu siparara nende mu ngulu, bamenyaanga mu ng'ungu nende mu meena kali mu loba.
Bano boosi Nasae yabasiima hulw'efukiirira yaabwe! Kata boosi bahaba nibatanyoola esiindu si Nasae basuubisa,
olwohuba Nasae yali niyatutekehera esiindu silayi esihirao. Esichiiririrwa syae syali abo bosi beeholere aboolerefu elalira alala naafwe.

Olwohuba efwe koti lu huli nende esidiiyiha sihoongo sy'abajulisi sitwebodohaanie, lehe hwetuseho buli siindu syoosi esitwehiingamo, nende esibi syatwomeraho muno, mani hwiruhe nende esinani embiro chituli mu moni.

Lehe huhayisirye emoni cheefwe hu Yesu, yi fukiirira yeefwe yeemaho ohutula elalira hu huchaaka ohwolera elalira hu njakamo! Yesu haba siyatya omusalabba! Nae ohweema hu sangaalo lyali nilimuliindire mu moni, haba siyabaasa hu soni ch'ohufwiira hu musalabba chiyali achia ohunyoola, nae bulaanu yehaale hu muhono muluungi kw'esisaala sy'obutuki sya Nasae.
Baaseho hu bidinyu biyabitamo; koti lu yesimiirisira ebidinyu byakiire awo, ohutula mu mahono k'abaholi b'ebibi! Mani mutakanya omwooyo kw'eng'we kwawaamo amaani mani mwaakwa.
Olwohuba mu hulwaana hw'eng'we nende esibi, musisiiri ohwoola hu hwiidisa amabaanga keeng'we.
Eng'we mwibiriire emboosi chigumia chi Nasae yalomaloma nang'we koti abaana bae ati, “mwaana wange, otalekeresaanga Omwaami nahukolola, handi otawechaangamo omwooyo Omwaami nahuboneresa.
Olwohuba Omwaami akolola buli muundu yadaha, handi aboneresa buli muundu yayira koti omwaana.”
Mugumireenge ohusaanda hu munyoola koti esibonereso situla eyiri Laata yeng'we. Aliwo omwaana yeesi yi simwaana ataboneresaangaho nadaha ohumukolola?
Nimutanyoola ohusaandisibwa koti abaana bae boosi bali, sino syekesa siti haba simuli baana bae baadyeri, nae muli abaana b'erwaanyi busa.
Handi buli muundu hweefwe, ali nende simwaana omukolola, handi hubeesamo busa oluyaali. Mani bulaanu efwe sihuhoyeere ohuba abaloonga muno eyiri seefwe w'omwooyo mani hwanyoola obulamu?
Baseefwe abo bateemaho ohutukolola hulw'esiha sidiidi koti lu babona bati silayi yi bali ohutukolola. Nae Nasae atukolola natuboneresa hulw'obulayi bweefwe, hwaanyale ohutukabaho hu bwolerefu bwae.

Nihunyoola ohusaandisibwa nibatukolola, esiha esyo, ohusaandisibwa ohwo hutubonehera koti esiindu sibi, esituleetera obuchuuni busa. Nae luunyuma abomiisibwa nende esibonereso sifwaana sityo, banyoola omuheemba kw'esangaalo lw'obulamu bulungifu.
Siingise akulu amahono keeng'we kajoong'ere ako, handi yomiise amahumbo keeng'we katengereha ako!
Kendereenge buli siha hu ngira ngololofu, hu hukulu hulema huhaye ohulemera elalira, nae huwone.
Teemeho koti lu munyala ohubona muti, muli nende emireembe nende buli muundu yeesi, nimukeendera mu bulamu bwolerefu, olwohuba awumao omuundu yeesi ochia ohubona Omwaami naabula obwolerefu.
Mweliinde abulewo omuundu yeesi okobola enyuma mani yaafwirwa sya Nasae. Handi lehe omuundu yeesi atehola koti omusaala mululu okwemeeda ohuhula mani kwanyaasa echaasye nende obusiba bwakwo.
Mweliinde omuundu yeesi atehola omucheke handi otatya Nasae koti hale Esau owakusa ehabi yae y'obusiha koti omwaana muhuluundu hulw'esideru sy'eby'ohulya silala.

Mumanyire koti lunyuma yateemaho ohukoonya ehabi cha simwaana nae baahaya ohumuba olwohuba haba siyanyala ohunyoola engeri yoosi eyohukaluuhaniamo ebibaaso bya simwaana, kata nende ayahaba niyateemaho ohwekweeda nende amasika kae.

Musisiiri ohwoola hu hudiira hu biindu bimunyala ohudiiraho koti Bayisirayiri bali, koti hu lugulu lwa Sinai, olwali nende omuliro kwaaduha; musisiiri ohwoolaho hu siirima nende enang'oong'we, nende omuyaka kuduma,
ekono ly'eturumbeta, oba ekono ly'omuundu. Abandu nibawulira ekono elyo, bekongooya bati batawuliraho emboosi yindi,
olwohuba sibanyala ohwesimiirisira esilagiro syaboola siti, “Kata esisolo syoosi nisyegeeng'a hu lugulu olwo, sihoyeerwe ohuhubbwa amakina syaafwa.”
Ebiindu bibabona byali ni bitiisa muno mani byaakera Musa yaboola ati, “Ndi ohutengereha handi obuti bundiirire!”
Ohutusaho, mwiichire hu lugulu lwa Siyooni, nende mu siko sya Nasae mulamu, Yerusaalemu syo Mukulu, si bamalaika baasyo bali elifu nende elifu.

Mwiichire eyiri omukanda kw'abafukiirira Kristo, abaana ba Nasae b'amberi, ba baandiika ameeta kaabwe Mukulu. Mwiichire eyiri Nasae, oheengera abandu boosi emisango, nende eyiri emyooyo ch'abandu balayi abaholwa aboolerefu.
Mwiichire eyiri Yesu, owatekeha elakano yaaha, nende eyiri amabaanga keediswa akasuubisa ebiindu bilai muno ohuhiraho amabaanga ka Abbeli.

Sakira mweliinde, handi mutahaya ohuwulira emboosi ch'omuundu oli ohulomaloma. Nisiri siti, abo abahaya ohuwulira omuundu olomaloma nabeekesa ebidiira hu huhweliinda hw'omusyaalo muno haba sibaona, bulaanu naafwe hunaone hutye nihuubbira omukoongo omuundu olomaloma natula Mukulu nadaha ati hweliinde.
Mu biha ebyo, ekono lyadengaania esyaalo, nae ebiha bya bulaanu yasuubisa ati, “Handi njia ohudengaania ataali esyaalo syong'ene nae Ekulu lyosi!”
Emboosi chino, “Handi ehabi liindi,” cheekesa bulai chiti, bacha ohudengaania handi ohusindikisa buli siindu siloonge, nae ebiindu bitanyala ohudengaanisibwa byong'ene nibyo ebicha ohudoong'a.
Mani sakira, olwohuba mucha ohunyoola obwaami butanyala ohudengaanisibwa, lehe hwebase Nasae mani humwiinamire mu ngeri yimusangaasa, nihuli nende obuloonga nende ohutya;
olwohuba Nasae weefwe, ali omuliro kusihirisa.
Mwemeede ohudahana koti Abakurisito.
Mutebiriraanga ohwakaanira abakeni mu madaala keeng'we. Olwohuba aliwo abandu bandi abahola batyo, mani bakaanira bamalaika nibataamanyire.
Yichulisenge abandu bali mu mboye, koti mwahaba nimuli alala nabo mu mboye. Yichulisenge abamanani koti mwahaba nimusaandira alala nabo.

Abandu boosi bahoyeere ohwiisa oluyaali mu bulamu bw'ohudeehisania. Abandu badehisania badahaneenge ataali ohutula erwaanyi w'ohudeehisania hwaabwe. Olwohuba Nasae achia ohuheengera abacheke nende abayirani omusango.
Mweliinde mutaba nende obwekoombi bw'eseende, handi ebiindu bi muli ninabyo bibamaleenge. Olwohuba Nasae yaboola ati, “Siinjia hubaleha; siinjia hubajwaang'a.”
Mani lehe hube abomiifu mani huboole huti, “Omwaami niye omuhoonyi wange, haba siinjia hutya. Omuundu anyala ohuholaho siindu siina?”
Yichulise abemeresi beeng'we ababeekesa emboosi ya Nasae. Baaseho koti obulamu bwaabwe bwali, mani mulondakane nende efukiirira yaabwe.
Yesu Kristo haba saakaluuhana, niye nasilala oyo, ekulo, lwaleero, nende endaalo choosi.

Mutakanya enjekesa ngeni chikabuhaane chitaali echadyeeri chitabakosa ohutula hu ngira yadyeeri. Silayi emyooyo cheefwe ohunyoola amaani katula mu sisa sya Nasae ataali ohutula mu hwoseresa amalako kadiira hubyohulya akatahoonya kata abo abakaliinda.
Huli nende alutaari yi balaamisi ba Nasae bomu yeema ly'Esiyudaaya batafukiirirwa ohuyiryaaho.
Omulaamisi muhuluundu w'Esiyudaaya ayira amabaanga k'ebisolo mu Sifwo Sihiramo Obwolerefu, mani yakayaana koti esiyaanwa sy'ebibi; nae ebisolo byeene bisaambirwa erwaanyi w'eyeema.
Sakira Yesu yesi yafwiira erwaanyi w'esiko, hwaanyale ohulabya abandu ohutula hu bibi byaabwe nende amabaanga kae keene.
Mani sakira lehe hutule huchie yaali erwaanyi w'esifwo si bandu bamenyamo, huswaalire alala nae.
Olwohuba hu syaalo huno hubulaho esiko siyiindira; ohutusaho hukoonya esiko sichia ohwiicha.
Sakira lehe buli siha huwaanire Nasae esiyaanwa syeefwe sy'ohumufumia ohubitira mu Yesu Kristo, esiri koti esiyaanwa situla mu minwa chimutuumbula koti Omwaami.
Mutebirira ohuholaanga esilai nende ohuhonyanaanga, olwohuba bino nibyo ebiyaanwa bisangaasa Nasae.

Muwulireenge abemeresi beeng'we handi mubeseengemo oluyaali. Olwohuba nibo abaliinda obulamu bw'emyooyo cheeng'we nibatawuluuha, olwohuba bahoyeere ohutusa obujulisi eyiri Nasae obudiira hu buhalaabani bwaabwe.
Mutwekongooyereenge eyiri Nasae buli siha. Olwohuba humanyire huti, huli nende ebibaaso bilai, handi hudaha ohuhola ebiindu bilai ebiha byoosi.
Handi ndemeeda ohubekweeda muno endi, mundekongooyere eyiri Nasae anyale ohungalusa bwaangu yi muli.
Mani lehe Nasae w'emireembe, owasyuuhisa Omwaami weefwe Yesu ohutula mu bafu, Yesu Omwaayi Muhuluundu w'amakoondi ohubitira mu makulu kae akomiisa elakano litaakama,
ababeerese buli simudaha, hu munyale ohuhola ebiindu byadaha. Nasae oyo atuholeremo ebimusangaasa, nabitira mu Yesu Kristo. Nasae oyo ohoyeere ohubeereswa oluyaali endaalo choosi. Amiina.
Basyaange mbekweeda mutekeerese nende ohwesimiirisa emboosi chino echibagumia emyooyo. Olwohuba ebbarwa yi mbandikiire yino haba sindeeyi muno.
Mbeekesa mumanye muti, owasyeefwe Timoteo yamala ohulehuulwa ohutula mu mboye. Nae niyeecha bwaangu njia ohwiicha nae ohubabona.
Mutuheesere abemeresi beeng'we nende abandu ba Nasae boosi. Abafukiiriri baasyeefwe bali mu Yitale bosi baabatumira amaheeso.
Lehe esisa sya Nasae sibe naang'we mweesi. Amiina.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Ebbarwa yitula eyiri Yakobbo, omuhalaabani wa Nasae nende ow'Omwaami Yesu Kristo. Heesa eng'we enjia ehumi-na-chibiri ech'abandu basalaanira mu syaalo syoosi.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Basyaange, ebidinyu byabuli ngeri nibibakwaaho, mwebaleenge muti muli abeehabi.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Olwohuba mumanyire muti efukiirira y'eng'we niyihemebwa mani mwaahaya ohukwa, awo munyoola amaani kohwesimiirisa.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Mubone muti muli nende ohwesimiirisa mu bulamu bw'eng'we bwoosi, hu munyale ohwehola abandu balungifu handi abechufu, nimutaaliho esiindu syoosi simwekoomba.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Nae naliwo omuundu yeesi mweng'we otaali nende amakesi, leha yekongooye Nasae, ochia ohumubeeresa amakesi; olwohuba Nasae niye okaba ebiindu buli muundu mu bungi.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Nae oyo oba niyekongooya, lehe yekongooye nende efukiirira, natakanaa-kana. Omuundu yeesi okana-kana ali koti efwiinda y'omu nyaanja, yi muyaka kuhubba kwaayira eno nende era.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Omuundu ofwaana atyo, otanyala ohuheengao esy'ohuhola,

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: haba saacha hunyoola esiindu syoosi ohutula eyiri Omwaami.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Abakurisito bamanani bahoyeere ohwehoya Nasae nabaniinia akulu,

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: handi Abakurisito bayiinda, bahoyeere ohwehoya Nasae nabeesa aasi. Olwohuba abayiinda bacha ohumalibwao koti esimuli sy'omusiino.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Olwohuba elyuuba litula nende obumemu bwaalyo busimamula syooma; ebimuli byaahwo bikwa, mani obulayi bwaasyo bwaawa. Mu ngeri nasilala eyo nilwo lu bayiinda bacha ohusihiriswa nibasisiiri mu hunyaahana hwaabwe.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Ali nende ehabi omuundu womiirira mu fukiirira ebihemo nibimwoolaho, olwohuba naaba naamalire ohuyingira amahemo, achia ohunyoola ekofya y'obutuki y'obulamu yi Nasae yamala ohusuubisa abamuheera.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Omuundu nanyoola ebihemo bifwaana bityo, atabolaanga ati, “Ebihemo bino bitula eyiri Nasae,” olwohuba Nasae haba saanyala huhemebwa nende esibi syoosi, handi Nasae mweene saahemaangaho omuundu yeesi.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Nae omuundu yeesi anyoola ohuhemebwa ebibaaso byae biba nibihweesa omwooyo kwae nibikuyira mu sibi.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Mani obwekoombi bubi obwo buhula, mani bwebula esibi. Handi esibi nisihulire siibula ohufwa.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Basyaange baheerwa, mutabachibwaanga!

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Buli siyaanwa silayi handi esiichufu, situla Mukulu; situla eyiri Nasae Seefwe, owaloonga obulafu bwo Mukulu, otakaluuhana-kaluuhana oba yaleeta esiirima naakaluhaana.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Ohweema hu hudaha hwae omweene, yatwiibula handi nabitira mu mboosi y'adyeeri, huhunyale ohuba ebyaamo bitaangira mu biloonge byae byoosi.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Basyaange, mudiire emboosi chino bulai! Buli muundu ahoyeere ohuba omwangu mu huwulira, nae otaanguya ohulomaloma handi otanyoolera bwaangu.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Olwohuba etima ly'omuundu sirimuhoonya ohuhola bi obuluungifu bu Nasae adaha.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Sakira, mwetuseho buli saambo mbi yoosi, nende ebiholwa bibi. Mweweeyo eyiri Nasae handi mufukiirire emboosi yi yataaka mu myooyo cheeng'we, eyinyala ohubaonia.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Mutebacha abeene nimutekeeresa busa emboosi; nae muyite mu hola.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Olwohuba omuundu owulira emboosi, mani yaahaya ohuyita mu hola, afwaana koti omuundu weebona mu syebonero mani yaamanya koti lu afwaana.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Nae naamalire ohweebona koti lu afwaana, atulao ya waao, mani bwaangu-bwaangu niyebirira koti lu afwaana.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Nae niwehaliirisa bulai mu malako kaonia abandu, mani wemeeda ohukabaasaho, ataali ohutekeeresaanga busa hwong'ene mani waakebiirira, nae waakata mu hola, Nasae achia ohuhubeeresa emikisa mu byohola.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Omuundu yeesi nabaasa ati w'efukiirira, nae saanyala ohufuka olulimi lwae, efukiirira yae yiba yibulamo obuhoonyi, handi omweene aba yebachirisa busa.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Efukiirira yi Nasae Seefwe ayira koti eyadyeeri omuwuma ohwebachirisa, niyo yino: ohuliinda abaana bafwiire, nende abahasi bafwiire mu bidinyu byaabwe, nende ohweliinda esyaalo sitahunyaasa.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Basyaange, mu bulamu bweeng'we koti abafukiiririra mu Mwaami weefwe Yesu Kristo, Omwaami w'oluyaali, haba simuhoyeere ohusosola mu bandu nimweema hu huboneha hw'ohumukulu.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Niwichuhana omuundu muyiinda wefwaalire engila y'esaabbu nende engubo nyirifu niyeecha yi mwebusiire, handi omuundu wundi omumanani wefwaalire engubo ch'ebiseke yesi yeecha,

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: mani mwabeeresa omuundu muyiinda oluyaali, nimumuboolera muti, “Yihala hu sisaala silayi muno sino,” nae mu boolera omumanani muti, “Yema ala, oba muti, yihala aasi hu loba mu makulu kange ano,”

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: awo muba muteereo ohusosola akati-kaati weng'we mani mwehola koti abahengi b'omusango abali nende embaasa mbi.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Basyaange mutekeerese! Mubaasa muti Nasae haba siyadoola abamanani b'ohusyaalo ohuba abayiinda mu fukiirira handi ohunyoola Obwaami bu yasuubisa abandu bamudaha?

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Nae eng'we mulekeresa abamanani! Abandu bayiinda haba sinibo ababafwinyirira nibabahwehweesa nibabayira mu biina?

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Haba sinibo abalomaloma bubi hu liita ly'oluyaali limwanyoola?

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Nimwoseresa bulai amalako k'obutuki akali mu byaandiikwa byolerefu kaboola kati, “Daha owaasyo koti lu wedaha omweene,” awo muba muhola esiindu silayi.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Nae nimukabuhaniamo abandu ohweema hu huboneha hwaabwe hw'ohumukulu, awo muba muhola esibi, handi awo baabayira koti abahalaki b'amalako ohweema hu Lako liriwo.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Olwohuba omuundu yeesi ohalaka kata elako lala, aba koti ohalaake amalako koosi.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Olwohuba omuundu waboola ati, “Otayiranaanga,” niye yesi owaboola ati, “Otetaanga.” Kata notayiranaanga, nae weeta omuundu, awo oba omalire ohwehola omuhalaki w'amalako.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Mani lomalome haandi holeenge ebiindu koti abandu babacha ohuheengera omusango ohweema hu lako lireeta emireembe.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Olwohuba Nasae haba saachia hukwiira esisa omuundu otakwiira owaasye esisa namuheengera omusango.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Basyaange, silayi siina si muundu ali nasyo naboola ati, “Ndi nende efukiirira”, nae ebiholwa byae haba sibyekesa bityo? Efukiirira yae eyo yong'ene busa yinyala ohumuwonia?

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Koti esy'ohuboneraho, niwichuhira yabaawo owasyeeng'we musaacha oba omuhasi, otaaliho nende esy'ohwefwaala oba eby'ohulya bimala,

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: bimuhoonya siina mulala hweeng'we namuboolera ati, “Nasae ahubeerese ehabi! Ba bilai, handi olye bilai,” natamubereese syaaba nadaha mu bulamu bwae?

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Nilwo lu siri nende efukiirira: niyiba yong'ene ataali ebiholwa biyisiira, efukiirira eyo yiba efu.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Nae owundi hweeng'we niyeecha yaboola ati, “Ewe oli nende efukiirira, nae ese ndi nende ebiholwa.” Mba ndakobolamo endi, “Njekeseho koti lu onyala ohuba nende efukiirira ataali ebiholwa. Nae ese njia ohuhweekesa efukiirira yange ohweema hu biholwa byaange.”

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Mufukiirira muti Nasae aliwo mulala yeng'ene? Esyo silayi! Kata emisaambwa chosi chifukiirira chityo, handi chitengereha nende obuti.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Omusiru ewe! Odaha bahwekese bati efukiirira yibulamo ebiholwa yibula obuhoonyi?

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Yibbulaimu kuuka yeefwe yeehola omulungifu mu moni wa Nasae atye? Byali ohweema hu biholwa byae, koti lu yawaanira Nasae Yisaka omwaana wae hu alutaari.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Awo onyala ohubona oti, efukiirira yae nende ebiholwa byae biholera alala; handi efukiirira yae yomiisibwa nende ebiholwa byae.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Handi ebyandiiko byolerefu byolerera abweene ebiboola biti, “Yibbulaimu yafukiirira mu Nasae handi ohweema hu fukiirira yae, Nasae yamubala koti omuundu mulungifu.” Handi Nasae yalanga Yibbulaimu ati omwiicha wae.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Sakira, omuundu aholwa yaaba omulungifu nende Nasae ohweema hu biindu byaahola ataali ohweema hu fukiirira yong'ene.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Nilwo busa lu byali nende Rahabbu omuhasi mucheke wekusa. Nasae yamuhola ohuba omulungifu nae ohweema hu biholwa byae, koti lu yakaanira Abayisirayiri bahemeresi mani yaabahoonya ohwiruha nibabitira hu ngira yindi.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Mani koti lu mubiri kubulamo omwooyo kuli omufu, nilwo lwosi lu fukiirira yibulamo ebiholwa yosi yiri efu.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Basyaange, abaangi mweng'we muteehola ohuba abekesa. Olwohuba mumanyire muti efwe abeekesa bacha ohutuhengera omusango nende obwaalaba ohuhira abandu bandi.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Efwe fweesi ebiha bihira obuungi hudondobana nihuhola ebibi. Nae omuundu yeesi otadondobana mu nomaloma yae, oyo aba omulungifu elalira, onyala ohufuka obulamu bwae bwoosi.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Nihuta olusaala lundi mu munwa kw'esuhiri, lukera chatuwulira mani hwanyala ohuchiyira chaacha yihudaha yoosi.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Oba bonereho hu meeri chosi. Kata chahaba ehoongo chityo, nichiirusibwa nende omuyaka kw'amaani, chifukibwa nende engasi ndiidi, mani chaacha buli abundu woosi yi mufuka yadaha.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Olulimi lwosi luli lutyo. Kata nende niluli ahatundu hadiidi muno ahomubiri, nae lunyala ohwefumia hulw'ebiindu bikali bilulomaloma. Baaseho koti lu haliro hadiidi hanyala ohusaamba esichaha sihoongo!

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Olulimi lwosi luli koti omuliro. Lweechula ebibi. Olulimi situundu sy'omubiri kweefwe nae lunyaasa omubiri kwoosi. Handi olweene olwo nilwo oluwaambia omuliro hu mubiri kwoosi nilukutusa hu muliro kutaakama.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Omuundu anyala ohutuka ebiloonge byoosi, - ebisolo biteende nende amayoni, ebisolo byambaaka nende eng'eni mani yaabihola byaloongoyala.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Nae abulao omuundu yeesi onyala ohutuka olulimi. Olulimi lubi handi silutukiha, handi lweechula obusiba bwiita.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Hwehoonyera olulimi lweefwe ohufumia Omwaami handi Seefwe, handi hwehoonyera olulimi lweefwe lweene olwo ohuholima omuundu waloongwa mu fwaani ya Nasae.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Mu munwa mulala omwo nimwo omutula ohufumia Nasae nende ohuholima abandu. Basyaange, sino haba sisihoyera ohuba sityo!

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Mubaasa muti mu sulo ndala, munyala ohutulamo amaachi malai nende amaachi malulu?

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Basyaange, mubaasa muti omutuli kunyala ohwaamaho emisabbiibu, oba omusabbibbu kwaamaho emituli? Kata esulo y'amaachi k'omuunyu haba siyinyala husoohamo amaachi malai.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Wiina mw'eng'we omukesi handi omanyire ebiindu? Lehe yeekesenge amakesi kae nende ohumanya hwae mu bulamu bwae bulungifu, nende mu biholwa byae biholebwa mu buloonga nende mu makesi.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Nae mu myooyo cheeng'we nimuba nimwechulamo ehali-hali ebi nende obwimani, mani muleheenge ohweniinia nende ohwebacha nimuyingania obwadyeeri.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Obukesi buno haba sibufwaanana nende obwo obwiiha ohutula Mukulu daawe, nae bw'esyaalo nibwo, obutaali obunadiini, obw'omusaambwa.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Olwohuba ali ehali-hali nende obwiimani, awo wosi aliwo ohutabuhana nende ebibi by'engeri choosi.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Nae amakesi katula Mukulu kataangira ohuba amoolerefu; handi kaleeta emireembe, handi kalimo obuloonga, nende ohudeeba hu bandu bandi; keechulamo esisa mani keebula ebiholwa bilai. Haba sikalimo mwooyo mubi, oba obwebachirisi.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Handi abo abaleeta emireembe banyoolamo obwadyeeri bwataakwa mu mireembe.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Siina syeene esiletaanga ohulwaana nende obusoolo mw'eng'we? Ebiindu bino haba sibitula mu hwekoomba bweeng'we hubi ohubalwaaniramo?

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Mudaha ebiindu nae haba simubinyoola. Sakira muchaaka ohwiitana; handi mwekoomba ebiindu bimutanyala hunyoola. Sakira musoolana handi mwalwaana. Simunyoola ebiindu bimudaha olwohuba haba simwekongooya Nasae ohubibabeeresa.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Handi nimwekongooya haba simunyoola, olwohuba muli nende ebichiiririrwa bibi. Mwekongooya ohunyoola ebiindu bimwehoonyera ohwesangaasa abeene busa.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Eng'we abatesikiha! Mukoterwe muti, nimuwaamba esyaalo obwiicha muba abasuku ba Nasae? Omuundu odaha ohuwaamba esyaalo obwiicha, oyo aaba adaha ohuba omusuku wa Nasae.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Oba mubaasa muti ebyandiiko byolerefu bibulamo amahulundu kaboola kati, “Omwooyo kwa Nasae ku yatutaamo kwechulamo ehiinda?”

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Nae esisa si Nasae atwekesa, sihiramo amaani. Koti lu byandiiko byolerefu biboola, “Nasae ayingania abesuunga, nae abaloonga abakwiira esisa.”

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Mani mube abawulisi eyiri Nasae. Lwaanie Sitaani mani achia ohubatulaho niyeruha embiro.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Sude aambi nende Nasae, mani yesi achia ohusuda aambi nang'we. Eng'we abaholi b'ebibi, mwesaabe amahono keeng'we. Nae eng'we abakanaakana, mulabye emyooyo cheeng'we!

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Mweyendeherere nende esibeera mani mulire; Ohucheha hweeng'we hwehole ohulira, handi esangaalo ly'eng'we lyehole ohwewunamira!

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Mube abaloonga mu moni wa Nasae, mani achia ohubaniinia akulu.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Basyaange, mutalomalomaanga bubi hu basyeeng'we. Oyo yeesi olomaloma bubi hu waasye, oba oheengera owaasye omusango, aaba alomaloome bubi hu Malako ka Musa, handi aaba alekeresa Amalako. Nae nolekeresa Amalako, awo sooba oli omuundu owulira Amalako, nae oba oli omuundu olekeresa Amalako busa.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Olwohuba omuundu wataao Amalako niye omuheengi w'emisaango ali mulala yeng'ene. Oyo niye onyala ohuwonia oba yaasihirisa. Nae bulaanu ewe niiwe naanu oheengera owaasyo omusango?

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Nae bulaanu tekeerese eng'we ababoola muti, “Olwaleero oba muchuli hucha ohuchia mu siko nabulebe, mani humaleyo omwaaka mulala nihuchurusa hunyoole amagoba”.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Mukoterwe koti lu bulamu bweeng'we bunaabe muchuli! Muli koti enang'oong'we eliboneha ohumala esiha sidiidi, nilikotao. Nae simumanyireho ebidiira hu muchuli.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Mwahaboolere muti, “Omwaami naakanya, hucha ohuba abalamu, mani huhole sino oba sira.”

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Nae bulaanu eng'we mweniinia handi mwefumia busa. Ohwefumia hwengeri eyo, hubi nihwo.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Sakira omuundu yeesi omanyire esiindu silayi syahooyerwe ohuhola, mani yaahaya ohusihola, aaba aholere esibi.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Mani bulaanu eng'we mutekeerese! Mwelalihirire handi mulire hulw'ebidinyu bicha ohuboolaho!

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Obuyiinda bweeng'we bwamala ohubola handi embuungi chamala ohulya ebyefwaalo byeeng'we.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Esaabbu y'eng'we alala nende efeesa byamala ohuubba emberebeende, handi emberebeende chino chicha ohuba esyohuboneraho syekesa ebibi byeeng'we; mani chicha ohulya emibiri cheeng'we koti lu muliro kuhola. Mwehung'anisiiryeho obuyiinda mu ndaalo chisembayo chino.

book_name: EBBARWA YA YAKOBBO EBBARWA YI YAKOBBO YANDIIKA
verse_text: Mutekeerese, omuheemba kumwahaya ohutunga abahalaabani babahalaabanira mu ndalo cheeng'we, nguno kulira; handi nende ohulira hw'abandu bakesa hwoola mu matwi k'Omwaami w'Obunyala bwoosi.
